T01bsu036_u:6: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśitāparamapāramitāprāptairabhijñātābhijñātairmahāśrāvakaiḥ tadyathā - āyuṣmatā ca ājñātakauṇḍinyena, āyuṣmatā ca aśvajitā, āyuṣmatā ca bāṣpeṇa, āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā, āyuṣmatā ca bhadrikeṇa, āyuṣmatā ca mahākāśyapena, āyuṣmatā ca urubilvakāśyapena, āyuṣmatā ca nadīkāśyapena,
T01bsu036_u:7: āyuṣmatā ca gayākāśyapena, āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa, āyuṣmatā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena, āyuṣmatā ca mahākātyāyanena, āyuṣmatā ca aniruddhena,
T01bsu036_u:8: āyuṣmatā ca revatena, āyuṣmatā ca kapphinena, āyuṣmatā ca gavāṃpatinā,
T01bsu036_u:9: āyuṣmatā ca pilindavatsena, āyuṣmatā ca bakkulena, āyuṣmatā ca mahākauṣṭhilena, āyuṣmatā ca bharadvājena, āyuṣmatā ca mahānandena,
T01bsu036_u:10: āyuṣmatā ca upanandena, āyuṣmatā ca sundaranandena, āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputreṇa, āyuṣmatā ca subhūtinā āyuṣmatā ca rāhulena |
T01bsu036_u:11: ebhiścānyaiśca mahāśrāvakaiḥ - āyuṣmatā ca ānandena śaikṣeṇa |
T01bsu036_u:15: aśītyā ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavaivartikairekajātipratibaddhairyaduta anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
T01bsu036_u:17: | tadyathā - mañjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena,
T01bsu036_u:18: avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca sarvārthanāmnā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca ratnapāṇinā ca bhaiṣajyarājena ca bhaiṣajyasamudgatena ca vyūharājena ca pradānaśūreṇa ca ratnacandreṇa ca ratnaprabheṇa (Vaidya 2) ca pūrṇacandreṇa ca mahāvikrāmiṇā ca anantavikrāmiṇā ca trailokyavikrāmiṇā ca mahāpratibhānena ca
T01bsu036_u:19: satatasamitābhiyuktena ca dharaṇīdhareṇa ca akṣayamatinā ca padmaśriyā ca nakṣatrarājena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena, siṃhena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena |
T01bsu036_u:21: tadyathā - bhadrapālena ca ratnākareṇa ca susārthavāhena ca naradattena ca guhyaguptena ca varuṇadattena ca
T01bsu036_u:22: indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇā ca anupamamatinā ca sūryagarbheṇa ca dharaṇīṃdhareṇa ca |
T01bsu036_u:26: sūryeṇa ca devaputreṇa samantagandhena ca devaputreṇa ratnaprabheṇa ca devaputreṇa avabhāsaprabheṇa ca devaputreṇa |
T01bsu036_u:30: virūpākṣeṇa ca mahārājena, dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa ca mahārājena, vaiśravaṇena ca mahārājena |
T01bsu036_u:31: īśvareṇa ca devaputreṇa ca maheśvareṇa ca devaputreṇa triṃśaddevaputrasahasraparivārābhyām
T01bsu036_u:33: tadyathā - śikhinā ca brahmaṇā jyotiṣprabheṇa ca brahmaṇā |
T01bsu036_u:37: upanandena ca nāgarājena, sāgareṇa ca vāsukinā ca takṣakeṇa ca manasvinā ca anavataptena ca utpalakena ca nāgarājena |
T01bsu036_u:39: tadyathā - drumeṇa ca kinnararājena, mahādharmeṇa ca kinnararājena, sudharmeṇa ca kinnararājena,
T01bsu036_u:42: tadyathā - manojñena ca gandharveṇa manojñasvareṇa ca madhureṇa ca madhurasvareṇa ca gandharveṇa
T01bsu036_u:44: tadyathā - balinā ca asurendreṇa, kharaskandhena ca asurendreṇa,
T01bsu036_u:45: vemacitriṇā ca asurendreṇa, rāhuṇā ca asurendreṇa |
T01bsu036_u:48: mahātejasā ca garuḍendreṇa, mahākāyena ca mahāpūrṇena ca maharddhiprāptena ca garuḍendreṇa
T01bsu036_u:49: rājñā ca ajātaśatruṇā māgadhena vaidehīputreṇa sārdham
T01bsu036_u:50: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rcito 'pacāyito mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ
T01bsu036_u:51: sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitvā tasminneva mahādharmāsane paryaṅkamābhujya anantanirdeśapratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūdaniñjamānena kāyena sthito 'niñjaprāptena ca cittena |
T01bsu036_u:52: samanantarasamāpannasya khalu punarbhagavato māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ mahatpuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat, bhagavantaṃ tāśca catasraḥ parṣado 'bhyavākiran (Vaidya 3) sarvāvacca buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūccalitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam |
T01bsu036_u:53: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ, rājānaśca maṇḍalino balacakravartinaścaturdvīpakacakravartinaśca te sarve saparivārā bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayanti sma āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ
T01bsu036_u:54: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavato bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā |
T01bsu036_u:56: tāni ca sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma yāvadavīcirmahānirayo yāvacca bhavāgram |
T01bsu036_u:57: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ṣaṭsu gatiṣu sattvāḥ saṃvidyante sma, te sarve 'śeṣeṇa
T01bsu036_u:59: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti ca, te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:60: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, sa ca sarvo nikhilena śrūyate sma |
T01bsu036_u:61: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā yogino yogācārāḥ prāptaphalāścāprāptaphalāśca, te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:62: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
T01bsu036_u:65: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ, te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:66: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu parinirvṛtānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dhātustūpā ratnamayāḥ te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma ||
T01bsu036_u:69: ko nvatra heturbhaviṣyati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhagavatā idamevaṃrūpaṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ kṛtam? bhagavāṃśca samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:70: imāni caivaṃrūpāṇi mahāścaryādbhutācintyāni maharddhiprātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:71: kiṃ nu khalvahametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripṛccheyam? ko nvatra samarthaḥ
T01bsu036_u:72: syādetamarthaṃ visarjayitum? tasyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ
T01bsu036_u:74: dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi ca anena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpāṇi nimittāni bhaviṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:77: tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ bahūnāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato mahānimittaṃ prātihāryāvabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptānāmadbhutaprāptānāṃ kautūhalaprāptānāmetadabhavat - kiṃ nu khalu vayamimamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato maharddhiprātihāryāvabhāsaṃ kṛtaṃ paripṛcchema?
T01bsu036_u:78: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya ātmanā ca dharmasaṃśayaprāptastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mañjuśriyaṃ (Vaidya 4)
T01bsu036_u:79: kumārabhūtametadavocat - ko nvatra mañjuśrīrhetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadayamevaṃrūpa āścaryādbhuto bhagavatā ṛddhayavabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ, imāni cāṣṭādaśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇi vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni paramadarśanīyāni tathāgatapūrvaṃgamāni tathāgatapariṇāyakāni saṃdṛśyante?
T01bsu036_u:80: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:81: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mañjuśirī iyaṃ hi raśmiḥ pramuktā naranāyakena /
T01bsu036_u:83: māndāravāṇāṃ ca mahanta varṣaṃ puṣpāṇi muñcanti surāḥ suhṛṣṭāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:85: yehī mahī śobhatiyaṃ samantāt parṣāśca catvāra sulabdhaharṣāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:86: sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ imu saṃprakampitaṃ ṣaḍbhirvikārehi subhīṣmarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:87: sā caiva raśmī purimādiśāya aṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:88: avabhāsayī ekakṣaṇena sarve suvarṇavarṇā iva bhonti kṣetrāḥ // Saddhp_1.4
T01bsu036_u:89: yāvānavīcī paramaṃ bhavāgraṃ kṣetreṣu yāvanti ca teṣu sattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:90: ṣaṭsū gatīṣū tahi vidyamānā cyavanti ye cāpyupapadyi tatra // Saddhp_1.5
T01bsu036_u:91: karmāṇi citrā vividhāni teṣāṃgatīṣu dṛśyanti sukhā dukhā ca /
T01bsu036_u:92: hīnā praṇītā tatha madhyamā ca iha sthito addaśi sarvametat // Saddhp_1.6
T01bsu036_u:93: buddhāṃśca paśyāmi narendrasiṃhān prakāśayanto vivaranti dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:95: praśāsamānān bahusattvakoṭīḥ udāharanto madhurasvarāṃ giram // Saddhp_1.7
T01bsu036_u:97: dṛṣṭāntahetūnayutāna koṭibhiḥ prakāśayanto imu buddhadharmam // Saddhp_1.8
T01bsu036_u:98: duḥkhena saṃpīḍita ye ca sattvā jātījarākhinnamanā ajānakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:99: teṣāṃ prakāśenti praśāntanirvṛtiṃ duḥkhasya anto ayu bhikṣave ti //
T01bsu036_u:101: pratyekayānaṃ ca vadanti teṣāṃ saṃvarṇayanto ima dharmanetrīm //
T01bsu036_u:102: ye cāpi anye sugatasya putrā anuttaraṃ jñāna gaveṣamāṇāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:103: vividhāṃ kriyāṃ kurviṣu sarvakālaṃ teṣāṃ pi bodhāya vadanti varṇam //
T01bsu036_u:104: śṛṇomi paśyāmi ca mañjughoṣa iha sthito īdṛśakāni tatra /
T01bsu036_u:105: anyā viśeṣāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ pradeśamātraṃ tatu varṇayiṣye // Saddhp_1.12
T01bsu036_u:106: paśyāmi kṣetreṣu bahūṣu cāpi ye bodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:107: koṭīsahasrāṇi analpakāni vividhena vīryeṇa janenti bodhim // Saddhp_1.13
T01bsu036_u:108: dadanti dānāni tathaiva kecid dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ suvarṇam /
T01bsu036_u:109: muktāmaṇiṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ dāsāṃśca dāsī rathaaśvaeḍakān // Saddhp_1.14
T01bsu036_u:112: pariṇāmayanto iha agrabodhau vayaṃ hi yānasya bhavema lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:114: ahaṃ pi tasyo bhavi kṣipra lābhī dadanti dānāni imīdṛśāni // Saddhp_1.16
T01bsu036_u:116: savaijayantān ratanāmayāni dadanti dānāni tathaiva kecit // Saddhp_1.17 //
T01bsu036_u:117: dadanti putrāṃśca tathaiva putrīḥ priyāṇi māṃsāni dadanti kecit /
T01bsu036_u:118: hastāṃśca pādāṃśca dadanti yācitāḥ paryeṣamāṇā imamagrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:120: datvā ca dānāni prasannacittāḥ prārthenti jñānaṃ hi tathāgatānām //
T01bsu036_u:121: paśyāmyahaṃ mañjuśirī kahiṃcit sphītāni rājyāni vivarjayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:122: antaḥpurān dvīpa tathaiva sarvān amātyajñātīṃśca vihāya sarvān //
T01bsu036_u:123: upasaṃkramī lokavināyakeṣu pṛcchanti dharmaṃ pravaraṃ śivāya /
T01bsu036_u:124: kāṣāyavastrāṇi ca prāvaranti keśāṃśca śmaśrūṇyavatārayanti // Saddhp_1.21
T01bsu036_u:125: kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu bodhisattvān bhikṣū samānāḥ pavane vasanti /
T01bsu036_u:128: kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu bodhisattvān girikandareṣu praviśanti dhīrāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:131: abhijña pañceha ca sparśayitvā vasantyaraṇye sugatasya putrāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:132: pādaiḥ samaiḥ sthitviha keci dhīrāḥ kṛtāñjalī saṃmukhi nāyakānām /
T01bsu036_u:133: abhistavantīha harṣaṃ janitvā gāthāsahasrehi jinendrarājam // Saddhp_1.25
T01bsu036_u:134: smṛtimanta dāntāśca viśāradāśca sūkṣmāṃ cariṃ keci prajānamānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:135: pṛcchanti dharmaṃ dvipadottamānāṃ śrutvā ca te dharmadharā bhavanti //
T01bsu036_u:136: paribhāvitātmāna jinendraputrān kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu tatra tatra /
T01bsu036_u:139: nihatya māraṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ parāhanantī imu dharmadundubhim //
T01bsu036_u:141: avismayantān sugatasya putrān anunnatān śāntapraśāntacārīn // Saddhp_1.29
T01bsu036_u:143: vanaṣaṇḍa niśrāya tathānyarūpā avabhāsu kāyātu pramuñcamānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:145: vīrye sthitāḥ keci jinasya putrā middhaṃ jahitvā ca aśeṣato 'nye /
T01bsu036_u:146: caṃkramyayuktāḥ pavane vasanti vīryeṇa te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:147: ye cātra rakṣanti sadā viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ maṇiratnasādṛśam /
T01bsu036_u:148: paripūrṇacārī ca bhavanti tatra śīlena te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:149: kṣāntībalā keci jinasya putrā adhimānaprāptāna kṣamanti bhikṣuṇām /
T01bsu036_u:150: ākrośa paribhāṣa tathaiva tarjanāṃ kṣāntyā hi te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:151: kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu bodhisattvān krīḍāratiṃ sarva vivarjayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:152: bālān sahāyān parivarjayitvā āryeṣu saṃsargaratān samāhitān // Saddhp_1.34
T01bsu036_u:154: dhyāyanta varṣāṇa sahasrakoṭyo dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:155: dadanti dānāni tathaiva kecit saśiṣyasaṃgheṣu jineṣu saṃmukham /
T01bsu036_u:156: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānnaṃ gilānabhaiṣajya bahū analpakam //
T01bsu036_u:157: vastrāṇa koṭīśata te dadanti sahasrakoṭīśatamūlya kecit /
T01bsu036_u:159: anarghamūlyāṃśca dadanti vastrān saśiṣyasaṃghāna jināna saṃmukham //
T01bsu036_u:160: vihāra koṭīśata kārayitvā ratnāmayāṃśco tatha candanāmayān /
T01bsu036_u:162: ārāma caukṣāṃśca manoramāṃśca phalairupetān kusumaiśca citraiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:163: divāvihārārtha dadanti kecit saśrāvakāṇāṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇām // Saddhp_1.39
T01bsu036_u:164: dadanti dānānimamevarūpā vividhāni citrāṇi ca harṣajātāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:165: datvā ca bodhāya janenti vīryaṃ dānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:166: dharmaṃ ca kecit pravadanti śāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntahetūnayutairanekaiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:167: deśenti te prāṇasahasrakoṭināṃ jñānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:168: nirīhakā dharma prajānamānā dvayaṃ pravṛttāḥ khagatulyasādṛśāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:169: anopaliptāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ prajñāya te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:170: bhūyaśca paśyāmyahu mañjughoṣa parinirvṛtānāṃ sugatāna śāsane /
T01bsu036_u:171: utpanna dhīrā bahubodhisattvāḥ kurvanti satkāru jināna dhātuṣu //
T01bsu036_u:172: stūpāna paśyāmi sahasrakoṭyo analpakā yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:173: yebhiḥ sadā maṇḍita kṣetrakoṭiyo ye kāritā tehi jinātmajehi // Saddhp_1.44
T01bsu036_u:175: ratnāna saptāna viśiṣṭa ucchritāḥ sahasra pañco paripūrṇa yojanā /
T01bsu036_u:177: savaijayantāḥ sada śobhamānā ghaṇṭāsamūhai raṇamāna nityam /
T01bsu036_u:178: puṣpaiśca gandhaiśca tathaiva vādyaiḥ saṃpūjitā naramaruyakṣarākṣasaiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:179: kārāpayantī sugatasya putrā jināna dhātuṣviha pūjamīdṛśīm /
T01bsu036_u:180: yebhirdiśāyo daśa śobhitā yaḥ supuṣpitairvā yatha pārijātaiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:181: ahaṃ cimāśco bahuprāṇakoṭya iha sthitāḥ paśyiṣu sarvametat /
T01bsu036_u:182: prapuṣpitaṃ lokamimaṃ sadevakaṃ jinena muktā iyamekaraśmiḥ // Saddhp_1.48
T01bsu036_u:183: aho prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhasya aho 'sya jñānaṃ vipulaṃ anāsravam /
T01bsu036_u:184: yasyaikaraśmiḥ prasṛtādya loke darśeti kṣetrāṇa bahū sahasrān //
T01bsu036_u:185: āścaryaprāptāḥ sma nimitta dṛṣṭvā imamīdṛśaṃ cādbhutamaprameyam /
T01bsu036_u:186: vadasva mañjusvara etamarthaṃ kautūhalaṃ hyapanaya buddhaputra //
T01bsu036_u:187: catvārimā parṣa udagracittāstvāṃ cābhivīkṣantiha māṃ ca vīra /
T01bsu036_u:188: janehi harṣaṃ vyapanehi kāṅkṣāṃ tvaṃ vyākarohī sugatasya putra //
T01bsu036_u:189: kimarthameṣaḥ sugatena adya prabhāsa etādṛśako vimuktaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:191: aho prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhasya aho 'sya jñānaṃ vipulaṃ viśuddham //
T01bsu036_u:192: yasyaikaraśmī prasṛtādya loke darśeti kṣetrāṇa bahūn sahasrān /
T01bsu036_u:193: etādṛśo artha ayaṃ bhaviṣyati yenaiṣa raśmī vipulā pramuktā // Saddhp_1.53
T01bsu036_u:194: ye agradharmā sugatena spṛṣṭāstada bodhimaṇḍe puruṣottamena /
T01bsu036_u:195: kiṃ teha nirdekṣyati lokanātho atha vyākariṣyatyayu bodhisattvān //
T01bsu036_u:196: analpakaṃ kāraṇametta bheṣyati yaddarśitāḥ kṣetrasahasra neke /
T01bsu036_u:198: pṛccheti maitreyu jinasya putra spṛhenti te naramaruyakṣarākṣasāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:199: catvārimā parṣa udīkṣamāṇā mañjusvaraḥ kiṃ nviha vyākariṣyati //
T01bsu036_u:200: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma -
T01bsu036_u:202: mahādharmavṛṣṭhayabhipravarṣaṇaṃ ca mahādharmadundubhisaṃpravādanaṃ ca mahādharmadhvajasamucchrayaṇaṃ ca mahādharmolkāsaṃprajvālanaṃ ca mahādharmaśaṅkhābhiprapūraṇaṃ ca mahādharmabherīparāhaṇanaṃ ca mahādharmanirdeśaṃ ca adya kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:203: yathā mama kulaputrāḥ pratibhāti, yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmidamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭamabhūt, teṣāmapi pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃ raśmipramocanāvabhāso 'bhut |
T01bsu036_u:211: anusmarāmyahaṃ kulaputrā atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairaprameyairacintyairaparimitairapramāṇaistataḥpareṇa parataraṃ yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpo nāma
T01bsu036_u:213: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T01bsu036_u:214: sa dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam |
T01bsu036_u:215: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:216: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsānāṃ samatikramāya nirvāṇaparyavasānam bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma ||
T01bsu036_u:217: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa parataraṃ candrasūryapradīpa eva nāmnā tathāgato
T01bsu036_u:219: iti hi ajita etena paraṃparodāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmekanāmadheyānāmakekulagotrāṇāṃ yadidaṃ bharadvājasagotrāṇāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇyabhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:220: tatra ajita teṣāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇāṃ pūrvakaṃ tathāgatamupādāya yāvat
T01bsu036_u:222: 'bhūdarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T01bsu036_u:224: 'pi dharmaṃ deśitavān ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam |
T01bsu036_u:225: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśitavān
T01bsu036_u:226: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsānāṃ samatikramāya nirvāṇaparyavasānam |
T01bsu036_u:227: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharma deśitavān ||
T01bsu036_u:228: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya aṣṭau putrā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:231: anantamatiśca nāma, ratnamatiśca nāma, viśeṣamatiśca nāma,
T01bsu036_u:232: vimatisamuddhāṭī ca nāma, ghoṣamatiśca nāma, dharmamatiśca nāma rājakumāro
T01bsu036_u:234: teṣāṃ khalu punarajita aṣṭānāṃ rājakumārāṇāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyaputrāṇāṃ vipularddhirabhūt |
T01bsu036_u:237: te taṃ bhagavantamabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsaṃ viditvā anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ śrutvā sarvarājyaparibhogānutsṛjya taṃ bhagavantamanu pravrajitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:239: sadā ca brahmacāriṇo bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāśca te rājakumārā abhuvan ||
T01bsu036_u:240: tena khalu punarajita samayena sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato
T01bsu036_u:241: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitvā (Vaidya
T01bsu036_u:242: 13) tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte tasminneva mahādharmāsane paryaṅkamābhujya anantanirdeśapratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūdaniñjamānena kāyena sthitena aniñjamānena cittena |
T01bsu036_u:243: samanantarasamāpannasya khalu punastasya bhagavato māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ mahatpuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat |
T01bsu036_u:245: sarvāvacca tad buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūt calitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam |
T01bsu036_u:246: tena khalu punarajita samayena tena kālena ye tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ, rājānaśca maṇḍalino balacakravartinaścaturdvīpakacakravartinaśca, te sarve saparivārāstaṃ
T01bsu036_u:247: bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayanti sma āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ
T01bsu036_u:248: | atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya
T01bsu036_u:251: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sarvāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma, tadyathāpi nāma ajita etarhyetāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante ||
T01bsu036_u:252: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavato viṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ samanubaddhā abhuvan
T01bsu036_u:253: ye tasyāṃ parṣadi dharmaśravaṇikāḥ, te āścaryaprāptā abhūvan adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ
T01bsu036_u:255: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:257: sa ca bhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya taṃ varaprabhaṃ bodhisattvamārabhya saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:258: yāvat paripūrṇān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpān bhāṣitavān ekāsane niṣaṇṇo 'saṃpravedhamānena
T01bsu036_u:260: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadekāsane niṣaṇṇā tān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpāṃstasya bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sma |
T01bsu036_u:261: na ca tasyāṃ parṣadi ekasattvasyāpi kāyaklamatho 'bhūt, na ca cittaklamathaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:262: atha sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣaṣṭayantarakalpānāmatyayāt taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nirdiśya tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte parinirvāṇamārocitavān sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ purastāt - adya bhikṣavo 'syāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme tathāgato 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti ||
T01bsu036_u:264: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śrīgarbhaṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrīgarbho bodhisattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate |
T01bsu036_u:269: samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:270: taṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān
T01bsu036_u:271: aśītiṃ cāntarakalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān saṃprakāśitavān |
T01bsu036_u:272: tatra ajita ye tasya bhagavato 'ṣṭau putrā abhūvan,
T01bsu036_u:275: taiśca tataḥ paścādbahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭāni satkṛtāni ca |
T01bsu036_u:284: ārāgayitvā ca satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitānyarcitānyapacāyitāni |
T01bsu036_u:285: syātkhalu punaste ajita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena
T01bsu036_u:288: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena
T01bsu036_u:290: yaścāsau yaśaskāmo nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt kausīdyaprāptaḥ, tvameva ajita sa tena kālena tena samayena yaśaskāmo nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt kausīdyaprāptaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:291: iti hi ajita ahamanena paryāyeṇedaṃ bhagavataḥ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpāṃ raśmimutsṛṣṭāmevaṃ parimīmāṃse, yathā bhagavānapi taṃ
T01bsu036_u:292: saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitukāmaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:293: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta etamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:295: yadā jino āsi prajāna uttamaścandrasya sūryasya pradīpa nāma //
T01bsu036_u:296: saddharma deśeti prajāna nāyako vineti sattvāna anantakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:299: ye cāṣṭa putrāstada tasya āsan kumārabhūtasya vināyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:300: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pravrajitaṃ mahāmuniṃ jahitva kāmāṃllaghu sarvi prāvrajan //
T01bsu036_u:301: dharmaṃ ca so bhāṣati lokanātho anantanirdeśavaraṃ ti sūtram /
T01bsu036_u:303: samanantaraṃ bhāṣiya so vināyakaḥ paryaṅka bandhitva kṣaṇasmi tasmin /
T01bsu036_u:306: devāśca yakṣāśca sthitāntarīkṣe kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamasya //
T01bsu036_u:307: sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pracacāla tatkṣaṇam āścaryamatyadbhutamāsi tatra /
T01bsu036_u:308: raśmiṃ ca ekāṃ pramumoca nāyako bhruvāntarāttāmatidarśanīyām //
T01bsu036_u:309: pūrvāṃ ca gatvā diśa sā hi raśmiraṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇā /
T01bsu036_u:310: prabhāsayaṃ bhrājati sarvalokaṃ darśeti sattvāna cyutopapādam //
T01bsu036_u:311: ratnāmayā kṣetra tathātra kecidvaiḍūryanirbhāsa tathaiva kecit /
T01bsu036_u:312: dṛśyanti citrā atidarśanīyā raśmiprabhāsena vināyakasya // Saddhp_1.65 //
T01bsu036_u:313: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
T01bsu036_u:315: ye cābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti pūjenti ca lokadhātuṣu //
T01bsu036_u:316: buddhāśca dṛśyanti svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇayūpā iva darśanīyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:317: vaiḍūryamadhye ca suvarṇabimbaṃ parṣāya madhye pravadanti dharmam //
T01bsu036_u:318: tahi śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanā na vidyate te cāpramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:319: ekaikakṣetrasmi vināyakānāṃ raśmiprabhā darśayate hi sarvān // Saddhp_1.68
T01bsu036_u:321: dṛśyanti putrā naranāyakānāṃ viharanti ye parvatakandareṣu // Saddhp_1.69
T01bsu036_u:323: bahubodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ sarve 'pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā //
T01bsu036_u:324: aniñjamānāśca avedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:325: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasā dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:326: bhūtaṃ padaṃ śāntamanāsravaṃ ca prajānamānāśca prakāśayanti /
T01bsu036_u:328: dṛṣṭvā ca tā parṣa catasra tāyinaścandrārkadīpasya imaṃ prabhāvam /
T01bsu036_u:329: harṣasthitāḥ sarvi bhavitva tatkṣaṇamanyonya pṛcchanti kathaṃ nu etat //
T01bsu036_u:331: acirācca so naramaruyakṣapūjitaḥ samādhito vyutthita lokanāyakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:332: varaprabhaṃ putra tadādhyabhāṣata yo bodhisattvo vidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:333: lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /
T01bsu036_u:334: tvaṃ hyatra sākṣī mama dharmakośe yathāhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām //
T01bsu036_u:336: prabhāṣate tajjina agradharmān paripūrṇa so antarakalpa ṣaṣṭim //
T01bsu036_u:337: yaṃ caiva so bhāṣati lokanātho ekāsanasthaḥ pravarāgradharmam /
T01bsu036_u:338: taṃ sarvamādhārayi so jinātmajo varaprabho yo abhu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:339: so co jino bhāṣiya agradharmaṃ praharṣayitvā janatāmanekām /
T01bsu036_u:340: tasmiṃśca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ purato hi lokasya sadevakasya //
T01bsu036_u:341: prakāśitā me iya dharmanetrī ācakṣito dharmasvabhāva yādṛaśaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:342: nirvāṇakālo mama adya bhikṣavo rātrīya yāmasmiha madhyamasmin //
T01bsu036_u:343: bhavathāpramattā adhimuktisārā abhiyujyathā mahya imasmi śāsane /
T01bsu036_u:344: sudurlabhā bhonti jinā maharṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutāna atyayāt //
T01bsu036_u:348: āśvāsayitvā ca narendrarājā tāḥ prāṇakoṭyo bahavo acintiyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:349: mā bhāyathā bhikṣava nirvṛte mayi bhaviṣyatha buddha mamottareṇa //
T01bsu036_u:350: śrīgarbha eṣo vidu bodhisattvo gatiṃ gato jñāni anāsravasmin /
T01bsu036_u:351: spṛśiṣyate uttamamagrabodhiṃ vimalāgranetro ti jino bhaviṣyati //
T01bsu036_u:352: tāmeva rātriṃ tada yāmi madhyame parinirvṛto hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:353: śarīra vaistāriku tasya cābhūt stūpāna koṭīnayutā anantakā // Saddhp_1.84
T01bsu036_u:354: bhikṣuśca tatrā tatha bhikṣuṇīyo ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:355: analpakāste yatha gaṅgabālikā abhiyukta tasyo sugatasya śāsane //
T01bsu036_u:356: yaścāpi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇako varaprabho yena sa dharma dhāritaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:357: aśīti so antarakalpa pūrṇāṃ tahi śāsane bhāṣati agradharmān // Saddhp_1.86
T01bsu036_u:358: aṣṭāśataṃ tasya abhūṣi śiṣyāḥ paripācitā ye tada tena sarve /
T01bsu036_u:359: dṛṣṭā ca tebhirbahubuddhakoṭyaḥ satkāru teṣāṃ ca kṛto maharṣiṇām //
T01bsu036_u:360: caryāṃ caritvā tada ānulomikīṃ buddhā abhūvan bahulokadhātuṣu parasparaṃ te ca anantareṇa anyonya vyākarṣu tadāgrabodhaye // Saddhp_1.88
T01bsu036_u:362: teṣāṃ ca buddhāna paraṃpareṇa dīpaṃkaraḥ paścimako abhūṣi /
T01bsu036_u:364: yaścāsi tasyo sugatātmajasya varaprabhasyo tada dharma bhāṣataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:365: śiṣyaḥ kusīdaśca sa lolupātmā lābhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:367: uddeśa svādhyāyu tathāsya sarvo na tiṣṭhate bhāṣitu tasmi kāle //
T01bsu036_u:368: nāmaṃ ca tasyo imamevamāsīd yaśakāmanāmnā diśatāsu viśrutaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:369: sa cāpi tenākuśalena karmaṇā kalmāṣabhūtenabhisaṃskṛtena // Saddhp_1.92 //
T01bsu036_u:370: ārāgayī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ pūjāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāmakārṣīt /
T01bsu036_u:371: cīrṇā ca caryā vara ānulomikī dṛṣṭaśca buddho ayu śākyasiṃhaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:372: ayaṃ ca so paścimako bhaviṣyati anuttarāṃ lapsyati cāgrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:374: kausīdyaprāptastada yo babhūva parinirvṛtasya sugatasya śāsane /
T01bsu036_u:375: tvameva so tādṛśako babhūva ahaṃ ca āsīttada dharmabhāṇakaḥ // Saddhp_1.95
T01bsu036_u:376: imena haṃ kāraṇahetunādya dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ idamevarūpam /
T01bsu036_u:377: jñānasya tasya prathitaṃ nimittaṃ prathamaṃ mayā tatra vadāmi dṛṣṭam //
T01bsu036_u:380: tameva yaṃ icchati bhāṣaṇāya paryāyamagraṃ tadadyo mayā śrutaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:383: prayatā sucittā bhavathā kṛtāñjalī bhāṣiṣyate lokahitānukampī /
T01bsu036_u:384: varṣiṣyate dharmamanantavarṣaṃ tarpiṣyate ye sthita bodhihetoḥ //
T01bsu036_u:385: yeṣāṃ ca saṃdehagatīha kācid ye saṃśayā yā vicikitsa kācit /
T01bsu036_u:386: vyapaneṣyate tā vidurātmajānāṃ ye bodhisattvā iha bodhiprasthitāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:390: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃstataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:391: vyutthāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - gambhīraṃ śāriputra durdṛśaṃ duranubodhaṃ buddhajñānaṃ tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pratibuddham, durvijñeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tatkasya hetoḥ?
T01bsu036_u:403: tathāgata eva śāriputra tathāgatasya dharmān deśayet, yān dharmāṃstathāgato jānāti |
T01bsu036_u:405: sarvadharmānapi tathāgata eva jānāti, ye ca te dharmāḥ, yathā ca te dharmāḥ, yādṛśāśca te dharmāḥ, yallakṣaṇāśca te dharmāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:406: yatsvabhāvāśca te dharmāḥ, ye ca yathā ca yādṛśāśca yallakṣaṇāśca
T01bsu036_u:409: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:411: na śakyaṃ sarvaśo jñātuṃ sarvasattvairvināyakāḥ // Saddhp_2.1 //
T01bsu036_u:412: balā vimokṣā ye teṣāṃ vaiśāradyāśca yādṛśāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:413: yādṛśā buddhadharmāśca na śakyaṃ jñātu kenacit // Saddhp_2.2 //
T01bsu036_u:415: gambhīrā caiva sūkṣmā ca durvijñeyā sudurdṛśā // Saddhp_2.3 //
T01bsu036_u:417: phalaṃ me bodhimaṇḍasmin dṛṣṭaṃ yādṛśakaṃ hi tat // Saddhp_2.4 //
T01bsu036_u:418: ahaṃ ca tatprajānāmi ye cānye lokanāyakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:419: yathā yad yādṛśaṃ cāpi lakṣaṇaṃ cāsya yādṛśam // Saddhp_2.5 //
T01bsu036_u:421: na taddarśayituṃ śakyaṃ vyāhāro 'sya na vidyate /
T01bsu036_u:422: nāpyasau tādṛśaḥ kaścit sattvo lokasmi vidyate // Saddhp_2.6 //
T01bsu036_u:423: yasya taṃ deśayeddharma deśitaṃ cāpi jāniyāt /
T01bsu036_u:424: anyatra bodhisattvebhyo adhimuktīya ye sthitāḥ // Saddhp_2.7 //
T01bsu036_u:425: ye cāpi te lokavidusya śrāvakāḥ kṛtādhikārāḥ sugatānuvarṇitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:426: kṣīṇāsravā antimadehadhāriṇo na teṣa viṣayo 'sti jināna jñāne //
T01bsu036_u:427: sa caiva sarvā iya lokadhātu pūrṇā bhavecchārisutopamānām /
T01bsu036_u:428: ekībhavitvāna vicintayeyuḥ sugatasya jñānaṃ na hi śakya jānitum //
T01bsu036_u:429: saceha tvaṃ sādṛśakehi paṇḍitaiḥ pūrṇā bhaveyurdaśā pi ddiśāyo /
T01bsu036_u:430: ye cāpi mahyaṃ imi śrāvakānye teṣāṃ pi pūrṇā bhavi evameva // Saddhp_2.10
T01bsu036_u:431: ekībhavitvāna ca te 'dya sarve vicintayeyuḥ sugatasya jñānam /
T01bsu036_u:432: na śakta sarve sahitā pi jñātuṃ yathāprameyaṃ mama buddhajñānam //
T01bsu036_u:434: diśo daśaḥ sarva bhaveyuḥ pūrṇā yathā naḍānāṃ vanaveṇunāṃ vā //
T01bsu036_u:436: kalpāna koṭīnayutānanantānna tasya bhūtaṃ parijāni artham // Saddhp_2.13
T01bsu036_u:439: suviniścitārthā bahudharmabhāṇakāsteṣāṃ pi pūrṇā daśimā diśo bhavet //
T01bsu036_u:440: naḍāna veṇūna va nityakālamacchidrapūrṇo bhavi sarvalokaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:441: ekībhavitvāna vicintayeyuryo dharma sākṣāt sugatena dṛṣṭaḥ // Saddhp_2.15
T01bsu036_u:442: anucintayitvā bahukalpakoṭyo gaṅgā yathā vālika aprameyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:443: ananyacittāḥ sukhumāya prajñayā teṣāṃ pi cāsmin viṣayo na vidyate //
T01bsu036_u:444: avivartikā ye bhavi bodhisattvā analpakā yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:445: ananyacittāśca vicintayeyusteṣāṃ pi cāsmin viṣayo na vidyate //
T01bsu036_u:446: gambhīra dharmā sukhumā pi buddhā atarkikāḥ sarvi anāsravāśca /
T01bsu036_u:447: ahaṃ ca jānāmiha yādṛśā hi te te vā jinā loki daśaddiśāsu // Saddhp_2.18
T01bsu036_u:448: yaṃ śāriputro sugataḥ prabhāṣate adhimuktisaṃpanna bhavāhi tatra /
T01bsu036_u:449: ananyathāvādi jino maharṣī cireṇa pī bhāṣati uttamārtham // Saddhp_2.19 //
T01bsu036_u:450: āmantrayāmī imi sarvaśrāvakān pratyekabodhāya ca ye 'bhiprasthitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:451: saṃsthāpitā ye maya nirvṛtīya saṃmokṣitā duḥkhaparaṃparātaḥ // Saddhp_2.20
T01bsu036_u:452: upāyakauśalya mametadagraṃ bhāṣāmi dharmaṃ bahu yena loke /
T01bsu036_u:453: tahiṃ tahiṃ lagna pramocayāmi trīṇī ca yānānyupadarśayāmi // Saddhp_2.21
T01bsu036_u:455: atha khalu ye tatra parṣatsaṃnipāte mahāśrāvakā ājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhā arhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni ye cānye śrāvakayānikā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā ye ca pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitāḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmetadabhavat - ko nu hetuḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yad
T01bsu036_u:456: bhagavānadhimātramupāyakauśalyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ saṃvarṇayati? gambhīraścāyaṃ mayā dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti saṃvarṇayati? durvijñeyaśca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairiti saṃvarṇayati? yathā tāvad bhagavatā ekaiva
T01bsu036_u:458: asya ca vayaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtha na jānīmaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:459: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vicikitsākathaṃkathāṃ viditvā cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya ātmanā ca dharmasaṃśayaprāptastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo yad bhagavānadhimātraṃ punaḥ punastathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyajñānadarśanadharmadeśanāṃ saṃvarṇayati -
T01bsu036_u:461: durvijñeyaṃ ca saṃghābhāṣyamiti punaḥ punaḥ saṃvarṇayati |
T01bsu036_u:465: tatsādhu bhagavānnirdiśatu yatsaṃghāya tathāgato gambhīrasya tathāgatadharmasya punaḥ punaḥ saṃvarṇanāṃ karoti ||
T01bsu036_u:466: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:468: balā vimokṣā dhyānāśca aprameyā mi sparśitāḥ // Saddhp_2.22 //
T01bsu036_u:469: bodhimaṇḍaṃ ca kīrtesi pṛcchakaste na vidyate /
T01bsu036_u:470: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ ca kīrtesi na ca tvāṃ kaści pṛcchati // Saddhp_2.23 //
T01bsu036_u:472: jñānādhigama kīrtesi gambhīraṃ ca prabhāṣase // Saddhp_2.24 //
T01bsu036_u:474: nirvāṇaṃ prasthitā ye ca kimetad bhāṣate jinaḥ // Saddhp_2.25 //
T01bsu036_u:476: devā nāgāśca yakṣāśca gandharvāśca mahoragāḥ // Saddhp_2.26 //
T01bsu036_u:481: mamāpi saṃśayo hyatra svake sthāne narottama /
T01bsu036_u:482: kiṃ niṣṭhā mama nirvāṇe atha caryā mi darśitā // Saddhp_2.29 //
T01bsu036_u:484: pramuñca ghoṣaṃ varadundubhisvarā udāharasvā yatha eṣa dharmaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:485: ime sthitā putra jinasya aurasā vyavalokayantaśca kṛtāñjalī jinam //
T01bsu036_u:486: devāśca nāgāśca sayakṣarākṣasāḥ koṭīsahasrā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:487: ye cāpi prārthenti samagrabodhiṃ sahasraśītiḥ paripūrṇa ye sthitāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:488: rājāna ye mahipati cakravartino ye āgatāḥ kṣetrasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:489: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sagauravāḥ sthitāḥ kathaṃ nu caryāṃ paripūrayema //
T01bsu036_u:491: kimanenārthena bhāṣitena? tatkasya hetoḥ? utrasiṣyati śāriputra ayaṃ
T01bsu036_u:493: dvaitīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - bhāṣatāṃ bhagavān, bhāṣatāṃ sugata
T01bsu036_u:494: | tatkasya hetoḥ? santi bhagavaṃstasyāṃ parṣadi bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni
T01bsu036_u:495: prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvabuddhadarśāvīni prajñāvanti, yāni bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śraddhāsyanti pratīyiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti ||
T01bsu036_u:497: vispaṣṭu bhāṣasva jināna uttamā santīha parṣāya sahasra prāṇinām /
T01bsu036_u:498: śrāddhāḥ prasannāḥ sugate sagauravā jñāsyanti ye dharmamudāhṛtaṃ te //
T01bsu036_u:499: atha khalu bhagavān dvaitīyakamapyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - alaṃ śāriputra anenārthena prakāśitena |
T01bsu036_u:500: utrasiṣyati śāriputra ayaṃ sadevako loko 'sminnarthe vyākriyamāṇe |
T01bsu036_u:503: alaṃ hi dharmeṇiha bhāṣitena sūkṣmaṃ idaṃ jñānamatarkikaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:504: abhimānaprāptā bahu santi bālā nirdiṣṭadharmasmi kṣipe ajānakāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:508: mādṛśānāṃ bhagavanniha parṣadi bahūni prāṇiśatāni saṃvidyante, anyāni ca bhagavan bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi, yāni bhagavatā pūrvabhaveṣu paripācitāni,
T01bsu036_u:509: tāni bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śraddhāsyanti pratīyiṣyanti udgahīṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:511: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:512: bhāṣasva dharmaṃ dvipadānamuttamā ahaṃ tvāmadhyeṣami jyeṣṭhaputraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:513: santīha prāṇīna sahasrakoṭayo ye śraddadhāsyanti te dharma bhāṣitam //
T01bsu036_u:514: ye ca tvayā pūrvabhaveṣu nityaṃ paripācitāḥ sattva sudīrgharātram /
T01bsu036_u:515: kṛtāñjalī te pi sthitātra sarve ye śraddadhāsyanti tavaita dharmam //
T01bsu036_u:516: asmādṛśā dvādaśime śatāśca ye cāpi te prasthita agrabodhaye /
T01bsu036_u:517: tān paśyamānaḥ sugataḥ prabhāṣatāṃ teṣāṃ ca harṣaṃ paramaṃ janetu //
T01bsu036_u:518: atha khalu bhagavāṃstraitīyakamapyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yadidānīṃ tvaṃ śāriputra
T01bsu036_u:520: evamadhyeṣamāṇaṃ tvāṃ śāriputra kiṃ vakṣyāmi ? tena hi śāriputra śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
T01bsu036_u:522: samanantarabhāṣitā ceyaṃ bhagavatā vāk, atha khalu tataḥ parṣada ābhimānikānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṃ pañcamātrāṇi sahasrāṇyutthāya āsanebhyo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā tataḥ
T01bsu036_u:524: te ātmānaṃ savraṇaṃ jñātvā tataḥ parṣado 'pakrāntāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:526: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - nippalāvā me śāriputra parṣat apagataphalguḥ śraddhāsāre pratiṣṭhitā |
T01bsu036_u:531: bhagavānetadavocat - kadācit karhicicchāriputra tathāgata evaṃrūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayati
T01bsu036_u:532: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra udumbarapuṣpaṃ kadācit karhicit saṃdṛśyate, evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pi kadācit karhicit evaṃrūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayati |
T01bsu036_u:541: ekakṛtyena śāriputra ekakaraṇīyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate mahākṛtyena mahākaraṇīyena |
T01bsu036_u:542: katamaṃ ca śāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyaṃ yena kṛtyena
T01bsu036_u:543: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate? yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:547: tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate
T01bsu036_u:552: idaṃ tacchāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyamekaprayojanaṃ loke prādurbhāvāya |
T01bsu036_u:553: iti hi śāriputra yattathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyam, tattathāgataḥ karoti |
T01bsu036_u:560: ekamevāhaṃ śāriputra yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharma deśayāmi yadidaṃ buddhayānam |
T01bsu036_u:561: na kiṃcicchāriputra dvitīyaṃ vā tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate |
T01bsu036_u:563: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye 'pi tu śāriputra atīta
T01bsu036_u:564: 'dhvanyabhūvan daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai
T01bsu036_u:565: mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:566: ye nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:568: sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ, yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam, yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanameva sattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:569: tathāgatajñānadarśanasaṃdarśanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇameva tathāgatajñānadarśanapratibodhanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanamārgāvatāraṇameva sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:570: yairapi śāriputra sattvaisteṣāmatītānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt saddharmaḥ śrutaḥ, te 'pi sarve 'nuttarāyāḥ
T01bsu036_u:573: ye 'pi te śāriputra anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, ye ca nānābhirnihāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti, te 'pi
T01bsu036_u:574: sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam, yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanameva sattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:575: tathāgatajñānadarśanasaṃdarśanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇameva tathāgatajñānadarśanapratibodhanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanamārgāvatāraṇameva sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:577: 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti, te 'pi sarve 'nuttarāyāḥ
T01bsu036_u:579: ye 'pi te śāriputra etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti ghriyante yāpayanti, dharmaṃ ca deśayanti
T01bsu036_u:580: bahujanahitāya bahujanahitāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca, ye nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayanti, te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam, yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanameva sattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:581: tathāgatajñānadarśanasaṃdarśanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇameva tathāgatajñānadarśanapratibodhanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanamārgāvatāraṇameva sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
T01bsu036_u:583: 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāṃ pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, te 'pi sarve 'nuttarāyāḥ
T01bsu036_u:585: ahamapi śāriputra etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
T01bsu036_u:586: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayāmi |
T01bsu036_u:587: ahamapi śāriputra ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam, yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanameva sattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:588: tathāgatajñānadarśanasaṃdarśanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇameva tathāgatajñānadarśanapratibodhanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanamārgāvatāraṇameva sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi |
T01bsu036_u:590: te śāriputra sattvā etarhi mamemaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, te 'pi sarve
T01bsu036_u:592: tadanenāpi śāriputra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā nāsti dvitīyasya yānasya kvaciddaśasu dikṣu loke prajñaptiḥ, kutaḥ punastṛtīyasya ||
T01bsu036_u:593: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra yadā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā kalpakaṣāye (Vaidya 29) votpadyante sattvakaṣāye vā kleśakaṣāye vā dṛṣṭikaṣāye vā āyuṣkaṣāye votpadyante |
T01bsu036_u:594: evaṃrūpeṣu śāriputra kalpasaṃkṣobhakaṣāyeṣu bahusattveṣu lubdheṣvalpakuśalamūleṣu tadā śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā upāyakauśalyena tadevaikaṃ buddhayānaṃ triyānanirdeśena nirdiśanti |
T01bsu036_u:595: tatra śāriputra ye śrāvakā arhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā vā imāṃ kriyāṃ tathāgatasya buddhayānasamādapanāṃ na śṛṇvanti nāvataranti nāvabudhyanti, na te śāriputra tathāgatasya śrāvakā veditavyāḥ, nāpyarhanto nāpi pratyekabuddhā veditavyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:596: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra yaḥ kaścid bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā arhattvaṃ
T01bsu036_u:598: 'smi buddhayānāditi vadet, etāvanme samucchrayasya paścimakaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ
T01bsu036_u:601: asthānametacchāriputra anavakāśo yadbhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ saṃmukhībhūte tathāgate imaṃḥ dharmaṃ śrutvā na śraddadhyāt sthāpayitvā parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya |
T01bsu036_u:602: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi śāriputra śrāvakāstasmin kāle tasmin
T01bsu036_u:603: samaye parinirvṛte tathāgate eteṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ dhārakā vā deśakā vā bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:604: anyeṣu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu niḥsaṃśayā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:605: imeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śraddadhādhvaṃ me śāriputra pattīyata avakalpayata |
T01bsu036_u:606: na hi śāriputra tathāgatānāṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃvidyate |
T01bsu036_u:608: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:614: tatteṣāṃ kuśalaṃ nāsti śṛṇuyurdharma ye imam // Saddhp_2.40 //
T01bsu036_u:615: śuddhā ca niṣpalāvā ca susthitā pariṣanmama /
T01bsu036_u:616: phalguvyapagatā sarvā sārā ceyaṃ pratiṣṭhitā // Saddhp_2.41 //
T01bsu036_u:617: śṛṇohi me śārisutā yathaiṣa saṃbuddha dharmaḥ puruṣottamehi /
T01bsu036_u:618: yathā ca buddhāḥ kathayanti nāyakā upāyakauśalyaśatairanekaiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:619: yathāśayaṃ jāniya te cariṃ ca nānādhimuktāniha prāṇakoṭinām /
T01bsu036_u:621: citrāṇi karmāṇi viditva teṣāṃ purākṛtaṃ yatkuśalaṃ ca tehi // Saddhp_2.43
T01bsu036_u:622: nānāniruktīhi ca kāraṇehi saṃprāpayāmī ima teṣa prāṇinām /
T01bsu036_u:623: hetūhi dṛṣṭāntaśatehi cāhaṃ tathā tathā toṣayi sarvasattvān // Saddhp_2.44
T01bsu036_u:624: sūtrāṇi bhāṣāmi tathaiva gāthā itivṛttakaṃ jātakamadbhutaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:625: nidāna aupamyaśataiśca citrairgeyaṃ ca bhāṣāmi tathopadeśān // Saddhp_2.45
T01bsu036_u:626: ye bhonti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
T01bsu036_u:629: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha //
T01bsu036_u:630: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
T01bsu036_u:631: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathaṃci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaniścayam //
T01bsu036_u:633: upāya eṣo varadasya jñāne praveśanārthāya nidarśito me // Saddhp_2.49 //
T01bsu036_u:634: bhavanti ye ceha sadā viśuddhā vyaktā śucī sūrata buddhaputrāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:635: kṛtādhikārā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu vaipulyasūtrāṇi vadāmi teṣām // Saddhp_2.50
T01bsu036_u:637: tathā hi te āśayasaṃpadāya viśuddharūpāya samanvitābhūn /
T01bsu036_u:638: vadāmi tān buddha bhaviṣyatheti anāgate 'dhvāni hitānukampakāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:639: śrutvā ca prītisphuṭa bhonti sarve buddhā bhaviṣyāma jagatpradhānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:640: punaśca haṃ jāniya teṣa caryāṃ vaipulyasūtrāṇi prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_2.52
T01bsu036_u:641: ime ca te śrāvaka nāyakasya yehi śrutaṃ śāsanametamagryam /
T01bsu036_u:642: ekāpi gāthā śruta dhāritā vā sarveṣa bodhāya na saṃśayo 'sti //
T01bsu036_u:643: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtiyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
T01bsu036_u:645: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:646: ekaṃ hi kāryaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:647: pratiṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayaṃbhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:648: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa-indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhapeti //
T01bsu036_u:649: mātsaryadoṣo hi bhaveta mahyaṃ spṛśitva bodhiṃ virajāṃ viśiṣṭām /
T01bsu036_u:650: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattvaṃ na mamate sādhu //
T01bsu036_u:651: mātsarya mahyaṃ na kahiṃci vidyate īrṣyā na me nāpi ca chandarāgaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:653: ucchinna pāpā mama sarvadharmāstenāsmi buddho jagato 'nubodhāt //
T01bsu036_u:654: yathā hyahaṃ citritu lakṣaṇehi prabhāsayanto imu sarvalokam /
T01bsu036_u:656: evaṃ ca cintemyahu śāriputra kathaṃ nu evaṃ bhavi sarvasattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:658: yathā ca paśyāmi yathā ca cintaye yathā ca saṃkalpa mamāsi pūrvam /
T01bsu036_u:659: paripūrṇametat praṇidhānu mahyaṃ buddhā ca bodhiṃ ca prakāśayāmi //
T01bsu036_u:660: sacedahaṃ śārisutā vadeyaṃ sattvāna bodhāya janetha chandam /
T01bsu036_u:661: ajānakāḥ sarva bhrameyuratra na jātu gṛhṇīyu subhāṣitaṃ me // Saddhp_2.62
T01bsu036_u:662: tāṃścaiva haṃ jāniya evarūpān na cīrṇacaryāḥ purimāsu jātiṣu /
T01bsu036_u:663: adhyoṣitāḥ kāmaguṇeṣu saktāstṛṣṇāya saṃmūrchita mohacittāḥ // Saddhp_2.63
T01bsu036_u:664: te kāmahetoḥ prapatanti durgatiṃ ṣaṭsū gatīṣū parikhidyamānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:665: kaṭasī ca vardhenti punaḥ punaste duḥkhena saṃpīḍita alpapuṇyāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:666: vilagna dṛṣṭīgahaneṣu nityamastīti nāstīti tathāsti nāsti /
T01bsu036_u:667: dvāṣaṣṭi dṛṣṭīkṛta niśrayitvā asanta bhāvaṃ parigṛhya te sthitāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:669: duḥśodhakā mānina dambhinaśca vaṅkāḥ śaṭhā alpaśrutāśca bālāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:670: te naiva śṛṇvanti subuddhaghoṣaṃ kadāci pi jātisahasrakoṭiṣu //
T01bsu036_u:671: teṣāmahaṃ śārisutā upāyaṃ vadāmi duḥkhasya karotha antam /
T01bsu036_u:672: duḥkhena saṃpīḍita dṛṣṭva sattvān nirvāṇa tatrāpyupadarśayāmi //
T01bsu036_u:673: evaṃ ca bhāṣāmyahu nityanirvṛtā ādipraśāntā imi sarvadharmāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:674: caryāṃ ca so pūriya buddhaputro anāgate 'dhvāni jino bhaviṣyati //
T01bsu036_u:676: ekaṃ tu yānaṃ hi nayaśca eka ekā ciyaṃ deśana nāyakānām // Saddhp_2.69 //
T01bsu036_u:677: vyapanehi kāṅkṣāṃ tatha saṃśayaṃ ca yeṣāṃ ca keṣāṃ ciha kāṅkṣa vidyate /
T01bsu036_u:678: ananyathāvādina lokanāyakā ekaṃ idaṃ yānu dvitīyu nāsti // Saddhp_2.70 //
T01bsu036_u:679: ye cāpyabhūvan purimāstathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā buddhasahasra neke /
T01bsu036_u:680: atītamadhvānamasaṃkhyakalpe teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ na kadāci vidyate //
T01bsu036_u:681: sarvehi tehi puruṣottamehi prakāśitā dharma bahū viśuddhāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:683: sarve ca te darśayi ekayānamekaṃ ca yānaṃ avatārayanti /
T01bsu036_u:685: ekasmi yāne paripācayanti acintiyā prāṇisahasrakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_2.73 //
T01bsu036_u:686: anye upāyā vividhā jinānāṃ yehī prakāśentimamagradharmam /
T01bsu036_u:687: jñātvādhimuktiṃ tatha āśayaṃ ca tathāgatā loki sadevakasmin // Saddhp_2.74
T01bsu036_u:688: ye cāpi sattvāstahi teṣa saṃmukhaṃ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ atha vā śrutāvinaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:689: dānaṃ ca dattaṃ caritaṃ ca śīlaṃ kṣāntyā ca saṃpādita sarvacaryāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:690: vīryeṇa dhyānena kṛtādhikārāḥ prajñāya vā cintita eti dharmāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:691: vividhāni puṇyāni kṛtāni yehi te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:692: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca jināna teṣāṃ ye śāsane kecidabhūṣi sattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:693: kṣāntā ca dāntā ca vinīta tatra te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:694: ye cāpi dhātūna karonti pūjāṃ jināna teṣāṃ parinirvṛtānām /
T01bsu036_u:695: ratnāmayān stūpasahasra nekān suvarṇarūpyasya ca sphāṭikasya //
T01bsu036_u:696: ye cāśmagarbhasya karonti stūpān karketanāmuktamayāṃśca kecit /
T01bsu036_u:697: vaiḍūryaśreṣṭhasya tathendranīlān te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:698: ye cāpi śaileṣu karonti stūpān ye candanānāmagurusya kecit /
T01bsu036_u:699: ye devadārūsya karonti stūpān ye dārusaṃghātamayāṃśca kecit // Saddhp_2.80
T01bsu036_u:701: iṣṭāmayān mṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāśca kurvanti jināna stūpān /
T01bsu036_u:702: uddiśya ye pāṃsukarāśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca kārayanti // Saddhp_2.81
T01bsu036_u:703: sikatāmayān vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye keciduddiśya jināna stūpān /
T01bsu036_u:704: kumārakāḥ krīḍiṣu tatra tatra te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:706: uddiśya kārāpita yehi cāpi te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.83
T01bsu036_u:707: ye saptaratnāmaya tatra kecid ye tāmrikā vā tatha kāṃsikā vā /
T01bsu036_u:708: kārāpayīṣu sugatāna bimbā te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.84
T01bsu036_u:709: sīsasya lohasya ca mṛttikāya vā kārāpayīṣu sugatāna vigrahān /
T01bsu036_u:710: ye pustakarmāmaya darśanīyāṃste sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:711: ye citrabhittīṣu karonti vigrahān paripūrṇagātrān śatapuṇyalakṣaṇān /
T01bsu036_u:712: likhetsvayaṃ cāpi likhāpayedvā te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:713: ye cāpi kecittahi śikṣamāṇāḥ krīḍāratiṃ cāpi vinodayantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:714: nakhena kāṣṭhena kṛtāsi vigrahān bhittīṣu puruṣā ca kumārakā vā //
T01bsu036_u:715: sarve ca te kārūṇikā abhūvan sarve 'pi te tārayi prāṇikoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:717: samādapentā bahubodhisatvāṃste sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:718: dhātūṣu yaiścāpi tathāgatānāṃ stūpeṣu vā mṛttikavigraheṣu vā /
T01bsu036_u:719: ālekhyabhittīṣvapi pāṃsustūpe puṣpā ca gandhā ca pradatta āsīt //
T01bsu036_u:720: vādyā ca vādāpita yehi tatra bheryo 'tha śaṅkhāḥ paṭahāḥ sughoṣakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:721: nirnāditā dundubhayaśca yehi pūjāvidhānāya varāgrabodhinām // Saddhp_2.90
T01bsu036_u:722: vīṇāśca tālā paṇavāśca yehi mṛdaṅga vaṃśā tuṇavā manojñāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:723: ekotsavā vā sukumārakā vā te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_2.91
T01bsu036_u:724: vādāpitā jhallariyo 'pi yehi jalamaṇḍakā carpaṭamaṇḍakā vā /
T01bsu036_u:725: sugatāna uddiśyatha pūjanārthaṃ gītaṃ sugītaṃ madhuraṃ manojñam //
T01bsu036_u:726: sarve ca te buddha abhūṣi loke kṛtvāna tāṃ bahuvidhadhātupūjām /
T01bsu036_u:727: kimalpakaṃ pi sugatāna dhātuṣu ekaṃ pi vādāpiya vādyabhāṇḍam //
T01bsu036_u:728: puṣpeṇa caikena pi pūjayitvā ālekhyabhittau sugatāna bimbān /
T01bsu036_u:729: vikṣiptacittā pi ca pūjayitvā anupūrva drakṣyanti ca buddhakoṭyaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:731: yaiścāñjalistatra kṛto 'pi stūpe paripūrṇa ekā talasaktikā vā /
T01bsu036_u:733: namo 'stu buddhāya kṛtaikavāraṃ yehī tadā dhātudhareṣu teṣu /
T01bsu036_u:734: vikṣiptacittairapi ekavāraṃ te sarvi prāptā imamagrabodhim // Saddhp_2.96
T01bsu036_u:735: sugatāna teṣāṃ tada tasmi kāle parinirvṛtānāmatha tiṣṭhatāṃ vā /
T01bsu036_u:736: ye dharmanāmāpi śruṇiṃsu sattvāste sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:737: anāgatā pī bahubuddhakoṭyo acintiyā yeṣu pramāṇu nāsti /
T01bsu036_u:738: te pī jinā uttamalokanāthāḥ prakāśayiṣyanti upāyametam // Saddhp_2.98 //
T01bsu036_u:740: yenā vineṣyantiha prāṇakoṭyo bauddhasmi jñānasmi anāsravasmin //
T01bsu036_u:741: eko 'pi sattvo na kadāci teṣāṃ śrutvāna dharmaṃ na bhaveta buddhaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:744: upadarśayanto imamekayānaṃ vakṣyanti dharmaṃ hi tathāgatatve //
T01bsu036_u:745: sthitikā hi eṣā sada dharmanetrī prakṛtiśca dharmāṇa sadā prabhā[sate] /
T01bsu036_u:748: dharmasthitiṃ dharmaniyāmatāṃ ca nityasthitāṃ loki imāmakampyām /
T01bsu036_u:749: buddhāśca bodhiṃ pṛthivīya maṇḍe prakāśayiṣyanti upāyakauśalam //
T01bsu036_u:750: daśasū diśāsū naradevapūjitāstiṣṭhanti buddhā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:751: sukhāpanārthaṃ iha sarvaprāṇināṃ te cāpi bhāṣantimamagrabodhim //
T01bsu036_u:753: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ paridīpayanti buddhā imāmuttamaśāntabhūmim // Saddhp_2.105
T01bsu036_u:754: caritaṃ ca te jāniya sarvadehināṃ yathāśayaṃ yacca purā niṣevitam /
T01bsu036_u:755: vīryaṃ ca sthāmaṃ ca viditva teṣāṃ jñātvādhimuktiṃ ca prakāśayanti //
T01bsu036_u:756: dṛṣṭāntahetūn bahu darśayanti bahukāraṇān jñānabalena nāyakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:758: ahaṃ pi caitarhi jinendranāyako utpanna sattvāna sukhāpanārtham /
T01bsu036_u:760: deśemi dharmaṃ ca bahuprakāraṃ adhimuktimadhyāśaya jñātva prāṇinām /
T01bsu036_u:762: ahaṃ pi paśyāmi daridrasattvān prajñāya puṇyehi ca viprahīṇān /
T01bsu036_u:764: praskanna saṃsāri niruddha durge magnāḥ punarduḥkhaparaṃparāsu //
T01bsu036_u:766: na buddhameṣanti mahānubhāvaṃ na dharma mārganti dukhāntagāminam //
T01bsu036_u:767: gatīṣu ṣaṭsu pariruddhacittāḥ kudṛṣṭidṛṣṭīṣu sthitā akampyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:768: duḥkhātu duḥkhānupradhāvamānāḥ kāruṇya mahyaṃ balavantu teṣu //
T01bsu036_u:769: so 'haṃ viditvā tahi bodhimaṇḍe saptāha trīṇi paripūrṇa saṃsthitaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:770: arthaṃ vicintemimamevarūpaṃ ullokayan pādapameva tatra // Saddhp_2.113 //
T01bsu036_u:771: prekṣāmi taṃ cānimiṣaṃ drumendraṃ tasyaiva heṣṭhe anucaṃkramāmi /
T01bsu036_u:772: āścaryajñānaṃ ca idaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ sattvāśca mohāndha avidvasū ime //
T01bsu036_u:773: brahmā ca māṃ yācati tasmi kāle śakraśca catvāri ca lokapālāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:774: maheśvaro īśvara eva cāpi marudgaṇānāṃ ca sahasrakoṭayaḥ // Saddhp_2.115
T01bsu036_u:775: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravā arthaṃ ca cintemi kathaṃ karomi /
T01bsu036_u:776: ahaṃ ca bodhīya vadāmi varṇān ime ca duḥkhairabhibhūta sattvāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:777: te mahya dharmaṃ kṣipi bālabhāṣitaṃ kṣipitva gaccheyurapāyabhūmim /
T01bsu036_u:778: śreyo mamā naiva kadāci bhāṣituṃ adyaiva me nirvṛtirastu śāntā //
T01bsu036_u:780: purimāṃśca buddhān samanusmaranto upāyakauśalyu yathā ca teṣām /
T01bsu036_u:781: yaṃ nūna haṃ pi ima buddhabodhiṃ tridhā vibhajyeha prakāśayeyam //
T01bsu036_u:782: evaṃ ca me cintitu eṣa dharmo ye cānye buddhā daśasu ddiśāsu /
T01bsu036_u:783: darśiṃsu te mahya tadātmabhāvaṃ sādhuṃ ti ghoṣaṃ samudīrayanti //
T01bsu036_u:786: vayaṃ pi buddhāya paraṃ tadā padaṃ tṛdhā ca kṛtvāna prakāśayāmaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:787: hīnādhimuktā hi avidvasū narā bhaviṣyathā buddha na śraddadheyuḥ //
T01bsu036_u:790: ahaṃ cudagrastada āsi śrutvā ghoṣaṃ manojñaṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇām /
T01bsu036_u:791: udagracitto bhaṇi teṣa tāyināṃ na mohavādī pravarā maharṣī // Saddhp_2.123
T01bsu036_u:792: ahaṃ pi evaṃ samudācariṣye yathā vadantī vidu lokanāyakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:793: ahaṃ pi saṃkṣobhi imasmi dāruṇe utpanna sattvāna kaṣāyamadhye //
T01bsu036_u:794: tato hyahaṃ śārisutā viditvā vārāṇasīṃ prasthitu tasmi kāle /
T01bsu036_u:796: tahi pañcakānāṃ pravadāmi bhikṣuṇāṃ dharmaṃ upāyena praśāntabhūmim //
T01bsu036_u:797: tataḥ pravṛttaṃ mama dharmacakraṃ nirvāṇaśabdaśca abhūṣi loke /
T01bsu036_u:798: arhantaśabdastatha dharmaśabdaḥ saṃghasya śabdaśca abhūṣi tatra //
T01bsu036_u:800: saṃsāraduḥkhasya ca eṣa anto evaṃ vadāmī ahu nityakālam // Saddhp_2.127 //
T01bsu036_u:801: yasmiṃśca kāle ahu śāriputra paśyāmi putrān dvipadottamānām /
T01bsu036_u:802: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ koṭīsahasrāṇi analpakāni // Saddhp_2.128 //
T01bsu036_u:803: upasaṃkramitvā ca mamaiva antike kṛtāñjalīḥ sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:804: yehī śruto dharma jināna āsīt upāyakauśalyu bahuprakāram // Saddhp_2.129
T01bsu036_u:805: tato mamā etadabhūṣi tatkṣaṇaṃ samayo mamā bhāṣitumagradharmam /
T01bsu036_u:806: yasyāhamarthaṃ iha loki jātaḥ prakāśayāmī tamihāgrabodhim // Saddhp_2.130
T01bsu036_u:808: adhimānaprāptāna avidvasūnāṃ ime tu śroṣyanti hi bodhisattvāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:809: viśāradaścāhu tadā prahṛṣṭaḥ saṃlīyanāṃ sarva vivarjayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:810: bhāṣāmi madhye sugatātmajānāṃ tāṃścaiva bodhāya samādapemi // Saddhp_2.132
T01bsu036_u:813: ye cā śatā dvādaśime anāsravā buddhā bhaviṣyantimi loki sarve //
T01bsu036_u:814: yathaiva teṣāṃ purimāṇa tāyināṃ anāgatānāṃ ca jināna dharmatā /
T01bsu036_u:815: mamāpi eṣaiva vikalpavarjitā tathaiva haṃ deśayi adya tubhyam //
T01bsu036_u:816: kadāci kahiṃci kathaṃci loke utpādu bhoti puruṣarṣabhāṇām /
T01bsu036_u:817: utpadya cā loki anantacakṣuṣaḥ kadācidetādṛśu dharma deśayuḥ //
T01bsu036_u:818: sudurlabho īdṛśu agradharmaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutairapi syāt /
T01bsu036_u:819: sudurlabhā īdṛśakāśca sattvāḥ śratvāna ye śraddadhi agradharmam //
T01bsu036_u:820: audumbaraṃ puṣpa yathaiva durlabhaṃ kadāci kahiṃci kathaṃci dṛśyate /
T01bsu036_u:821: manojñarūpaṃ ca janasya tadbhavedāścaryu lokasya sadevakasya //
T01bsu036_u:822: ataśca āścaryataraṃ vadāmi śrutvāna yo dharmamimaṃ subhāṣitam /
T01bsu036_u:823: anumodi ekaṃ pi bhaṇeya vācaṃ kṛta sarvabuddhāna bhaveya pūjā //
T01bsu036_u:824: vyapanehi kāṅkṣāmiha saṃśayaṃ ca ārocayāmi ahu dharmarājā /
T01bsu036_u:825: samādapemi ahamagrabodhau na śrāvakāḥ kecidihāsti mahyam // Saddhp_2.139
T01bsu036_u:826: tava śāriputraitu rahasyu bhotu ye cāpi me śrāvaka mahya sarve /
T01bsu036_u:828: ye bodhisattvāśca ime pradhānā rahasyametanmama dhārayantu // Saddhp_2.140
T01bsu036_u:829: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pañcakaṣāyakāle kṣudrāśca duṣṭāśca bhavanti sattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:830: kāmairihāndhīkṛta bālabuddhayo na teṣa bodhāya kadāci cittam //
T01bsu036_u:831: śrutvā ca yānaṃ mama etadekaṃ prakāśitaṃ tena jinena āsīt /
T01bsu036_u:832: anāgate 'dhvāni bhrameyu sattvāḥ sūtraṃ kṣipitvā narakaṃ vrajeyuḥ //
T01bsu036_u:833: lajjī śucī ye ca bhaveyu sattvāḥ saṃprasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:834: viśārado bhūtva vademi teṣāmekasya yānasya anantavarṇān // Saddhp_2.143 //
T01bsu036_u:836: bahūhi saṃdhāvacanehi coktaṃ durbodhyametaṃ hi aśikṣitehi // Saddhp_2.144
T01bsu036_u:837: tasmāddhi saṃdhāvacanaṃ vijāniyā buddhāna lokācariyāṇa tāyinām /
T01bsu036_u:838: jahitva kāṅkṣāṃ vijahitva saṃśayaṃ bhaviṣyathā buddha janetha harṣam //
T01bsu036_u:842: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavato
T01bsu036_u:847: idamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato 'ntikād dharmaṃ tadanyān bodhisattvān dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvānāṃ ca anāgate 'dhvani buddhanāma śrutvā atīva śocāmi atīva saṃtapye, bhraṣṭo 'smyevaṃrūpāt tathāgatajñānagocarād jñānadarśanāt |
T01bsu036_u:848: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavan abhīkṣṇaṃ gacchāmi parvatagirikandarāṇi vanaṣaṇḍānyārāmanadīvṛkṣamūlānyekāntāni divāvihārāya, tadāpyahaṃ bhagavan yadbhūyastvena anenaiva vihāreṇa viharāmi |
T01bsu036_u:849: tulye nāma dharmadhātupraveśe vayaṃ bhagavatā hīnena yānena niryātitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:850: evaṃ ca me bhagavaṃstasmin samaye bhavati - asmākamevaiṣo 'parādhaḥ, naiva bhagavato 'parādhaḥ
T01bsu036_u:851: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedbhagavānasmābhiḥ pratīkṣitaḥ syāt sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayamānaḥ, yadidamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya,
T01bsu036_u:852: teṣveva vayaṃ bhagavan dharmeṣu niryātāḥ syāma |
T01bsu036_u:853: yatpunarbhagavan asmābhiranupasthiteṣu bodhisattveṣu saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ bhagavato 'jānamānaistvaramāṇaiḥ prathamabhāṣitaiva tathāgatasya dharmadeśanā
T01bsu036_u:859: adyāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ putro jyeṣṭha auraso mukhato jāto dharmajo dharmanirmito dharmadāyādo dharmanirvṛttaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:860: apagataparidāho 'smyadya bhagavan imamevaṃrūpamadbhutadharmamaśrutapūrvaṃ bhagavato 'ntikād ghoṣaṃ śrutvā ||
T01bsu036_u:862: āścaryaprāpto 'smi mahāvināyaka audbilyajāto imu ghoṣa śrutvā /
T01bsu036_u:863: kathaṃkathā mahya na bhūya kācit paripācito 'haṃ iha agrayāne //
T01bsu036_u:864: āścaryabhūtaḥ sugatāna ghoṣaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ ca śokaṃ ca jahāti prāṇinām /
T01bsu036_u:865: kṣīṇāsravasyo mama yaśca śoko vigato 'sti sarvaṃ śruṇiyāna ghoṣam //
T01bsu036_u:870: yannāma traidhātuki agradharmaṃ na deśayiṣyāmi anāgate 'dhve // Saddhp_3.4
T01bsu036_u:871: dvātriṃśatī lakṣaṇa mahya bhraṣṭā suvarṇavarṇacchavitā ca bhraṣṭā /
T01bsu036_u:872: balā vimokṣāścimi sarvi riñcitā tulyeṣu dharmeṣu aho 'smi mūḍhaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:873: anuvyañjanā ye ca mahāmunīnāmaśīti pūrṇāḥ pravarā viśiṣṭāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:874: aṣṭādaśāveṇika ye ca dharmāste cāpi bhraṣṭā ahu vañcito 'smi // Saddhp_3.6
T01bsu036_u:875: dṛṣṭvā ca tvāṃ lokahitānukampī divāvihāraṃ parigamya caikaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:876: hā vañcito 'smīti vicintayāmi asaṅgajñānātu acintiyātaḥ // Saddhp_3.7 //
T01bsu036_u:877: rātriṃdivāni kṣapayāmi nātha bhūyiṣṭha so eva vicintayantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:878: pṛcchāmi tāvad bhagavantameva bhraṣṭo 'hamasmītyatha vā na veti //
T01bsu036_u:879: evaṃ ca me cintayato jinendra gacchanti rātriṃdiva nityakālam /
T01bsu036_u:880: dṛṣṭvā ca anyān bahubodhisattvān saṃvarṇitāṃllokavināyakena // Saddhp_3.9
T01bsu036_u:881: śrutvā ca so 'haṃ imu buddhadharmaṃ saṃghāya etatkila bhāṣitaṃ ti /
T01bsu036_u:882: atarkikaṃ sūkṣmamanāsravaṃ ca jñānaṃ praṇetī jina bodhimaṇḍe //
T01bsu036_u:885: tato mamā āśayu jñātva nātho dṛṣṭīvimokṣāya bravīti nirvṛtim //
T01bsu036_u:886: vimucya tā dṛṣṭikṛtāni sarvaśaḥ śūnyāṃśca dharmānahu sparśayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:887: tato vijānāmyahu nirvṛto 'smi na cāpi nirvāṇamidaṃ pravucyati //
T01bsu036_u:888: yadā tu buddho bhavate 'grasattvaḥ puraskṛto naramaruyakṣarākṣasaiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:889: dvātriṃśatīlakṣaṇarūpadhārī aśeṣato nirvṛtu bhoti tatra // Saddhp_3.13 //
T01bsu036_u:890: vyapanīta sarvāṇi mi manyitāni śrutvā ca ghoṣaṃ ahamadya nirvṛtaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:891: yadāpi vyākurvasi agrabodhau purato hi lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_3.14
T01bsu036_u:892: balavacca āsīnmama chambhitatvaṃ prathamaṃ giraṃ śrutva vināyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:893: mā haiva māro sa bhavedviheṭhako abhinirmiṇitvā bhuvi buddhaveṣam //
T01bsu036_u:894: yadā tu hetūhi ca kāraṇaiśca dṛṣṭāntakoṭīnayutaiśca darśitā /
T01bsu036_u:895: suparisthitā sā varabuddhabodhistato 'smi niṣkāṅkṣu śruṇitva dharmam //
T01bsu036_u:896: yadā ca me buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ kīrteṣyatī tān parinirvṛtān jinān /
T01bsu036_u:897: yathā ca tairdeśitu eṣa dharma upāyakauśalya pratiṣṭhihitvā // Saddhp_3.17
T01bsu036_u:898: anāgatāśco bahu buddha loke tiṣṭhanti ye co paramārthadarśinaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:901: tathā ca te ātmana yādṛśī carī abhiniṣkramitvā prabhṛtīya saṃstutā /
T01bsu036_u:902: buddhaṃ ca te yādṛśu dharmacakraṃ tathā ca te 'vasthita dharmadeśanā //
T01bsu036_u:903: tataśca jānāmi na eṣa māro bhūtāṃ cariṃ darśayi lokanāthaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:904: na hyatra mārāṇa gatī hi vidyate mamaiva cittaṃ vicikitsaprāptam //
T01bsu036_u:905: yadā tu madhureṇa gabhīravalgunā saṃharṣito buddhasvareṇa cāham /
T01bsu036_u:906: tadā mi vidhvaṃsita sarvasaṃśayā vicikitsa naṣṭā ca sthito 'smi jñāne //
T01bsu036_u:907: niḥsaṃśayaṃ bheṣyi tathāgato 'haṃ puraskṛto loki sadevake 'smin /
T01bsu036_u:908: saṃghāya vakṣye imu buddhabodhiṃ samādapento bahubodhisattvān //
T01bsu036_u:909: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - ārocayāmi te śāriputra,
T01bsu036_u:910: prativedayāmi te asya sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ purataḥ |
T01bsu036_u:911: mayā tvaṃ śāriputra viṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike paripācito
T01bsu036_u:914: sa tvaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasaṃmantritena bodhisattvarahasyena iha mama pravacane upapannaḥ
T01bsu036_u:915: sa tvaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānena tatpaurvakaṃ caryāpraṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasaṃmantritaṃ bodhisattvarahasyaṃ na samanusmarasi |
T01bsu036_u:919: dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ saṃprakāśayāmi ||
T01bsu036_u:920: api khalu punaḥ śāriputra, bhaviṣyasi tvamanāgate 'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairacintyairapramāṇairbahūnāṃ
T01bsu036_u:921: saddharmaṃ dhārayitvā vividhāṃ ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā imāmeva bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya padmaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi
T01bsu036_u:923: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān ||
T01bsu036_u:924: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra samayena tasya bhagavataḥ padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya virajaṃ nāma buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ paramasudarśanīyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca bahujananārīgaṇākīrṇaṃ ca maruprakīrṇaṃ ca vaiḍūryamayaṃ suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddham |
T01bsu036_u:925: teṣu ca aṣṭāpadeṣu ratnavṛkṣā bhaviṣyanti saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ puṣpaphalaiḥ satatasamitaṃ samarpitāḥ
T01bsu036_u:926: so 'pi śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastrīṇyeva yānānyārabhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:927: kiṃcāpi śāriputra sa tathāgato na kalpakaṣāya utpatsyate, api tu praṇidhānavaśena dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:928: mahāratnapratimaṇḍitaśca nāma śāriputra sa kalpo bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:929: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa kalpo mahāratnapratimaṇḍita ityucyate?
T01bsu036_u:931: te tasmin kāle tasyāṃ virajāyāṃ lokadhātau bahavo bodhisattvā bhaviṣyantyaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā amāpyā gaṇanāṃ samatikrāntā anyatra tathāgatagaṇanayā |
T01bsu036_u:932: tena kāraṇena sa kalpo mahāratnapratimaṇḍita ityucyate ||
T01bsu036_u:933: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra samayena bodhisattvāstasmin buddhakṣetre yadbhūyasā ratnapadmavikrāmiṇo bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:936: bahubuddhaśatasahasracīrṇabrahmacaryāḥ, tathāgataparisaṃstutā buddhajñānābhiyuktā mahābhijñāparikarmanirjātāḥ sarvadharmanayakuśalā mārdavāḥ smṛtimantaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:937: bhūyiṣṭhena śāriputra evaṃrūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paripūrṇaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati ||
T01bsu036_u:938: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya dvādaśāntarakalpā āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā kumārabhūtatvam |
T01bsu036_u:940: sa ca śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato dvādaśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena dhṛtiparipūrṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vyākṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau parinirvāsyati |
T01bsu036_u:941: ayaṃ bhikṣavo dhṛtiparipūrṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate
T01bsu036_u:942: padmavṛṣabhavikrāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:943: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T01bsu036_u:944: tasyāpi śāriputra padmavṛṣabhavikrāmiṇastathāgatasya evaṃrūpameva buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:945: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati |
T01bsu036_u:946: tatastasya tasmin saddharme kṣīṇe dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmapratirūpakaḥ sthāsyati ||
T01bsu036_u:947: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:948: bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:951: bahubuddhakoṭīṣu karitva satkriyāṃ caryābalaṃ tatra upārjayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:952: utpādayitvā ca daśo balāni spṛśiṣyase uttamamagrabodhim // Saddhp_3.24 //
T01bsu036_u:953: acintiye aparimitasmi kalpe prabhūtaratnastada kalpu bheṣyati /
T01bsu036_u:954: virajā ca nāmnā tada lokadhātuḥ kṣetraṃ viśuddhaṃ dvipadottamasya //
T01bsu036_u:958: ye śikṣitā buddhaśateṣu caryāṃ te tatra kṣetre upapadya santi //
T01bsu036_u:961: sama dvādaśā antarakalpa tasya bhaviṣyate āyu tadā jinasya /
T01bsu036_u:962: manujānapī antarakalpa aṣṭa āyuṣpramāṇaṃ tahi teṣa bheṣyati // Saddhp_3.29
T01bsu036_u:963: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya dvātriṃśatiṃ antarakalpa pūrṇām /
T01bsu036_u:964: saddharma saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
T01bsu036_u:966: saddharmi kṣīṇe pratirūpako 'sya dvātriṃśatī antarakalpa sthāsyati /
T01bsu036_u:967: śarīravaistārika tasya tāyinaḥ susatkṛto naramarutaiśca nityam //
T01bsu036_u:968: etādṛśaḥ so bhagavān bhaviṣyati prahṛṣṭa tvaṃ śārisutā bhavasva /
T01bsu036_u:969: tvameva so tādṛśako bhaviṣyasi anābhibhūto dvipadānamuttamaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:970: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyā āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyedaṃ vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhagavato 'ntikāt
T01bsu036_u:971: saṃmukhaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ svakasvakaiścīvarairbhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsuḥ
T01bsu036_u:972: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiranyāśca devaputraśatasahasrakoṭyo bhagavantaṃ divyairvastrairabhicchādayāmāsuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:975: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇi dundubhayaścoparyantarīkṣe parāhananti sma |
T01bsu036_u:976: mahāntaṃ ca puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayitvā evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante sma - pūrvaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāmṛṣipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakraṃ pravartitam |
T01bsu036_u:977: idaṃ punarbhagavatā adya anuttaraṃ dvitīyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam |
T01bsu036_u:978: te ca devaputrāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
T01bsu036_u:984: na cāyamīdṛśo dharmaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ kadācana // Saddhp_3.35 //
T01bsu036_u:986: yathārtho vyākṛto hyeṣa śāriputro viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_3.36 //
T01bsu036_u:990: ārāgitaśca yadbuddhaḥ prārthanā bhotu bodhaye // Saddhp_3.38 //
T01bsu036_u:993: bhagavan vigatakathaṃkatho bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamidamātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:994: yāni ca imāni bhagavan dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni bhagavatā pūrvaṃ śaikṣabhūmau sthāpitāni evamavavaditāni evamanuśiṣṭānyabhūvan etatparyavasāno me bhikṣavo dharmavinayo yadidaṃ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokasamatikramo nirvāṇasamavasaraṇaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:995: ime ca bhagavan dve bhikṣusahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ sarveṣāmātmadṛṣṭibhavadṛṣṭivibhavadṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivivarjitānāṃ nirvāṇabhūmisthitāḥ smaḥ ityātmanaḥ saṃjānatām, te bhagavato 'ntikādimamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ dharma śrutvā kathaṃkathāmāpannāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:996: tatsādhu bhagavān bhāṣatāmeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyavinodanārtha yathā bhagavannetāścatasraḥ parṣado niṣkāṅkṣā nirvicikitsā bhaveyuḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:997: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nanu te mayā śāriputra pūrvamevākhyātaṃ
T01bsu036_u:998: nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmaṃ deśayati imāmevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvadharmadeśanābhirbodhisattvayānameva samādāpayati
T01bsu036_u:999: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra aupamyaṃ te kariṣyāmi asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśanārtham
T01bsu036_u:1000: tatkasya hetoḥ? upamayā iha ekatyā vijñapuruṣā bhāṣitasyārthamājānanti ||
T01bsu036_u:1001: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra iha syāt kasmiṃścideva grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vā janapadapradeśe vā rāṣṭre vā rājadhānyāṃ vā gṛhapatirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako 'bhyatītavayo 'nuprāpta āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1002: mahaccāsya niveśanaṃ bhaveducchritaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca cirakṛtaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca dvayorvā trayāṇāṃ vā caturṇāṃ vā pañcānāṃ vā prāṇiśatānāmāvāsaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1008: tacca sahasaiva mahātāgniskandhena sarvapārśveṣu sarvāvantaṃ niveśanaṃ pradīptaṃ bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1009: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ kumārakāḥ syuḥ pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā |
T01bsu036_u:1011: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣastaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ mahātāgniskandhena samantāt saṃprajvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītastrasta udvignacitto bhavet, evaṃ cānuvicintayet - pratibalo 'hamanena mahatāgniskandhenāsaṃspṛṣṭo
T01bsu036_u:1012: 'paridagdhaḥ kṣiprameva svastinā asmād gṛhādādīptād dvāreṇa nirgantuṃ
T01bsu036_u:1014: api tu ya ime mamaiva putrā bālakāḥ kumārakā asminneva niveśane ādīpte taistaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti, imaṃ cāgāramādīptaṃ na jānanti na budhyante na vidanti na cetayanti
T01bsu036_u:1015: nodvegamāpadyante, saṃtapyamānā apyanena mahatāgniskandhena mahatā ca duḥkhaskandhena spṛṣṭāḥ samānā na duḥkhaṃ manasi kurvanti, nāpi nirgamanamanasikāramutpādayanti ||
T01bsu036_u:1017: sa ca śāriputra puruṣo balavān bhaved bāhubalikaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1020: yannvahaṃ sarvānimān kumārakānekapiṇḍayitvā utsaṅgenādāya asmād gṛhānnirgamayeyam |
T01bsu036_u:1021: sa punarevamanuvicintayet - idaṃ khalu niveśanamekapraveśaṃ saṃvṛtadvārameva
T01bsu036_u:1027: iti pratisaṃkhyāya tān kumārakānāmantrayate sma - āgacchata bhavantaḥ kumārakāḥ, nirgacchata
T01bsu036_u:1031: atha khalu te kumārakā evaṃ tasya hitakāmasya puruṣasya tadbhāṣitaṃ nāvabudhyante nodvijanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante, na vicintayanti na nirdhāvanti, nāpi jānanti na
T01bsu036_u:1037: atha khalu sa puruṣa evamanuvicintayet - ādīptamidaṃ niveśanaṃ mahatāgniskandhena saṃpradīptam
T01bsu036_u:1038: mā haivāhaṃ ceme ca kumārakā ihaivānena mahātāgniskandhena anayavyasanamāpatsyāmahe |
T01bsu036_u:1040: sa ca puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayajño bhavet, adhimuktiṃ ca vijānīyāt |
T01bsu036_u:1041: teṣāṃ ca kumārakāṇāmanekavidhānyanekāni krīḍanakāni bhaveyurvividhāni ca ramaṇīyakānīṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manaāpāni, tāni ca durlabhāni bhaveyuḥ
T01bsu036_u:1042: atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayaṃ jānaṃstān kumārakānetadavocat
T01bsu036_u:1043: - yāni tāni kumārakā yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakānyāścaryādbhutāni,
T01bsu036_u:1047: tāni ca mayā sarvāṇi bahinirveśanadvāre sthāpitāni yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanahetoḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1049: ahaṃ vo yasya yasya yenārtho yena prayojanaṃ bhaviṣyati, tasmai tasmai tatpradāsyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:1051: atha khalu te kumārakāsteṣāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ ramaṇīyakānāmarthāya yathepsitānāṃ yathāsaṃkalpitānāmiṣṭānāṃ kāntānāṃ priyāṇāṃ manaāpānāṃ nāmadheyāni śrutvā
T01bsu036_u:1052: tasmādādīptādagārāt kṣipramevārabdhavīryā balavatā javena anyonyamapratīkṣamāṇāḥ kaḥ prathamaṃ kaḥ prathamataramityanyonyaṃ saṃghaṭṭitakāyāstasmādādīptādagārāt kṣiprameva nirdhāvitāḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:1053: atha sa puruṣaḥ kṣemasvastinā tān kumārakān nirgatān dṛṣṭvā abhayaprāptāniti viditvā ākāśe grāmacatvare upaviṣṭaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto nirupādāno vigatanīvaraṇo 'bhayaprāpto bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1054: atha khalu te kumārakā yena sa pitā tenopasaṃkrāman, upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadeyuḥ - dehi nastāta
T01bsu036_u:1057: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣasteṣāṃ svakānāṃ putrāṇāṃ vātajavasaṃpannān (Vaidya 53) gorathakānevānuprayacchet saptaratnamayān savedikān sakiṅkiṇījālābhipralambitānuccān pragṛhītānāścaryādbhutaratnālaṃkṛtān ratnadāmakṛtaśobhān puṣpamālyālaṃkṛtāṃstūlikāgoṇikāstaraṇān dūṣyapaṭapratyāstīrṇānubhayato lohitopadhānān śvetaiḥ prapāṇḍaraiḥ śīghrajavairgoṇairyojitān bahupuruṣaparigṛhītān |
T01bsu036_u:1059: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra sa puruṣa āḍhyaśca bhavenmahādhanaśca prabhūtakoṣṭhāgāraśca
T01bsu036_u:1060: sa evaṃ manyeta - alaṃ ma eṣāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1063: mamaiva putrāḥ, sarve ca me priyā manaāpāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1065: samaṃ ca mayaite kumārakāḥ sarve cintayitavyā na viṣamam |
T01bsu036_u:1067: sarvasattvānāmapyahamimānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāyānāni dadyām, kimaṅga punaḥ svakānāṃ putrāṇām
T01bsu036_u:1068: te ca dārakāstasmin samaye teṣu mahāyāneṣvabhiruhya āścaryādbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1069: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra mā haiva tasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ syāt, yena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścātsarveṣāṃ mahāyānānyeva dattāni, udārayānānyeva
T01bsu036_u:1071: śāriputra āha - na hyetad bhagavan, na hyetat sugata |
T01bsu036_u:1072: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhaved yattena puruṣeṇopāyakauśalyena te dārakāstasmādādīptād gṛhānniṣkāsitāḥ, jīvitena ca abhicchāditāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1073: tatkasya hetoḥ? ātmabhāvapratilambhenaiva bhagavan sarvakrīḍanakāni labdhāni bhavanti |
T01bsu036_u:1074: yadyapi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekarathamapi na dadyāt, tathāpi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1076: puruṣeṇa pūrvameva evamanuvicintitam - upāyakauśalyena ahamimān kumārakāṃstasmānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti |
T01bsu036_u:1077: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1078: kaḥ punarvādo yattena puruṣeṇa prabhūtakośakoṣṭhāgāramastīti kṛtvā putrapriyatāmeva manyamānena ślāghamānenaikavarṇānyekayānāni dattāni, yaduta mahāyānāni |
T01bsu036_u:1080: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra |
T01bsu036_u:1083: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvabhayavinivṛttaḥ sarvopadravopāyāsopasargaduḥkhadaurmanasyāvidyāndhakāratamastimirapaṭalaparyavanāhebhyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā vipramuktaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1084: tathāgato jñānabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmasamanvāgataḥ ṛddhibalenātibalavāṃllokapitāḥ, mahopāyakauśalyajñānaparamapāramitāprāpto mahākāruṇiko 'parikhinnamānaso hitaiṣī anukampakaḥ sa traidhātuke mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyaskandhena ādīptajīrṇapaṭalaśaraṇaniveśanasadṛśa utpadyate sattvānāṃ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāvidyāndhakāratamastimirapaṭalaparyavanāhapratiṣṭhānāṃ rāgadveṣamohaparimocanahetoranuttarāyāṃ (Vaidya 54) samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpanahetoḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1085: sa utpannaḥ samānaḥ paśyati sattvān dahyataḥ pacyamānāṃstapyamānān paritapyamānān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ,
T01bsu036_u:1086: paribhoganimittaṃ ca kāmahetunidānaṃ ca anekāvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti |
T01bsu036_u:1087: dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ ca paryeṣṭinidānaṃ parigrahanidānaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokeṣvanekavidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:1089: tatraiva ca duḥkhaskandhe parivartamānāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante na budhyante na cetayanti nodvijanti na niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante |
T01bsu036_u:1090: tatraiva ca ādīptāgārasadṛśe traidhātuke 'bhiramanti, tena tenaiva vidhāvanti |
T01bsu036_u:1091: tena ca mahatā duḥkhaskandhena abhyāhatā na duḥkhamanasikārasaṃjñāmutpādayanti ||
T01bsu036_u:1092: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - ahaṃ khalveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pitā |
T01bsu036_u:1093: mayā hyete sattvā asmādevaṃrūpānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayitavyāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:1094: mayā caiṣāṃ sattvānāmaprameyamacintyaṃ buddhajñānasukhaṃ dātavyam, yenaite sattvāḥ krīḍiṣyanti ramiṣyanti paricārayiṣyanti, vikrīḍitāni ca kariṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:1095: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - sacedahaṃ jñānabalo 'smīti kṛtvā ṛddhibalo 'smīti kṛtvā anupāyenaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1102: tatra śāriputra tathāgato yadyathāpi nāma sa puruṣo bāhubalikaḥ sthāpayitvā bāhubalam, upāyakauśalyena tān kumārakāṃstasmādādīptādagārānniṣkāsayet, niṣkāsayitvā sa teṣāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1103: paścādudārāṇi mahāyānāni dadyāt, evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan
T01bsu036_u:1105: upāyakauśalyajñānenādīptajīrṇapaṭalaśaraṇaniveśanasadṛśāt traidhātukāt sattvānāṃ niṣkāsanahetostrīṇi yānānyupadarśayati yadut śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti |
T01bsu036_u:1106: tribhiśca yānaiḥ sattvāṃllobhayati, evaṃ caiṣāṃ vadati - mā bhavanto 'sminnādīptāgārasadṛśe
T01bsu036_u:1108: atra hi yūyaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiratāḥ pañcakāmaguṇasahagatayā tṛṣṇayā dahyatha
T01bsu036_u:1111: trīṇi yānānyanuprāpsyatha yadidaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti |
