T01bsu036_u:1115: evaṃ caitāṃllobhayāmi - etāni bhoḥ sattvā yāni āryāṇi ca āryapraśastāni ca mahāramaṇīyakasamanvāgatāni ca |
T01bsu036_u:1120: tatra śāriputra ye sattvāḥ paṇḍitajātīyā bhavanti, te tathāgatasya lokapiturabhiśraddadhanti
T01bsu036_u:1125: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā mṛgarathamākāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ
T01bsu036_u:1126: | anye sattvā anācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ damaśamathamākāṅkṣamāṇā ātmaparinirvāṇahetorhetupratyayānubodhāya tathāgataśāsane 'bhiyujyante, te ucyante pratyekabuddhayānamākāṅkṣamāṇāstraidhātukānnirdhāvanti tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā ajarathamāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1127: apare punaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamanācāryakaṃ jñānamākāṅkṣamāṇā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvasattvaparinirvāṇahetostathāgatajñānabalavaiśāradyānubodhāya tathāgataśāsane 'bhiyujyante |
T01bsu036_u:1131: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sa puruṣastān kumārakāṃstasmādādīptādagārānnirdhāvitān dṛṣṭvā kṣemasvastibhyāṃ parimuktānabhayaprāptāniti viditvā ātmānaṃ ca mahādhanaṃ viditvā teṣāṃ dārakāṇāmekameva yānamudāramanuprayacchet, evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā paśyati - anekāḥ sattvakoṭīstraidhātukāt parimuktā
T01bsu036_u:1135: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prabhūto mahājñānabalavaiśāradyakośa iti viditvā sarve caite mamaiva putrā iti jñātvā buddhayānenaiva tān sattvān parinirvāpayati
T01bsu036_u:1136: | na ca kasyacit sattvasya pratyātmikaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadati |
T01bsu036_u:1138: ye cāpi te śāriputra sattvāstraidhātukāt parimuktā bhavanti, teṣāṃ tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīrāryāṇi paramasukhāni krīḍanakāni
T01bsu036_u:1140: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet, yena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā teṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekameva mahāyānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dattaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ
T01bsu036_u:1142: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho na mṛṣāvādī bhavati, yena pūrvamupāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścānmahāyānenaiva sattvān parinirvāpayati |
T01bsu036_u:1145: anenāpi śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam, yathā upāyakauśalyajñānābhinirhāraistathāgata ekameva mahāyānaṃ deśayati ||
T01bsu036_u:1146: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:1147: yathā hi puruṣasya bhavedagāraṃ jīrṇaṃ mahantaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:1148: viśīrṇa prāsādu tathā bhaveta stambhāśca mūleṣu bhaveyu pūtikāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1149: gavākṣaharmyā galitaikadeśā viśīrṇa kuḍayaṃ kaṭalepanaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:1150: jīrṇu pravṛddhoddhṛtavedikaṃ ca tṛṇacchadaṃ sarvata opatantam //
T01bsu036_u:1151: śatāna pañcāna anūnakānāṃ āvāsu so tatra bhaveta prāṇinām /
T01bsu036_u:1152: bahūni cā niṣkuṭasaṃkaṭāni uccārapūrṇāni jugupsitāni // Saddhp_3.41 //
T01bsu036_u:1153: gopānasī vigalita tatra sarvā kuḍayāśca bhittīśca tathaiva srastāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1154: gṛdhrāṇa koṭyo nivasanti tatra pārāvatolūka tathānyapakṣiṇaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1155: āśīviṣā dāruṇa tatra santi deśapradeśeṣu mahāviṣogrāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1156: vicitrikā vṛścikamūṣikāśca etāna āvāsu suduṣṭaprāṇinām // Saddhp_3.43 //
T01bsu036_u:1157: deśe ca deśe amanuṣya bhūyo uccāraprasrāvavināśitaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:1158: kṛmikīṭakhadyotakapūritaṃ ca śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiśca nināditaṃ ca //
T01bsu036_u:1159: bheruṇḍakā dāruṇā tatra santi manuṣyakuṇapāni ca bhakṣayantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1160: teṣāṃ ca niryāṇu pratīkṣamāṇāḥ śvānāḥ śṛgālāśca vasantyaneke //
T01bsu036_u:1162: te durbalā nitya kṣudhābhibhūtā deśeṣu deśeṣu vikhādamānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1163: kalahaṃ karontāśca ninādayanti subhairavaṃ tadgṛhamevarūpam // Saddhp_3.46
T01bsu036_u:1164: suraudracittā pi vasanti yakṣā manuṣyakuṇapāni vikaḍḍhamānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1165: deśeṣu deśeṣu vasanti tatra śatāpadī gonasakāśca vyālāḥ // Saddhp_3.47 //
T01bsu036_u:1166: deśeṣu deśeṣu ca nikṣipanti te potakānyālayanāni kṛtvā /
T01bsu036_u:1167: nyastāni nyastāni ca tāni teṣāṃ te yakṣa bhūyo paribhakṣayanti //
T01bsu036_u:1168: yadā ca te yakṣa bhavanti tṛptāḥ parasattva khāditva suraudracittāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1169: parasattvamāṃsaiḥ paritṛptagātrāḥ kalahaṃ tadā tatra karonti tīvram //
T01bsu036_u:1172: te cāpi śvānān parigṛhya pādairuttānakān kṛtva tathaiva bhūmau /
T01bsu036_u:1173: grīvāsu cotpīḍya vibhartsayanto vyābādhayantaśca ramanti tatra //
T01bsu036_u:1174: nānāśca kṛṣṇāśca tathaiva durbalā uccā mahantāśca vasanti pretāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1175: jighatsitā bhojana mārgamāṇā ārtasvaraṃ krandiṣu tatra tatra //
T01bsu036_u:1180: te yakṣa pretāśca piśācakāśca gṛdhrāśca āhāra gaveṣamāṇāḥ // Saddhp_3.54
T01bsu036_u:1181: etādṛśaṃ bhairavu tad gṛhaṃ bhavet mahantamuccaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:1182: vijarjaraṃ durbalamitvaraṃ ca puruṣasya ekasya parigrahaṃ bhavet //
T01bsu036_u:1183: sa ca bāhyataḥ syātpuruṣo gṛhasya niveśanaṃ tacca bhavetpradīptam /
T01bsu036_u:1184: sahasā samantena caturdiśaṃ ca jvālāsahasraiḥ paridīpyamānam //
T01bsu036_u:1185: vaṃśāśca dārūṇi ca agnitāpitāḥ karonti śabdaṃ gurukaṃ subhairavam /
T01bsu036_u:1186: pradīpta stambhāśca tathaiva bhittayo yakṣāśca pretāśca mucanti nādam //
T01bsu036_u:1187: jvālūṣitā gṛdhraśatāśca bhūyaḥ kumbhāṇḍakāḥ ploṣṭamukhā bhramanti /
T01bsu036_u:1188: samantato vyālaśatāśca tatra nadanti krośanti ca dahyamānāḥ // Saddhp_3.58
T01bsu036_u:1189: piśācakāstatra bahū bhramanti saṃtāpitā agnina mandapuṇyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1190: dantehi pāṭitva ti anyamanyaṃ rudhireṇa siñcanti ca dahyamānāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1191: bherūṇḍakāḥ kālagatāśca tatra khādanti sattvāśca ti anyamanyam /
T01bsu036_u:1192: uccāra dahyatyamanojñagandhaḥ pravāyate loki caturdiśāsu // Saddhp_3.60 //
T01bsu036_u:1195: pradīptakeśāśca bhramanti pretāḥ kṣudhāya dāhena ca dahyamānāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1197: puruṣaśca so tasya gṛhasya svāmī dvārasmi asthāsi vipaśyamānaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1198: śṛṇoti cāsau svake atra putrān krīḍāpanaiḥ krīḍanasaktabuddhīn /
T01bsu036_u:1199: ramanti te krīḍanakapramattā yathāpi bālā avijānamānāḥ // Saddhp_3.63 //
T01bsu036_u:1200: śrutvā ca so tatra praviṣṭu kṣipraṃ pramocanārthāya tadātmajānām /
T01bsu036_u:1201: mā mahya bālā imi sarva dārakā dahyeyu naśyeyu ca kṣiprameva //
T01bsu036_u:1202: sa bhāṣate teṣamagāradoṣān duḥkhaṃ idaṃ bhoḥ kulaputra dāruṇam /
T01bsu036_u:1203: vividhāśca sattveha ayaṃ ca agni mahantikā duḥkhaparaṃparā tu //
T01bsu036_u:1204: āśīviṣā yakṣa suraudracittāḥ kumbhāṇḍa pretā bahavo vasanti /
T01bsu036_u:1205: bheruṇḍakāḥ śvānaśṛgālasaṃghā gṛdhrāśca āhāra gaveṣamāṇāḥ // Saddhp_3.66
T01bsu036_u:1206: etādṛśāsmin bahavo vasanti vināpi cāgneḥ paramaṃ subhairavam /
T01bsu036_u:1207: duḥkhaṃ idaṃ kevalamevarūpaṃ samantataścāgnirayaṃ pradīptaḥ // Saddhp_3.67
T01bsu036_u:1208: te codyamānāstatha bālabuddhayaḥ kumārakāḥ krīḍanake pramattāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1210: na cintayante pitaraṃ bhaṇantaṃ na cāpi teṣāṃ manasīkaronti // Saddhp_3.68
T01bsu036_u:1211: puruṣaśca so tatra tadā vicintayet suduḥkhito 'smī iha putracintayā /
T01bsu036_u:1212: kiṃ mahya putrehi aputrakasya mā nāma dahyeyurihāgninā ime // Saddhp_3.69
T01bsu036_u:1213: upāyu so cintayi tasmi kāle lubdhā ime krīḍanakeṣu bālāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1214: na cātra krīḍā ca ratī ca kācid bālāna ho yādṛśu mūḍhabhāvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1215: sa tānavocachṛṇuthā kumārakā nānāvidhā yānaka yā mamāsti /
T01bsu036_u:1216: mṛgairajairgoṇavaraiśca yuktā uccā mahantā samalaṃkṛtā ca // Saddhp_3.71
T01bsu036_u:1217: tā bāhyato asya niveśanasya nirdhāvathā tehi karotha kāryam /
T01bsu036_u:1218: yuṣmākamarthe maya kāritāni niryātha taistuṣṭamanāḥ sametya // Saddhp_3.72
T01bsu036_u:1219: te yāna etādṛśakā niśāmya ārabdhavīryāstvaritā hi bhūtvā /
T01bsu036_u:1220: nirdhāvitāstatkṣaṇameva sarve ākāśi tiṣṭhanti dukhena muktāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1221: puruṣaśca so nirgata dṛṣṭva dārakān grāmasya madhye sthitu catvarasmin /
T01bsu036_u:1222: upaviśya siṃhāsani tānuvāca aho ahaṃ nirvṛtu adya mārṣāḥ // Saddhp_3.74 //
T01bsu036_u:1223: ye duḥkhalabdhā mama te tapasvinaḥ putrā priyā orasa viṃśa bālāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1224: te dārūṇe durgagṛhe abhūvan bahūjantūpūrṇe ca subhairave ca // Saddhp_3.75
T01bsu036_u:1226: ādīptake jvālasahasrapūrṇe ratā ca te krīḍaratīṣu āsan /
T01bsu036_u:1227: mayā ca te mocita adya sarve yenāhu nirvāṇu samāgato 'dya // Saddhp_3.76
T01bsu036_u:1228: sukhasthitaṃ taṃ pitaraṃ viditvā upagamya te dāraka evamāhuḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1229: dadāhi nastāta yathābhibhāṣitaṃ trividhāni yānāni manoramāṇi //
T01bsu036_u:1230: sacettava satyaka tāta sarvaṃ yadbhāṣitaṃ tatra niveśane te /
T01bsu036_u:1231: trividhāni yānāni ha saṃpradāsye dadasva kālo 'yamihādya teṣām //
T01bsu036_u:1233: hiraṇya dāsāśca analpakāḥ syurupasthape ekavidhā sa yānā // Saddhp_3.79 //
T01bsu036_u:1238: mṛdukān paṭṭāna tathaiva tatra varatūlikāsaṃstṛta ye 'pi te rathāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1241: śvetāḥ supuṣṭā balavanta goṇā mahāpramāṇā abhidarśanīyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1242: ye yojitā ratnaratheṣu teṣu parigṛhītāḥ puruṣairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_3.83 //
T01bsu036_u:1243: etādṛśān so puruṣo dadāti putrāṇa sarvāṇa varān viśiṣṭān /
T01bsu036_u:1244: te cāpi tuṣṭāttamanāśca tehi diśāśca vidiśāśca vrajanti krīḍakāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1245: emeva haṃ śārisutā maharṣī sattvāna trāṇaṃ ca pitā ca bhomi /
T01bsu036_u:1246: putrāśca te prāṇina sarvi mahyaṃ traidhātuke kāmavilagna bālāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1247: traidhātukaṃ co yatha tanniveśanaṃ subhairavaṃ duḥkhaśatābhikīrṇam /
T01bsu036_u:1249: ahaṃ ca traidhātukamukta śānto ekāntasthāyī pavane vasāmi /
T01bsu036_u:1250: traidhātukaṃ co mamidaṃ parigraho ye hyatra dahyanti mamaiti putrāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1251: ahaṃ ca ādīnava tatra darśayī viditva trāṇaṃ ahameva caiṣām /
T01bsu036_u:1252: na caiva me te śruṇi sarvi bālā yathāpi kāmeṣu vilagnabuddhayaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1253: upāyakauśalyamahaṃ prayojayī yānāni trīṇi pravadāmi caiṣām /
T01bsu036_u:1254: jñātvā ca traidhātuki nekadoṣān nirdhāvanārthāya vadāmyupāyam //
T01bsu036_u:1255: māṃ caiva ye niśrita bhonti putrāḥ ṣaḍabhijña traividya mahānubhāvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1257: pratyekabuddhāśca bhavanti ye 'tra avivartikā ye ciha bodhisattvāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1258: samāna putrāṇa hu teṣa tatkṣaṇamimena dṛṣṭāntavareṇa paṇḍita /
T01bsu036_u:1259: vadāmi ekaṃ imu buddhayānaṃ parigṛhṇathā sarvi jinā bhaviṣyatha //
T01bsu036_u:1260: taccā variṣṭhaṃ sumanoramaṃ ca viśiṣṭarūpaṃ ciha sarvaloke /
T01bsu036_u:1261: buddhāna jñānaṃ dvipadottamānāmudārarūpaṃ tatha vandanīyam // Saddhp_3.92
T01bsu036_u:1262: balāni dhyānāni tathā vimokṣāḥ samādhināṃ koṭiśatā ca nekā /
T01bsu036_u:1263: ayaṃ ratho īdṛśako variṣṭho ramanti yeno sada buddhaputrāḥ // Saddhp_3.93
T01bsu036_u:1264: krīḍanta etena kṣapenti rātrayo divasāṃśca pakṣānṛtavo 'tha māsān /
T01bsu036_u:1266: ratnāmayaṃ yānamidaṃ variṣṭhaṃ gacchanti yeno iha bodhimaṇḍe /
T01bsu036_u:1267: vikrīḍamānā bahubodhisattvā ye co śṛṇonti sugatasya śrāvakāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1268: evaṃ prajānāhi tvamadya tiṣya nāstīha yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ kahiṃcit /
T01bsu036_u:1269: diśo daśā sarva gaveṣayitvā sthāpetvupāyaṃ puruṣottamānām // Saddhp_3.96
T01bsu036_u:1270: putrā mamā yūyamahaṃ pitā vo mayā ca niṣkāsita yūya duḥkhāt /
T01bsu036_u:1273: evaṃ ca haṃ tatra vadāmi nirvṛtimanirvṛtā yūya tathaiva cādya /
T01bsu036_u:1274: saṃsāraduḥkhādiha yūya muktā bauddhaṃ tu yānaṃ va gaveṣitavyam //
T01bsu036_u:1275: ye bodhisattvāśca ihāsti kecicchṛṇvanti sarve mama buddhanetrīm /
T01bsu036_u:1276: upāyakauśalyamidaṃ jinasya yeno vinetī bahubodhisattvān // Saddhp_3.99 //
T01bsu036_u:1277: hīneṣu kāmeṣu jugupsiteṣu ratā yadā bhontimi atra sattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1278: duḥkhaṃ tadā bhāṣati lokanāyako ananyathāvādirihāryasatyam // Saddhp_3.100
T01bsu036_u:1279: ye cāpi duḥkhasya ajānamānā mūlaṃ na paśyantiha bālabuddhayaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1280: mārgaṃ hi teṣāmanudarśayāmi samudāgamastṛṣṇa dukhasya saṃbhavaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1281: tṛṣṇānirodho 'tha sadā aniśritā nirodhasatyaṃ tṛtiyaṃ idaṃ me /
T01bsu036_u:1282: ananyathā yena ca mucyate naro mārgaṃ hi bhāvitva vimukta bhoti //
T01bsu036_u:1283: kutaśca te śārisutā vimuktā asantagrāhātu vimukta bhonti /
T01bsu036_u:1284: na ca tāva te sarvata mukta bhonti anirvṛtāṃstān vadatīha nāyakaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1286: mamaiṣa chando ahu dharmarājā sukhāpanārthāyiha loki jātaḥ // Saddhp_3.104
T01bsu036_u:1287: iya śāriputrā mama dharmamudrā yā paścime kāli mayādya bhāṣitā /
T01bsu036_u:1289: hitāya lokasya sadevakasya diśāsu vidiśāsu ca deśayasva // Saddhp_3.105 //
T01bsu036_u:1290: yaścāpi te bhāṣati kaści sattvo anumodayāmīti vadeta vācam /
T01bsu036_u:1291: mūrdhnena cedaṃ pratigṛhya sūtraṃ avivartikaṃ taṃ naru dhārayestvam //
T01bsu036_u:1292: dṛṣṭāśca teno purimāstathāgatāḥ satkāru teṣāṃ ca kṛto abhūṣi /
T01bsu036_u:1293: śrutaśca dharmo ayamevarūpo ya eta sūtraṃ abhiśraddadheta // Saddhp_3.107
T01bsu036_u:1294: ahaṃ ca tvaṃ caiva bhaveta dṛṣṭo ayaṃ ca sarvo mama bhikṣusaṃghaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1295: dṛṣṭāśca sarve imi bodhisattvā ye śraddadhe bhāṣitameta mahyam //
T01bsu036_u:1296: sūtraṃ imaṃ bālajanapramohanamabhijñajñānāna mi etu bhāṣitam /
T01bsu036_u:1297: viṣayo hi naivāstiha śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhāna gatirna cātra //
T01bsu036_u:1298: adhimuktisārastuva śāriputra kiṃ vā punarmahya ime 'nyaśrāvakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1299: ete 'pi śraddhāya mamaiva yānti pratyātmikaṃ jñānu na caiva vidyate //
T01bsu036_u:1300: mā caiva tvaṃ stambhiṣu mā ca māniṣu māyuktayogīna vadesi etat /
T01bsu036_u:1301: bālā hi kāmeṣu sadā pramattā ajānakā dharmu kṣipeyu bhāṣitam //
T01bsu036_u:1302: upāyakauśalya kṣipitva mahyaṃ yā buddhanetrī sada loki saṃsthitā /
T01bsu036_u:1303: bhṛkuṭiṃ karitvāna kṣipitva yānaṃ vipāku tasyeha śṛṇohi tīvram //
T01bsu036_u:1305: kṣipitva sūtraṃ idamevarūpaṃ mayi tiṣṭhamāne parinirvṛte vā /
T01bsu036_u:1306: bhikṣūṣu vā teṣu khilāni kṛtvā teṣāṃ vipākaṃ mamihaṃ śṛṇohi //
T01bsu036_u:1307: cyutvā manuṣyeṣu avīci teṣāṃ pratiṣṭha bhotī paripūrṇakalpāt /
T01bsu036_u:1309: yadā ca narakeṣu cyutā bhavanti tataśca tiryakṣu vrajanti bhūyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1310: sudurbalāḥ śvānaśṛgālabhūtāḥ pareṣa krīḍāpanakā bhavanti // Saddhp_3.115
T01bsu036_u:1311: varṇena te kālaka tatra bhonti kalmāṣakā vrāṇika kaṇḍulāśca /
T01bsu036_u:1312: nirlomakā durbala bhonti bhūyo vidveṣamāṇā mama agrabodhim // Saddhp_3.116
T01bsu036_u:1313: jugupsitā prāṇiṣu nitya bhonti loṣṭaprahārābhihatā rudantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1314: daṇḍena saṃtrāsita tatra tatra kṣudhāpipāsāhata śuṣkagātrāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1315: uṣṭrātha vā gardabha bhonti bhūyo bhāraṃ vahantaḥ kaśadaṇḍatāḍitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1317: punaśca te kroṣṭuka bhonti tatra bībhatsakāḥ kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
T01bsu036_u:1319: tataścyavitvāna ca bhūyu bālāḥ pañcāśatīnāṃ sama yojanānām /
T01bsu036_u:1321: dīrghātmabhāvā hi bhavanti prāṇino jaḍāśca mūḍhāḥ parivartamānāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1322: apādakā bhonti ca kroḍasakkino vikhādyamānā bahuprāṇikoṭibhiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1323: sudāruṇāṃ te anubhonti vedanāṃ kṣipitva sūtraṃ idamevarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:1324: puruṣātmabhāvaṃ ca yada labhante te kuṇṭhakā laṅgaka bhonti tatra /
T01bsu036_u:1325: kubjātha kāṇā ca jaḍā jaghanyā aśraddadhantā ima sūtra mahyam //
T01bsu036_u:1326: apratyanīyāśca bhavanti loke pūtī mukhātteṣa pravāti gandhaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1327: yakṣagraho ukrami teṣa kāye aśraddadhantānima buddhabodhim // Saddhp_3.123
T01bsu036_u:1328: daridrakā peṣaṇakārakāśca upasthāyakā nitya parasya durbalāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1329: ābādha teṣāṃ bahukāśca bhonti anāthabhūtā viharanti loke // Saddhp_3.124
T01bsu036_u:1330: yasyaiva te tatra karonti sevanāmadātukāmo bhavatī sa teṣām /
T01bsu036_u:1331: dattaṃ pi co naśyati kṣiprameva phalaṃ hi pāpasya imevarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:1332: yaccāpi te tatra labhanti auṣadhaṃ suyuktarūpaṃ kuśalehi dattam /
T01bsu036_u:1333: tenāpi teṣāṃ ruja bhūyu vardhate so vyādhirantaṃ na kadāci gacchati //
T01bsu036_u:1334: anyehi cauryāṇi kṛtāni bhonti ḍamarātha ḍimbāstatha vigrahāśca /
T01bsu036_u:1336: na jātu so paśyati lokanāthaṃ narendrarājaṃ mahi śāsamānam /
T01bsu036_u:1338: tasyākṣaṇeṣveva hi vāsu bhoti imāṃ kṣipitvā mama buddhanetrīm //
T01bsu036_u:1339: na cāpi so dharma śṛṇoti bālo badhiraśca so bhoti acetanaśca /
T01bsu036_u:1340: kṣipitva bodhīmimamevarūpāmupaśānti tasyo na kadāci bhoti // Saddhp_3.129
T01bsu036_u:1341: sahasra nekā nayutāṃśca bhūyaḥ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1342: jaḍātmabhāvo vikalaśca bhoti kṣipitva sūtraṃ imu pāpakaṃ phalam //
T01bsu036_u:1343: udyānabhūmī narako 'sya bhoti niveśanaṃ tasya apāyabhūmiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1344: kharasūkarā kroṣṭuka bhūmisūcakāḥ pratiṣṭhitasyeha bhavanti nityam //
T01bsu036_u:1346: parapreṣya so bhoti daridra nityaṃ tatkāli tasyābharaṇānimāni //
T01bsu036_u:1347: vastrāṇi co vyādhayu bhonti tasya vraṇāna koṭīnayutāśca kāye /
T01bsu036_u:1348: vicarcikā kaṇḍu tathaiva pāmā kuṣṭhaṃ kilāsaṃ tatha āmagandhaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1349: satkāyadṛṣṭiśca ghanāsya bhoti udīryate krodhabalaṃ ca tasya /
T01bsu036_u:1350: saṃrāgu tasyātibhṛśaṃ ca bhoti tiryāṇa yonīṣu ca so sadā ramī //
T01bsu036_u:1351: sacedahaṃ śārisutādya tasya paripūrṇakalpaṃ pravadeya doṣān /
T01bsu036_u:1352: yo hī mamā etu kṣipeta sūtraṃ paryantu doṣāṇa na śakya gantum //
T01bsu036_u:1354: saṃpaśyamāno idameva cārthaṃ tvāṃ saṃdiśāmī ahu śāriputra /
T01bsu036_u:1355: mā haiva tvaṃ bālajanasya agrato bhāṣiṣyase sūtramimevarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:1356: ye tū iha vyakta bahuśrutāśca smṛtimanta ye paṇḍita jñānavantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1357: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ tān śrāvayestvaṃ paramārthametat //
T01bsu036_u:1358: dṛṣṭāśca yehī bahubuddhakoṭyaḥ kuśalaṃ ca yai ropitamaprameyam /
T01bsu036_u:1359: adhyāśayāścā dṛḍha yeṣa co syāttān śrāvayestvaṃ paramārthametat //
T01bsu036_u:1360: ye vīryavantaḥ sada maitracittā bhāventi maitrīmiha dīrgharātram /
T01bsu036_u:1361: utsṛṣṭakāyā tatha jīvite ca teṣāmidaṃ sūtra bhaṇeḥ samakṣam //
T01bsu036_u:1362: anyonyasaṃkalpa sagauravāśca teṣāṃ ca bālehi na saṃstavo 'sti /
T01bsu036_u:1363: ye cāpi tuṣṭā girikandareṣu tān śrāvayestvaṃ ida sūtra bhadrakam //
T01bsu036_u:1365: yānīdṛśān paśyasi buddhaputrāṃsteṣāmidaṃ sūtra prakāśayesi // Saddhp_3.141
T01bsu036_u:1367: paśyesi yānīdṛśa buddhaputrāṃsteṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.142
T01bsu036_u:1368: akrodhanā ye sada ārjavāśca kṛpāsamanvāgata sarvaprāṇiṣu /
T01bsu036_u:1370: sagauravā ye sugatasya antike teṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.143
T01bsu036_u:1371: yo dharmu bhāṣe pariṣāya madhye asaṅgaprāpto vadi yuktamānasaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1373: mūrdhnāñjaliṃ yaśca karoti baddhvā sarvajñabhāvaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1374: daśo diśo yo 'pi ca caṃkrameta subhāṣitaṃ bhikṣu gaveṣamāṇaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1375: vaipulyasūtrāṇi ca dhārayeta na cāsya rucyanti kadācidanye /
T01bsu036_u:1376: ekāṃ pi gāthāṃ na ca dhāraye 'nyatastaṃ śrāvayestvaṃ varasūtrametat //
T01bsu036_u:1377: tathāgatasyo yatha dhātu dhārayettathaiva yo mārgati koci taṃ naraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1378: emeva yo mārgati sūtramīdṛśaṃ labhitva yo mūrdhani dhārayeta //
T01bsu036_u:1379: anyeṣu sūtreṣu na kāci cintā lokāyatairanyataraiśca śāstraiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1380: bālāna etādṛśa bhonti gocarāstāṃstvaṃ vivarjitva prakāśayeridam //
T01bsu036_u:1381: pūrṇaṃ pi kalpaṃ ahu śāriputra vadeyamākāra sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1382: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ teṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi //
T01bsu036_u:1386: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ imamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamāyuṣmataśca śāriputrasya vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā
T01bsu036_u:1388: upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamabhimukhamullokayamānā avanakāyā abhinatakāyāḥ praṇatakāyāstasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocan - vayaṃ hi bhagavan jīrṇā vṛddhā mahallakā asmin bhikṣusaṃghe sthavirasaṃmatā jarājīrṇībhūtā nirvāṇaprāptāḥ sma iti bhagavan nirudyamā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvapratibalāḥ smaḥ, aprativīryārambhāḥ smaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1389: yadāpi bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati, ciraṃ niṣaṇṇaśca bhagavān bhavati, vayaṃ ca tasyāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1390: dharmadeśanāyāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavāmaḥ, tadāpyasmākaṃ bhagavan ciraṃ
T01bsu036_u:1393: tato vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavato dharmaṃ deśayamānasya śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ sarvamāviṣkurmaḥ
T01bsu036_u:1394: nāsmābhireṣu buddhadharmeṣu buddhakṣetravyūheṣu vā bodhisattvavikrīḍiteṣu vā tathāgatavikrīḍiteṣu vā spṛhotpāditā |
T01bsu036_u:1397: tato bhagavan asmābhirapyanye bodhisattvā avavaditā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, anuśiṣṭāśca
T01bsu036_u:1399: te vayaṃ bhagavannetarhi bhagavato 'ntikācchrāvakāṇāmapi vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhavatīti śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāptā mahālābhaprāptāḥ smaḥ
T01bsu036_u:1400: | bhagavannadya sahasaivemamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ tathāgataghoṣaṃ śrutvā mahāratnapratilabdhāśca smaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1402: bhagavan amārgitamaparyeṣṭamacintitamaprārthitaṃ cāsmābhirbhagavannidamevaṃ rūpaṃ mahāratnaṃ pratilabdham |
T01bsu036_u:1403: pratibhāti no bhagavan, pratibhāti naḥ sugata |
T01bsu036_u:1404: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ piturantikādapakrāmet |
T01bsu036_u:1406: sa tatra bahūni varṣāṇi vipravased viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā |
T01bsu036_u:1407: atha sa bhagavan mahān puruṣo bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1409: sa ca vṛttiṃ paryeṣamāṇa āhāracīvarahetordiśo vidiśaḥ prakāman anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ gacchet |
T01bsu036_u:1410: tasya ca sa pitā anyatamaṃ janapadaṃ prakrāntaḥ syāt |
T01bsu036_u:1419: athe khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetorgrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu paryaṭamāno 'nupūrveṇa yatrāsau puruṣo bahudhanahiraṇyasuvarṇakośakoṣṭhāgārastasyaiva pitā vasati,
T01bsu036_u:1421: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣasya pitā bahudhanahiraṇyakośakoṣṭhāgārastasmin nagare vasamānastaṃ pañcāśadvarṣanaṣṭaṃ putraṃ satatasamitamanusmaret |
T01bsu036_u:1422: samanusmaramāṇaśca na kasyacidācakṣedanyatraika evātmanādhyātmaṃ saṃtapyet, evaṃ ca cintayet
T01bsu036_u:1428: sa taṃ punaḥ punaḥ putramanusmaret - aho nāmāhaṃ nirvṛtiprāpto
T01bsu036_u:1429: bhaveyaṃ yadi me sa putra imaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ paribhuñjīta ||
T01bsu036_u:1430: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa
T01bsu036_u:1431: yena tasya prabhūtahiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya samṛddhasya puruṣasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmet |
T01bsu036_u:1432: atha khalu bhagavan sa tasya daridrapuruṣasya pitā svake niveśanadvāre mahatyā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrapariṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto mahāsiṃhāsane sapādapīṭhe suvarṇarūpyapratimaṇḍite upaviṣṭo hiraṇyakoṭīśatasahasrairvyavahāraṃ kurvan vālavyajanena vījyamāno vitatavitāne pṛthivīpradeśe muktakusumābhikīrṇe ratnadāmābhipralambite mahatyaddharyā upaviṣṭaḥ syāt |
T01bsu036_u:1433: adrākṣīt sa bhagavan daridrapuruṣastaṃ svakaṃ pitaraṃ svake niveśanadvāre evaṃrūpayā ṛdhyā upaviṣṭaṃ mahatā janakāyena parivṛtaṃ gṛhapatikṛtyaṃ kurvāṇam |
T01bsu036_u:1434: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvignamānasaḥ evamanuvicintayāmāsa - sahasaivāyaṃ mayā rājā vā rājamātro vā āsāditaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1439: mā haivāhamiha vaiṣṭiko vā gṛhyeya, anyataraṃ vā doṣamanuprāpnuyām ||
T01bsu036_u:1440: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo duḥkhaparaṃparāmanasikārabhayabhītastvaramāṇaḥ prakrāmet palāyet, na tatra saṃtiṣṭhet |
T01bsu036_u:1441: atha khalu bhagavan sa āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ svake niveśanadvāre siṃhāsane upaviṣṭastaṃ svakaṃ putraṃ sahadarśanenaiva pratyabhijānīyāt |
T01bsu036_u:1442: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
T01bsu036_u:1443: bhavet, evaṃ ca cintayet - āścaryaṃ yāvad yatra hi nāma asya mahato hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya paribhoktā upalabdhaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1447: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ putratṛṣṇāsaṃpīḍitastasmin kṣaṇalavamuhūrte javanān puruṣān saṃpreṣayet - gacchata mārṣā etaṃ puruṣaṃ śīghramānayadhvam |
T01bsu036_u:1448: atha khalu bhagavaṃste puruṣāḥ rsava eva javena pradhāvitāstaṃ daridrapuruṣamadhyālambeyuḥ
T01bsu036_u:1449: atha khalu daridrapuruṣastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvigramānaso dāruṇamārtasvaraṃ muñcedāraved viravet |
T01bsu036_u:1451: atha khalu te puruṣā balātkāreṇa taṃ
T01bsu036_u:1453: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣo bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna udvignamānasa evaṃ ca cintayet - mā tāvadahaṃ vadhyo daṇḍayo bhaveyam |
T01bsu036_u:1458: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti |
T01bsu036_u:1459: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet |
T01bsu036_u:1460: tatkasya hetoḥ? jānāti sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya hīnādhimuktikatāmātmanaścodārasthāmatām
T01bsu036_u:1462: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet -
T01bsu036_u:1464: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa |
T01bsu036_u:1465: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi |
T01bsu036_u:1467: evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet |
T01bsu036_u:1468: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi |
T01bsu036_u:1470: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1471: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ
T01bsu036_u:1473: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau - gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo 'sau puruṣa ihāgato 'bhūt, taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām |
T01bsu036_u:1474: sacet sa evaṃ vadet - kiṃ karma kartavyamiti, sa yuvābhyāmevaṃ vaktavyaḥ -
T01bsu036_u:1476: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām |
T01bsu036_u:1477: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1478: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1479: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam |
T01bsu036_u:1481: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
T01bsu036_u:1482: apanayitvā mṛdukāni vastrāṇi, caukṣāṇyudārāṇi malināni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya,
T01bsu036_u:1483: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet |
T01bsu036_u:1484: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadet - vahantu bhavantaḥ piṭakāni, mā tiṣṭhata, harata pāṃsūni |
T01bsu036_u:1491: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet, tadviśrabdhaṃ māṃ yāceḥ,
T01bsu036_u:1492: yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena |
T01bsu036_u:1496: yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa
T01bsu036_u:1501: ahaṃ (Vaidya 74) ca vṛddhaḥ, tvaṃ ca daharaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1502: mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā |
T01bsu036_u:1503: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ,
T01bsu036_u:1505: sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
T01bsu036_u:1506: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante |
T01bsu036_u:1507: yādṛśo me putra aurasaḥ, tādṛśastvaṃ mama adyāgreṇa bhavasi ||
T01bsu036_u:1508: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt |
T01bsu036_u:1510: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet |
T01bsu036_u:1511: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
T01bsu036_u:1513: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1514: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet |
T01bsu036_u:1515: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa |
T01bsu036_u:1518: icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet,
T01bsu036_u:1520: tatkasya hetoḥ? yādṛśa eva ahamasya dravyasya svāmī,
T01bsu036_u:1522: mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi ||
T01bsu036_u:1523: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo 'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt |
T01bsu036_u:1525: na ca tasmāt kiṃcit prārthayet, antaśaḥ saktuprasthamūlyamātramapi |
T01bsu036_u:1528: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ saṃśrāvayet - śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ, ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1535: yaḥ kaścinmamopabhogo 'sti, taṃ sarvamasmai puruṣāya niryātayāmi |
T01bsu036_u:1538: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:1539: evaṃ ca vicintayet - sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti (Vaidya 75)
T01bsu036_u:1541: tathāgataśca asmākamevaṃ vadati - putrā mama yūyamiti, yathā sa gṛhapatiḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1546: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1548: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1549: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1550: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā
T01bsu036_u:1552: hīnādhimuktikatām, tataśca bhagavānasmānupekṣate, na saṃbhinatti, nācaṣṭe
T01bsu036_u:1553: - yo 'yaṃ tathāgatasya jñānakośaḥ, eṣa eva yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T01bsu036_u:1557: etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe
T01bsu036_u:1558: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1562: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:1565: yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti, api tu khalu
T01bsu036_u:1569: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ, te codārāyāṃ buddhabodhau samādāpitāḥ, asmākaṃ cedānīṃ bhagavānadhimuktibalaṃ jñātvā idamudāhṛtavān anena vayaṃ bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmaḥ -
T01bsu036_u:1571: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
T01bsu036_u:1572: āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
T01bsu036_u:1573: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya //
T01bsu036_u:1576: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve //
T01bsu036_u:1577: yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1578: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram // Saddhp_4.3 //
T01bsu036_u:1579: pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
T01bsu036_u:1580: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni // Saddhp_4.4 //
T01bsu036_u:1581: tathā ca so putra gaveṣamāṇo anyaṃ mahantaṃ nagaraṃ hi gatvā /
T01bsu036_u:1582: niveśanaṃ māpiya tatra tiṣṭhet samarpito kāmugaṇehi pañcabhiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1583: bahuṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyaṃ dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālam /
T01bsu036_u:1584: hastī ca aśvāśca padātayaśca gāvaḥ paśūścaiva tathaiḍakāśca // Saddhp_4.6
T01bsu036_u:1585: prayoga āyoga tathaiva kṣetrā dāsī ca dāsā bahu preṣyavargaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1586: susatkṛtaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭibhī rājñaśca so vallabhu nityakālam //
T01bsu036_u:1587: kṛtāñjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarā grāmeṣu ye cāpi vasanti grāmiṇaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1588: bahuvāṇijāstasya vrajanti antike bahūhi kāryehi kṛtādhikārāḥ // Saddhp_4.8
T01bsu036_u:1589: etādṛśo ṛddhimato naraḥ syājjīrṇaśca vṛddhaśca mahallakaśca /
T01bsu036_u:1590: sa putraśokaṃ anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam // Saddhp_4.9
T01bsu036_u:1592: sa tādṛśo durmati mahya putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1593: ayaṃ ca kośo vipulo mamāsti kālakriyā co mama pratyupasthitā //
T01bsu036_u:1594: so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro daridrakaḥ kṛpaṇaku nityakālam /
T01bsu036_u:1595: grāmeṇa grāmaṃ anucaṃkramantaḥ paryeṣate bhakta athāpi colam //
T01bsu036_u:1596: paryeṣamāṇo 'pi kadāci kiṃcillabheta kiṃcit puna naiva kiṃcit /
T01bsu036_u:1597: sa śuṣyate paraśaraṇeṣu bālo dadrūya kaṇḍūya ca digdhagātraḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1598: so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā anupūrvaśo tatra gato bhaveta /
T01bsu036_u:1599: bhaktaṃ ca colaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇo niveśanaṃ yatra pituḥ svakasya //
T01bsu036_u:1600: so cāpi āḍhyaḥ puruṣo mahādhano dvārasmi siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1602: āpto janaścāsya samantataḥ sthito dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca gaṇenti kecit /
T01bsu036_u:1603: kecittu lekhānapi lekhayanti kecit prayogaṃ ca prayojayanti // Saddhp_4.15
T01bsu036_u:1604: so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitaṃ gṛhapatino niveśanam /
T01bsu036_u:1605: kahiṃ nu adya ahamatra āgato rājā ayaṃ bheṣyati rājamātraḥ // Saddhp_4.16
T01bsu036_u:1606: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
T01bsu036_u:1608: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naro daridravīthīṃ paripṛcchamānaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1609: so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsanasthaśca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1610: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etaṃ puruṣaṃ daridram //
T01bsu036_u:1611: samanantaraṃ tehi gṛhītu so naro gṛhītamātro 'tha ca mūrccha gacchet /
T01bsu036_u:1612: dhrūvaṃ khu mahyaṃ vadhakā upasthitāḥ kiṃ mahya colenatha bhojanena vā //
T01bsu036_u:1613: dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī hīnādhimukto ayu bāla durmatiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1614: na śraddadhī mahyamimāṃ vibhūṣitāṃ pitā mamāyaṃ ti na cāpi śraddadhīt //
T01bsu036_u:1615: puruṣāṃśca so tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāśca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
T01bsu036_u:1616: kucelakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīnasattvāḥ paryeṣathā taṃ naru karmakārakam //
T01bsu036_u:1618: taṃ śodhanārthāya karohi karma dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ pradāsye //
T01bsu036_u:1619: etādṛśaṃ ghoṣa śruṇitva so naro āgatya saṃśodhayi taṃ pradeśam /
T01bsu036_u:1620: tatraiva so āvasathaṃ ca kuryānniveśanasyopalikuñcike 'smin // Saddhp_4.23
T01bsu036_u:1621: so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed gavākṣaolokanake 'pi nityam /
T01bsu036_u:1622: hīnādhimukto ayu mahya putraḥ saṃkāradhānaṃ śucikaṃ karoti // Saddhp_4.24
T01bsu036_u:1624: sa otaritvā piṭakaṃ gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā /
T01bsu036_u:1625: upasaṃkramettasya narasya antike avabhartsayanto na karotha karma //
T01bsu036_u:1626: dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ dadāmi dviguṇāṃ ca bhūyastatha pādamrakṣaṇam /
T01bsu036_u:1627: saloṇabhaktaṃ ca dadāmi tubhya śākaṃ ca śāṭiṃ ca punardadāmi //
T01bsu036_u:1628: evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle saṃśleṣayettaṃ punareva paṇḍitaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1629: suṣṭhuṃ khalū karma karoṣi atra putro 'si vyaktaṃ mama nātra saṃśayaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1630: sa stokastokaṃ ca gṛhaṃ praveśayet karmaṃ ca kārāpayi taṃ manuṣyam /
T01bsu036_u:1631: viṃśacca varṣāṇi supūritāni krameṇa viśrambhayi taṃ naraṃ saḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1632: hiraṇyu so mauktiku sphāṭikaṃ ca pratisāmayettatra niveśanasmin /
T01bsu036_u:1633: sarvaṃ ca so saṃgaṇanāṃ karoti arthaṃ ca sarvaṃ anucintayeta //
T01bsu036_u:1634: bahirdhā so tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya eko vasamānu bālaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1635: daridracintāmanucintayeta na me 'sti etādṛśa bhoga kecit // Saddhp_4.30 //
T01bsu036_u:1636: jñātvā ca so tasya imevarūpamudārasaṃjñābhigato mi putraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1637: sa ānayitvā suhṛjñātisaṃghaṃ niryātayiṣyāmyahu sarvamartham // Saddhp_4.31
T01bsu036_u:1640: uvāca evaṃ pariṣāya madhye putro mamāyaṃ cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ // Saddhp_4.32
T01bsu036_u:1641: pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca 'to viṃśatiye mi dṛṣṭaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1642: amukātu nagarātu mamaiṣa naṣṭo ahaṃ ca mārganta ihaivamāgataḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1643: sarvasya dravyasya ayaṃ prabhurme etasya niryātayi sarvaśeṣataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1644: karotu kāryaṃ ca piturdhanena sarvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ ca dadāmi etat //
T01bsu036_u:1646: hīnādhimuktiṃ ca pituśca tān guṇāṃllabdhvā kuṭumbaṃ sukhito 'smi adya //
T01bsu036_u:1648: na śrāvitaṃ buddha bhaviṣyatheti yūyaṃ kila śrāvaka mahya putrāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1649: asmāṃśca adhyeṣati lokanātho ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:1650: teṣāṃ vade kāśyapa mārga nuttaraṃ yaṃ mārga bhāvitva bhaveyu buddhāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1651: vayaṃ ca teṣāṃ sugatena preṣitā bahubodhisattvāna mahābalānām /
T01bsu036_u:1652: anuttaraṃ mārga pradarśayāma dṛṣṭāntahetūnayutāna koṭibhiḥ // Saddhp_4.38
T01bsu036_u:1653: śrutvā ca asmāku jinasya putrā bodhāya bhāventi sumārgamagryam /
T01bsu036_u:1654: te vyākriyante ca kṣaṇasmi tasmin bhaviṣyathā buddha imasmi loke //
T01bsu036_u:1656: etādṛśaṃ karma karoma tāyinaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇā ima dharmakośam /
T01bsu036_u:1657: prakāśayantaśca jinātmajānāṃ vaiśvāsikastasya yathā naraḥ saḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1659: na caiva prārthema jinasya jñānaṃ jinasya jñānaṃ ca prakāśayāmaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1660: pratyātmikīṃ nirvṛti kalpayāma etāvatā jñānamidaṃ na bhūyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1661: nāsmāka harṣo 'pi kadācia bhoti kṣetreṣu buddhāna śruṇitva vyūhān //
T01bsu036_u:1663: na cātra kaścidbhavatīha dharmo evaṃ tu cintetva na bhoti śraddhā //
T01bsu036_u:1664: suniḥspṛhā smā vaya dīrgharātraṃ bauddhasya jñānasya anuttarasya /
T01bsu036_u:1665: praṇidhānamasmāka na jātu tatra iyaṃ parā niṣṭha jinena uktā //
T01bsu036_u:1667: parimukta traidhātukaduḥkhapīḍitāḥ kṛtaṃ ca asmābhi jinasya śāsanam //
T01bsu036_u:1668: yaṃ hi prakāśema jinātmajānāṃ ye prasthitā bhonti ihāgrabodhau /
T01bsu036_u:1669: teṣāṃ ca yatkiṃci vadāma dharmaṃ spṛha tatra asmāka na jātu bhoti //
T01bsu036_u:1673: upāyakauśalya yathaiva tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasya kāle /
T01bsu036_u:1674: hīnādhimuktaṃ satataṃ dameti damiyāna cāsmai pradadāti vittam //
T01bsu036_u:1676: hīnādhimuktān damayantu putrān dametva ca jñānamidaṃ dadāti // Saddhp_4.49
T01bsu036_u:1677: āścaryaprāptāḥ sahasā sma adya yathā daridro labhiyāna vittam /
T01bsu036_u:1678: phalaṃ ca prāptaṃ iha buddhāśāsane prathamaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca //
T01bsu036_u:1679: yacchīlamasmābhi ca dīrgharātraṃ saṃrakṣitaṃ lokavidusya śāsane /
T01bsu036_u:1680: asmābhi labdhaṃ phalamadya tasya śīlasya pūrvaṃ caritasya nātha //
T01bsu036_u:1681: yad brahmacaryaṃ paramaṃ viśuddhaṃ niṣevitaṃ śāsani nāyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:1682: tasyo viśiṣṭaṃ phalamadya labdhaṃ śāntaṃ udāraṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca //
T01bsu036_u:1683: adyo vayaṃ śrāvakabhūta nātha saṃśrāvayiṣyāmatha cāgrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:1684: bodhīya śabdaṃ ca prakāśayāmasteno vayaṃ śrāvaka bhīṣmakalpāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1685: arhantabhūtā vayamadya nātha arhāmahe pūja sadevakātaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1686: lokātsamārātu sabrahmakātaḥ sarveṣa sattvāna ca antikātaḥ // Saddhp_4.54
T01bsu036_u:1687: ko nāma śaktaḥ pratikartu tubhyamudyuktarūpo bahukalpakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1688: suduṣkarāṇīdṛśakā karoṣi suduṣkarān yāniha martyaloke // Saddhp_4.55 //
T01bsu036_u:1690: hastehi pādehi śireṇa cāpi pratipriyaṃ duṣkarakaṃ hi kartum /
T01bsu036_u:1691: śireṇa aṃsena ca yo dhareta paripūrṇakalpān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1693: vihāra kārāpayi candanāmayān saṃstīrya co dūṣyayugehi dadyāt //
T01bsu036_u:1694: gilānabhaiṣajya bahuprakāraṃ pūjārtha dadyāt sugatasya nityam /
T01bsu036_u:1695: dadeya kalpān yatha gaṅgavālikā naivaṃ kadācit pratikartu śakyam //
T01bsu036_u:1697: buddhā mahārāja anāsravā jinā sahanti bālāna imīdṛśāni // Saddhp_4.59 //
T01bsu036_u:1699: dharmeśvaro īśvaru sarvaloke maheśvaro lokavināyakendraḥ // Saddhp_4.60 //
T01bsu036_u:1700: pratipatti darśeti bahuprakāraṃ sattvāna sthānāni prajānamānaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1701: nānādhimuktiṃ ca viditva teṣāṃ hetūsahasrehi bravīti dharmam //
T01bsu036_u:1703: bahuprakāraṃ hi bravīti dharmaṃ nidarśayanto imamagrabodhim // Saddhp_4.62
T01bsu036_u:1707: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapaṃ tāṃścānyān sthavirān mahāśrāvakānāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu mahākāśyapa |
T01bsu036_u:1708: sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtān guṇavarṇān bhāṣadhve |
T01bsu036_u:1709: ete ca kāśyapa tathāgatasya bhūtā guṇāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1711: yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ paryanto 'dhigantumaparimitānapi kalpān bhāṣamāṇaiḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1712: dharmasvāmī kāśyapa tathāgataḥ, sarvadharmāṇāṃ rājā prabhurvaśī |
T01bsu036_u:1713: yaṃ ca kāśyapa tathāgato dharmaṃ yatropanikṣipati, sa tathaiva bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:1718: sarvadharmārthavaśitāprāptaḥ sarvadharmādhyāśayaprāptaḥ sarvadharmaviniścayakauśalyajñānaparamapāramitāprāptaḥ sarvajñajñānasaṃdarśakaḥ sarvajñajñānāvatārakaḥ sarvajñajñānopanikṣepakaḥ kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:1719: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāvantastṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo nānāvarṇā nānāprakārā oṣadhigrāmā nānānāmadheyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātāḥ parvatagirikandareṣu vā |
T01bsu036_u:1720: meghaśca mahāvāriparipūrṇa unnamet, unnamitvā sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1722: saṃchādya ca sarvatra samakālaṃ vāri pramuñcet |
T01bsu036_u:1726: sarve te tato mahāmeghapramuktādvāriṇo yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayamabdhātuṃ pratyāpibanti |
T01bsu036_u:1727: te caikarasena vāriṇā prabhūtena meghapramuktena yathābījamanvayaṃ vivṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāmāpadyante, tathā ca puṣpaphalāni prasavanti |
T01bsu036_u:1728: te ca pṛthak pṛthagū nānānāmadheyāni pratilabhante |
T01bsu036_u:1729: ekadharaṇīpratiṣṭhitāśca te sarve oṣadhigrāmā bījagrāmā ekarasatoyābhiṣyanditāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1730: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate |
T01bsu036_u:1733: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1734: lokadhātumavacchādayati, evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata evaṃ śabdamudīrayati,
T01bsu036_u:1736: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, tīrṇastārayāmi, mukto mocayāmi, āśvasta āśvāsayāmi,
T01bsu036_u:1738: ahamimaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ samyak prajñayā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmi sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī
T01bsu036_u:1741: tatra kāśyapa bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatasya dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti
T01bsu036_u:1742: atha tathāgato 'pi teṣāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryaparāparavaimātratāṃ (Vaidya 85) jñātvā tāṃstān dharmaparyāyānupasaṃharati, tāṃ tāṃ dharmakathāṃ kathayati bahvīṃ vicitrāṃ
T01bsu036_u:1744: yayā kathaya te sattvāḥ dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavanti, kālaṃ ca kṛtvā
T01bsu036_u:1745: sugatīṣūpapadyante, yatra prabhūtāṃśca kāmān paribhuñjante, dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti |
T01bsu036_u:1746: śrutvā ca taṃ dharmaṃ vigatanīvaraṇā bhavanti |
T01bsu036_u:1747: anupūrveṇa ca sarvajñadharmeṣvabhiyujyante yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthānam ||
T01bsu036_u:1748: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃchādya samaṃ vāri pramuñcati, sarvāṃśca tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīn vāriṇā saṃtarpayati |
T01bsu036_u:1749: yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthāmaṃ ca te tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vāryāpibanti, svakasvakāṃ ca jātipramāṇatāṃ gacchanti |
T01bsu036_u:1750: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate, sarvaḥ sa dharma ekaraso yaduta vimuktiraso
T01bsu036_u:1752: tatra kāśyapa ye te sattvāstathāgatasya dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śṛṇvanti dhārayanti
T01bsu036_u:1753: abhisaṃyujyante, na te ātmanātmānaṃ jānanti vā vedayanti vā budhyanti vā |
T01bsu036_u:1754: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata eva kāśyapa tān sattvāṃstathā jānāti, ye ca te,
T01bsu036_u:1756: yaṃ ca te cintayanti, yathā ca te cintayanti,
T01bsu036_u:1758: yaṃ ca te bhāvayanti, yathā ca te bhāvayanti, yena ca te bhāvayanti |
T01bsu036_u:1759: yaṃ ca te prāpnuvanti, yathā ca te prāpnuvanti, yena ca te prāpnuvanti |
T01bsu036_u:1760: tathāgata eva kāśyapa tatra pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣadarśī yathā ca darśī teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmiṣu sthitānāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamānām |
T01bsu036_u:1761: so 'haṃ kāśyapa ekarasadharma viditvā yaduta vimuktirasaṃ nirvṛtirasaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ nityaparinirvṛtamekabhūmikamākāśagatikamadhimuktiṃ sattvānāmanurakṣamāṇo
T01bsu036_u:1763: āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā yūyaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ tathāgatasya na śaknutha avataritum |
T01bsu036_u:1766: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamāna imā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:1770: rahasyaṃ cāpi dhārenti na ca bhāṣanti prāṇinām // Saddhp_5.2 //
T01bsu036_u:1771: durbodhyaṃ cāpi tajjñānaṃ sahasā śrutva bāliśāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1772: kāṅkṣāṃ kuryuḥ sudurmedhāstato bhraṣṭā bhrameyu te // Saddhp_5.3 //
T01bsu036_u:1775: anyamanyehi arthehi dṛṣṭiṃ kurvāmi ujjukām // Saddhp_5.4 //
T01bsu036_u:1778: so ca vārisya saṃpūrṇo vidyunmālī mahāmbudaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1784: iha yā kāci medinyāṃ jātā oṣadhayo bhavet /
T01bsu036_u:1787: parvate kandare caiva nikuñjeṣu ca yadbhavet // Saddhp_5.10 //
T01bsu036_u:1789: tṛṣitāṃ dharaṇīṃ tarpet pariṣiñcati cauṣadhīḥ // Saddhp_5.11 //
T01bsu036_u:1791: yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ tṛṇagulmā pibanti tat // Saddhp_5.12 //
T01bsu036_u:1792: drumāśca ye keci mahādrumāśca khudrāka madhyāśca yathāvayāśca /
T01bsu036_u:1793: yathābalaṃ sarve pibanti vāri pibanti vardhanti yathecchakāmāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1794: kāṇḍena nālena tvacā yathaiva śākhāpraśākhāya tathaiva patraiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1795: vardhanti puṣpehi phalehi caiva meghābhivṛṣṭena mahauṣadhīyaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1796: yathābalaṃ tā viṣayaśca yādṛśo yāsāṃ ca yad yādṛśakaṃ ca bījam /
T01bsu036_u:1797: svakasvakaṃ tāḥ prasavaṃ dadanti vāriṃ ca taṃ ekarasaṃ pramuktam //
T01bsu036_u:1799: emeva buddho 'pi ha loke kāśyapa utpadyate vāridharo va loke /
T01bsu036_u:1800: utpadya ca bhāṣati lokanātho bhūtāṃ cariṃ darśayate ca prāṇinām //
T01bsu036_u:1801: evaṃ ca saṃśrāvayate maharṣiḥ puraskṛto loke sadevake 'smin /
T01bsu036_u:1802: tathāgato 'haṃ dvipadottamo jino utpannu lokasmi yathaiva meghaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1804: duḥkhena śuṣyanta sukhe sthapeyaṃ kāmāṃśca dāsyāmyahu nirvṛtiṃ ca //
T01bsu036_u:1805: śṛṇotha me devamanuṣyasaṃghā upasaṃkramadhvaṃ mama darśanāya /
T01bsu036_u:1806: tathāgato 'haṃ bhagavānanābhibhūḥ saṃtāraṇārthaṃ iha loki jātaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1807: bhāṣāmi ca prāṇisahasrakoṭināṃ dharmaṃ viśuddhaṃ abhidarśanīyam /
T01bsu036_u:1808: ekā ca tasyo samatā tathatvaṃ yadidaṃ vimuktiścatha nirvṛtī ca //
T01bsu036_u:1809: svareṇa caikena vadāmi dharmaṃ bodhiṃ nidānaṃ kariyāna nityam /
T01bsu036_u:1810: samaṃ hi etadviṣamatva nāsti na kaści vidveṣu na rāgu vidyate //
T01bsu036_u:1811: anunīyatā mahya na kācidasti premā ca doṣaśca na me kahiṃcit /
T01bsu036_u:1812: samaṃ ca dharmaṃ pravadāmi dehināṃ yathaikasattvasya tathā parasya //
T01bsu036_u:1813: ananyakarmā pravadāmi dharmaṃ gacchantu tiṣṭhantu niṣīdamānaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1815: niṣaṇṇa śayyāsanamāruhitvā kilāsitā mahya na jātu vidyate // Saddhp_5.23
T01bsu036_u:1816: saṃtarpayāmī imu sarvalokaṃ megho va vāriṃ sama muñcamānaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1817: āryeṣu nīceṣu ca tulyabuddhirduḥśīlabhūteṣvatha śīlavatsu // Saddhp_5.24
T01bsu036_u:1819: dṛṣṭisthitā ye ca vinaṣṭadṛṣṭī samyagdṛśo ye cāviśuddhadṛṣṭayaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1820: hīneṣu cotkṛṣṭamatīṣu cāpi mṛdvindriyeṣu pravadāmi dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:1821: kilāsitāṃ sarva vivarjayitvā samyak pramuñcāmyahu dharmavarṣam //
T01bsu036_u:1822: yathābalaṃ ca śruṇiyāna mahyaṃ vividhāsu bhūmīṣu pratiṣṭhihanti /
T01bsu036_u:1823: deveṣu martyeṣu manorameṣu śakreṣu brahmeṣvatha cakravartiṣu //
T01bsu036_u:1824: kṣudrānukṣudrā ima oṣadhīyo kṣudrīka etā iha yāva loke /
T01bsu036_u:1825: anyā ca madhyā mahatī ca oṣadhī śṛṇotha tāḥ sarva prakāśayiṣye //
T01bsu036_u:1826: anāsravaṃ dharma prajānamānā nirvāṇaprāptā viharanti ye narāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1827: ṣaḍabhijña traividya bhavanti ye ca sā kṣudrikā oṣadhi saṃpravuttā //
T01bsu036_u:1828: girikandeṣū viharanti ye ca pratyekabodhiṃ spṛhayanti ye narāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1829: ye īdṛśā madhyaviśuddhabuddhayaḥ sā madhyamā oṣadhi saṃpravuttā //
T01bsu036_u:1831: ye prārthayante puruṣarṣabhatvaṃ buddho bhaviṣye naradevanāthaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1832: vīryaṃ ca dhyānaṃ ca niṣevamāṇāḥ sā oṣadhī agra iyaṃ pravuccati //
T01bsu036_u:1833: ye cāpi yuktāḥ sugatasya putrā maitrīṃ niṣevantiha śāntacaryām /
T01bsu036_u:1834: niṣkāṅkṣaprāptā puruṣarṣabhatve ayaṃ drumo vucyati evarūpaḥ // Saddhp_5.32
T01bsu036_u:1835: avivarticakraṃ hi pravartayantā ṛddhībalasmin sthita ye ca dhīrāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1836: pramocayanto bahu prāṇikoṭī mahādrumo so ca pravuccate hi // Saddhp_5.33
T01bsu036_u:1837: samaśca so dharma jinena bhāṣito meghena vā vāri samaṃ pramuktam /
T01bsu036_u:1838: citrā abhijñā ima evarūpā yathauṣadhīyo dharaṇītalasthāḥ // Saddhp_5.34 //
T01bsu036_u:1840: yathā ca so bhāṣati ekadharmaṃ nānāniruktī jalabindavo vā // Saddhp_5.35
T01bsu036_u:1841: mamāpi co varṣatu dharmavarṣaṃ loko hyayaṃ tarpitu bhoti sarvaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1842: yathābalaṃ cānuvicintayanti subhāṣitaṃ ekarasaṃ pi dharmam // Saddhp_5.36
T01bsu036_u:1843: tṛṇagulmakā vā yatha varṣamāṇe madhyā pi vā oṣadhiyo yathaiva /
T01bsu036_u:1844: drumā pi vā te ca mahādrumā vā yatha śobhayante daśadikṣu sarve //
T01bsu036_u:1845: iyaṃ sadā lokahitāya dharmatā tarpeti dharmeṇimu sarvalokam /
T01bsu036_u:1846: saṃtarpitaścāpyatha sarvalokaḥ pramuñcate oṣadhi puṣpakāṇi // Saddhp_5.38
T01bsu036_u:1848: madhyāpi ca oṣadhiyo vivardhayī arhanta ye te sthita āsravakṣaye /
T01bsu036_u:1850: bahubodhisattvāḥ smṛtimanta dhīrāḥ sarvatra traidhātuki ye gatiṃgatāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:1851: paryeṣamāṇā imamagrabodhiṃ drumā va vardhanti ti nityakālam // Saddhp_5.40
T01bsu036_u:1852: ye ṛddhimantaścatudhyānadhyāyino ye śūnyatāṃ śrutva janenti prītim /
T01bsu036_u:1853: raśmīsahasrāṇi pramuñcamānāste caiva vuccanti mahādrumā iha // Saddhp_5.41
T01bsu036_u:1854: etādṛśī kāśyapa dharmadeśanā meghena vā vāri samaṃ pramuktam /
T01bsu036_u:1855: bahvī vivardhanti mahauṣadhīyo manuṣyapuṣpāṇi anantakāni // Saddhp_5.42 //
T01bsu036_u:1856: svapratyayaṃ dharma prakāśayāmi kālena darśemi ca buddhabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:1857: upāyakauśalyu mamaitadagraṃ sarveṣa co lokavināyakānām // Saddhp_5.43 //
T01bsu036_u:1858: paramārtha evaṃ mayaṃ bhūtabhāṣito te śrāvakāḥ sarvi na enti nirvṛtim /
T01bsu036_u:1859: caranti ete vara bodhicārikāṃ buddhā bhaviṣyantimi sarvaśrāvakāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:1860: punaraparaṃ kāśyapa tathāgataḥ sattvavinaye samo na cāsamaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1861: tadyathā kāśyapa candrasuryaprabhā sarvalokamavabhāsayati kuśalakāriṇamakuśalakāriṇaṃ cordhvāvasthitamadharāvasthitaṃ ca sugandhi durgandhi, sā sarvatra samaṃ prabhā nipatati na viṣamam, evameva kāśyapa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñajñānacittaprabhā sarveṣu pañcagatyupapanneṣu sattveṣu yathādhimuktiṃ mahāyānikapratyekabuddhayānikaśrāvakayānikeṣu saddharmadeśanā samaṃ pravartate |
T01bsu036_u:1862: na ca tathāgatasya jñānaprabhāyā ūnatā vā atiriktatā vā yathāpuṇyajñānasamudāgamāya saṃbhavati
T01bsu036_u:1864: kevalamanyonyacaritāḥ sattvāḥ, tena trīṇi yānāni prajñapyante ||
T01bsu036_u:1866: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat - yadi bhagavan na
T01bsu036_u:1867: santi trīṇi yānāni, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyutpanne 'dhvani
T01bsu036_u:1868: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptiḥ prajñapyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapametadavocat - tadyathā kāśyapa kumbhakāraḥ
T01bsu036_u:1871: kānicid ghṛtabhājanāni, kānicid dadhikṣīrabhājanāni, kānicid hīnānyaśucibhājanāni bhavanti, na ca mṛttikāyā nānātvam, atha ca dravyaprakṣepamātreṇa bhājanānāṃ nānātvaṃ prajñāyate evameva kāśyapa ekamevedaṃ yānaṃ yaduta buddhayānam |
T01bsu036_u:1872: na dvitīyaṃ na tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate ||
T01bsu036_u:1873: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat - yadyapi bhagavan sattvā nānādhimuktayo ye traidhātukānniḥsṛtāḥ, kiṃ teṣāmekaṃ nirvāṇamuta
T01bsu036_u:1874: dve trīṇi vā? bhagavānāha - sarvadharmasamatāvabodhāddhi kāśyapa nirvāṇam
T01bsu036_u:1876: tena hi kāśyapa upamāṃ te kariṣyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:1879: sa evaṃ brūyānna santi suvarṇadurvaṇāni rūpāṇi, na santi suvarṇadurvarṇānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ draṣṭāraḥ, na staḥ sūryācandramasau, na santi nakṣatrāṇi, na santi grahāḥ, na santi grahāṇāṃ draṣṭāraḥ athānye puruṣāstasya jātyandhasya puruṣasya purata evaṃ vadeyuḥ - santi suvarṇadurvarṇāni rūpāṇi, santi suvarṇadurvarṇānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ draṣṭāraḥ, staḥ
T01bsu036_u:1880: sūryācandramasau, santi nakṣatrāṇi, santi grahāḥ, santi grahāṇāṃ draṣṭāraḥ
T01bsu036_u:1881: | sa ca jātyandhaḥ puruṣasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na śraddadhyāt, noktaṃ gṛhṇīyāt |
T01bsu036_u:1884: tasyaivaṃ syāt - tasya puruṣasya pūrvapāpena karmaṇā vyādhirutpannaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1885: ye ca kecana vyādhaya utpadyante, te sarve caturvidhāḥ -
T01bsu036_u:1887: atha sa vaidyastasya vyādhervyupaśamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarupāyaṃ cintayet |
T01bsu036_u:1888: tasyaivaṃ syāt - yāni khalvimāni dravyāṇi pracaranti, na taiḥ śakyo 'yaṃ
T01bsu036_u:1890: santi tu himavati parvatarāje catasra oṣadhayaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:1892: dvitīyā sarvavyādhipramocanī nāma, tṛtīyā sarvaviṣavināśanī nāma, caturthī yathāsthānasthitasukhapradā nāma |
T01bsu036_u:1894: atha sa vaidyastasmin jātyandhe kāruṇyamutpādya tādṛśamupāyaṃ cintayet, yenopāyena himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ śaknuyādgantam |
T01bsu036_u:1898: ārāgya ca kāṃciddantaiḥ kṣoditāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt, kāṃcit peṣayitvā dadyāt, kāṃcidanyadravyasaṃyojitāṃ pācayitvā dadyāt,
T01bsu036_u:1899: kāṃcidāmadravyasaṃyojitāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt, kāṃcicchalākayā śarīrasthānaṃ viddhvā dadyāt, kāṃcidagninā paridāhya dadyāt,
T01bsu036_u:1902: sa pratilabdhacakṣurbahiradhyātmaṃ dūre āsanne ca candrasūryaprabhāṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahān sarvarūpāṇi ca paśyet |
T01bsu036_u:1903: evaṃ ca vadet - aho batāhaṃ mūḍhaḥ, yo 'haṃ pūrvamācakṣamāṇānāṃ na śraddadhāmi, noktaṃ (Vaidya 92)
T01bsu036_u:1911: te taṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - kevalaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā cakṣuḥ pratilabdham
T01bsu036_u:1916: tamenamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - yadā tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa antargṛhaṃ niṣaṇṇo bahiranyāni rūpāṇi na paśyasi, na ca jānāsi, nāpi te ye
T01bsu036_u:1919: bherīśaṅkhādīnāṃ śabdaṃ na prajānāsi, na śṛṇoṣi |
T01bsu036_u:1923: tatkathamasi paṇḍitaḥ? kathaṃ ca sarvaṃ paśyāmīti vadasi? tatsādhu bhoḥ puruṣa yadandhakāraṃ tatprakāśamiti saṃjānīṣe, yacca prakāśaṃ tadandhakāramiti saṃjānīṣe ||
T01bsu036_u:1924: atha sa puruṣastān ṛṣīnevaṃ vadet - ka upāyaḥ, kiṃ vā śubhaṃ karma kṛtvedṛśīṃ prajñāṃ pratilabheya, yuṣmākaṃ prasādāccaitān guṇān
T01bsu036_u:1925: pratilabheya? atha khalu te ṛṣayastasya puruṣasyaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ -
T01bsu036_u:1932: araṇye vasan ekāgracitto lokatṛṣṇāṃ prahāya pañcābhijñāḥ prāpnuyāt |
T01bsu036_u:1933: pratilabdhābhijñaśca cintayet - yadahaṃ pūrvamanyatkarma kṛtavān, tena me na kaścid guṇo 'dhigataḥ |

T01bsu036_u:2194: saddharmu teṣāṃ vipulaṃ praṇītaṃ dhāretva kalpāna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2195: pūjāṃ ca stūpeṣu kariṣyate tadā parinirvṛtānāṃ sugatāna teṣām //
T01bsu036_u:2196: ratnāmayān stūpa savaijayantān kariṣyate teṣa jinottamānām /
T01bsu036_u:2198: puṣpehi gandhehi ca pūjayanto vādyehi vā lokahitānukampinām // Saddhp_6.33
T01bsu036_u:2199: tatpaścime caiva samucchrayasmin priyadarśane tatra manojñakṣetre /
T01bsu036_u:2202: prakāśayantasyima buddhanetrīṃ manujeṣu deveṣu ca nityakālam //
T01bsu036_u:2203: bahuśrāvakātasya jinasya tatra koṭī sahasrā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2204: ṣaḍabhijña traividya maharddhikāśca abhijñaprāptāḥ sugatasya śāsane //
T01bsu036_u:2206: abhiyuktarūpāḥ sugatasya śāsane teṣāṃ sahasrāṇi bahūni tatra //
T01bsu036_u:2207: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya saddharmu saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle /
T01bsu036_u:2208: viṃśacca viṃśāntarakalpa pūrṇā etatpramāṇaṃ pratirūpakasya // Saddhp_6.38
T01bsu036_u:2209: maharddhikāḥ pañca mi śrāvakā ye nirdiṣṭa ye te maya agrabodhaye /
T01bsu036_u:2210: anāgate 'dhvāni jināḥ svayaṃbhuvasteṣāṃ ca caryāṃ śṛṇuthā mamāntikāt //
T01bsu036_u:2214: bhūtapūrva bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairaprameyairacintyairaparimitairapramāṇaistataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena mahābhijñājñānābhibhūrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
T01bsu036_u:2215: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstāḥ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān saṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau mahārūpe kalpe |
T01bsu036_u:2217: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo yāvāniha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīdhātuḥ, taṃ kaścideva puruṣaḥ sarvaṃ cūrṇīkuryāt, maṣiṃ kuryāt |
T01bsu036_u:2218: atha khalu sa puruṣastasmāllokadhātorekaṃ paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātusahasramatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet |
T01bsu036_u:2219: atha sa puruṣo dvitīyaṃ ca paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā tataḥ pareṇa parataraṃ lokadhātusahasramatikramya dvitīyaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet |
T01bsu036_u:2220: anena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāvantaṃ pṛthivīdhātumupanikṣipet pūrvasyāṃ diśi |
T01bsu036_u:2221: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ śakyaṃ teṣāṃ lokadhātūnāmanto vā paryanto vā
T01bsu036_u:2222: gaṇanayādhigantum? ta āhuḥ - no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata |
T01bsu036_u:2223: bhagavānāha - śakyaṃ punarbhikṣavasteṣāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ kenacid gaṇakena vā
T01bsu036_u:2224: gaṇakamahāmātreṇa vā gaṇanayā paryanto 'dhigantum, yeṣu vopanikṣiptāni tāni paramāṇurajāṃsi, yeṣu vā nopanikṣiptāni |
T01bsu036_u:2225: na tveva teṣāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śakyaṃ gaṇanāyogena paryanto 'dhigantum |
T01bsu036_u:2228: taṃ cāhaṃ bhikṣavastathāgataṃ tāvacciraṃ parinirvṛtamanena tathāgatajñānadarśanabalādhānena yathādya śvo vā parinirvṛtamanusmarāmi ||
T01bsu036_u:2229: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:2230: abhū atītā bahu kalpakoṭyo anusmarāmi dvipadānamuttamam /
T01bsu036_u:2232: yathā trisāhasrima lokadhātuṃ kaścid rajaṃ kurya aṇupramāṇam /
T01bsu036_u:2233: paramāṇumekaṃ ca tato gṛhītvā kṣetraṃ sahasraṃ gamiyāna nikṣipet //
T01bsu036_u:2234: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pi ca eva nikṣipet sarvaṃ pi so nikṣipi taṃ rajogatam /
T01bsu036_u:2235: riktā bhavetā iya lokadhātuḥ sarvaśca so pāṃsu bhaveta kṣīṇaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2237: yo lokadhātūṣu bhaveta tāsu pāṃsu rajo yasya pramāṇu nāsti /
T01bsu036_u:2238: rajaṃ karitvāna aśeṣatastaṃ lakṣyaṃ dade kalpaśate gate ca // Saddhp_7.4
T01bsu036_u:2239: evāprameyā bahu kalpakoṭyaḥ parinirvṛtasya sugatasya tasya /
T01bsu036_u:2240: paramāṇu sarve na bhavanti lakṣyāstāvadbahu kṣīṇa bhavanti kalpāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2241: tāvacciraṃ nirvṛtu taṃ vināyakaṃ tān śrāvakāṃstāṃśca pi bodhisattvān /
T01bsu036_u:2242: etādṛśaṃ jñānu tathāgatānāṃ smarāmi vṛttaṃ yatha adya śvo vā // Saddhp_7.6
T01bsu036_u:2244: buddhaṃ mayā kalpaśatairanekaiḥ smṛtīya sūkṣmāya anāsravāya // Saddhp_7.7
T01bsu036_u:2247: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragrata eva sarvāṃ mārasenāṃ prābhañjīt parājaiṣīt |
T01bsu036_u:2248: prabhañjayitvā parājayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmiti na ca tāvattasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:2252: tṛtīyamapi caturthamapi pañcamamapi ṣaṣṭhamapi saptamamapi aṣṭamamapi navamamapi daśamamapyantarakalpaṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle bodhimaṇḍe 'sthāt sakṛdvartanena paryaṅkena antarādavyutthitaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2254: na ca tāvadasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma ||
T01bsu036_u:2255: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya devaistrāyastriṃśairmahāsiṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūd yojanaśatasahasraṃ
T01bsu036_u:2256: samucchrayeṇa, yatra sa bhagavān niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2257: samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca khalu punastasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe, atha brahmakāyikā devaputrā divyaṃ puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayāmāsuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2258: bodhimaṇḍasya parisāmantakena yojanaśatamantarikṣe ca vātān pramuñcanti, ye taṃ jīrṇapuṣpamavakarṣayanti
T01bsu036_u:2259: | yathāpravarṣitaṃ ca tat puṣpavarṣaṃ tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya avyucchinnaṃ pravarṣayanti
T01bsu036_u:2261: tathā pravarṣitaṃ ca tatpuḥpavarḥaṃ pravarḥayanti yāvat parinirvāṇakālasamaye tasya bhagavatastaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti |
T01bsu036_u:2263: tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya satkārārthamavyucchinnaṃ pravādayāmāsuḥ paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpān tasya bhagavato niḥaṇṇasya |
T01bsu036_u:2264: tata uttari tāni divyāṇi tūryāṇi satatasamitaṃ pravādayāmāsuryāvattasya bhagavato mahāparinirvāṇakālasamayāt
T01bsu036_u:2265: atha khalu bhikṣavo daśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ
T01bsu036_u:2267: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhaṃ ca taṃ viditvā ye tasya bhagavataḥ kumārabhūtasya ṣoḍaśa putrā abhūvannaurasāḥ, jñānākaro nāma teṣāṃ jyeṣṭho 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:2268: teṣāṃ ca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśānāṃ rājakumārāṇāmekaikasya ca vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakānyabhūvan vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni |
T01bsu036_u:2269: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāstāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakāni visarjayitvā, taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamanuttarāṃ
T01bsu036_u:2270: samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā, mātṛbhirdhātrībhiśca rudantībhiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ tena ca mahārājñā cakravartinā āryakeṇa mahākośena rājāmātyaiśca bahubhiśca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ yena bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
T01bsu036_u:2272: tasya bhagavataḥ satkārārthāya gurukārārthāya mānanārthāya pūjanārthāya arcanārthāya apacāyanārthāya upasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2273: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya añjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhiḥ sārūpyābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma -
T01bsu036_u:2275: uttāraṇārthāyiha sarvadehināṃ paripūrṇa saṃkalpu ayaṃ ti bhadrakaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2276: suduṣkarā antarakalpimān daśa kṛtāni ekāsani saṃniṣadya /
T01bsu036_u:2277: na ca te 'ntarā kāyu kadāci cālito na hastapādaṃ na pi cānyadaṅgam //
T01bsu036_u:2278: cittaṃ pi te śāntagataṃ susaṃsthitamaniñjyabhūtaṃ sada aprakampyam /
T01bsu036_u:2279: vikṣepu naivāsti kadāci pi tava atyantaśāntasthitu tvaṃ anāsravaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2281: diṣṭayāsi kṣemeṇa ca svastinā ca aviheṭhitaḥ prāpta imāgrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:2282: asmākamṛddhī iyamevarūpā diṣṭayā ca vardhāma narendrasiṃha // Saddhp_7.11
T01bsu036_u:2283: anāyikeyaṃ praja sarva duḥkhitā utpāṭitākṣī va nihīnasaukhyā /
T01bsu036_u:2284: mārgaṃ na jānanti dukhāntagāminaṃ na mokṣahetorjanayanti vīryam //
T01bsu036_u:2285: apāya vardhanti ca dīrgharātraṃ divyāśca kāyāḥ parihāṇadharmāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2286: na śrūyate jātu jināna śabdastamondhakāro ayu sarvalokaḥ // Saddhp_7.13 //
T01bsu036_u:2287: prāptaṃ ca te lokavidū ihādya śivaṃ padaṃ uttama nāsravaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:2288: vayaṃ ca lokaśca anugṛhītaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca tvā eti vrajāma nātha //
T01bsu036_u:2289: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva bālakāḥ, taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhimukhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamābhiḥ sārūpyabhīrgāthābhiḥ saṃmukhamabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣante sma dharmacakrapravartanatāyai - deśayatu bhagavān dharmam, deśayatu sugato dharmaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:2291: deśehi dharmaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇā vināyakā apratimā maharṣe /
T01bsu036_u:2292: labdhaṃ ti jñānaṃ pravaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prakāśayā loki sadevakasmin //
T01bsu036_u:2293: asmāṃśca tārehi imāṃśca sattvān nidarśaya jñānu tathāgatānām /
T01bsu036_u:2294: yathā vayaṃ pi imamagrabodhiṃ anuprāpnuyāmo 'tha ime ca sattvāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2295: caryāṃ ca jñānaṃ pi ca sarva jānasi adhyāśayaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ ca puṇyam /
T01bsu036_u:2297: adhimukti jānāsi ca sarvaprāṇināṃ pravartayā cakravaraṃ anuttaram //
T01bsu036_u:2299: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyamānena daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitānyabhūīvan,
T01bsu036_u:2301: sarveṣu ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu yā lokāntarikāstāsu ye akṣaṇāḥ saṃvṛtā andhakāratamisrāḥ yatra imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau evaṃmahaujaskau ābhayāpyābhāṃ nānubhavataḥ, varṇenāpi varṇaṃ tejasāpi tejo nānubhavataḥ,
T01bsu036_u:2303: ye 'pi tāsu lokāntarikāsu sattvā upapannāḥ, te 'pyanyonyamevaṃ paśyanti anyonyamevaṃ saṃjānanti - anye 'pi bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ santīhopapannāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2304: anye 'pi bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ santīhopapannāḥ iti |
T01bsu036_u:2305: sarveṣu ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu yāni devabhavanāni devavimānāni ca, yāvad brahmalokād ṣaḍvikāraṃ
T01bsu036_u:2306: prakampitānyabhūvan, mahatā cāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan atikramya devānāṃ devānubhāvam
T01bsu036_u:2307: iti hi bhikṣavastasmin samaye teṣu lokadhātuṣu mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya mahataśca audārikasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhūt ||
T01bsu036_u:2308: atha pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni, tānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti, śrīmanti aujasvīni ca |
T01bsu036_u:2309: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāmetadabhavat - imāni khalu punarbrāhmāṇi vimānānyatīva bhrājanti tapanti virājanti śrīmanti aujasvīni ca |
T01bsu036_u:2310: kasya khalvidaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu
T01bsu036_u:2312: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sarvasattvatrātā nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:2313: atīva no harṣita adya sarve vimānaśreṣṭhā imi prajvalanti /
T01bsu036_u:2314: śriyā dyutīyā ca manoramā ye kiṃ kāraṇaṃ īdṛśu bheṣyate 'dya //
T01bsu036_u:2315: sādhu gaveṣāmatha etamarthaṃ ko devaputro upapannu adya /
T01bsu036_u:2316: yasyānubhāvo ayamevarūpo abhūtapūrvo ayamadya dṛśyate // Saddhp_7.19 //
T01bsu036_u:2318: yadi vā bhaved buddha narendrarājā utpannu lokasmi kahiṃcidadya /
T01bsu036_u:2319: yasyo nimittaṃ imamevarūpaṃ śriyā daśo dikṣu jvalanti adya // Saddhp_7.20
T01bsu036_u:2320: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye
T01bsu036_u:2321: mahābrahmāṇaḥ, te sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu
T01bsu036_u:2323: adrākṣuḥ khalu punasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇaḥ paścime digbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ
T01bsu036_u:2326: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiśca sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti sma, abhiprakiranti sma, taṃ ca bodhivṛkṣaṃ
T01bsu036_u:2328: abhyavakīrya tāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ - parigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni asmākamanukampāmupādāya |
T01bsu036_u:2330: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhiḥ sārūpyābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma -
T01bsu036_u:2331: āścaryabhūto jina aprameyo utpanna lokasmi hitānukampī /
T01bsu036_u:2332: nātho 'si śāstāsi gurūsi jāto anugṛhītā daśimā diśo 'dya // Saddhp_7.21 //
T01bsu036_u:2333: pañcāśatī koṭisahasra pūrṇā yā lokadhātūna ito bhavanti /
T01bsu036_u:2334: yato vayaṃ vandana āgatā jinaṃ vimānaśreṣṭhān prajahitva sarvaśaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2335: pūrveṇa karmeṇa kṛtena asmin vicitracitrā hi ime vimānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2338: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānabhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya taṃ bhagavantametadūcuḥ -
T01bsu036_u:2339: pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram, pravartayatu sugato dharmacakraṃ loke
T01bsu036_u:2343: deśayatu bhagavān dharmasvāmī dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2344: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ||
T01bsu036_u:2345: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -
T01bsu036_u:2347: maitrībalaṃ ca deśehi sattvāṃstārehi duḥkhitān // Saddhp_7.24 //
T01bsu036_u:2350: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsayati sma ||

T01bsu036_u:2520: sahapravartitaṃ cedaṃ bhikṣavastena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ parṣadaḥ purastāt, atha tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte
T01bsu036_u:2522: | sarve ca te traividyāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2523: punaranupūrveṇa bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dvitīyāṃ dharmadeśanāmakārṣīt, tṛtīyāmapi
T01bsu036_u:2525: atha khalu bhikṣavastasya bhagavato mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaikaikasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni |
T01bsu036_u:2526: tataḥ paścād bhikṣavastasya bhagavato gaṇanāsamatikrāntaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho
T01bsu036_u:2528: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva samānāḥ śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2529: sarve ca te śrāmaṇerā abhūvan paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ kuśalā bahubuddhaśatasahasracaritāvino
T01bsu036_u:2531: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ - imāni khalu punarbhagavaṃstathāgatasya bahūni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi maharddhikāni mahānubhāvāni maheśākhyāni bhagavato dharmadeśanayā pariniṣpannāni |
T01bsu036_u:2533: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākamanukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya dharmaṃ deśayatu, yadvayamapi tathāgatasyānuśikṣemahi |
T01bsu036_u:2536: tvaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvāśayajño jānīṣe asmākamadhyāśayamiti ||
T01bsu036_u:2538: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tān bālān dārakān rājakumārān pravrajitān śrāmaṇerān dṛṣṭvā yāvāṃstasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ parivāraḥ,
T01bsu036_u:2540: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2541: samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāmadhyāśayaṃ viditvā viṃśateḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ||
T01bsu036_u:2542: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ te ṣodaśa rājakumārāḥ śrāmaṇerā udgṛhītavanto dhāritavanta ārādhitavantaḥ paryāptavantaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:2543: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2545: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śrāvakāścādhimuktavantaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2546: te ca ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerā bahūni ca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vicikitsāprāptānyabhūvan ||
T01bsu036_u:2547: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2548: samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamaṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇyaviśrānto bhāṣitvā vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya |
T01bsu036_u:2549: tathā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhikṣavaḥ sa tathāgataścaturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi vihārasthita evāsīt
T01bsu036_u:2550: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ pratisaṃlīnaṃ viditvā pṛthak pṛthag dharmāsanāni siṃhāsanāni prajñāpya teṣu niṣaṇṇāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ namaskṛtya taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ caturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi saṃprakāśitavantaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2551: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2552: samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ kalpasahasrāṇāmatyayena smṛtimān saṃprajānastasmāt samādhervyuttiṣṭhat
T01bsu036_u:2553: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat
T01bsu036_u:2555: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin
T01bsu036_u:2556: dharmāsane, atha tāvadeva sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayāmāsaāścaryaprāptā bhikṣavo 'dbhutaprāptā ime ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāḥ prajñāvanto bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāścīrṇacaritā buddhajñānaparyupāsakā buddhajñānapratigrāhakā buddhājñānāvatārakā buddhajñānasaṃdarśakāḥ paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2557: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ (Vaidya 119) śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
T01bsu036_u:2559: na pratibādhiṣyante, sarve te kṣipramanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherlābhino bhaviṣyanti, sarve ca te
T01bsu036_u:2561: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane
T01bsu036_u:2563: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhāya samādāpitānyabhūvan, sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni |
T01bsu036_u:2568: ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
T01bsu036_u:2570: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti |
T01bsu036_u:2571: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
T01bsu036_u:2572: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2574: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2576: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2578: | dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2580: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2584: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:2589: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
T01bsu036_u:2590: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyasmābhiḥ samādāpitānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, tānyetāni bhikṣavo 'dyāpi
T01bsu036_u:2596: katame ca te bhikṣavaḥ sattvāḥ, ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni
T01bsu036_u:2597: sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni? yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan ||
T01bsu036_u:2598: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate 'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:2599: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca śroṣyanti, na cāvabhotsyante bodhisattvā vayamiti,
T01bsu036_u:2600: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti, api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
T01bsu036_u:2602: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:2606: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati, pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm, atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā
T01bsu036_u:2607: sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati |
T01bsu036_u:2608: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā, kaḥ punarvādastṛtīyasya? upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām - dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā
T01bsu036_u:2611: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram |
T01bsu036_u:2612: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya |
T01bsu036_u:2613: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām |
T01bsu036_u:2615: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet - yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ - vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ
T01bsu036_u:2618: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet - mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti |
T01bsu036_u:2620: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt |
T01bsu036_u:2621: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa, mā nivartadhvam |
T01bsu036_u:2624: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam |
T01bsu036_u:2628: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ - muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt |
T01bsu036_u:2630: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
T01bsu036_u:2633: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet |
T01bsu036_u:2634: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2636: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti ||
T01bsu036_u:2640: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evaṃ paśyati - mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam |
T01bsu036_u:2641: mā khalvime ekameva buddhajñānaṃ śrutvā draveṇaiva pratinivartayeyuḥ,
T01bsu036_u:2644: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,
T01bsu036_u:2645: viśrāntānāṃ caiṣāmevaṃ kathayati - idaṃ khalu ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramiti,
T01bsu036_u:2646: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve nirvāṇabhūmī sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārthaṃ deśayati saṃprakāśayati yadidaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:2647: yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ samaye te sattvāstatra sthitā bhavanti, atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato
T01bsu036_u:2648: saṃśrāvayati - na khalu punarbhikṣavo yūyaṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2652: nirvāṇam, api tu khalu punarūpāyakauśalyametad bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat trīṇi yānāni
T01bsu036_u:2654: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayopadarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:2656: daśeha so antarakalpa pūrṇān na lapsi bodhiṃ paramārthadarśī //
T01bsu036_u:2657: devātha nāgā asurātha guhyakā udyukta pūjārtha jinasya tasya /
T01bsu036_u:2658: puṣpāṇa varṣaṃ pramumocu tatra buddhe ca bodhiṃ naranāyake 'smin //
T01bsu036_u:2659: upariṃ ca khe dundubhayo vineduḥ satkārapūjārtha jinasya tasya /
T01bsu036_u:2660: suduḥkhitā cāpi jinena tatra cirabudhyamānena anuttaraṃ padam //
T01bsu036_u:2661: daśāna co antarakalpa atyayāt spṛśe sa bodhiṃ bhagavānanābhibhūḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2662: hṛṣṭā udagrāstada āsu sarve devā manuṣyā bhujagāsurāśca // Saddhp_7.63 //
T01bsu036_u:2663: vīrāḥ kumārā atha tasya ṣoḍaśa putrā guṇāḍhyā naranāyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:2666: vanditva pādau ca vināyakasya adhyeṣiṣū dharma prakāśayasva /
T01bsu036_u:2667: asmāṃśca tarpehi imaṃ ca lokaṃ subhāṣiteneha narendrasiṃha // Saddhp_7.65
T01bsu036_u:2668: cirasya lokasya daśaddiśe 'smin vidito 'si utpannu mahāvināyaka /
T01bsu036_u:2670: diśāya pūrvāya sahasrakoṭyaḥ kṣetrāṇa pañcāśadabhūṣi kampitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2671: tatrāpi ye brāhma vimāna agrāste tejavanto adhimātramāsi // Saddhp_7.67 //
T01bsu036_u:2673: puṣpairihābhyokiriyāṇa nāyakamarpenti te sarva vimāna tasya // Saddhp_7.68
T01bsu036_u:2675: tūṣṇīṃ ca so āsi narendrarājā na tāva kālo mama dharma bhāṣitum //
T01bsu036_u:2676: evaṃ diśi dakṣiṇiyāṃ pi tatra atha paścimā heṣṭima uttarasyām /
T01bsu036_u:2677: upariṣṭimāyāṃ vidiśāsu caiva āgatya brahmāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_7.70
T01bsu036_u:2678: puṣpebhi abhyokiriyāṇa nāyakaṃ pādau ca vanditva vināyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:2679: niryātayitvā ca vimāna sarvānabhiṣṭavitvā punarabhyayāci // Saddhp_7.71 //
T01bsu036_u:2682: darśehi maitrībala pūrvasevitamapāvṛṇohī amṛtasya dvāram // Saddhp_7.72 //
T01bsu036_u:2683: adhyeṣaṇāṃ jñātva anantacakṣuḥ prakāśate dharma bahuprakāram /
T01bsu036_u:2684: catvāri satyāni ca vistareṇa pratītya sarve imi bhāva utthitāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2685: avidya ādīkariyāṇa cakṣumān prabhāṣate sa maraṇāntaduḥkham /
T01bsu036_u:2686: jātiprasūtā imi sarvadoṣā mṛtyuṃ ca mānuṣyamimeva jānatha // Saddhp_7.74
T01bsu036_u:2687: samanantaraṃ bhāṣitu dharma tena bahuprakārā vividhā anantāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2688: śrutvānaśītī nayutāna koṭyaḥ sattvāḥ sthitāḥ śrāvaka bhūtale laghum //
T01bsu036_u:2689: kṣaṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ aparaṃ abhūṣi jinasya tasyo bahu dharma bhāṣataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2690: viśuddhasattvā yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ kṣaṇena te śrāvakabhūta āsīt //
T01bsu036_u:2691: tatottarī agaṇiyu tasya āsīt saṃghastadā lokavināyakasya /
