T01bsu036_u:2692: kalpāna koṭīnyayutā gaṇenta ekaika no cāntu labheya teṣām // Saddhp_7.77
T01bsu036_u:2693: ye cāpi te ṣoḍaśa rājaputrā ye aurasā cailakabhūta sarve /
T01bsu036_u:2694: te śrāmaṇerā avaciṃsu taṃ jinaṃ prakāśayā nāyaka agradharmam //
T01bsu036_u:2695: yathā vayaṃ lokavidū bhavema yathaiva tvaṃ sarvajinānamuttama /
T01bsu036_u:2697: ime ca sattvā bhavi sarvi eva yathaiva tvaṃ vīra viśuddhacakṣuḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2698: so cā jino āṃśayu jñātva teṣāṃ kumārabhūtāna tathātmajānām /
T01bsu036_u:2701: bhūtāṃ cariṃ darśayi lokanātho yathā caranto vidu bodhisattvāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2703: gāthāsahasrehi analpakehi yeṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ // Saddhp_7.82
T01bsu036_u:2704: so cā jino bhāṣiya sūtrametadvihāru praviśitva vilakṣayīta /
T01bsu036_u:2705: pūrṇānaśītiṃ caturaśca kalpān samāhitaikāsani lokanāthaḥ // Saddhp_7.83 //
T01bsu036_u:2706: te śrāmaṇerāśca viditva nāyakaṃ vihāri āsannamaniṣkramantam /
T01bsu036_u:2707: saṃśrāvayiṃsu bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ bauddha imaṃ jñānamanāsravaṃ śivam //
T01bsu036_u:2708: pṛthak pṛthagāsana prajñapitvā abhāṣi teṣāmidameva sūtram /
T01bsu036_u:2709: sugatasya tasya tada śāsanasmin adhikāra kurvanti mamevarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:2710: gaṅgā yathā vāluka aprameyā sahasra ṣaṣṭiṃ tada śrāvayiṃsu /
T01bsu036_u:2711: ekaiku tasya sugatasya putro vineti sattvāni analpakāni // Saddhp_7.86 //
T01bsu036_u:2713: tasyo jinasya parinirvṛtasya caritva te paśyisu buddhakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2714: tehī tadā śrāvitakehi sārdhaṃ kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamānām //
T01bsu036_u:2715: caritva caryāṃ vipulāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ buddhā ca te bodhi daśaddiśāsu /
T01bsu036_u:2716: te ṣoḍaśā tasya jinasya putrā diśāsu sarvāsu dvayo dvayo jināḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2717: ye cāpi saṃśrāvitakā tadāsī te śrāvakā teṣa jināna sarve /
T01bsu036_u:2718: imameva bodhiṃ upanāmayanti kramakrameṇa vividhairupāyaiḥ // Saddhp_7.89
T01bsu036_u:2719: ahaṃ pi abhyantari teṣa āsīnmayāpi saṃśrāvita sarvi yūyam /
T01bsu036_u:2720: teno mama śrāvaka yūyamadya bodhāvupāyeniha sarvi nemi // Saddhp_7.90 //
T01bsu036_u:2721: ayaṃ khu hetustada pūrva āsīdayaṃ pratyayo yena hu dharma bhāṣe /
T01bsu036_u:2722: nayāmyahaṃ yena mamāgrabodhiṃ mā bhikṣavo utrasatheha sthāne //
T01bsu036_u:2723: yathāṭavī ugra bhaveya dāruṇā śūnyā nirālamba nirāśrayā ca /
T01bsu036_u:2724: bahuśvāpadā caiva apāniyā ca bālāna sā bhīṣaṇikā bhaveta // Saddhp_7.92 //
T01bsu036_u:2725: purūṣāṇa co tatra sahasra nekā ye prasthitāstāmaṭavīṃ bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2726: aṭavī ca sā śūnya bhaveta dīrghā pūrṇāni pañcāśata yojanāni // Saddhp_7.93
T01bsu036_u:2727: puruṣaśca āḍhyaḥ smṛtimantu vyakto dhīro vinītaśca viśāradaśca /
T01bsu036_u:2728: yo deśikasteṣa bhaveta tatra aṭavīya durgāya subhairavāya // Saddhp_7.94
T01bsu036_u:2730: te cāpi khinnā bahuprāṇikoṭya uvāca taṃ deśika tasmi kāle /
T01bsu036_u:2731: khinnā vayaṃ ārya na śaknuyāma nivartanaṃ adyiha rocate naḥ // Saddhp_7.95
T01bsu036_u:2732: kuśalaśca so pi tada paṇḍitaśca praṇāyakopāya tadā vicintayet /
T01bsu036_u:2733: dhikkaṣṭa ratnairimi sarvi bālā bhraśyanti ātmāna nivartayantaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2734: yannūnahaṃ ṛddhibalena vādya nagaraṃ mahantaṃ abhinirmiṇeyam /
T01bsu036_u:2736: vāpī nadīyo abhinirmiṇeyam ārāmapuṣpaiḥ pratimaṇḍitaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:2738: nirmāṇu kṛtva iti tān vadeya mā bhāyathā harṣa karotha caiva /
T01bsu036_u:2739: prāptā bhavanto nagaraṃ variṣṭhaṃ praviśya kāryāṇi kuruṣva kṣipram //
T01bsu036_u:2740: udagracittā bhaṇatheha nirvṛtā nistīrṇa sarvā aṭavī aśeṣataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2741: āśvāsanārthāya vadeti vācaṃ kathaṃ na pratyāgata sarvi asyā //
T01bsu036_u:2742: viśrāntarūpāṃśca viditva sarvān samānayitvā ca punarbravīti /
T01bsu036_u:2743: āgacchatha mahya śṛṇotha bhāṣato ṛddhīmayaṃ nagaramidaṃ vinirmitam //
T01bsu036_u:2744: yuṣmāka khedaṃ ca mayā vitdivā nivartanaṃ mā ca bhaviṣyatīti /
T01bsu036_u:2745: upāyakauśalyamidaṃ mameti janetha vīryaṃ gamanāya dvīpam // Saddhp_7.102
T01bsu036_u:2747: emeva haṃ bhikṣava deśiko vā praṇāyakaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭinām /
T01bsu036_u:2748: khidyanta paśyāmi tathaiva prāṇinaḥ kleśāṇḍakośaṃ na prabhonti bhettum //
T01bsu036_u:2749: tato mayā cintitu eṣa artho viśrāmabhūtā imi nirvṛtīkṛtāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2750: sarvasya duḥkhasya nirodha eṣa arhantabhūmau kṛtakṛtya yūyam //
T01bsu036_u:2751: samaye yadā tu sthita atra sthāne paśyāmi yūyāmarhanta tatra sarvān /
T01bsu036_u:2752: tadā ca sarvāniha saṃnipātya bhūtārthamākhyāmi yathaiṣa dharmaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2753: upāyakauśalya vināyakānāṃ yad yāna deśenti trayo maharṣī /
T01bsu036_u:2754: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ na dvitīyamasti viśrāmaṇārthaṃ tu dviyāna deśitā //
T01bsu036_u:2755: tato vademi ahamadya bhikṣavo janetha vīryaṃ paramaṃ udāram /
T01bsu036_u:2756: sarvajñajñānena kṛtena yūyaṃ naitāvatā nirvṛti kāci bhoti // Saddhp_7.107
T01bsu036_u:2757: sarvajñajñānaṃ tu yadā spṛśiṣyatha daśo balā ye ca jināna dharmāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2759: etādṛśī deśana nāyakānāṃ viśrāmahetoḥ pravadanti nirvṛtim /
T01bsu036_u:2760: viśrānta jñātvāna ca nirvṛtīye sarvajñajñāne upanenti sarvān //
T01bsu036_u:2764: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavato 'ntikādidamevaṃrūpamupāyakauśalyajñānadarśanaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitanirdeśaṃ śrutvā eṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca
T01bsu036_u:2765: pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca bhagavato vṛṣabhatāṃ śrutvā āścaryaprāpto 'bhūdadbhutaprāpto 'bhūnnirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena prītiprāmodyena sphuṭo 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:2766: mahatā ca prītiprāmodyena mahatā ca dharmagauraveṇa utthāyāsanād bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ cittamutpāditavān - āścaryaṃ bhagavan, āścaryaṃ sugata |
T01bsu036_u:2767: paramaduṣkaraṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kurvanti, ya imaṃ nānādhātukaṃ
T01bsu036_u:2768: lokamanuvartayante, bahubhiścopāyakauśalyajñānanidarśanaiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti, tasmiṃstasmiṃśca sattvān vilagnānupāyakauśalyena
T01bsu036_u:2770: kimatra bhagavan asmābhiḥ śakyaṃ kartum? tathāgata evāsmākaṃ jānīte āśayaṃ pūrvayogacaryāṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:2771: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthito 'bhūd bhagavantameva namaskurvan animiṣābhyāṃ ca netrābhyāṃ saṃprekṣamāṇaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:2772: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ pūrṇasya maitrāyaṇīputrasya cittāśayamavalokya sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyamimaṃ śrāvakaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputraṃ yo mayāsya bhikṣusaṃghasya dharmakathikānāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ, bahubhiśca
T01bsu036_u:2773: bhūtairguṇairabhiṣṭutaḥ, bahubhiśca prakārairasmin mama śāsane saddharmaparigrahāyābhiyuktaḥ
T01bsu036_u:2774: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'klānto dharmadeśanayā,
T01bsu036_u:2776: muktvā bhikṣavastathāgataṃ nānyaḥ śaktaḥ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputramarthato vā vyañjanato vā paryādātum
T01bsu036_u:2777: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo mamaivāyaṃ saddharmaparigrāhaka iti? na khalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T01bsu036_u:2779: buddhakoṭīnām, yatra anenaiva teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane saddharmaḥ parigṛhītaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2780: tadyathāpi nāma mama etarhi sarvatra cāgryo
T01bsu036_u:2782: sarvatra ca pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhī abhūt, sarvatra ca bodhisattvābhijñāsu gatiṃ gato 'bhūt
T01bsu036_u:2784: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane yāvadāyuṣpramāṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caritavān |
T01bsu036_u:2785: sarvatra ca śrāvaka iti saṃjñāyate sma |
T01bsu036_u:2791: eṣāmapi bhikṣavo vipaśyipramukhānāṃ saptānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ yeṣāmahaṃ
T01bsu036_u:2794: yadapi tadbhikṣavo bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani asmin bhadrakalpe caturbhirbuddhairūnaṃ buddhasahasram, teṣāmapi śāsane eṣa eva pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro 'gryo dharmakathikānāṃ bhaviṣyati, saddharmaparigrāhakaśca bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:2795: evamanāgate 'dhvani aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmamādhārayiṣyati, aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kariṣyati, aprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃśca sattvān paripācayiṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:2797: sa imāmevaṃrūpāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya aprameyairasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate
T01bsu036_u:2798: dharmaprabhāso nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca
T01bsu036_u:2801: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātava ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:2802: samaṃ pāṇitalajātaṃ saptaratnamayamapagataparvataṃ saptaratnamayaiḥ kūṭāgāraiḥ paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:2804: devā api manuṣyān drakṣyanti, manuṣyā api devān drakṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:2805: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena idaṃ buddhakṣetramapagatapāpaṃ bhaviṣyati apagatamātṛgrāmaṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:2806: sarve ca te sattvā aupapādukā bhaviṣyanti brahmacāriṇo manomayairātmabhāvaiḥ svayaṃprabhā ṛddhimanto vaihāyasaṃgamā vīryavantaḥ smṛtimantaḥ prajñāvantaḥ suvarṇavarṇaiḥ samucchrayairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
T01bsu036_u:2808: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dvāvāhārau bhaviṣyataḥ
T01bsu036_u:2810: aprameyāṇi cāsaṃkhyeyāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti sarveṣāṃ ca mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ pratisaṃvidgatiṃgatānāṃ sattvāvavādakuśalānām |
T01bsu036_u:2811: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāścāsya śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti maharddhikā mahānubhāvā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ
T01bsu036_u:2816: parinirvṛtasya ca tasya bhagavato dharmaprabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saddharmaścirasthāyī bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:2817: ratnamayaiśca stūpaiḥ sā lokadhātuḥ sphuṭā bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:2821: śṛṇotha me bhikṣava etamarthaṃ yathā carī mahya sutena cīrṇā /
T01bsu036_u:2822: upāyakauśalyasuśikṣitena yathā ca cīrṇā iya bodhicaryā // Saddhp_8.1 //
T01bsu036_u:2823: hīnādhimuktā ima sattva jñātvā udārayāne ca samuttrasanti /
T01bsu036_u:2825: tatu śrāvakā bhontimi bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ ca nidarśayanti //
T01bsu036_u:2827: evaṃ ca bhāṣanti vayaṃ hi śrāvakā dūre vayaṃ uttamamagrabodhiyā //
T01bsu036_u:2828: etāṃ cariṃ teṣvanuśikṣamāṇāḥ paripāku gacchanti hi sattvakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2829: hīnādhimuktāśca kusīdarūpā anupūrva te sarvi bhavanti buddhāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2830: ajñānacaryāṃ ca caranti ete vayaṃ khalu śrāvaka alpakṛtyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2831: nirviṇṇa sarvāsu cyutopapattiṣu svakaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pariśodhayanti //
T01bsu036_u:2832: sarāgatāmātmani darśayanti sadoṣatāṃ cāpi samohatāṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:2833: dṛṣṭīvilagnāṃśca viditva sattvāṃsteṣāṃ pi dṛṣṭiṃ samupāśrayanti //
T01bsu036_u:2834: evaṃ caranto bahu mahya śrāvakāḥ sattvānupāyena vimocayanti /
T01bsu036_u:2835: unmādu gaccheyu narā avidvasū sa caiva sarvaṃ caritaṃ prakāśayet //
T01bsu036_u:2836: pūrṇo ayaṃ śrāvaka mahya bhikṣavaścarito purā buddhasahasrakoṭiṣu /
T01bsu036_u:2837: teṣāṃ ca saddharma parigrahīṣīd bauddhaṃ idaṃ jñāna gaveṣamāṇaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2838: sarvatra caiṣo abhu agraśrāvako bahuśrutaścitrakathī viśāradaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2839: saṃharṣakaścā akilāsi nityaṃ sada buddhakṛtyena ca pratyupasthitaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2841: mahāabhijñāsu sadā gatiṃgataḥ pratisaṃvidānāṃ ca abhūṣi lābhī /
T01bsu036_u:2842: sattvāna co indriyagocarajño dharmaṃ ca deśeti sadā viśuddham //
T01bsu036_u:2843: saddharma śreṣṭhaṃ ca prakāśayantaḥ paripācayī sattvasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2844: anuttarasminniha agrayāne kṣetraṃ svakaṃ śreṣṭhu viśodhayantaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2845: anāgate cāpi tathaiva adhve pūjeṣyatī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2846: saddharma śreṣṭhaṃ ca parigrahīṣyati svakaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyati //
T01bsu036_u:2849: so pūja kṛtvā naranāyakānāṃ saddharma śreṣṭhaṃ sada dhārayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:2850: bhaviṣyatī buddha svayaṃbhu loke dharmaprabhāso diśatāsu viśrutaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2851: kṣetraṃ ca tasya suviśuddha bheṣyatī ratnāna saptāna sadā viśiṣṭam /
T01bsu036_u:2852: ratnavabhāsaśca sa kalpu bheṣyatī suviśuddha so bheṣyati lokadhātuḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2854: yehi sphuṭo bheṣyati lokadhātuḥ suviśuddha śuddhehi maharddhikehi //
T01bsu036_u:2855: atha śrāvakāṇāṃ pi sahasrakoṭyaḥ saṃghastadā bheṣyati nāyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:2858: sarve ca sattvāstahi buddhakṣetre śuddhā bhaviṣyanti ca brahmacāriṇaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2860: āhārasaṃjñā ca na tatra bheṣyati anyatra dharme rati dhyānaprītiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2861: na mātṛgrāmo 'pi ca tatra bheṣyati na cāpyapāyāna ca durgatībhayam //
T01bsu036_u:2863: ākīrṇa sattvehi subhadrakehi yatkiṃcimātraṃ pi idaṃ prakāśitam //
T01bsu036_u:2864: atha khalu teṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ vaśībhūtaśatānāmetadabhavat - āścaryaprāpta
T01bsu036_u:2867: mahāśrāvakā vyākṛtāḥ, evamasmākamapi tathāgataḥ pṛthak pṛthag vyākuryāt |
T01bsu036_u:2868: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma - imāni kāśyapa dvādaśa
T01bsu036_u:2871: tatra kāśyapa kauṇḍinyo bhikṣurmahāśrāvako dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ samantaprabhāso nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati, vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
T01bsu036_u:2872: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T01bsu036_u:2873: tatra kāśyapa anenaikena nāmadheyena pañca tathāgataśatāni bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:2876: tadyathā gayākāśyapo nadīkāśyapaḥ urubilvakāśyapaḥ kālaḥ kālodāyī aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo bakkulaścundaḥ svāgataḥ ityevaṃpramukhāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatāni ||
T01bsu036_u:2877: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:2878: kauṇḍinyagotro mama śrāvako 'yaṃ tathāgato bheṣyati lokanāthaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2880: samantaprabho nāma jino bhaviṣyati kṣetraṃ ca tasya pariśuddha bheṣyati /
T01bsu036_u:2882: anantakalpasmi anāgate 'dhvani dṛṣṭvāna buddhān bahavo hyanantān //
T01bsu036_u:2886: viharanta tatra anucintayanti viśuddhaśīlā sada sādhuvṛttayaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2887: śrutvāna dharmaṃ dvipadottamasya anyāni kṣetrāṇyapi co sadā te /
T01bsu036_u:2888: vrajanti te buddhasahasravandakāḥ pūjāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāṃ karonti //
T01bsu036_u:2889: kṣeṇena te cāpi tadāsya kṣetraṃ pratyāgamiṣyanti vināyakasya /
T01bsu036_u:2892: tataśca bhūyo dviguṇena tāyinaḥ parinirvṛtasyeha sa dharma sthāsyati //
T01bsu036_u:2893: pratirūpakaścāsya bhaviṣyate punastriguṇaṃ tato ettakameva kālam /
T01bsu036_u:2894: saddharmabhraṣṭe tada tasya tāyino dukhitā bhaviṣyanti narā marū ca //
T01bsu036_u:2896: paripūrṇa pañcāśata nāyakānāṃ ete bhaviṣyanti paraṃparāya // Saddhp_8.29
T01bsu036_u:2898: sarveṣa etādṛśakāśca vyūhā ṛddhibalaṃ ca tatha buddhakṣetram /
T01bsu036_u:2899: gaṇaśca saddharma tathaiva īdṛśaḥ saddharmasthānaṃ ca samaṃ bhaviṣyati //
T01bsu036_u:2900: sarveṣametādṛśakaṃ bhaviṣyati nāmaṃ tadā loki sadevakasmin /
T01bsu036_u:2901: yathā mayā pūrvi prakīrtitāsīt samantaprabhāsasya narottamasya //
T01bsu036_u:2902: paraṃparā eva tathānyamanyaṃ te vyākariṣyanti hitānukampī /
T01bsu036_u:2903: anantarāyaṃ mama adya bheṣyati yathaiva śāsāmyahu sarvalokam //
T01bsu036_u:2904: evaṃ khu ete tvamihādya kāśyapa dhārehi pañcāśatanūnakāni /
T01bsu036_u:2905: vaśibhūta ye cāpi mamānyaśrāvakāḥ kathayāhi cānyeṣvapi śrāvakeṣu //
T01bsu036_u:2906: atha khalu tāni pañcārhacchatāni bhagavataḥ saṃmukhamātmano vyākaraṇāni śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasa pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2907: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirobhirnipatya evamāhuḥ - atyayaṃ vayaṃ bhagavan deśayāmo yairasmābhirbhagavannevaṃ satatasamitaṃ cittaṃ paribhāvitam - idamasmākaṃ parinirvāṇam |
T01bsu036_u:2910: tatkasya hetoḥ? yairnāma asmābhirbhagavaṃstathāgatajñāne 'bhisaṃboddhavye evaṃrūpeṇa parīttena jñānena paritoṣaṃ gatāḥ sma |
T01bsu036_u:2911: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kasyacideva puruṣasya kaṃcideva mitragṛhaṃ praviṣṭasya mattasya vā suptasya vā sa mitro 'narghamaṇiratnaṃ vastrānte badhnīyāt - asyedaṃ maṇiratnaṃ bhavatviti atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣa utthāyāsanāt prakāmet |
T01bsu036_u:2915: mahatā ca vyāyāmena kathaṃcit kaṃcidāhāraṃ pratilabheta |
T01bsu036_u:2917: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya sa purāṇamitraḥ puruṣo yena tasya tadanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte baddham,
T01bsu036_u:2919: tamevaṃ vadet - kiṃ tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṛcchramāpadyase āhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ, yadā yāvad bhoḥ puruṣa mayā tava sukhavihārārthaṃ sarvakāmanivartakamanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte upanibaddham |
T01bsu036_u:2922: na ca nāma tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa pratyavekṣase - kiṃ mama baddhaṃ yena vā baddhaṃ ko hetuḥ kiṃnidānaṃ vā (Vaidya 135) baddhametat? bālajātīyastvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa
T01bsu036_u:2924: gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa etanmaṇiratnaṃ grahāya mahānagaraṃ gatvā parivartayastva |
T01bsu036_u:2925: tena ca dhanena sarvāṇi dhanakaraṇīyāni kuruṣveti ||
T01bsu036_u:2926: evameva bhagavan asmākamapi tathāgatena pūrvameva bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvajñatācittānyutpāditānyabhūvan
T01bsu036_u:2927: tāni ca vayaṃ bhagavan na jānīmo na budhyāmahe |
T01bsu036_u:2928: te vayaṃ bhagavan arhadbhūmau nirvṛtāḥ sma iti saṃjānīmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2929: vayaṃ kṛcchraṃ jīvāmaḥ, yadvayaṃ bhagavan evaṃ parīttena jñānena paritoṣamāpadyāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:2931: te vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena saṃbodhyamānāḥ - mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava etannirvāṇaṃ manyadhvam |
T01bsu036_u:2932: saṃvidyante bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ saṃtāne kuśalamūlāni yāni mayā pūrvaṃ paripācitāni |
T01bsu036_u:2933: etarhi ca mamaivedamupāyakauśalyaṃ dharmadeśanābhilāpena yad yūyametarhi nirvāṇamiti manyadhve
T01bsu036_u:2934: evaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavatā saṃbodhayitvā adyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:2935: atha khalu tāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatānyājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhāni tasyāṃ velāyamimā gāthā abhāṣanta
T01bsu036_u:2936: hṛṣṭā prahṛṣṭā sma śruṇitva etāṃ āśvāsanāmīdṛśikāmanuttarām /
T01bsu036_u:2937: yaṃ vyākṛtāḥ sma paramāgrabodhaye namo 'stu te nāyaka nantacakṣuḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2938: deśemahe atyayu tubhyamantike yathaiva bālā avidū ajānakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2939: yaṃ vai vayaṃ nirvṛtimātrakeṇa parituṣṭa āsīt sugatasya śāsane //
T01bsu036_u:2940: yathāpi puruṣo bhavi kaścideva praviṣṭa sa syādiha mitraśālam /
T01bsu036_u:2941: mitraṃ ca tasya dhanavantamāḍhyaṃ so tasya dadyād bahū khādyabhojyam //
T01bsu036_u:2942: saṃtarpayitvāna ca bhojanena anekamūlyaṃ ratanaṃ ca dadyāt /
T01bsu036_u:2943: baddhvāntarīye vasanānti granthiṃ datvā ca tasyeha bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2944: so cāpi prakrāntu bhaveta bālo utthāya so 'nyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajeta /
T01bsu036_u:2945: so kṛcchraprāptaḥ kṛpaṇo gaveṣī āhāra paryeṣati khidyamānaḥ // Saddhp_8.38
T01bsu036_u:2947: paryeṣitaḥ bhojananirvṛtaḥ syād bhaktaṃ udāraṃ avicintayantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2948: taṃ cāpi ratnaṃ hi bhaveta vismṛtaṃ baddhvāntarīye smṛtirasya nāsti //
T01bsu036_u:2949: tameva so paśyati pūrvamitro yenāsya dattaṃ ratanaṃ gṛhe sve /
T01bsu036_u:2950: tameva suṣṭhū paribhāṣayitvā darśeti ratnaṃ vasanāntarasmin // Saddhp_8.40
T01bsu036_u:2951: dṛṣṭvā ca so paramasukhaiḥ samarpito ratnasya tasyo anubhāva īdṛśaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2952: mahādhanī kośabalī ca so bhavet samarpitaḥ kāmaguṇehi pañcahi //
T01bsu036_u:2954: tathāgatenaiva idaṃ hi dattaṃ bhaveṣu pūrveṣviha dīrgharātram //
T01bsu036_u:2955: vayaṃ ca bhagavanniha bālabuddhayo ajānakāḥ smo sugatasya śāsane /
T01bsu036_u:2956: nirvāṇamātreṇa vayaṃ hi tuṣṭā na uttarī prārthayi nāpi cintayī //
T01bsu036_u:2957: vayaṃ ca saṃbodhita lokabandhunā na eṣa etādṛśa kāci nirvṛtiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2958: jñānaṃ praṇītaṃ puruṣottamānāṃ yā nirvṛtīyaṃ paramaṃ ca saukhyam //
T01bsu036_u:2959: idaṃ cudāraṃ vipulaṃ bahūvidhaṃ anuttaraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ ca śrutvā /
T01bsu036_u:2960: prītā udagrā vipulā sma jātāḥ parasparaṃ vyākaraṇāya nātha // Saddhp_8.45
T01bsu036_u:2964: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cintayāmāsa - apyeva nāma vayamevaṃrūpaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhemahi |
T01bsu036_u:2965: evaṃ ca cintayitvā anuvicintya prārthayitvā utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya, āyuṣmāṃśca rāhulo 'pyevaṃ cintayitvā anuvicintya prārthayitvā bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya evaṃ
T01bsu036_u:2966: vācamabhāṣata - asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avasaro bhavatu |
T01bsu036_u:2968: asmākaṃ hi bhagavān pitā janako layanaṃ trāṇaṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:2969: vayaṃ hi bhagavan sadevamānuṣāsure loke 'tīva citrīkṛtāḥ -
T01bsu036_u:2970: bhagavataścaite putraḥ bhagavataścopasthāyakāḥ bhagavataśca dharmakośaṃ dhārayantīti |
T01bsu036_u:2971: tannāma bhagavan kṣiprameva pratirūpaṃ bhaved yad bhagavānasmākaṃ vyākuryādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu036_u:2972: anye ca dve bhikṣusahasre sātireke śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāmutthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavantamullokayamāne tasthatuḥ etāmeva
T01bsu036_u:2973: cintāmanuvicintayamāne yaduta idameva buddhajñānam - apyeva nāma vayamapi
T01bsu036_u:2975: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - bhaviṣyasi tvamānanda anāgate 'dhvani sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T01bsu036_u:2976: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T01bsu036_u:2977: dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvā, gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāṃ ca kṛtvā, teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayitvā,
T01bsu036_u:2979: sa tvamānanda anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃbuddhaḥ samāno viṃśatigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi paripācayiṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:2980: samṛddhaṃ ca te buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati vaiḍūryamayaṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:2983: aparimitāṃśca kalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati, yeṣāṃ kalpānāṃ na śakyaṃ gaṇanayā paryanto 'dhigantum tāvadasaṃkhyeyāni tāni kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tasya bhagavata āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:2984: yāvacca ānanda tasya bhagavataḥ sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati, taddviguṇaṃ parinirvṛtasya saddharmaḥ sthāsyati yāvāṃstasya bhagavataḥ saddharmaḥ
T01bsu036_u:2986: tasya khalu punarānanda sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasya daśasu dikṣu bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyanti ||
T01bsu036_u:2987: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:2988: ārocayāmi ahu bhikṣusaṃghe ānandabhadro mama dharmadhārakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2990: anāgate 'dhvāni jino bhaviṣyati pūjitva ṣaṣṭiṃ sugatāna koṭyaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2991: nāmena so sāgarabuddhidhārī abhijñaprāpto iti tatra viśrutaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2993: tahi bodhisattvā yathā gaṅgavālikāstataśca bhūyo paripācayiṣyati /
T01bsu036_u:2994: maharddhikaśco sa jino bhaviṣyati daśaddiśe lokavighuṣṭaśabdaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:2995: amitaṃ ca tasyāyu tadā bhaviṣyati yaḥ sthāsyate lokahitānukampakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:2996: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tāyino dviguṇaṃ ca saddharmu sa tasya sthāsyati
T01bsu036_u:2997: pratirūpakaṃ taddviguṇena bhūyaḥ saṃsthāsyate tasya jinasya śāsane /
T01bsu036_u:2998: tadāpi sattvā yathā gaṅgavālikā hetuṃ janeṣyantiha buddhabodhau //
T01bsu036_u:2999: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi navayānasaṃprasthitānāmaṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - na bodhisattvānāmapi tāvadasmābhirevamudāraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutapūrvam, kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrāvakāṇām?
T01bsu036_u:3000: kaḥ khalvatra heturbhaviṣyati, kaḥ pratyaya iti? atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ
T01bsu036_u:3001: bodhisattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkamājñāya tān bodhisattvānāmantrayāmāsa - samamasmābhiḥ kulaputrā ekakṣaṇe ekamuhūrte mayā ca ānandena ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ dharmagaganābhyudgatarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
T01bsu036_u:3006: ayaṃ punarānandabhadro buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmakośadhara eva bhavati sma - yaduta bodhisattvānāṃ pariniṣpattihetoḥ praṇidhānametatkulaputrā asya kulaputrasyeti ||
T01bsu036_u:3007: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavato 'ntikādātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, ātmanaśca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān śrutvā,
T01bsu036_u:3008: pūrvapraṇidhānacaryāṃ ca śrutvā, tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:3009: tasmiṃśca samaye bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ saddharmamanusmarati sma, ātmanaśca purvapraṇidhānam ||
T01bsu036_u:3012: āścaryabhūtā jina aprameyā ye smārayanti mama dharmadeśanām /
T01bsu036_u:3013: parinirvṛtānāṃ hi jināna tāyināṃ samanusmarāmī yatha adya śvo vā //
T01bsu036_u:3015: paricārako 'haṃ sugatasya bhomi saddharma dhāremi ca bodhikāraṇāt //
T01bsu036_u:3016: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ rāhulabhadramāmantrayate sma - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ rāhulabhadra anāgate 'dhvani saptaratnapadmavikrāntagāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T01bsu036_u:3017: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān daśalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā |
T01bsu036_u:3018: sadā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jyeṣṭhaputro bhaviṣyasi tadyathāpi nāma mamaitarhi |
T01bsu036_u:3019: tasya khalu punā rāhulabhadra bhagavataḥ saptaratnapadmavikrāntagāminastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpamevāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati, evaṃ rūpaiva sarvākāraguṇasaṃpad
T01bsu036_u:3020: bhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma tasya bhagavataḥ sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvākāraguṇopetā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3021: tasyāpi rāhula sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tvameva jyeṣṭhaputro bhaviṣyasi |
T01bsu036_u:3023: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3024: ayaṃ mamā rāhula jyeṣṭhaputro yo auraso āsi kumārabhāve /
T01bsu036_u:3025: bodhiṃ pi prāptasya mamaiṣa putro dharmasya dāyādyadharo maharṣiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3026: anāgate 'dhve bahubuddhakoṭyo yān drakṣyase yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
T01bsu036_u:3027: sarveṣa teṣāṃ hi jināna putro bhaviṣyatī bodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_9.9
T01bsu036_u:3029: ajñātacaryā iya rāhulasya praṇidhānametasya ahaṃ prajānami /
T01bsu036_u:3030: karoti saṃvarṇana lokabandhuṣu ahaṃ kilā putra tathāgatasya // Saddhp_9.10
T01bsu036_u:3031: guṇāna koṭīnayutāprameyāḥ pramāṇu yeṣāṃ na kadācidasti /
T01bsu036_u:3032: ye rāhulasyeha mamaurasatya tathā hi eṣo sthitu bodhikāraṇāt //
T01bsu036_u:3033: adrākṣītkhalu punarbhagavāṃste dve śrāvakasahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavantamavalokayamāne abhimukhaṃ prasannacitte mṛducitte mārdavacitte |
T01bsu036_u:3034: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - paśyasi tvamānanda ete dve śrāvakasahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇām? āha - paśyāmi bhagavan, paśyāmi sugata |
T01bsu036_u:3035: bhagavānāha - sarva evaite ānanda dve bhikṣu sahasre samaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ samudānayiṣyanti, pañcāśallokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃśca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyitvā saddharma ca dhārayitvā paścime samucchraye
T01bsu036_u:3036: ekakṣaṇenaikamuhūrtenaikalavenaikasaṃnipātena daśasu dikṣvanyonyāsu lokadhātuṣu sveṣu sveṣu buddhakṣetreṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante |
T01bsu036_u:3037: ratnaketurājā nāma tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3043: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3044: dve vai sahasre ime śrāvakāṇāṃ ānanda ye te mama agrataḥ sthitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3045: tān vyākaromī ahamadya paṇḍitānanāgate 'dhvāni tathāgatatve // Saddhp_9.12
T01bsu036_u:3046: ananta aupamyanidarśanehi buddhāna agryāṃ kariyāṇa pūjām /
T01bsu036_u:3048: ekena nāmena daśaddiśāsu kṣaṇasmi ekasmi tathā muhūrte /
T01bsu036_u:3050: niṣadya ca drumapravarāṇa mūle buddhā bhaviṣyanti spṛśitva jñānam //
T01bsu036_u:3051: ekaṃ ca teṣāmiti nāma bheṣyati ratnasya ketūtiha loki viśrutāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3052: samāni kṣetrāṇi varāṇi teṣāṃ samo gaṇaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvāḥ // Saddhp_9.15
T01bsu036_u:3053: ṛddhiprabhūtā iha sarvi loke samantataste daśasu ddiśāsu /
T01bsu036_u:3054: dharmaṃ prakāśetva yadāpi nirvṛtāḥ saddharmu teṣāṃ samameva sthāsyati //
T01bsu036_u:3055: atha khalu te śaikṣāśaikṣāḥ śrāvakā bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhaṃ svāni svāni vyākaraṇāni śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskāḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhagavantaṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta tṛptāḥ sma lokapradyota śrutvā vyākaraṇaṃ idam /
T01bsu036_u:3056: amṛtena yathā siktāḥ sukhitāḥ sama tathāgata // Saddhp_9.17 //
T01bsu036_u:3058: adyāsmābhiḥ sukhaṃ prāptaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇaṃ idam // Saddhp_9.18 //
T01bsu036_u:3059: ityāryasaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye ānandarāhulābhyāmanyābhyāṃ ca dvābhyāṃ bhikṣusahasrābhyāṃ vyākaraṇaparivarto nāma navamaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:3062: atha khalu bhagavan bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya tānyaśītiṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇyāmantrayate sma - paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja asyāṃ parṣadi
T01bsu036_u:3065: śrutaḥ? āha - paśyāmi bhagavan, paśyāmi sugata |
T01bsu036_u:3066: bhagavānāha - sarve svalvete bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, yairasyāṃ parṣadi antaśaḥ
T01bsu036_u:3067: ekāpi gāthā śrutā, ekapadamapi śrutam, yairvā punarantaśa ekacittotpādenāpyanumoditamidaṃ sūtram |
T01bsu036_u:3068: sarvā etā ahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja catasraḥ parṣado vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:3069: ye 'pi kecid bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:3070: antaśa ekagāthāmapi śrutvā, antaśa ekenāpi cittotpādena
T01bsu036_u:3071: abhyamumodayiṣyanti, tānapyahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrān va kuladuhitṛrvā vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:3072: paripūrṇabuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāvinaste bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaiṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3074: sattvānāmanukampārthamasmin jambudvīpe manuṣyeṣu pratyājātā veditavyāḥ, ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti saṃgrāhayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:3075: likhitvā cānusmariṣyanti, kālena ca kālaṃ vyavalokayiṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3076: tasmiṃśca pustake tathāgatagauravamutpādayiṣyanti, śāstṛgauraveṇa satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3078: ye kecid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti anumodayiṣyanti vā,
T01bsu036_u:3080: tatra bhaiṣajyarāja yaḥ kaścidanyataraḥ puruṣo vā strī vā evaṃ vadet -
T01bsu036_u:3081: kīdṛśāḥ khalvapi te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti? tasya bhaiṣajyarāja puruṣasya vā striyā vā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā darśayitavyaḥ, ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayitā śrāvayitā vā deśayitā vā sagauravo veha dharmaparyāye |
T01bsu036_u:3082: ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā, yo hyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:3084: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa hi bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va tathāgato veditavyaḥ sadevakena lokena |
T01bsu036_u:3085: tasya ca tathāgatasyaivaṃ satkāraḥ kartavyaḥ, yaḥ khalvasmāddharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi
T01bsu036_u:3086: dhārayet, kaḥ punarvādo ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāpta mudgṛhṇīyād dhārayedvā vācayedvā paryavāpnuyādvā prakāśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā,
T01bsu036_u:3088: tatra ca pustake satkāraṃ kuryāt gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvādyāñjalinamaskāraiḥ praṇāmaiḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3089: pariniṣpannaḥ (Vaidya 143) sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau veditavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3093: yaḥ svayamudāraṃ dharmābhisaṃskāramudārāṃ ca buddhakṣetropapattiṃ sthāpayitvā asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanahetormayi parinirvṛte sattvānāṃ hitārthamanukampārthaṃ ca ihopapanno veditavyaḥ tathāgatadūtaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3094: tathāgatakṛtyakarastathāgatasaṃpreṣitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñātavyaḥ, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saṃprakāśayet, antaśo rahasi cauryeṇāpi
T01bsu036_u:3096: yaḥ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva sattvo duṣṭacittaḥ pāpacitto raudracittastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ kalpamavarṇaṃ bhāṣet, yaśca teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmasya sūtrāntasya dhārakāṇāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ vā
T01bsu036_u:3097: pravrajitānāṃ vā ekāmapi vācamapriyāṃ saṃśrāvayed bhūtāṃ vā abhūtāṃ vā,
T01bsu036_u:3100: tathāgatabhāraṇapratimaṇḍitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3101: tathāgataṃ sa bhaiṣajyarāja aṃsena pariharati, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati |
T01bsu036_u:3102: sa yena yenaiva prakrāmet, tena tenaiva sattvairañjalīkaraṇīyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyo 'rcayitavyo 'pacāyitavyo
T01bsu036_u:3104: sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ, divyāśca ratnarāśayastasya dharmabhāṇakasyopanāmayitavyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3106: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃśrāvayet, yaṃ śrutvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpadyeyuḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:3107: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3109: satkartavyāśca te sattvā ye dhārenti imaṃ nayam // Saddhp_10.1 //
T01bsu036_u:3110: sarvajñatvaṃ ca yo icchet kathaṃ śīrghaṃ bhavediti /
T01bsu036_u:3111: sa imaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ satkuryādvāpi dhārakam // Saddhp_10.2 //
T01bsu036_u:3114: upapattiṃ śūbhāṃ tyaktvā sa dhīra iha āgataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3116: upapatti vaśā tasya yena so dṛśyate tahi /
T01bsu036_u:3117: paścime kāli bhāṣanto idaṃ sūtraṃ niruttaram // Saddhp_10.5 //
T01bsu036_u:3119: divyehi puṣpehi ca satkareta mānuṣyakaiścāpi hi sarvagandhaiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3120: divyehi vastrehi ca chādayeyā ratnehi abhyokiri dharmabhāṇakam //
T01bsu036_u:3121: kṛtāñjalī tasya bhaveta nityaṃ yathā jinendrasya svayaṃbhuvastathā /
T01bsu036_u:3122: yaḥ paścime kāli subhairave 'smin parinirvṛtasya ida sutra dhārayet //
T01bsu036_u:3123: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vihāraśayyāsanavastrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3124: dadeya pūjārtha jinātmajasya apyekavāraṃ pi vadeta sūtram // Saddhp_10.8
T01bsu036_u:3125: tathāgatānāṃ karaṇīya kurvate mayā ca so preṣita mānuṣaṃ bhavam /
T01bsu036_u:3126: yaḥ sūtrametaccarimasmi kāle likheya dhāreya śruṇeya vāpi // Saddhp_10.9
T01bsu036_u:3127: yaścaiva sthitveha jinasya saṃmukhaṃ śrāvedavarṇaṃ paripūrṇakalpam /
T01bsu036_u:3128: praduṣṭacitto bhṛkuṭiṃ karitvā bahuṃ naro 'sau prasaveta pāpam //
T01bsu036_u:3130: avarṇamākrośa vadeya teṣāṃ bahūtaraṃ tasya vadāmi pāpam // Saddhp_10.11 //
T01bsu036_u:3131: naraśca yo saṃmukha saṃstaveyā kṛtāñjalī māṃ paripūrṇakalpam /
T01bsu036_u:3133: bahuṃ khu so tatra labheta puṇyaṃ māṃ saṃstavitvāna praharṣajātaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3135: ataśca so bahutarakaṃ labheta yo varṇa teṣāṃ pravadenmanuṣyaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3136: aṣṭādaśa kalpasahasrakoṭyo yasteṣu pusteṣu karoti pūjām /
T01bsu036_u:3137: śabdehi rūpehi rasehi cāpi divyaiśca gandhaiśca sparśaiśca divyaiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3138: karitva pustāna tathaiva pūjāṃ aṣṭādaśa kalpasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3139: yadi śruṇo ekaśa eta sūtraṃ āścaryalābho 'sya bhavenmahāniti //
T01bsu036_u:3141: bahavo hi mayā bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyā bhāṣitāḥ, bhāṣāmi bhāṣiṣye ca |
T01bsu036_u:3142: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyāṇāmayameva dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīkaḥ sarvalokāśraddadhanīyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3144: bahujanapratikṣipto 'yaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyastiṣṭhato 'pi tathāgatasya, kaḥ punarvādaḥ parinirvṛtasya ||
T01bsu036_u:3145: api tu khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaracchannāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā veditavyāḥ
T01bsu036_u:3149: tathāgatavihāraikasthānanivāsinaśca te bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti, tathāgatapāṇiparimārjitamūrdhānaśca te bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śraddadhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca saṃśrāvayiṣyanti ||
T01bsu036_u:3150: yasmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā, tasmin bhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatacaityaṃ kārayitavyaṃ mahantaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3153: tatkasya hetoḥ? ekaghanameva tasmiṃstathāgataśarīramupanikṣiptaṃ bhavati, yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe
T01bsu036_u:3154: dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā paṭhyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā likhyeta vā likhito vā pustakagatastiṣṭhet
T01bsu036_u:3155: tasmiṃśca stūpe satkāro gurukāro mānanā pūjanā arcanā karaṇīyā
T01bsu036_u:3158: ye ca khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sattvāstaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ labheran vandanāya pūjanāya darśanāya vā, sarve te bhaiṣajyarāja abhyāsannībhūtā veditavyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3159: tatkasya hetoḥ? bahavo bhaiṣajyarāja gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāśca (Vaidya 146) bodhisattvacaryāṃ
T01bsu036_u:3160: caranti, na ca punarimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ labhante darśanāya vā śravaṇāya vā
T01bsu036_u:3162: na tāvatte bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ kuśalā bhavanti, yāvannemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti
T01bsu036_u:3163: ye tvimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā cādhimucyanti avataranti vijānanti
T01bsu036_u:3164: parigṛhṇanti, tasmin samaye te āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, abhyāśībhūtāḥ
T01bsu036_u:3165: tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva puruṣo bhavedudakārthī udakagaveṣī
T01bsu036_u:3167: sa yāvat paśyecchuṣkaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ pāṃsuṃ nirvāhyamānam, tāvajjānīyāt, dūra itastāvadūdakamiti
T01bsu036_u:3168: atha pareṇa samayena sa puruṣa ārdrapaṃsumudakasaṃniśraṃ kardamapaṅkabhutamudakabindubhiḥ sravadbhirnirvāhyamānaṃ paśyet, tāṃśca puruṣānudapānakhānakān kardamapaṅkadigdhāṅgān, atha khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sa puruṣastatpūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣkāṅkṣo bhavennirvicikitsaḥ - āsannamidaṃ khalūdakamiti |
T01bsu036_u:3169: evameva bhaiṣajyarāja dūre te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, yāvannemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti,
T01bsu036_u:3171: yadā khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti avataranti svādhyāyanti cintayanti
T01bsu036_u:3174: tatkasya hetoḥ? paramasaṃdhābhāṣitavivaraṇo hyayaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
T01bsu036_u:3177: dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyet, navayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3178: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta,
T01bsu036_u:3179: adhimānikaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo veditavyaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:3180: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayet, tena bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatalayanaṃ praviśya tathāgatacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya tathāgatasyāsane
T01bsu036_u:3182: katamaśca bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatalayanam? sarvasattvamaitrīvihāraḥ svalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatalayanam |
T01bsu036_u:3184: | katamacca bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaram? mahākṣāntisauratyaṃ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaram |
T01bsu036_u:3185: tattena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prāvaritavyam |
T01bsu036_u:3188: tatra tena kulaputreṇa niṣattavyam, niṣadya cāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ
T01bsu036_u:3189: anavalīnacittena bodhisattvena purastādbodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3190: anyalokadhātusthitaścāhaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja tasya kulaputrasya nirmitaiḥ (Vaidya 147) parṣadaḥ samāvartayiṣyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:3192: te tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhāṣitaṃ na pratibādhiṣyanti, na pratikṣepsyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3196: yāni ca asya asmāddharmaparyāyāt padavyañjanāni paribhraṣṭāni bhaviṣyanti, tāni tasya svādhyāyataḥ
T01bsu036_u:3198: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3200: durlabho vai śravo hyasya adhimuktī pi durlabhā // Saddhp_10.16 //
T01bsu036_u:3201: udakārthī yathā kaścit khānayet kūpa jaṅgale /
T01bsu036_u:3202: śuṣkaṃ ca pāṃsu paśyeta khānyamāne punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.17 //
T01bsu036_u:3203: so dṛṣṭvā cintayettatra dūre vāri ito bhavet /
T01bsu036_u:3204: idaṃ nimittaṃ dūre syāt śuṣkapāṃsuritotsṛtaḥ // Saddhp_10.18 //
T01bsu036_u:3205: yadā tu ārdraṃ paśyeta pāṃsuṃ snigdhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3206: niṣṭhā tasya bhavettatra nāsti dūre jalaṃ iha // Saddhp_10.19 //
T01bsu036_u:3207: evameva tu te dūre buddhajñānasya tādṛśāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3208: aśṛṇvanta idaṃ sūtramabhāvitvā punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.20 //
T01bsu036_u:3210: sūtrarājaṃ śruṇiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti vā sakṛt // Saddhp_10.21 //
T01bsu036_u:3211: te bhonti saṃnikṛṣṭā vai buddhajñānasya paṇḍitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3212: yathaiva cārdre pāṃsusmin āsannaṃ jalamucyate // Saddhp_10.22 //
T01bsu036_u:3213: jinasya lenaṃ praviśitvā prāvaritvā mi cīvaram /
T01bsu036_u:3214: mamāsane niṣīditvā abhīto bhāṣi paṇḍitaḥ // Saddhp_10.23 //
T01bsu036_u:3216: śūnyatā cāsanaṃ mahyamatra sthitvā hi deśayet // Saddhp_10.24 //
T01bsu036_u:3217: loṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ vātha śaktī ākrośa tarjanātha vā /
T01bsu036_u:3218: bhāṣantasya bhavettatra smaranto mama tā sahet // Saddhp_10.25 //
T01bsu036_u:3221: ahaṃ pi tasya vīrasya yo mahya parinirvṛte /
T01bsu036_u:3222: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeyā preṣeṣye bahu nirmitān // Saddhp_10.27 //
T01bsu036_u:3225: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti parṣadaśca samā api // Saddhp_10.28 //
T01bsu036_u:3227: ye cāpi tasya dāsyanti vāreṣyanti sma nirmitāḥ // Saddhp_10.29 //
T01bsu036_u:3229: narairvirahite deśe aṭavyāṃ parvateṣu vā // Saddhp_10.30 //
T01bsu036_u:3231: skhalitaṃ cāsya svādhyāyamuccāriṣye punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.31 //
T01bsu036_u:3232: tahiṃ ca sya viharato ekasya vanacāriṇaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3233: devān yakṣāṃśca preṣiṣye sahāyāṃstasya naikaśaḥ // Saddhp_10.32 //
T01bsu036_u:3234: etādṛśāstasya guṇā bhavanti caturṇa parṣāṇa prakāśakasya /
T01bsu036_u:3235: eko vihāre vanakandareṣu svādhyāya kurvantu mamāhi paśyet // Saddhp_10.33
T01bsu036_u:3236: pratibhāna tasya bhavatī asaṅgaṃ nirukti dharmāṇa bahū prajānāti /
T01bsu036_u:3237: toṣeti so prāṇisahasrakoṭyaḥ yathāpi buddhena adhiṣṭhitatvāt //
T01bsu036_u:3238: ye cāpi tasyāśrita bhonti sattvāste bodhisattvā laghu bhonti sarve /
T01bsu036_u:3239: tatsaṃgatiṃ cāpi niṣevamāṇāḥ paśyanti buddhāna yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3243: atha khalu bhagavataḥ purastāttataḥ pṛthivīpradeśāt parṣanmadhyāt saptaratnamayaḥ stūpo 'bhyudgataḥ pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa ca pariṇāhena |
T01bsu036_u:3244: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ svabhyalaṃkṛto bahutoraṇasahasraiḥ pratimaṇḍitaḥ patākāvaijayantīsahasrābhiḥ pralambito ratnadāmasahasrābhiḥ pralambitaḥ paṭṭaghaṇṭāsahasraiḥ pralambitaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhaṃ pramuñcamānaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3245: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt |
T01bsu036_u:3249: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti |
T01bsu036_u:3250: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune
T01bsu036_u:3254: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo 'ñjaliṃ pragṛhyāvasthitāḥ atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:3255: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayaḥ, asyaivaṃrūpasya mahāratnastūpasya loke
T01bsu036_u:3256: prādurbhāvāya? ko vā bhagavan asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati? evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe
T01bsu036_u:3260: asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3264: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto
T01bsu036_u:3266: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ, tadā paścādahaṃ pariniṣpanno 'bhūvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:3267: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam - mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya eko mahāratnastūpaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3269: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt - ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ (Vaidya 150) saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃprakāśyeta, teṣu teṣvayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ
T01bsu036_u:3271: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet |
T01bsu036_u:3272: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt |
T01bsu036_u:3273: tadayaṃ mahāpratibhāna tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrastūpaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3274: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe 'smāt
T01bsu036_u:3275: parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma ||
T01bsu036_u:3276: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:3277: paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena |
T01bsu036_u:3279: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya praṇidhānaṃ gurukamabhūt |
T01bsu036_u:3280: etadasya praṇidhānam - yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3281: saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ, tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo 'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam |
T01bsu036_u:3282: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ
T01bsu036_u:3283: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ, teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti, tān sarvān saṃnipātya
T01bsu036_u:3284: tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām |
T01bsu036_u:3285: tanmayāpi mahāpratibhāna bahavastathāgatavigrahā nirmitāḥ, ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
T01bsu036_u:3287: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:3289: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmūrṇākośādraśmiṃ prāmuñcat, yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sma, te sarve saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:3290: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma, ratnavṛkṣaiśca citrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma, dūṣyapaṭṭadāmasamalaṃkṛtāni bahubodhisattvaśatasahasraparipūrṇāni vitānavitatāni
T01bsu036_u:3292: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:3293: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma
T01bsu036_u:3303: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā
T01bsu036_u:3306: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma - gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum, bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikam, prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrastūpavandanāya atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:3307: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī saptaratnahemajālasaṃchannā mahāratnagandhadhūpanadhūpitā māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇā kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtā suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhā apagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānī apagatakālaparvatā
T01bsu036_u:3310: iti hi tasmin samaye ye 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ, te sarve 'nyeṣu
T01bsu036_u:3311: abhūvan, sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:3312: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:3313: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:3315: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam
T01bsu036_u:3317: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan ||
T01bsu036_u:3318: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt |
T01bsu036_u:3319: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:3322: samantādaṣṭabhyo digbhyo viṃśatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāṇi vaiḍūryamayāni saptaratnahemajālasaṃchannāni kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtāni māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇāni divyavitānavitatāni divyapuṣpadāmābhipralambitāni divyagandhadhūpanadhūpitāni |
T01bsu036_u:3323: sarvāṇi ca tāni viṃśatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyapagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīni apagatakālaparvatāni apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatāni apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatāni apagatasumeruparvatāni apagatatadanyamahāparvatāni apagatamahāsamudrāṇi apagatanadīmahānadīni
T01bsu036_u:3325: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca (Vaidya 152) vṛkṣaiścitritam |
T01bsu036_u:3327: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt |
T01bsu036_u:3328: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma |
T01bsu036_u:3329: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham |
T01bsu036_u:3330: tānyapi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyaikaikasyāṃ diśi apagatagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīni apagatakālaparvatāni apagatamucilindamahāmucilindaparvatāni apagatacakravālamahācakravālaparvatāni apagatasumeruparvatāni apagatatadanyamahāparvatāni apagatamahāsamudrāṇi apagatanadīmahānadīni parisaṃsthāpayati apagatadevamanuṣyāsurakāyāni apagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāni |
T01bsu036_u:3332: tānyapi buddhakṣetrāṇi vaiḍūryamayāni saptaratnahemajālapraticchannāni kiṅkiṇījālālaṃkṛtāni māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpasaṃstīrṇāni divyavitānavitatāni divyapuṣpadāmābhipralambitāni divyagandhadhūpanadhūpitāni ratnavṛkṣopaśobhitāni |
T01bsu036_u:3335: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
T01bsu036_u:3336: buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu, te sarve samāgatā daśabhyo digbhyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3337: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:3338: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:3339: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam |
T01bsu036_u:3342: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena śrāvakagaṇena |
T01bsu036_u:3343: anena ca ratnarāśinā abhyavakiradhvam, evaṃ ca vadadhvam - dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane |
T01bsu036_u:3344: evaṃ te tathāgatāḥ sarve svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayāmāsuḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:3345: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svānnirmitānaśeṣataḥ samāgatān viditvā, pṛthakpṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu niṣaṇṇāṃśca viditvā, tāṃścopasthāyakāṃsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmāgatān viditvā, chandaṃ ca taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ
T01bsu036_u:3348: tāśca sarvāścatasraḥ pariṣadaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo 'ñjalīḥ parigṛhya bhagavato mukhamullokayantyastasthuḥ
T01bsu036_u:3349: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ (Vaidya 153) mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3350: sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:3351: samuddhāṭya ca dve bhittī pravisārayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:3352: tadyathāpi nāma mahānagaradvāreṣu mahākapāṭasaṃpuṭāvargalavimuktau pravisāryete, evameva bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭya apāvṛṇoti sma |
T01bsu036_u:3355: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddvā pariśuṣkagātraḥ saṃghaṭitakāyo yathā samādhisamāpannastathā saṃdṛśyate sma |
T01bsu036_u:3356: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune |
T01bsu036_u:3359: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagavan śākyamune yastvamimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parṣanmadhye bhāṣase |
T01bsu036_u:3361: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparinirvṛtaṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:3362: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ divyamānuṣyakai ratnarāśibhirabhyavakiranti sma |
T01bsu036_u:3363: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasminneva siṃhāsane
T01bsu036_u:3366: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasminnardhāsane niṣasāda tenaiva tathāgatena sārdham ubhau ca tau tathāgatau tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau vaihāyasamantarīkṣasthau saṃdṛśyete ||
T01bsu036_u:3367: atha khalu tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmetadabhavat - dūrasthā vayamābhyāṃ tathāgatābhyām |
T01bsu036_u:3369: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāmṛddhibalena tāścatasraḥ parṣado vaihāyasamuparyantarīkṣe pratiṣṭhāpayati sma atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣada āmantrayate sma
T01bsu036_u:3370: ko bhikṣavo yuṣmākamutsahate tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum? ayaṃ sa kālaḥ, ayaṃ sa samayaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3373: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3374: ayamāgato nirvṛtako maharṣī ratanāmayaṃ stūpa praviśya nāyakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3375: śravaṇārtha dharmasya imasya bhikṣavaḥ ko dharmahetorna janeta vīryam //
T01bsu036_u:3377: bahukalpakoṭīparinirvṛto 'pi so nāma adyāpi śṛṇoti dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:3378: tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati dharmahetoḥ sudurlabho dharma yamevarūpaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3380: parinirvṛto 'pī imu sarvalokaṃ paryeṣatī sarvadaśaddiśāsu // Saddhp_11.3
T01bsu036_u:3381: ime ca sarve mama ātmabhāvāḥ sahasrakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3382: te dharmakṛtyasya kṛtena āgatāḥ parinirvṛtaṃ ca imu draṣṭu nātham //
T01bsu036_u:3383: choritva kṣetrāṇi svakasvakāni tatha śrāvakāntara marutaśca sarvān /
T01bsu036_u:3384: saddharmasaṃrakṣaṇahetu sarve kathaṃ ciraṃ tiṣṭhiya dharmanetrī //
T01bsu036_u:3386: saṃkrāmitā me tatha sarvasattvā ṛddhībalena pariśodhitāśca // Saddhp_11.6
T01bsu036_u:3387: etādṛśī utsukatā iyaṃ me kathaṃ prakāśediya dharmanetrī /
T01bsu036_u:3388: ime ca buddhā sthita aprameyā drumāṇa mūle yatha padmarāśiḥ // Saddhp_11.7
T01bsu036_u:3390: śobhanti tiṣṭhanti ca nityakālaṃ hutāśaneneva yathāndhakāram //
T01bsu036_u:3391: gandho manojño daśasū diśāsu pravāyate lokavināyakānām /
T01bsu036_u:3393: yenā ime mūrcchita sarvasattvā vāte pravāte iha nityakālam // Saddhp_11.9
T01bsu036_u:3394: mayi nirvṛte yo etaṃ dharmaparyāyu dhārayet /
T01bsu036_u:3395: kṣipraṃ vyāharatāṃ vācaṃ lokanāthāna saṃmukham // Saddhp_11.10 //
T01bsu036_u:3397: siṃhanādaṃ śruṇe tasya vyavasāyaṃ karoti yaḥ // Saddhp_11.11 //
T01bsu036_u:3398: ahaṃ dvitīyo bahavo ime ca ye koṭiyo āgata nāyakānām /
T01bsu036_u:3399: vyavasāya śroṣyāmi jinasya putrāt yo utsaheddharmamimaṃ prakāśitum //
T01bsu036_u:3400: ahaṃ ca tena bhavi pūjitaḥ sadā prabhūtaratnaśca jinaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3401: yo gacchate diśavidiśāsu nityaṃ śravaṇāya dharmaṃ imamevarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:3402: ime ca ye āgata lokanāthā vicitritā yairiya śobhitā bhūḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3403: teṣāṃ pi pūjā vipula analpakā kṛtā bhavetsūtraprakāśanena // Saddhp_11.14
T01bsu036_u:3404: ahaṃ ca dṛṣṭo iha āsanasmin bhagavāṃśca yo 'yaṃ sthitu stūpamadhye /
T01bsu036_u:3405: ime ca anye bahulokanāthā ye āgatāḥ kṣetraśatairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_11.15 //
T01bsu036_u:3409: tāni kaścitprakāśeta na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.17 //
T01bsu036_u:3411: kṣipeta kṣetrakoṭīyo na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.18 //
T01bsu036_u:3413: kṣipeta kṣetrakoṭīyo na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.19 //
T01bsu036_u:3415: bhavāgre yaśca tiṣṭhitvā dharmaṃ bhāṣennaro iha /
T01bsu036_u:3418: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ bhāṣedvā tatsuduṣkaram // Saddhp_11.21 //
T01bsu036_u:3420: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.22 //
T01bsu036_u:3422: paścātkāle likheccāpi idaṃ bhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.23 //
T01bsu036_u:3423: pṛthivīdhātuṃ ca yaḥ sarvaṃ nakhāgre saṃpraveśayet /
T01bsu036_u:3424: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta brahmalokaṃ pi āruhet // Saddhp_11.24 //
T01bsu036_u:3425: na duṣkaraṃ hi so kuryānna ca vīryasya tattakam /
T01bsu036_u:3428: paścātkāle idaṃ sūtraṃ vadeyā yo muhūrtakam // Saddhp_11.26 //
T01bsu036_u:3429: na duṣkaramidaṃ loke kalpadāhasmi yo naraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3432: dhārayitvā idaṃ sūtramekasattvaṃ pi śrāvayet // Saddhp_11.28 //
T01bsu036_u:3435: na hyetaṃ duṣkaraṃ bhoti tasmin kālasmi bhikṣuṇām /
T01bsu036_u:3437: tasyedaṃ duṣkarataraṃ idaṃ sūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
T01bsu036_u:3440: ṣaḍabhijñān mahābhāgān yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // Saddhp_11.32 //
T01bsu036_u:3441: ato bahutaraṃ karma karoti sa narottamaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3442: nirvṛtasya hi yo mahyaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayate varam // Saddhp_11.33 //
T01bsu036_u:3444: adyāpi cāhaṃ bhāṣāmi buddhajñānasya kāraṇāt // Saddhp_11.34 //
T01bsu036_u:3447: dhāreti yo idaṃ sūtraṃ sa dhāre jinavigraham // Saddhp_11.35 //
T01bsu036_u:3449: ya utsahati vaḥ kaścit paścātkālasmi dhāraṇam // Saddhp_11.36 //
T01bsu036_u:3455: dāntabhūmimanuprāptaḥ sūtraṃ dhāreti yo idam // Saddhp_11.39 //
T01bsu036_u:3457: idaṃ sutraṃ prakāśitvā nirvṛte naranāyake // Saddhp_11.40 //
T01bsu036_u:3459: paścime kāli yo bhāṣet sūtramekaṃ muhūrtakam // Saddhp_11.41 //
T01bsu036_u:3460: atha khalu bhagavān kṛtsnaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ sasurāsuraṃ ca lokamāmantraya etadavocat - bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ahamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ paryeṣitavānakhinno 'viśrāntaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3461: pūrvaṃ ca ahamanekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi rājābhūvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3466: tena ca samayena ayaṃ loko dīrghāyurabhat
T01bsu036_u:3467: | anekavarṣaśatasahasrajīvitena ca ahaṃ kālena dharmārthaṃ rājyaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3471: evaṃ ghaṇṭayā ghoṣāpayitavān - yo me jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamanupradāsyati, arthaṃ cākhyāsyati,
T01bsu036_u:3475: asti mahārāja saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma sutraṃ jyeṣṭhadharmanirdeśakam |
T01bsu036_u:3476: tadyadi dāsyamabhyupagacchasi, tataste 'haṃ taṃ dharmaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:3478: 'haṃ śrutvā tasyarṣervacanaṃ hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena sa ṛṣistenopeyivān
T01bsu036_u:3479: upetyāvocat - yatte dāsena karma karaṇīyaṃ tatkaromi |
T01bsu036_u:3480: so 'haṃ tasyarṣerdāsabhāvamabhyupetya tṛṇakāṣṭhapānīyakandamūlaphalādīni preṣyakarmāṇi kṛtavān, yāvad dvārādhyakṣo 'pyahamāsam |
T01bsu036_u:3481: divasaṃ caivaṃvidhaṃ karma kṛtvā rātrau śayānasya mañcake pādān dhārayāmi |
T01bsu036_u:3482: na ca me kāyaklamo na cetasi klamo
T01bsu036_u:3484: evaṃ ca me kurvataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣāsahasraṃ gatam ||
T01bsu036_u:3486: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ paridyotayannimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3488: rājyaṃ came dharmahetoḥ kṛtaṃ tanna ca kāmahetorjyeṣṭhadharmahetoḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3489: caturdiśaṃ me kṛta ghoṣaṇo 'yaṃ dharmaṃ vadedyastasya dāsyaṃ vrajeyam /
T01bsu036_u:3490: āsīdṛṣistena kālena dhīmān sūtrasya saddharmanāmnaḥ pravaktāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3491: sa māmavocadyadi te dharmakāṅkṣā upehi dāsyaṃ dharmamataḥ pravakṣye /
T01bsu036_u:3492: tuṣṭaścāhaṃ vacanaṃ taṃ niśāmya karmākaroddāsayogyaṃ tadā yam //
T01bsu036_u:3494: praṇidhistadā me bhavi sattvahetornātmānamuddiśya na kāmahetoḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3495: sa rāja āsīttadā abdhavīryo ananyakarmāṇi daśaddiśāsu /
T01bsu036_u:3496: paripūrṇa kalpāna sahasrakhinno yāvatsūtraṃ labdhavān dharmanāmam //
T01bsu036_u:3497: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt? na khalu punarevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T01bsu036_u:3498: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūvam |
T01bsu036_u:3499: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo 'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena
T01bsu036_u:3501: ayameva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto bhikṣurṛṣirabhut |
T01bsu036_u:3503: devadattameva cāgamya mayā ṣaṭū pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:3505: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyanuvyañjanāni suvarṇavarṇacchavitā daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūni aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā maharddhibalatā daśadiksattvanistāraṇatā, sarvametaddevadattamāgasya |
T01bsu036_u:3506: ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ, prativedayāmi - eṣa devadatto bhikṣuranāgate 'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyairdevarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho (Vaidya
T01bsu036_u:3507: 159) bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān devasopānāyāṃ
T01bsu036_u:3515: devarājasya khalu punarbhikṣavastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati |
T01bsu036_u:3517: ekaghanaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ bhaviṣyati saptaratnastūpaṃ praviṣṭam
T01bsu036_u:3520: sarve ca tatra devamanuṣyāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhirgāthābhiḥ
T01bsu036_u:3522: ye ca taṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kariṣyanti praṇāmaṃ vā,
T01bsu036_u:3523: teṣāṃ kecidagraphalamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti kecit pratyekabodhimanuprāpsyante acintyācāścāprameyā devamanuṣyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya avinivartanīyā bhaviṣyanti ||
T01bsu036_u:3524: atha khalu bhagavān punareva bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - yaḥ kaścit bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'dhvani kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraparivartaṃ śroṣyati, śrutvā ca na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati, viśuddhacittaścādhimokṣyate, tena tisṛṇāṃ durgatīnāṃ
T01bsu036_u:3525: dvāraṃ pithitaṃ bhaviṣyati ḥ narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṣu na patiṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:3528: | yasmiṃśca buddhakṣetra upapatsyate, tasminnaupapāduke saptaratnamaye padme upapatsyate tathāgatasya saṃmukham ||
T01bsu036_u:3529: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmadhastāddiśaḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādāgataḥ prajñākūṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3530: sa taṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - gacchāmo bhagavan svakaṃ buddhakṣetram |
T01bsu036_u:3531: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:3532: muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvanmadīyena bodhisattvena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ kaṃcideva dharmaviniścayaṃ kṛtvā paścāt svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gamiṣyasi |
T01bsu036_u:3533: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sahasrapatre padme śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātre
T01bsu036_u:3534: 'nekabodhisattvaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ samudramadhyāt sāgaranāgarājabhavanādabhyudgamya upari vaihāyasaṃ khagapathena gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavato 'ntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3535: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ padmādavatīrya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivanditvā yena prajñākūṭo bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3536: upasaṃkramya prajñākūṭena bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāmupasaṃgṛhya ekānte nyaṣīdat |
T01bsu036_u:3537: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:3540: tāvadaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni yāvadvācā na śakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ cittena vā cintayitum (Vaidya muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvat pūrvanimittaṃ drakṣyasi |
T01bsu036_u:3541: samanantarabhāṣitā ceyaṃ mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena vāk, tasyāṃ velāyāmanekāni padmasahasrāṇi
T01bsu036_u:3544: atha te bodhisattvāstenaiva khagapathena yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3545: upasaṃkramya tataścopari vaihāyasaṃ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
T01bsu036_u:3546: sarve ca te mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena vinītā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:3547: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ pūrvamabhūvan, te mahāyānaguṇān ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ saṃvarṇayanti
T01bsu036_u:3549: sarve ca te sarvadharmān śūnyāniti saṃjānanti sma,
T01bsu036_u:3551: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - sarvo 'yaṃ kulaputra mayā samudramadhyagatena
T01bsu036_u:3554: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ gāthābhigītena paripṛcchati -
T01bsu036_u:3555: mahābhadra prajñayā sūranāman asaṃkhyeyā ye vinītāstvayādya /
T01bsu036_u:3556: sattvā amī kasya cāyaṃ prabhāvastadbūhi pṛṣṭo naradeva tvametat //
T01bsu036_u:3557: kaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśitavānasi tvaṃ kiṃ vā sūtraṃ bodhimārgopadeśam /
T01bsu036_u:3558: yacchrutvāmī bodhaye jātacittāḥ sarvajñatve niścitaṃ labdhagādhāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3559: mañjuśrīrāha - samudramadhye saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣitavān, na cānyat |
T01bsu036_u:3560: prajñākūṭa āha - idaṃ sūtraṃ gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durdṛśam, na cānena sutreṇa kiṃcidanyat sūtraṃ samamasti |
T01bsu036_u:3561: asti kaścit sattvo ya idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ satkuryādavaboddhumanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
T01bsu036_u:3562: mañjuśrīrāha - asti kulaputra sāgarasya nāgarājño duhitā aṣṭavarṣā jātyā mahāprajñā tīkṣṇendriyā jñānapūrvaṃgamena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgatā
T01bsu036_u:3564: bodhicittāvinivartinī vistīrṇapraṇidhānā sarvasattveṣvātmapremānugatā guṇotpādane ca samarthā
T01bsu036_u:3566: smitamukhī paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā maitracittā karuṇāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate
T01bsu036_u:3569: dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato bodhāya ghaṭamāno bodhisattvabhūto
T01bsu036_u:3571: anekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi na kadācid vīryaṃ sraṃsitavān |
T01bsu036_u:3572: trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti kaścidantaśaḥ sarṣapamātro 'pi pṛthivīpradeśaḥ yatrānena śarīraṃ na nikṣiptaṃ sattvahitahetoḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3576: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā agrataḥ sthitā saṃdṛśyate sma |
T01bsu036_u:3579: puṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ gabhīraṃ ca diśaḥ sphurati sarvaśaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3583: yathecchayā me saṃbodhiḥ sākṣī me 'tra tathāgataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3585: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmān śāriputrastāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitarametadavocat - kevalaṃ kulaputri bodhāya
T01bsu036_u:3589: asti kulaputri strī na ca vīryaṃ sraṃsayati, anekāni ca kalpaśatānyanekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi puṇyāni karoti, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati, na cādyāpi buddhatvaṃ prāpnoti |
T01bsu036_u:3590: kiṃ kāraṇam? pañca sthānāni strī adyāpi na prāpnoti |
T01bsu036_u:3592: śakrasthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ mahārājasthānaṃ caturthaṃ cakravartisthānaṃ pañcamamavaivartikabodhisattvasthānam
T01bsu036_u:3593: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitureko maṇirasti, yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ mahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate |
T01bsu036_u:3594: sa ca maṇistayā sāgaranāgarājaduhitrā bhagavate dattaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3596: atha sāgaranāgarājaduhitā prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthaviraṃ ca śāriputrametadavocat - yo 'yaṃ maṇirmayā bhagavato dattaḥ, sa ca bhagavatā śīrghraṃ pratigṛhīto veti? sthavira āha - tvayā ca śīghraṃ
T01bsu036_u:3599: yadyahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra maharddhikī syām, śīghrataraṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam
T01bsu036_u:3601: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ sthavirasya ca śāriputrasya pratyakṣaṃ tat strīndriyamantarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati tasyāṃ velāyāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ prakrāntaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3602: atha dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vimalā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3603: tatra saptaratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇamabhisaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati sma, dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaṃ sarvānuvyajanarūpaṃ prabhayā ca daśadiśaṃ sphuritvā dharmadeśanāṃ kurvāṇam |
T01bsu036_u:3605: sattvāḥ, te sarve taṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma, sarvaiśca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramanuṣyāmanuṣyairnamasyamānaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ ca kurvantam |
T01bsu036_u:3606: ye ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti, sarve te 'vinivartanīyā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:3607: sā ca vimalā lokadhātuḥ, iyaṃ ca sahā lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat |
T01bsu036_u:3610: atha prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthaviraśca śāriputrastūṣṇīmabhūtām ||
T01bsu036_u:3614: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāpratibhānaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viṃśatibodhisattvaśatasahasraparivāro bhagavataḥ saṃmukhamimāṃ vācamabhāṣetām - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatvasminnarthe |
T01bsu036_u:3615: vayamimaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sattvānāṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmaḥ
T01bsu036_u:3616: kiṃcāpi bhagavan śaṭhakāḥ sattvāstasmin kāle bhaviṣyanti, parīttakuśalamūlā adhimānikā lābhasatkārasaṃniśritā
T01bsu036_u:3617: akuśalamūlapratipannā durdamā adhimuktivirahitā anadhimuktibahulāḥ, api tu khalu punarvayaṃ bhagavan kṣāntibalamupadarśayitvā tasmin kāle idaṃ sūtramuddekṣyāmo dhārayiṣyāmo deśayiṣyāmo likhiṣyāmaḥ satkariṣyāmo
T01bsu036_u:3619: kāyajīvitaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan utsṛjya idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3621: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavanta metadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan utsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum, api tu khalu punarbhagavan anyāsu lokadhātuṣviti |
T01bsu036_u:3622: atha khalu yāvantaste bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, aṣṭau bhikṣusahasrāṇi,
T01bsu036_u:3623: sarvāṇi tāni yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadūcuḥ -
T01bsu036_u:3625: vayamapīmaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye api tvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu |
T01bsu036_u:3627: lokadhātau adhimānikāḥ sattvā alpakuśalamūlā nityaṃ vyāpannacittāḥ śaṭhā vaṅkajātīyāḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:3628: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato mātṛbhaginī ṣaḍbhirbhikṣuṇīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhirbhikṣuṇībhiḥ utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamullokayantī sthitābhūt |
T01bsu036_u:3629: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantrayāmāsa -
T01bsu036_u:3630: kiṃ tvaṃ gautami durmanasvinī sthitā tathāgataṃ vyavalokayasi? nāhaṃ parikīrtitā vyākṛtā ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:3631: api tu khalu punargautami sarvaparṣadvayākaraṇena vyākṛtāsi |
T01bsu036_u:3632: api tu khalu punastvaṃ gautami ita upādāya aṣṭātriṃśatāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi |
T01bsu036_u:3633: imānyapi ṣaḍ bhikṣuṇīsahasrāṇi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tvayaiva sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike bodhisattvā dharmabhāṇakā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:3634: tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca
T01bsu036_u:3637: samyaksaṃbuddhastāni ṣaḍ bodhisattvasahasrāṇi paraṃparāvyākaraṇena vyākariṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ||
T01bsu036_u:3639: atha khalu rāhulamāturyaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyā etadabhavat - na me bhagavatā
T01bsu036_u:3641: atha khalu bhagavān yaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyāścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya yaśodharāṃ bhikṣuṇīmetadavocat - ārocayāmi te yaśodhare, prativedayāmi te |
T01bsu036_u:3642: tvamapi daśānāṃ buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi |
T01bsu036_u:3643: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca anupūrveṇa paripūrya raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidhācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugatolokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān bhadrāyāṃ lokadhātau |
T01bsu036_u:3644: aparimitaṃ ca tasya bhagavato raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ||
T01bsu036_u:3645: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇī ṣaḍbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā yaśodharā ca bhikṣuṇī caturbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā bhagavato 'ntikāt
T01bsu036_u:3646: svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣanta -
T01bsu036_u:3647: bhagavan vinetāsi vināyako 'si śāstāsi lokasya sadevakasya /
T01bsu036_u:3648: āśvāsadātā naradevapūjito vayaṃ pi saṃtoṣita adya nātha // Saddhp_12.1 //
T01bsu036_u:3649: atha khalu tā bhikṣuṇyaḥ imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ -
T01bsu036_u:3650: vayamapi bhagavan samutsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayituṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye, api tvanyāsu lokadhātuṣviti ||
T01bsu036_u:3651: atha khalu bhagavān yena tānyaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhāraṇīpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartikadharmacakrapravartakānāṃ tenāvalokayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:3652: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samanantarāvalokitā bhagavatā utthāyāsanebhyo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmyaivaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ - asmākaṃ bhagavān adhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanatāyai te khalvevamanuvicintya saṃprakampitāḥ parasparamūcuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ kulaputrāḥ kariṣyāmo yad bhagavānadhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasyānāgate 'dhvani saṃprakāśanatāyai?
T01bsu036_u:3653: atha khalu te kulaputrā bhagavato gauraveṇa ātmanaśca purvacaryāpraṇidhānena bhagavato 'bhimukhaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadante sma - vayaṃ bhagavan anāgate 'dhvani imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte daśasu dikṣu gatvā sarvasattvāṃllekhayiṣyāmaḥ pāṭhayiṣyāmaścintāpayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśayiṣyāmo bhagavata evānubhāvena |
T01bsu036_u:3655: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samasaṃgītyā bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -(Vaidya 164)
T01bsu036_u:3656: alpotsukastvaṃ bhagavan bhavasva vayaṃ tadā te parinirvṛtasya /
T01bsu036_u:3657: svaṃ paścime kāli subhairavasmin prakāśayiṣyāmida sūtramuttamam //
T01bsu036_u:3661: aprāpte prāptasaṃjñī ca ghore kālasmi paścime // Saddhp_12.4 //
T01bsu036_u:3663: saṃlekhavṛtticāri sma evaṃ vakṣyanti durmatī // Saddhp_12.5 //
T01bsu036_u:3664: raseṣu gṛddha saktāśca gṛhīṇāṃ dharma deśayī /
T01bsu036_u:3665: satkṛtāśca bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍabhijñā yathā tathā // Saddhp_12.6 //
T01bsu036_u:3669: tīrthikā batime bhikṣū svāni kāvyāni deśayuḥ // Saddhp_12.8 //
T01bsu036_u:3673: viprāṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ cāpi bhikṣuṇām // Saddhp_12.10 //
T01bsu036_u:3675: sarvaṃ vayaṃ kṣamiṣyāmo gauraveṇa maharṣiṇām // Saddhp_12.11 //
T01bsu036_u:3676: ye cāsmān kutsayiṣyanti tasmin kālasmi durmatī /
T01bsu036_u:3677: ime buddhā bhaviṣyanti kṣamiṣyāmatha sarvaśaḥ // Saddhp_12.12 //
T01bsu036_u:3679: yakṣarūpā bahu bhikṣū asmākaṃ paribhāṣakāḥ // Saddhp_12.13 //
T01bsu036_u:3681: kṣāntīya kakṣyāṃ bandhitvā sūtrametaṃ prakāśaye // Saddhp_12.14 //
T01bsu036_u:3682: anarthikāḥ sma kāyena jīvitena ca nāyaka /
T01bsu036_u:3683: arthikāśca sma bodhīya tava nikṣepadhārakāḥ // Saddhp_12.15 //
T01bsu036_u:3687: bhṛkuṭī sarva soḍhavyā aprajñaptiḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3690: bhāṣiṣyāma idaṃ sūtraṃ parṣanmadhye viśāradāḥ // Saddhp_12.18 //
T01bsu036_u:3692: gatvā gatvāsya dāsyāmo nikṣepaṃ tava nāyaka // Saddhp_12.19 //
T01bsu036_u:3694: alpotsuko bhava tvaṃ hi śāntiprāpto sunirvṛtaḥ // Saddhp_12.20 //
T01bsu036_u:3695: sarve ca lokapradyotā āgatā ye diśo daśa /
T01bsu036_u:3696: satyāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣāmo adhimuktiṃ vijānasi // Saddhp_12.21 //
T01bsu036_u:3700: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocata - duṣkaraṃ bhagavan paramaduṣkaramebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairutsoḍhaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa |
T01bsu036_u:3701: kathaṃ bhagavan ebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ? evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturṣu mañjuśrīrdharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3702: katameṣu caturṣu? iha mañjuśrīrbodhisattvena mahāsattvena ācāragocarapratiṣṭhitena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3703: kathaṃ ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattva ācāragocarapratiṣṭhito bhavati? yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānto bhavati, dānto dāntabhūmimanuprāpto 'nutrastāsaṃtrastamanā anabhyasūyakaḥ, yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme carati, yathābhūtaṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vyavalokayati |
T01bsu036_u:3704: yā khalveṣu dharmeṣvavicāraṇā avikalpanā, ayamucyate mañjuśrīrbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyācāraḥ
T01bsu036_u:3705: katamaśca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gocaraḥ? yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rājānaṃ saṃsevate, na rājaputrān na
T01bsu036_u:3706: rājamahāmātrān na rājapuruṣān saṃsevate na bhajate na paryupāste nopasaṃkrāmati, nānyatīrthyāścarakaparivrājakājīvakanirgranthān na kāvyaśāstraprasṛtān sattvān saṃsevate, na bhajate na paryupāste, na ca lokāyatamantradhārakān na lokāyatikān sevate na bhajate na paryupāste, na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti |
T01bsu036_u:3707: na cāṇḍalān na mauṣṭikān na saukarikān na kaukkuṭikān na mṛgalubdhakān na māṃsikān na naṭanṛttakān na jhallān na mallān |
T01bsu036_u:3709: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti |
T01bsu036_u:3712: śrāvakayānīyāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na sevate na bhajate na paryupāste, na ca taiḥ
T01bsu036_u:3714: na ca taiḥ saha samavadhānagocaro bhavati caṃkrame vā vihāre vā |
T01bsu036_u:3715: anyatropasaṃkrāntānāṃ caiṣāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate, taṃ cāniśrito bhāṣate |
T01bsu036_u:3717: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mātṛgrāmasya anyatarānyataramanunayanimittamudgṛhya abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, na ca mātṛgrāmasya abhīkṣṇaṃ darśanakāmo bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:3718: na ca kulānyupasaṃkramati, na ca dārikāṃ vā kanyāṃ vā vadhukāṃ vā abhīkṣṇamābhāṣitavyāṃ manyate, na pratisaṃmodayati |
T01bsu036_u:3719: na ca paṇḍakasya dharmaṃ deśayati, na ca tena sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti, na ca pratisaṃmodayati
T01bsu036_u:3720: na caikākī bhikṣārthamantargṛhaṃ praviśati anyatra tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3721: sacetpunarmātṛgrāmasya dharmaṃ deśayati, sa nāntaśo dharmasaṃrāgeṇāpi
T01bsu036_u:3725: na ca śrāmaṇeraṃ na ca śrāmaṇerīṃ na bhikṣuṃ na bhikṣuṇīṃ na kumārakaṃ na kumārikāṃ sātīyati, na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti, na ca saṃlāpaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3727: sa ca pratisaṃlayanaguruko bhavati, abhīkṣṇaṃ ca pratisaṃlayanaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3730: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān śūnyān vyavalokayati, yathāvat pratiṣṭhitān dharmān aviparītasthāyino yathābhūtasthitānacalānakampyānavivartyānaparivartān sadā
T01bsu036_u:3732: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sarvadharmān vyavalokayan viharati anena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gocare
T01bsu036_u:3735: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:3737: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśetuṃ anolīno viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_13.1 //
T01bsu036_u:3740: ye cāpiṃ rājapuruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam /
T01bsu036_u:3745: upāsikāśca varjeta prākaṭā yā avasthitāḥ // Saddhp_13.5 //
T01bsu036_u:3746: yā nirvṛtiṃ gaveṣanti dṛṣṭe dharme upāsikāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3747: varjayet saṃstavaṃ tābhiḥ ācāro ayamucyate // Saddhp_13.6 //
T01bsu036_u:3749: tasya bhāṣet sadā dhīro anolīno aniśritaḥ // Saddhp_13.7 //
T01bsu036_u:3752: kuleṣu cāpi vadhukāṃ kumāryaśca vivarjayet // Saddhp_13.8 //
T01bsu036_u:3753: na tā saṃmodayejjātu kauśalyaṃ hāsa pṛcchitum /
T01bsu036_u:3754: saṃstavaṃ tehi varjeta saukaraurabhrikaiḥ saha // Saddhp_13.9 //
T01bsu036_u:3756: māṃsaṃ sūnāya vikrenti saṃstavaṃ tairvivarjayet // Saddhp_13.10 //
T01bsu036_u:3759: vāramukhyā na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3761: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍitaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3762: na caikaḥ praviśettatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhavet // Saddhp_13.13 //
T01bsu036_u:3763: yadāpi praviśed grāmaṃ bhojanārthī punaḥ punaḥ /
