T01bsu036_u:3764: dvitīyaṃ bhikṣu mārgeta buddhaṃ vā samanusmaret // Saddhp_13.14 //
T01bsu036_u:3766: viharanti yena saprajñā dhārentā sūtramīdṛśam // Saddhp_13.15 //
T01bsu036_u:3768: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛte cāpi bhūtābhūte ca sarvaśaḥ // Saddhp_13.16 //
T01bsu036_u:3769: strīti nācarate dhīro puruṣeti na kalpayet /
T01bsu036_u:3770: sarvadharma ajātatvād gaveṣanto na paśyati // Saddhp_13.17 //
T01bsu036_u:3771: ācāro hi ayaṃ ukto bodhisattvāna sarvaśaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3772: gocaro yādṛśasteṣāṃ taṃ śṛṇotha prakāśataḥ // Saddhp_13.18 //
T01bsu036_u:3773: asantakā dharma ime prakāśitā aprādubhūtāśca ajāta sarve /
T01bsu036_u:3774: śūnyā nirīhā sthita nityakālaṃ ayaṃ gocaro ucyati paṇḍitānām //
T01bsu036_u:3775: viparītasaṃjñīhi ime vikalpitā asantasantā hi abhūtabhūtataḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3777: anutthitāścāpi ajātadharmā jātātha bhūtā viparītakalpitāḥ // Saddhp_13.20
T01bsu036_u:3778: ekāgracitto hi samāhitaḥ sadā sumerukūṭo yatha susthitaśca /
T01bsu036_u:3779: evaṃ sthitaścāpi hi tān nirīkṣedākāśabhūtānima sarvadharmān //
T01bsu036_u:3781: sthitā hi dharmā iti nityakālaṃ ayu gocaro ucyati paṇḍitānām //
T01bsu036_u:3782: īryāpathaṃ yo mama rakṣamāṇo bhaveta bhikṣū mama nirvṛtasya /
T01bsu036_u:3783: prakāśayet sūtramidaṃ hi loke na cāpi saṃlīyana tasya kācit //
T01bsu036_u:3784: kālena vā cintayamānu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya lenaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:3785: vipaśya dharmaṃ imu sarva yoniśo utthāya deśeta alīnacittaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3786: rājāna tasyeha karonti rakṣāṃ ye rājaputrāśca śṛṇonti dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:3787: anye 'pi co gṛhapati brāhmaṇāśca parivārya sarve 'sya sthitā bhavanti //
T01bsu036_u:3788: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrirbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitukāmaḥ sukhasthito bhavati sa sukhasthitaśca dharmaṃ bhāṣate kāyagataṃ vā pustakagataṃ vā |
T01bsu036_u:3789: pareṣāṃ ca deśayamāno nādhimātramupālambhajātīyo bhavati, na cānyān dharmabhāṇakān bhikṣūn
T01bsu036_u:3790: parivadati, na cāvarṇaṃ bhāṣate, na cāvarṇaṃ niścārayati, na cānyeṣāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā avarṇa bhāṣate, na cāvarṇaṃ cārayati, na ca teṣāmantike pratyarthikasaṃjñī bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:3793: sa āgatāgatānāṃ dhārmaśrāvaṇikānāmanuparigrāhikayā anabhyasūyayā (Vaidya 170) dharmaṃ deśayati
T01bsu036_u:3794: avivadamāno na ca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānena visarjayati |
T01bsu036_u:3795: api tu khalu punastathā visarjayati, yathā buddhajñānamabhisaṃbudhyate ||
T01bsu036_u:3796: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:3797: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇastatha dharmu bhāṣate /
T01bsu036_u:3798: udāra prajñapta karitva āsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe //
T01bsu036_u:3799: caukṣaṃ cāsau cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ supraśastaraṅgaiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3800: āsevakāṃ kṛṣṇa tathādaditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā // Saddhp_13.27 //
T01bsu036_u:3802: sudhautapādaśca upāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena cāpi // Saddhp_13.28
T01bsu036_u:3804: upasaṃhareccitrakathā bahūśca bhikṣūṇa co bhikṣūṇikāna caiva //
T01bsu036_u:3805: upāsakānāṃ ca upāsikānāṃ rājñāṃ tathā rājasutāna caiva /
T01bsu036_u:3806: vicitritārthāṃ madhurāṃ katheyā anabhyasūyantu sadā sa paṇḍitaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3807: pṛṣṭo 'pi cāsau tada praśna tehi anulomamarthaṃ punarnirdiśeta /
T01bsu036_u:3808: tathā ca deśeya tamarthajātaṃ yatha śrutva bodhīya bhaveyu lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3809: kilāsitāṃ cāpi vivarjayitvā na cāpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñām /
T01bsu036_u:3811: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijaheta paṇḍito maitrībalaṃ cā pariṣāya bhāvayet //
T01bsu036_u:3813: saṃharṣayetparṣa tathaiva toṣayenna cāpi kiṃcittatu jātu prārthayet //
T01bsu036_u:3814: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vastrāṇi śayyāsana cīvaraṃ vā /
T01bsu036_u:3815: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayeta na vijñapeyā pariṣāya kiṃcit // Saddhp_13.34
T01bsu036_u:3816: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇo bhaveya buddho 'hamime ca sattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3817: etanmamo sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke // Saddhp_13.35
T01bsu036_u:3818: yaścāpi bhikṣū mama nirvṛtasya anīrṣuko eta prakāśayeyā /
T01bsu036_u:3819: na tasya duḥkhaṃ na ca antarāyo śokopayāsā na bhavetkadācit //
T01bsu036_u:3820: na tasya saṃtrāsana kaści kuryānna tāḍanāṃ nāpi avarṇa bhāṣet /
T01bsu036_u:3821: na cāpi nipkāsana jātu tasya tathā hi so kṣāntibale pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3822: sukhasthitasyo tada paṇḍitasya evaṃ sthitasyo yatha bhāṣitaṃ mayā /
T01bsu036_u:3823: guṇāna koṭīśata bhontyaneke na śakyate kalpaśate hi vaktum // Saddhp_13.38
T01bsu036_u:3824: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmakṣayāntakāle vartamāne idaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nīrṣuko bhavatyaśaṭho 'māyāvī, na cānyeṣāṃ bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ pudgalānāmavarṇaṃ bhāṣate, nāpavadati nāvasādayati |
T01bsu036_u:3825: na cānyeṣāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ vā kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati -
T01bsu036_u:3826: dūre yūyaṃ kulaputrā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, na tasyāṃ yūyaṃ (Vaidya
T01bsu036_u:3831: na ca dharmavivādābhirato bhavati, na ca dharmavivādaṃ karoti, sarvasattvānāṃ cāntike maitrībalaṃ na vijahāti |
T01bsu036_u:3832: sarvatathāgatānāṃ cāntike pitṛsaṃjñāmutpādayati, sarvabodhisattvānāṃ cāntike śāstṛsaṃjñāmutpādayati
T01bsu036_u:3833: ye ca daśasu dikṣu loke bodhisattvā
T01bsu036_u:3835: dharmaṃ ca deśayamāno 'nūnamanadhikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati samena dharmapremṇā, na ca kasyacidantaśo dharmapremṇāpyadhikataramanugrahaṃ karoti imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:3836: anena mañjuśrīstṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmaparikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ sukhasparśaṃ viharati,
T01bsu036_u:3840: dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti śraddhāsyanti, pattīyiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti, pustakagataṃ ca kṛtvā
T01bsu036_u:3844: śāṭhyaṃ ca mānaṃ tatha kūṭanāṃ ca aśeṣato ujjhiya dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3845: īrṣyāṃ na kuryāttatha jātu paṇḍito ya icchate sūtramidaṃ prakāśitum //
T01bsu036_u:3846: avarṇa jātū na vadeya kasyaciddṛṣṭīvivādaṃ ca na jātu kuryāt /
T01bsu036_u:3847: kaukṛtyasthānaṃ ca na jātu kuryānna lapsyase jñānamanuttara tvam //
T01bsu036_u:3848: sadā ca so ārjavu mardāvaśca kṣāntaśca bhotī sugatasya putraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3849: dharmaṃ prakāśetuḥ punaḥ punaścimaṃ na tasya khedo bhavatī kadācit //
T01bsu036_u:3850: ye bodhisattvā daśasū diśāsu sattvānukampāya caranti loke /
T01bsu036_u:3851: te sarvi śāstāra bhavanti mahyaṃ gurugauravaṃ teṣu janeta paṇḍitaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3853: smaritva buddhāna dvipadānamuttamān jineṣu nityaṃ pitṛsaṃjña kuryāt /
T01bsu036_u:3854: adhimānasaṃjñāṃ ca vihāya sarvāṃ na tasya bhotī tada antarāyaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3855: śruṇitva dharmaṃ imamevarūpaṃ sa rakṣitavyastada paṇḍitena /
T01bsu036_u:3856: sukhaṃ vihārāya samāhitaśca surakṣito bhoti ca prāṇikoṭibhiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3857: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitukāmastena bhikṣuṇā gṛhasthapravrajitānāmantikād dūreṇa dūraṃ vihartavyam, maitrīvihāreṇa ca vihartavyam |
T01bsu036_u:3858: ye ca sattvā bodhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmantike spṛhotpādayitavyā |
T01bsu036_u:3860: mahāduṣprajñajātīyā bateme sattvāḥ, ye tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ na śṛṇvanti na jānanti na budhyante na pṛcchanti na śraddadhanti nādhimucyante |
T01bsu036_u:3861: kiṃcāpyete sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ nāvataranti, na budhyante, api tu khalu
T01bsu036_u:3862: punarahametāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yo yasmin sthito bhaviṣyati, taṃ tasminneva ṛddhibalenāvarjayiṣyāmi pattīyāpayiṣyāmi avatārayiṣyāmi paripācayiṣyāmi ||
T01bsu036_u:3863: anenāpi mañjuśrīścaturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamāno 'vyābādho bhavati, satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ rājñā rajaputrāṇāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām antarīkṣāvacarāścāsya devatāḥ śrāddhāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti dharmaśravaṇāya |
T01bsu036_u:3864: devaputrāścāsya sadānubaddhā bhaviṣyantyārakṣāyai grāmagatasya vā vihāragatasya vā |
T01bsu036_u:3866: tasya ca vyākaraṇenaṃ tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:3870: mañjuśrīrdharmaparyāyasya bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu śabdo vā ghoṣo vā nāmaśravo vā ||
T01bsu036_u:3871: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrī rājā bhavati balacakravartī, balena taṃ svakaṃ
T01bsu036_u:3875: atha tasya rājño balacakravartino vividhā yodhā bhavanti |
T01bsu036_u:3877: atha sa rājā tān yodhān yudhyamānān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ prīto bhavatyāttamanaskaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3878: sa prīta āttamanāḥ samānasteṣāṃ yodhānāṃ vividhāni dānāni dadāti |
T01bsu036_u:3879: tadyathā grāmaṃ vā grāmakṣetrāṇi (Vaidya 174) vā dadāti,
T01bsu036_u:3880: nagaraṃ nagarakṣetrāṇi vā dadāti, vastrāṇi dadāti, veṣṭanāni hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni karṇābharaṇāni sauvarṇasūtrāṇi hārārdhahārāṇi hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālānyapi dadāti,
T01bsu036_u:3883: tatkasya hetoḥ? eka eva hi sa cūḍāmaṇī rājño
T01bsu036_u:3885: yadā punarmañjuśrī rājā tamapi cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti, tadā sa sarvo rājñaścaturaṅgabalakāya āścaryaprāpto bhavatyadbhutaprāptaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3887: svena bāhubalanirjitena puṇyabalanirjitena traidhātuke dharmeṇa dharmarājyaṃ kārayati |
T01bsu036_u:3889: atha khalu tathāgatasyāpi āryā yodhā māreṇa sārdhaṃ yudhyante |
T01bsu036_u:3890: atha khalu mañjuśrīstathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā
T01bsu036_u:3891: teṣāmāryāṇāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā vividhāni sūtraśatasahasrāṇi bhāṣate sma catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣaṇārtham |
T01bsu036_u:3895: tatra mañjuśrīryathā sa rājā balacakravartī teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ mahatā puruṣakāreṇa vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāttaṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ paścimaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti sarvalokāśraddheyaṃ vismayabhūtam yathā mañjuśrīstasya rājñaḥ sa cūḍāmaṇiścirarakṣito mūrdhasthāyī, evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato
T01bsu036_u:3896: samyaksaṃbuddhastraidhātuke dharmarājo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayamāṇo yasmin samaye paśyati śrāvakāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca skandhamāreṇa vā kleśamāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ yudhyamānān, taiśca sārdhaṃ yudhyamānairyadā rāgadveṣamohakṣayaḥ sarvatraidhātukānniḥsaraṇaṃ sarvamāranirghātanaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraḥ kṛto bhavati, tadā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārāgitaḥ
T01bsu036_u:3897: samānasteṣāmāryḥṇḥṃ yodhḥnḥmimamevaṃrūpaṃ sarvalokavipratyanīkaṃ sarvalokḥśraddheyamabhḥṣitapūrvamanirdiṣṭapūrvaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ bhḥṣate sma |
T01bsu036_u:3898: sarveṣḥṃ sarvajñatḥhḥrakaṃ mahḥcūḍḥmaṇiprakhyaṃ tathḥgataḥ śrḥvakebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma
T01bsu036_u:3902: yo 'yaṃ mañjuśrīstathḥgatena adya tenaiva rḥjñḥ balacakravartinḥ ciraparirakṣitaścūḍḥmaṇiravamucya yodhebhyo dattaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:3903: evameva mañjuśrīstathḥgato 'pīmaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ cirḥnurakṣitaṃ sarvadharmaparyḥyḥṇḥṃ mūrdhasthḥyi tathḥgatavijñeyam |
T01bsu036_u:3905: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:3906: maitrībalaṃ co sada darśayantaḥ kṛpāyamāṇaḥ sada sarvasattvān /
T01bsu036_u:3909: gṛhastha ye pravrajitāśca ye syuratha bodhisattvāstada kāli paścime /
T01bsu036_u:3910: sarveṣu maitrībala so hi darśayī mā haiva kṣepsyanti śruṇitva dharmam //
T01bsu036_u:3911: ahaṃ tu bodhimanuprāpuṇitvā yadā sthito bheṣyi tathāgatatve /
T01bsu036_u:3912: tato upāneṣyi upāyi sthitvā saṃśrāvayiṣye imamagrabodhim // Saddhp_13.47
T01bsu036_u:3913: yathāpi rājā balacakravartī yodhāna dadyādvividhaṃ hiraṇyam /
T01bsu036_u:3914: hastīṃśca aśvāṃśca rathān padātīn nagarāṇi grāmāṃśca dadāti tuṣṭaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3915: keṣāṃci hastābharaṇāni prīto dadāti rūpyaṃ ca suvarṇasūtram /
T01bsu036_u:3916: muktāmaṇiṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ vividhāṃśca dāsān sa dadāti prītaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3917: yadā tu so uttamasāṃhasena vismāpito kenaci tatra bhoti /
T01bsu036_u:3918: vijñāya āścaryamidaṃ kṛtaṃ ti mukuṭaṃ sa muñcitva maṇiṃ dadāti //
T01bsu036_u:3919: tathaiva buddho ahu dharmarājā kṣāntībalaḥ prajñaprabhūtakośaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3920: dharmeṇa śāsāmimu sarvalokaṃ hitānukampī karūṇāyamānaḥ // Saddhp_13.51 //
T01bsu036_u:3922: parākramaṃ jāniya teṣa prāṇināṃ ye śuddhasattvā iha kleśaghātinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3925: jñātvā ca sattvān balavantu jñānī cūḍāmaṇiṃ vā ima sūtra deśayī //
T01bsu036_u:3926: imu paścimu loki vadāmi sūtraṃ sūtrāṇa sarveṣa mamāgrabhūtam /
T01bsu036_u:3927: saṃrakṣitaṃ me na ca jātu proktaṃ taṃ śrāvayāmyadya śṛṇotha sarve //
T01bsu036_u:3928: catvāri dharmā imi evarūpāḥ mayi nirvṛte ye ca niṣevitavyāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:3929: ye cārthikā uttamamagrabodhau vyāpāraṇaṃ ye ca karonti mahyam //
T01bsu036_u:3930: na tasya śoko na pi cāntarāyo daurvarṇikaṃ nāpi gilānakatvam /
T01bsu036_u:3931: na ca cchavī kṛṣṇika tasya bhoti na cāpi hīne nagarasmi vāsaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3932: priyadarśano 'sau satataṃ maharṣī . tathāgato vā yatha pūjya bhoti /
T01bsu036_u:3933: upasthāyakāstasya bhavanti nityaṃ ye devaputrā daharā bhavanti //
T01bsu036_u:3934: na tasya śastraṃ na viṣaṃ kadācit kāye krame nāpi ca daṇḍaloṣṭam /
T01bsu036_u:3935: saṃmīlitaṃ tasya mukhaṃ bhaveya yo tasya ākrośamapī vadeyā // Saddhp_13.58
T01bsu036_u:3936: so bandhubhūto bhavatīha prāṇināmālokajāto vicarantu medinīm /
T01bsu036_u:3937: timiraṃ haranto bahuprāṇakoṭināṃ yo sūtradhāre imu nirvṛte mayi //
T01bsu036_u:3938: supinasmi so paśyati bhadrarūpaṃ bhikṣūṃśca so paśyati bhikṣuṇīśca /
T01bsu036_u:3939: sihāsanasthaṃ ca tathātmabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ prakāśentu bahuprakāram //
T01bsu036_u:3941: devāṃśca yakṣān yatha gaṅgāvālikā asurāṃśca nāgāṃśca bahuprakārān /
T01bsu036_u:3942: teṣāṃ ca so bhāṣati agradharmaṃ supinasmi sarveṣa kṛtāñjalīnām //
T01bsu036_u:3943: tathāgataṃ so supinasmi paśyati deśenta dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭinām /
T01bsu036_u:3945: so cā tahī bhoti kṛtāñjalisthito abhiṣṭuvanto dvipaduttamaṃ munim /
T01bsu036_u:3946: so cā jino bhāṣati agradharmaṃ caturṇa parṣāṇa mahābhiṣaṭūkaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3947: so ca prahṛṣṭo bhavatī śruṇitvā prāmodyajātaśca karoti pūjām /
T01bsu036_u:3948: supine ca so dhāraṇi prāpuṇoti avivartiyaṃ jñāna spṛśitva kṣipram //
T01bsu036_u:3949: jñātvā ca so āśayu lokanāthastaṃ vyākarotī puruṣarṣabhatve /
T01bsu036_u:3950: kulaputra tvaṃ pīha anuttaraṃ śivaṃ spṛśiṣyasi jñānamanāgate 'dhvani //
T01bsu036_u:3951: tavāpi kṣetraṃ vipulaṃ bhaviṣyati parṣāśca catvāri yathaiva mahyam /
T01bsu036_u:3952: śroṣyanti dharmaṃ vipulaṃ anāsravaṃ sagauravā bhūtva kṛtāñjalī ca //
T01bsu036_u:3953: punaśca so paśyati ātmabhāvaṃ bhāventa dharmaṃ girikandareṣu /
T01bsu036_u:3954: bhāvitva dharmaṃ ca spṛśitva dharmatāṃ samādhi so labdhu jinaṃ ca paśyati // Saddhp_13.67
T01bsu036_u:3955: suvarṇavarṇaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ supinasmi dṛṣṭvā ca śṛṇoti dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:3957: śrutvā ca taṃ parṣadi saṃprakāśayī supino khu tasyo ayamevarūpaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:3958: svapne 'pi sarvaṃ prajahitva rājyamantaḥpuraṃ jñātigaṇaṃ tathaiva /

T01bsu036_u:4151: ārabdhavīryāḥ smṛtimanta sarve prajñābalasmin sthita aprameye /
T01bsu036_u:4152: viśāradā dharmu kathenti caite prabhāsvarā putra mamaiti sarve //
T01bsu036_u:4153: mayā ca prāpya imamagrabodhiṃ nagare gayāyāṃ drumamūli tatra /
T01bsu036_u:4154: anuttaraṃ vartiya dharmacakraṃ paripācitāḥ sarvi ihāgrabodhau //
T01bsu036_u:4155: anāsravā bhūta iyaṃ mi vācā śruṇitva sarve mama śraddadhadhvam /
T01bsu036_u:4156: evaṃ ciraṃ prāpta mayāgrabodhi paripācitāścaiti mayaiva sarve //
T01bsu036_u:4157: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni
T01bsu036_u:4158: bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan, adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni - kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena
T01bsu036_u:4159: kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ samādāpitāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:4161: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena kumārabhūtena kapilavastunaḥ śākyanagarānniṣkasya gayānagarānnātidūre bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatena anuttarā
T01bsu036_u:4162: samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā? tasyādya bhagavan kālasya sātiriṃkāṇi catvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi |
T01bsu036_u:4163: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam, tathāgatena tathāgatavṛṣabhitā tathāgataparākramaḥ kṛtaḥ, yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu036_u:4168: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:4169: sa varṣaśatikān putrānādarśayet, evaṃ ca vadet - ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti |
T01bsu036_u:4170: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ - eṣo 'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti
T01bsu036_u:4171: | tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam |
T01bsu036_u:4173: samyaksaṃbodhim, ime ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahvaprameyā bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritabrahmacaryāḥ, dīrgharātraṃ hi kṛtaniścayāḥ, buddhajñāne samādhimukhaśatasahasrasamāpadyanavyutthānakuśalāḥ mahābhijñāparikarmaniryātāḥ mahābhijñākṛtaparikarmāṇaḥ (Vaidya 187)
T01bsu036_u:4174: paṇḍitā buddhabhūmau, saṃgītakuśalāstathāgatadharmāṇām, āścaryādbhutā lokasya mahāvīryabalasthāmaprāptāḥ
T01bsu036_u:4175: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati - mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ, pariṇāmitāśca asyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmāviti |
T01bsu036_u:4176: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti |
T01bsu036_u:4177: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ - ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti |
T01bsu036_u:4179: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante |
T01bsu036_u:4180: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:4181: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:4183: deśaya, yadvayaṃ niḥsaṃśayā asmin dharme bhavema, anāgate 'dhvani
T01bsu036_u:4184: bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti ||
T01bsu036_u:4185: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
T01bsu036_u:4187: prāpto 'si bodhiṃ nagare gayāhvaye kālo 'yamalpo 'tra tu lokanātha //
T01bsu036_u:4188: ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū ye kalpakoṭīcaritā mahāgaṇī /
T01bsu036_u:4189: ṛddhībale ca sthita aprakampitāḥ suśikṣitāḥ prajñabale gatiṃgatāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4190: anūpaliptāḥ padumaṃ va vāriṇā bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4191: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravāḥ smṛtimanta lokādhipatisya putrāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4192: kathaṃ imaṃ adbhutamīdṛśaṃ te taṃ śraddadhiṣyantimi bodhisattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4193: vicikitsanirghātanahetu bhāṣa taṃ tvaṃ caiva deśehi yathaiva arthaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4194: yathā hi puruṣo iha kaścideva daharo bhaveyā śiśu kṛṣṇakeśaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4195: jātyā ca so viṃśatiruttare vā darśeti putrān śatavarṣajātān //
T01bsu036_u:4197: valīhi palitehi ca te upetā eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4198: duḥśraddadhaṃ tadbhavi lokanātha daharasya putrā imi evarūpāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4199: emeva bhagavāṃśca navo vayasthaḥ ime ca vijñā bahubodhisattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4201: dhṛtimanta prajñāya vicakṣaṇāśca prāsādikā darśaniyāśca sarve /
T01bsu036_u:4203: asaṅgacārī pavaneva santi ākāśadhātau satataṃ aniśritāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4204: jānenti vīryaṃ sugatasya putrāḥ paryeṣamāṇā ima buddhabhūmim //
T01bsu036_u:4205: kathaṃ nu śraddheyamidaṃ bhaveyā parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin /
T01bsu036_u:4206: vicikitsa asmāka na kācidasti śṛṇomathā saṃmukha lokanāthā // Saddhp_14.53
T01bsu036_u:4207: vicikitsa kṛtvāna imasmi sthāne gaccheyu mā durgati bodhisattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4208: tvaṃ vyākuruṣvā bhagavan yathāvat katha bodhisattvāḥ paripācitā ime //
T01bsu036_u:4212: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma -
T01bsu036_u:4213: avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ, abhiśraddadhadhvaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāṃ
T01bsu036_u:4216: - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ, abhiśraddadhadhvaṃ tathāgatasya bhutāṃ
T01bsu036_u:4219: avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ, abhiśraddadhadhvaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāṃ
T01bsu036_u:4221: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham, bhāṣatu sugataḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4223: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
T01bsu036_u:4226: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu
T01bsu036_u:4229: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ
T01bsu036_u:4230: śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam, yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte - sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
T01bsu036_u:4231: tathāgatena śākyakulādabhiniṣkramya gayāhvaye mahānagare bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti |
T01bsu036_u:4233: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya
T01bsu036_u:4234: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye
T01bsu036_u:4235: pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ, atha khalu kaścideva puruṣa utpadyate |
T01bsu036_u:4236: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet |
T01bsu036_u:4237: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāṃllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt, sarvāṇi ca tāni
T01bsu036_u:4238: pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet
T01bsu036_u:4239: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā? evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat - asaṃkhyeyāste
T01bsu036_u:4241: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā |
T01bsu036_u:4242: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate |
T01bsu036_u:4245: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ, prativedayāmi vaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4246: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni, yeṣu ca nopanikṣiptāni,
T01bsu036_u:4247: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante, yāvanti mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya |
T01bsu036_u:4248: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
T01bsu036_u:4249: deśayāmi, anyeṣu ca lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu, ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā
T01bsu036_u:4256: tasmiṃstasmiṃścātmanaḥ parinirvāṇaṃ vyāharati, tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ
T01bsu036_u:4257: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati - daharo 'hamasmi
T01bsu036_u:4261: yatkhalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ, tathāgata evaṃ cirābhisaṃbuddha evaṃ vyāharati - acirābhisaṃbuddho 'hamasmīti, nānyatra sattvānāṃ paripācanārtham |
T01bsu036_u:4263: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4264: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā, ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati, sarve te dharmaparyāyāḥ satyāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4266: tatkasya hetoḥ? dṛṣṭaṃ hi tathāgatena traidhātukaṃ yathābhūtam |
T01bsu036_u:4267: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti, na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā |
T01bsu036_u:4268: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti |
T01bsu036_u:4270: tatra tathāgato yāṃ kāṃcidvācaṃ vyāharati, sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ na mṛṣā nānyathā |
T01bsu036_u:4271: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati |
T01bsu036_u:4276: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā |
T01bsu036_u:4278: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt |
T01bsu036_u:4279: idānīṃ (Vaidya 191) khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi
T01bsu036_u:4281: paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi - mā haiva me 'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato 'bhīkṣṇadarśanena
T01bsu036_u:4282: akṛtakuśalamūlāḥ sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitā daridrabhūtāḥ kāmalolupā andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā
T01bsu036_u:4283: bhaveyuḥ, na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ - āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti |
T01bsu036_u:4284: vīryaṃ nārabheyustraidhātukānniḥsaraṇārtham, na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ
T01bsu036_u:4285: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma |
T01bsu036_u:4286: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ bhavati vā na vā |
T01bsu036_u:4287: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi - durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti |
T01bsu036_u:4288: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:4290: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya |
T01bsu036_u:4291: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:4296: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya |
T01bsu036_u:4297: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā |
T01bsu036_u:4298: sa ca vaidyaḥ pravāsagato bhavet, te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā
T01bsu036_u:4300: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4301: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4302: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet |
T01bsu036_u:4303: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4306: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ, evaṃ cainaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭyāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgataḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4309: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ
T01bsu036_u:4310: pariveṣṭamānān, tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca, śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt, evaṃ cainān vadet - pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam |
T01bsu036_u:4311: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
T01bsu036_u:4313: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4314: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4315: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ, enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti |
T01bsu036_u:4316: (Vaidya 192) te caivaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeran, tacca bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ na pibeyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4318: hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate, gandhenāpi rasenāpi na rocate |
T01bsu036_u:4319: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet - ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ
T01bsu036_u:4320: te khalvidaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ na pibanti, māṃ cābhinandanti |
T01bsu036_u:4322: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet - jīrṇo 'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ, vṛddho mahallakaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4328: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4329: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet, te tasmin samaye 'tīva śocayeyuḥ, atīva parideveyuḥ - yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako 'nukampakaḥ so 'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ, te 'dya vayamanāthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4332: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet |
T01bsu036_u:4333: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4336: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet |
T01bsu036_u:4337: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet? āhuḥ -
T01bsu036_u:4338: no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata |
T01bsu036_u:4340: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham |
T01bsu036_u:4341: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati ||
T01bsu036_u:4342: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4343: acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyo yāsāṃ pramāṇaṃ na kadāci vidyate /
T01bsu036_u:4344: prāptā mayā eṣa tadāgrabodhirdharmaṃ ca deśemyahu nityakālam //
T01bsu036_u:4345: samādapemī bahubodhisattvān bauddhasmi jñānasmi sthapemi caiva /
T01bsu036_u:4349: na cāpi nirvāmyahu tasmi kāle ihaiva co dharmu prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_15.3
T01bsu036_u:4350: tatrāpi cātmānamadhiṣṭhahāmi sarvāṃśca sattvāna tathaiva cāham /
T01bsu036_u:4351: viparītabuddhī ca narā vimūḍhāḥ tatraiva tiṣṭhantu na paśyiṣū mām //
T01bsu036_u:4352: parinirvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭva mamātmabhāvaṃ dhātūṣu pūjāṃ vividhāṃ karonti /
T01bsu036_u:4353: māṃ cā apaśyanti janenti tṛṣṇāṃ tatorjukaṃ citta prabhoti teṣām //
T01bsu036_u:4354: ṛjū yadā te mṛdumārdavāśca utsṛṣṭakāmāśca bhavanti sattvāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4355: tato ahaṃ śrāvakasaṃgha kṛtvāḥ ātmāna darśemyahu gṛdhrakūṭe // Saddhp_15.6
T01bsu036_u:4356: evaṃ ca haṃ teṣa vadāmi paścāt ihaiva nāhaṃ tada āsi nirvṛtaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4357: upāyakauśalya mameti bhikṣavaḥ punaḥ puno bhomyahu jīvaloke // Saddhp_15.7
T01bsu036_u:4358: anyehi sattvehi puraskṛto 'haṃ teṣāṃ prakāśemi mamāgrabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:4359: yūyaṃ ca śabdaṃ na śṛṇotha mahyaṃ anyatra so nirvṛtu lokanāthaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4360: paśyāmyahaṃ sattva vihanyamānān na cāhu darśemi tadātmabhāvam /
T01bsu036_u:4361: spṛhentu tāvanmama darśanasya tṛṣitāna saddharmu prakāśayiṣye //
T01bsu036_u:4364: na ca cyavāmī itu gṛdhrakūṭāt anyāsu śayyāsanakoṭibhiśca // Saddhp_15.10
T01bsu036_u:4365: yadāpi sattvā ima lokadhātuṃ paśyanti kalpenti ca dahyamānam /
T01bsu036_u:4366: tadāpi cedaṃ mama buddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇa bhotī marumānuṣāṇām //
T01bsu036_u:4367: krīḍā ratī teṣa vicitra bhoti udyānaprāsādavimānakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4369: upariṃ ca devābhihananti tūryān mandāravarṣaṃ ca visarjayanti /
T01bsu036_u:4370: mamaṃ ca abhyokiri śrāvakāṃśca ye cānya bodhāviha prasthitā vidū //
T01bsu036_u:4371: evaṃ ca me kṣetramidaṃ sadā sthitaṃ anye ca kalpentimu dahyamānam /
T01bsu036_u:4372: subhairavaṃ paśyiṣu lokadhātuṃ upadrutaṃ śokaśatābhikīrṇam // Saddhp_15.14
T01bsu036_u:4373: na cāpi me nāma śṛṇonti jātu tathāgatānāṃ bahukalpakoṭibhiḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4374: dharmasya vā mahya gaṇasya cāpi pāpasya karmasya phalevarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:4375: lyadā tu sattvā mṛdu mārdavāśca utpanna bhontīha manuṣyaloke /
T01bsu036_u:4376: utpannamātrāśca śubhena karmaṇā paśyanti māṃ dharmu prakāśayantam //
T01bsu036_u:4377: na cāhu bhāṣāmi kadāci teṣāṃ imāṃ kriyāmīdṛśikīmanuttarām /
T01bsu036_u:4378: teno ahaṃ dṛṣṭa cirasya bhomi tato 'sya bhāṣāmi sudurlabhā jināḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4380: etādṛśaṃ jñānabalaṃ mayedaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ yasya na kaścidantaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4381: āyuśca me dīrghamanantakalpaṃ samupārjitaṃ pūrva caritva caryām //
T01bsu036_u:4382: mā saṃśayaṃ atra kurudhva paṇḍitā vicikitsitaṃ co jahathā aśeṣam /
T01bsu036_u:4383: bhūtāṃ prabhāṣāmyahameta vācaṃ mṛṣā mamā naiva kadāci vāg bhavet //
T01bsu036_u:4384: yathā hi so vaidya upāyaśikṣito viparītasaṃjñīna sutāna hetoḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4385: jīvantamātmāna mṛteti brūyāt taṃ vaidyu vijño na mṛṣeṇa codayet //
T01bsu036_u:4386: yameva haṃ lokapitā svayaṃbhūḥ cikitsakaḥ sarvaprajāna nāthaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4387: viparīta mūḍhāṃśca viditva bālān anirvṛto nirvṛta darśayāmi //
T01bsu036_u:4388: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mahyamabhīkṣṇadarśanād viśraddha bhontī abudhā ajānakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4389: viśvasta kāmeṣu pramatta bhontī pramādahetoḥ prapatanti durgatim //
T01bsu036_u:4390: cariṃ cariṃ jāniya nityakālaṃ vadāmi sattvāna tathā tathāham /
T01bsu036_u:4391: kathaṃ nu bodhāvupanāmayeyaṃ katha buddhadharmāṇa bhaveyu lābhinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4395: asmin khalu punastathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:4396: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - asmin khalu punarajita
T01bsu036_u:4398: ebhyaḥ sahasraguṇena yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhāraṇīpratilambho
T01bsu036_u:4400: anyeṣāṃ ca sāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā asaṅgapratibhānatāpratilambho 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:4401: anyeṣāṃ ca dvisāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīnayutaśatasahasraparivartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:4402: anye ca trisāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avaivartyadharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4403: anye ca madhyamakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vimalanirbhāsacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ
T01bsu036_u:4404: | anye ca kṣudrakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ
T01bsu036_u:4405: dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā aṣṭajāti[prati]baddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:4406: anye ca catuścāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā caturjātipratibaddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:4407: anye ca tricāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā trijātipratibaddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:4408: anye ca dvicāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvḥ mahḥsattvḥ imaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ śrutvḥ dvijḥtipratibaddhḥ abhūvannanuttarḥyḥṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:4409: anye caikacḥturdvīpikḥ lokadhḥtuparamḥṇurajaḥsamḥ bodhisattvḥ mahḥsattvḥ imaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ śrutvḥ ekajḥtipratibaddhḥ abhūvannanuttarḥyḥṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:4410: aṣṭatrisḥhasramahḥsḥhasralokadhḥtuparamḥṇurajaḥsamaiśca bodhisattvairmahḥsattvairimaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ śrutvḥ anuttarḥyḥṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittḥnyutpḥditḥni ||
T01bsu036_u:4411: atha samanantaranirdiṣṭe bhagavataiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmābhisamaye pratiṣṭhāne, atha tāvadevoparivaihāyasādantarīkṣānmāndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ
T01bsu036_u:4413: teṣu ca lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni tāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāgatya ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu
T01bsu036_u:4414: siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni, tāni sarvāṇi cāvakiranti sma, abhyavakiranti sma,
T01bsu036_u:4416: bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭamavakiranti sma,
T01bsu036_u:4418: taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣado 'vakiranti sma, abhyavakiranti sma,
T01bsu036_u:4423: hārārdhahāramuktāhāramaṇiratnamahāratnāni copariṣṭādvaihāyasamantarīkṣe samantāt savāsu dikṣu pralambanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:4424: samantācca anarghaprāptasya dhūpasya ghaṭikāsahasrāṇi ratnamayāni svayameva pravicaranti sma
T01bsu036_u:4425: ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvad brahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhārayāmāsuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4426: anena paryāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ teṣāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvadbrahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe dhārayāmāsuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4428: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4429: āścarya dharmaḥ sugatena śrāvito na jātu asmābhiḥ śrutaiṣa pūrvam /
T01bsu036_u:4430: mahātmatā yādṛśi nāyakānāṃ āyuṣpramāṇaṃ ca yathā anantam // Saddhp_16.1 //
T01bsu036_u:4431: evaṃ ca dharmaṃ śruṇiyāna adya vibhajyamānaṃ sugatena saṃmukham /
T01bsu036_u:4432: prītisphuṭāḥ prāṇasahasrakoṭyo ya aurasā lokavināyakasya // Saddhp_16.2 //
T01bsu036_u:4433: avivartiyā keci sthitāgrabodhau keci sthitā dhāraṇiye varāyām /
T01bsu036_u:4434: asaṅgapratibhāṇi sthitāśca kecit koṭīsahasrāya ca dhāraṇīye // Saddhp_16.3
T01bsu036_u:4435: paramāṇukṣetrasya tathaiva cānye ye prasthitā uttamabuddhajñāne /
T01bsu036_u:4436: kecicca jātībhi tathaiva cāṣṭabhi jinā bhaviṣyanti anantadarśinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4437: kecittu catvāri atikramitvā kecitribhiścaiva dvibhiśca anye /
T01bsu036_u:4438: lapsyanti bodhiṃ paramārthadarśinaḥ śruṇitva dharmaṃ imu nāyakasya //
T01bsu036_u:4440: ke cāpi ekāya sthihitva jātyā sarvajña bhoṣyanti bhavāntareṇa /
T01bsu036_u:4441: śruṇitva āyu imu nāyakasya etādṛśaṃ labdhu phalaṃ anāsravam // Saddhp_16.6
T01bsu036_u:4442: aṣṭāna kṣetrāṇa yathā rajo bhavet evāpramāṇā gaṇanāya tattakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4443: yāḥ sattvakoṭyo hi śruṇitva dharmaṃ utpādayiṃsū varabodhicittam //
T01bsu036_u:4444: etādṛśaṃ karma kṛtaṃ maharṣiṇā prakāśayantenima buddhabodhim /
T01bsu036_u:4445: anantakaṃ yasya pramāṇu nāsti ākāśadhātū ca yathāprameyaḥ // Saddhp_16.8
T01bsu036_u:4446: māndāravāṇāṃ ca pravarṣi varṣaṃ bahudevaputrāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4447: śakrāśca brahmā yathā gaṅgavālikā ye āgatā kṣetrasahasrakoṭibhiḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4448: sugandhacūrṇāni ca candanasya agarusya cūrṇāni ca muñcamānāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4449: caranti ākāśi yathaiva pakṣī abhyokirantā vidhivajjinendrān //
T01bsu036_u:4450: upariṃ ca vaihāyasu dundubhīyo ninādayanto madhurā aghaṭṭitāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4451: divyāna dūṣyāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ kṣipanti bhrāmenti ca nāyakānām //
T01bsu036_u:4453: svayaṃ samantena viceru tatra pūjārtha lokādhipatisya tāyinaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4455: dhārantime paṇḍita bodhisattvāḥ avataṃsakān yāvat brahmalokāt //
T01bsu036_u:4459: etādṛśāścaryaviśiṣṭa adbhutā vicitra dṛśyantimi adya nāyakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4460: āyuṣpramāṇasya nidarśanena prāmodyalabdhā imi sarvasattvāḥ // Saddhp_16.15
T01bsu036_u:4461: vipulo 'dya artho daśasū diśāsu ghoṣaśca abhyudgatu nāyakānām /
T01bsu036_u:4463: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma -
T01bsu036_u:4466: kiyatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasavantīti tacchṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
T01bsu036_u:4468: tadyathāpi nāma ajitakaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pañcasu pāramitāsvaṣṭau kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi caret |
T01bsu036_u:4469: tadyathā dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ virahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā, yena ca ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ekacittotpādikāpyadhimuktirutpāditā abhiśraddadhānatā vā kṛtā, asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalābhisaṃskārasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ
T01bsu036_u:4471: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīnayutasahasratamīmapi koṭīnayutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti,
T01bsu036_u:4472: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamate |
T01bsu036_u:4473: evaṃrūpeṇa ajita puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate ||
T01bsu036_u:4474: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4478: dānaṃ dadanto buddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_16.18 //
T01bsu036_u:4489: dhṛtimān smṛtimāṃścaiva paribhāṣāḥ kṣame bahūḥ // Saddhp_16.23 //
T01bsu036_u:4491: kutsanaṃ ca sahetteṣāṃ buddhajñānasya kāraṇāt // Saddhp_16.24 //
T01bsu036_u:4495: styānamiddhaṃ ca varjitvā kalpakoṭyo hi yaścaret // Saddhp_16.26 //
T01bsu036_u:4498: tena dhyānena so vīraḥ prārthayed bodhimuttamām /
T01bsu036_u:4499: ahaṃ syāmiti sarvajño dhyānapāramitāṃ gataḥ // Saddhp_16.28 //
T01bsu036_u:4500: yacca puṇyaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ niṣevitvā imāṃ kriyām /
T01bsu036_u:4502: āyuṃ ca mama yo śrutvā strī vāpi puruṣo 'pi vā /
T01bsu036_u:4503: ekakṣaṇaṃ pi śraddhāti idaṃ puṇyamanantakam // Saddhp_16.30 //
T01bsu036_u:4504: vicikitsāṃ ca varjitvā iñjitā manyitāni ca /
T01bsu036_u:4507: na te trasanti śrutvedaṃ mama āyuracintiyam // Saddhp_16.32 //
T01bsu036_u:4516: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ vijānanti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate // Saddhp_16.36 //
T01bsu036_u:4517: punaraparamajita ya imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avataredadhimucyeta avagāheta avabudhyeta, so 'smādaprameyataraṃ
T01bsu036_u:4519: kaḥ punarvādo ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayeta vācayeda dhārayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā pustakagataṃ vā satkuryāt, gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet satkārayedvā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapātakābhistailapradīpairvā ghṛtapradīpairvā gandhatailapradīpairvā, bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyam yadā ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāya śrutvā adhyāśayenādhimucyate,
T01bsu036_u:4520: tadā tasyedamadhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam - yaduta gṛdhrakūṭaparvatagataṃ māṃ dharmaṃ nirdeśayantaṃ drakṣyati bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ śrāvakasaṃghamadhyagatam |
T01bsu036_u:4521: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām |
T01bsu036_u:4522: kūṭāgāraparibhogeṣu ca atra bodhisattvān nivasato drakṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4523: idamajita adhyāśayenādhimuktasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā adhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam
T01bsu036_u:4524: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi, ye tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣepsyanti uttari cābhyanumodayiṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:4526: tatastathāgataṃ soṃ 'sena pariharati ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati
T01bsu036_u:4527: na me tenājita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā stūpāḥ kartavyāḥ, na vihārā kartavyāḥ, na bhikṣusaṃghāya glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāstenānupradeyā bhavanti |
T01bsu036_u:4529: kṛtā me tena ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śarīreṣu śarīrapūjā,
T01bsu036_u:4530: saptaratnamayāśca stūpāḥ kāritāḥ, yāvad brahmalokamuccaistvena anupūrvapariṇāhena sacchatraparigrahāḥ
T01bsu036_u:4531: ghaṇṭāsamudgānuratāḥ, teṣāṃ ca śarīrastūpānāṃ vividhāḥ satkārāḥ kṛtā
T01bsu036_u:4533: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā (Vaidya 202)
T01bsu036_u:4534: prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4537: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ vā |
T01bsu036_u:4538: te ca mama saṃmukhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ, te ca mayā paribhuktā veditavyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4539: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā lekhayedvā, tadanenāhamajitaparyāyeṇa evaṃ vadāmi - na me tena
T01bsu036_u:4541: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena vā prajñayā vā saṃpādayet, bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam |
T01bsu036_u:4542: tadyathāpi nāma ajita ākāśa dhāturaparyantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu dikṣu vidikṣu, evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
T01bsu036_u:4543: puṇyābhisaṃskārān prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyān ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā |
T01bsu036_u:4544: tathāgatacaityasatkārārthaṃ ca abhiyukto bhavet, tathāgataśrāvakāṇāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣeta, bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:4546: kṣāntyā ca saṃpādayet, śīlavāṃśca bhavet, kalyāṇadharmaḥ sukhasaṃvāsaḥ kṣāntaśca bhavet, dāntaśca bhavedanabhyasūyakaśca, apagatakrodhamanaskāro
T01bsu036_u:4547: 'vyāpannamanaskāraḥ smṛtimāṃśca sthāmavāṃśca bhavet, vīryavāṃśca nityābhiyuktaśca bhavet, buddhadharmaparyeṣṭyā dhyāyī ca bhavet,
T01bsu036_u:4550: yasya kasyacidajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpā guṇā bhaveyurye mayā parikīrtitāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:4551: so 'jita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ veditavyaḥ -
T01bsu036_u:4552: bodhimaṇḍasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlaṃ gacchati |
T01bsu036_u:4553: yatra ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tiṣṭhedvā niṣīdedvā caṃkramedvā, tatra ajita tathāgatamuddiśya caityaṃ kartavyam, tathāgatastūpo 'yamiti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sadevakena lokeneti ||
T01bsu036_u:4554: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4555: puṇyaskandho aparyanto varṇito me punaḥ punaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4556: ya idaṃ dhārayetsūtraṃ nirvṛte naranāyake // Saddhp_16.37 //
T01bsu036_u:4565: kṛtā vādyaiśca vastraiśca dundubhībhiḥ punaḥ puna // Saddhp_16.41 //
T01bsu036_u:4566: madhurā vādyabhāṇḍā ca vāditā teṣu dhātuṣu /
T01bsu036_u:4568: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāli ca deśayet /
T01bsu036_u:4569: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā pūjanantikā // Saddhp_16.43 //
T01bsu036_u:4573: praveṇī praṇīta prajñaptā āvāsāśca sahasraśaḥ // Saddhp_16.45 //
T01bsu036_u:4576: saṃghasya vividhā pūjā kṛtā me tena saṃmukham /
T01bsu036_u:4577: ya idaṃ dhārayetsūtraṃ nirvṛtasmin vināyake // Saddhp_16.47 //
T01bsu036_u:4578: adhimuktisāro yo syādato bahutaraṃ hi saḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4579: puṇyaṃ labheta yo etatsūtraṃ vācellikheta vā // Saddhp_16.48 //
T01bsu036_u:4582: dīpaṃ ca dadyādyo nityaṃ gandhatailasya pūritam /
T01bsu036_u:4584: kuryādetādṛśīṃ pūjāṃ pustakeṣu ca yo naraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4585: bahu prasavate puṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya no bhavet // Saddhp_16.51 //
T01bsu036_u:4588: kaḥ punarvādo yaśca syāt kṣānto dāntaḥ samāhitaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4592: bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇato nityaṃ nādhimānī na cālasaḥ // Saddhp_16.54 //
T01bsu036_u:4593: prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati /
T01bsu036_u:4594: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu // Saddhp_16.55 //
T01bsu036_u:4595: ya īdṛśo bhavetkaścid yaḥ sūtraṃ dhārayedidam /
T01bsu036_u:4598: dhārayantamidaṃ sūtraṃ kuryādvai tasya satkriyām // Saddhp_16.57 //
T01bsu036_u:4600: mūrdhena vanditva ca tasya pādau tathāgato 'yaṃ janayeta saṃjñām //
T01bsu036_u:4601: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ cintayi tasmi kāle gamiṣyate eṣa drumasya mūlam /
T01bsu036_u:4602: budhyiṣyate bodhimanuttarāṃ śivāṃ hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
T01bsu036_u:4603: yasmiṃśca so caṃkrami tādṛśo viduḥ tiṣṭheta vā yatra niṣīdayedvā /
T01bsu036_u:4604: śayyāṃ ca kalpeya kahiṃci dhīro bhāṣantu gāthāṃ pi tu ekasūtrāt //
T01bsu036_u:4606: uddiśya buddhaṃ bhagavanta nāyakaṃ pūjāṃ ca citrāṃ tahi kārayettathā //
T01bsu036_u:4607: mayā sa bhuktaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo mayā svayaṃ caṃkramitaṃ ca tatraṃ /
T01bsu036_u:4608: tatropaviṣṭo ahameva ca syāṃ yatra sthitaḥ so bhavi buddhaputraḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4609: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:4612: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā anumodet kulaputro vā
T01bsu036_u:4613: kuladuhitā vā, kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavediti?
T01bsu036_u:4614: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4616: śrutvā cābhyanumodeyā kiyantaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavet // Saddhp_17.1 //
T01bsu036_u:4617: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścidajita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ
T01bsu036_u:4618: dharmaparyāya deśyamānaṃ saṃprakāśyamānaṃ śṛṇuyād bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā vijñapuruṣo vā kumārako vā, kumārikā vā, śrutvā ca abhyanumodeta, sacettato dharmaśravaṇādutthāya prakrāmet, sa ca vihāragato
T01bsu036_u:4619: vā gṛhagato vā araṇyagato vā vīthīgato vā grāmagato vā janapadagato vā tān hetūṃstāni kāraṇāni taṃ dharmaṃ yathāśrutaṃ yathodgṛhītaṃ yathābalamaparasya sattvasyācakṣīta māturvā piturvā jñātervā, saṃmoditasya vā anyasya vā saṃstutasya kasyacit, so 'pi yadi śrutvā anumodeta, anumodya ca punaranyasmai ācakṣīta |
T01bsu036_u:4620: so 'pi yadi śrutvānumodeta, anumodya ca so
T01bsu036_u:4623: atha khalvajita yo 'sau pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣo bhavet paraṃparāśravānumodakaḥ, tasyāpi tāvadahamajita kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhinirdekṣyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:4625: śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru |
T01bsu036_u:4627: tadyathāpi nāma ajita caturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu ye sattvāḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānāḥ ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ, aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñino vā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā
T01bsu036_u:4628: vā yāvadeva sattvāḥ sattvadhātau saṃgrahasamavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti |
T01bsu036_u:4629: atha kaścideva puruṣaḥ samutpadyeta puṇyakāmo hitakāmastasya sattvakāyasya sarvakāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāniṣṭān kāntān priyān manāpān dadyāt |
T01bsu036_u:4630: ekaikasya sattvasya jambudvīpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ dadyāt kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāya,
T01bsu036_u:4632: anena paryāyeṇa ajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ paripūrṇānyaśītiṃ varṣāṇi dānaṃ dadyāt
T01bsu036_u:4633: atha khalvajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirevaṃ cintayet - ime khalu sattvāḥ sarve mayā krīḍāpitā ramāpitāḥ sukhaṃ jivāpitāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4634: ime ca te bhavantaḥ sattvā balinaḥ palitaśiraso jīrṇavṛddhā mahallakā (Vaidya 206)
T01bsu036_u:4638: atha khalvajita sa puruṣastān sarvasattvān samādāpayet |
T01bsu036_u:4640: tasya te sattvāstaṃ ca dharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4641: śrutvā ca ekakṣaṇena ekamuhūrtena ekalavena sarve srotaāpannāḥ syuḥ, sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino
T01bsu036_u:4644: tatkiṃ manyase ajita api nu sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatistatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ
T01bsu036_u:4645: prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam? evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan, evametat sugata |
T01bsu036_u:4646: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirbahu puṇyaṃ prasavet, yastāvatāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ dadyāt |
T01bsu036_u:4648: evamukte bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ārocayāmi te ajita, prativedayāmi
T01bsu036_u:4649: yaśca sa dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ puruṣaścaturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ paripūrya arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyaṃ prasavet, yaśca pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣaḥ paraṃparāśravānugataḥ śravaṇena ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodeta |
T01bsu036_u:4650: yaccaitasya puruṣasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, yacca tasya puruṣasya
T01bsu036_u:4654: puruṣaḥ pañcāśattamaḥ, tataḥ puruṣaparaṃparāta ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodet |
T01bsu036_u:4655: asya anumodanāsahagatasya ajita puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārasya anumodanāsahagatasya agrataḥasau paurviko dānasahagataśca arhattvapratiṣṭhāpanāsahagataśca puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti, sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti |
T01bsu036_u:4656: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniḥadamapi na kḥamate |
T01bsu036_u:4658: puruḥa ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi ekapadamapi anumodya ca puṇyaṃ prasavati |
T01bsu036_u:4659: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita yo 'yaṃ mama saṃmukhamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt, śrutvā cābhyanumodet, aprameyataramasaṃkhyayetaraṃ tasyāhamajita taṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ vadāmi ||
T01bsu036_u:4660: yaḥ khalu punarajita asya dharmaparyāyasya śravāṇārthaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svagṛhānniṣkramya vihāraṃ gacchet |
T01bsu036_u:4661: sa ca gattvā tasminnimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtakamapi śṛṇuyāt sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā |
T01bsu036_u:4662: sa sattvastanmātreṇa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa kṛtenopacitena jātivinivṛtto dvitīye samucchraye dvitīye ātmabhāvapratilambhe gorathānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati,
T01bsu036_u:4663: aśvarathānāṃ hastirathānāṃ śibikānāṃ goyanānāmṛṣabhayānānāṃ divyānāṃ ca vimānānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:4664: sacet punastatra dharmaśravaṇe muhūrtamātramapi niṣadya idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt, (Vaidya 207) paraṃ vā niṣādayet, āsanasaṃvibhāgaṃ vā kuryādaparasya sattvasya, tena sa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa lābhī bhaviṣyati śakrāsanānāṃ brahmāsanānāṃ cakravartisaṃhāsanānām |
T01bsu036_u:4665: sacet punarajita kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aparaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa |
T01bsu036_u:4667: sa ca puruṣastasya tāṃ protsāhanāmāgamya yadi muhūrtamātramapi śṛṇuyāt, sa sattvastena protsāhena
T01bsu036_u:4670: na tasya jātiśatasahasrairapi pūti mukhaṃ bhavati na durgandhi |
T01bsu036_u:4671: nāpyasya jihvārogo bhavati, na mukharogo bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:4672: na ca śyāmadanto bhavati, na viṣamadanto bhavati, na pītadanto bhavati, na duḥsaṃsthitadanto
T01bsu036_u:4673: khaṇḍadanto na patitadanto na vakradanto na lamboṣṭho bhavati,
T01bsu036_u:4674: nābhyantaroṣṭho na prasāritoṣṭho na khaṇḍoṣṭho na vaṅkoṣṭho na kṛṣṇoṣṭho na bībhatsoṣṭho bhavati
T01bsu036_u:4675: na cipīṭanāso bhavati, na vakranāso bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:4676: na dīrghamukho bhavati, na vaṅkamukho bhavati, na kṛṣṇamukho bhavati,
T01bsu036_u:4678: api tu khalvajita sūkṣmasujātajihvādantoṣṭho bhavati āyatanāsaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4682: kṣipraṃ ca buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate |
T01bsu036_u:4683: paśya ajita ekasattvamapi nāma utsāhayitvā iyat puṇyaṃ prasavati |
T01bsu036_u:4684: kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ satkṛtya śṛṇuyāt, satkṛtya
T01bsu036_u:4686: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4688: anumodayitvā ca prasannacittaḥ śṛṇuṣva puṇyaṃ bhavi yattakaṃ tat //
T01bsu036_u:4689: sa caiva puruṣo bhavi dānadātā sattvān koṭīnayuteṣu nityam /
T01bsu036_u:4690: ye pūrvamaupamyakṛtā mayā vai tān sarvi tarpeya aśīti varṣān //
T01bsu036_u:4691: so dṛṣṭva teṣāṃ ca jarāmupasthitāṃ valī ca khaṇḍaṃ ca śiraśca pāṇḍaram /
T01bsu036_u:4692: hāhādhimucyanti hi sarvasattvā yannūna dharmeṇa hu ovadeyam // Saddhp_17.4
T01bsu036_u:4694: so teṣa dharmaṃ vadatīha paścānnirvāṇabhūmiṃ ca prakāśayeta /
T01bsu036_u:4695: sarve bhavāḥ phenamarīcikalpā nirvidyathā sarvabhaveṣu kṣipram //
T01bsu036_u:4696: te sarvasattvāśca śruṇitva dharmaṃ tasyaiva dātuḥ puruṣasya antikāt /
T01bsu036_u:4697: arhantabhūtā bhavi ekakāle kṣīṇāsravā antimadehadhāriṇaḥ // Saddhp_17.6 //
T01bsu036_u:4698: puṇyaṃ tato bahutaru tasya hi syat paraṃparātaḥ śruṇi ekagāthām /
T01bsu036_u:4699: anumodi vā yattaku tasya puṇyaṃ kala puṇyaskandhaḥ purimo na bhoti //
T01bsu036_u:4700: evaṃ bahu tasya bhaveta puṇyaṃ anantakaṃ yasya pramāṇu nāsti /
T01bsu036_u:4701: gāthāṃ pi śrutvaika paraṃparāya kiṃ vā punaḥ saṃmukha yo śruṇeyā //
T01bsu036_u:4702: yaścaikasattvaṃ pi vadeya tatra protsāhaye gaccha śṛṇuṣva dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:4703: sudurlabhaṃ sutramidaṃ hi bhoti kalpāna koṭīnayutairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_17.9
T01bsu036_u:4704: sa cāpi protsāhitu tena sattvaḥ śruṇeya sūtrema muhūrtakaṃ pi /
T01bsu036_u:4705: tasyāpi dharmasya phalaṃ śṛṇohi mukharoga tasya na kadāci bhoti //
T01bsu036_u:4706: jihvāpi tasya na kadāci duḥkhati na tasya dantā patitā bhavanti /
T01bsu036_u:4707: śyāmātha pītā viṣamā ca jātu bībhatsitoṣṭho na ca jātu bhoti //
T01bsu036_u:4708: kuṭilaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca na jātu dīrghaṃ mukhaṃ na cipiṭaṃ sya kadāci bhoti /
T01bsu036_u:4710: susaṃsthitā nāsa tathā lalāṭaṃ dantā ca oṣṭho mukhamaṇḍalaṃ ca //
T01bsu036_u:4711: priyadarśano bhoti sadā narāṇāṃ pūrtiṃ ca vakraṃ na kadāci bhoti /
T01bsu036_u:4712: yathotpalasyeha sadā sugandhiḥ pravāyate tasya mukhasya gandhaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4713: gṛhādvihāraṃ hi vrajitva dhīro gaccheta sūtraṃ śravaṇāya etat /
T01bsu036_u:4714: gatvā ca so tatra śṛṇe muhūrtaṃ prasannacittasya phalaṃ śṛṇotha //
T01bsu036_u:4715: sugauru tasyo bhavatetmabhāvaḥ pariyāti co aśvarathehi dhīraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4717: vibhūṣitāṃ so śibikāṃ labheta narairanekairiha vāhyamānām /
T01bsu036_u:4718: gatvāpi dharmaṃ śravaṇāya tasya phalaṃ śubhaṃ bhoti ca evarūpam //
T01bsu036_u:4719: niṣadya cāsau pariṣāya tatra śuklena karmeṇa kṛtena tena /
T01bsu036_u:4720: śakrāsanānāṃ bhavate sa lābhī brahmāsanānāṃ ca nṛpāsanānām // Saddhp_17.17
T01bsu036_u:4721: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye anumodanāpuṇyanirdeśaparivarto nāma saptadaśamaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:4724: atha khalu bhagavān satatasamitābhiyuktaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayāmāsa - yaḥ kaścit kulaputra imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati vā deśayiṣyati vā likhiṣyati va, sa kulaputro vā
T01bsu036_u:4725: kuladuhitā va aṣṭau cakṣurguṇaśatāni pratilapsyate, dvādaśa śrotraguṇaśatāni pratilapsyate, aṣṭau ghrāṇaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyate,
T01bsu036_u:4726: dvādaśa jihvāguṇaśatāni pratilapsyate, aṣṭau kāyaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyate,
T01bsu036_u:4729: sa evaṃ pariśuddhena cakṣurindriyeṇa prākṛtena māṃsacakṣuṣā mātāpitṛsaṃbhavena trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ sāntarbahiḥ saśailavanaṣaṇḍāmadho yāvadavīcimahānirayamupādāya upari ca yāvat bhavāgraṃ tat sarvaṃ drakṣyati
T01bsu036_u:4731: ye ca tasmin sattvā upapannāḥ, tān sarvān drakṣyati, karmavipākaṃ ca teṣāṃ jñāsyatīti ||
T01bsu036_u:4732: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4733: ya imaṃ sūtra bhāṣeta parṣāsu ca viśāradaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4734: anolīnaḥ prakāśeyā guṇāṃstasya śṛṇuṣva me // Saddhp_18.1 //
T01bsu036_u:4736: yenāsya vimalaṃ bhoti śuddhaṃ cakṣuranāvilam // Saddhp_18.2 //
T01bsu036_u:4739: meruṃ sumeru sarvā ca cakravālā sa paśyati /
T01bsu036_u:4740: ye cānye parvatāḥ khaṇḍāḥ samudrāṃścāpi paśyati // Saddhp_18.4 //
T01bsu036_u:4742: sarvaṃ sa paśyate dhīro māṃsacakṣusya īdṛśam // Saddhp_18.5 //
T01bsu036_u:4743: na tāva divyacakṣu sya bhoti no cāpi jāyate /
T01bsu036_u:4745: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ pareṣāṃ ca saṃśrāvayamānastairdvādaśabhiḥ śrotraguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau vividhāḥ śabdā niścaranti yāvadavīcirmahānirayo yāvacca bhavāgraṃ
T01bsu036_u:4746: sāntarbahiḥ, tadyathā - hastiśabdā vā aśvaśabdā vā uṣṭraśabdā vā gośabdā vā ajaśabdā vā janapadaśabdā vā rathaśabdā vā ruditaśabdā vā śokaśabdā vā
T01bsu036_u:4747: bhairavaśabdā vā śaṅkhaśabdā vā ghaṇṭāśabdā vā paṭahaśabdā vā bherīśabdā vā krīḍāśabdā vā gītaśabdā vā nṛtyaśabdā vā tūryaśabdā vā vādyaśabdā vā strīśabdā vā puruṣaśabdā vā dārakaśabdā vā (Vaidya 211) dārikāśabdā vā dharmaśabdā vā adharmaśabdā vā sukhaśabdā vā duḥkhaśabdā vā bālaśabdā vā āryaśabdā vā manojñaśabdā vā amanojñaśabdā vā devaśabdā vā nāgaśabdā vā yakṣaśabdā vā rākṣasaśabdā vā gandharvaśabdā vā asuraśabdā vā garuḍaśabdā
T01bsu036_u:4748: vā kinnaraśabdā vā mahoragaśabdā vā manuṣyaśabdā vā amanuṣyaśabdā vā agniśabdā vā vāyuśabdā vā udakaśabdā vā grāmaśabdā vā nagaraśabdā vā bhikṣuśabdā vā śrāvakaśabdā vā pratyekabuddhaśabdā vā bodhisattvaśabdā vā tathāgataśabdā vā, yāvantaḥ kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau
T01bsu036_u:4749: sāntarbahiḥ śabdā niścaranti, tān śabdāṃstena prākṛtena pariśuddhena śrotrendriyeṇa śṛṇoti
T01bsu036_u:4751: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rutānyavabudhyate, vibhāvayati vibhajati tena ca prākṛtena śrotrendriyeṇa
T01bsu036_u:4752: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rutāni śṛṇvatastasya taiḥ sarvaśabdaiḥ śrotrendriyaṃ nābhibhūyate
T01bsu036_u:4753: evaṃrūpaḥ satatasamitābhiyukta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyapratilambho bhavati, na ca tāvaddivyaṃ śrotramabhinirharati ||
T01bsu036_u:4756: śrotrendriyaṃ tasya viśuddhu bhoti anāvilaṃ prākṛtakaṃ ca tāvat /
T01bsu036_u:4757: vividhān hi yeneha śṛṇoti śabdāniha lokadhātau hi aśeṣato 'yam //
T01bsu036_u:4758: hastīna aśvāna śṛṇoti śabdān rathāna goṇāna ajaiḍakānām /
T01bsu036_u:4759: bherīmṛdaṅgāna sughoṣakānāṃ vīṇāna veṇūnatha vallakīnām // Saddhp_18.8 //
T01bsu036_u:4760: gītaṃ manojñaṃ madhuraṃ śṛṇoti na cāpi so sajjati tatra dhīraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4761: manuṣyakoṭīna śṛṇoti śabdān bhāṣanti yaṃ yaṃ ca yahiṃ yahiṃ te //
T01bsu036_u:4762: devāna co nitya śṛṇoti śabdān gītasvaraṃ ca madhuraṃ manojñam /
T01bsu036_u:4763: puruṣāṇa istrīṇa rutāni cāpi tatha dārakāṇāmatha dārikāṇām // Saddhp_18.10
T01bsu036_u:4764: ye parvateṣveva guhānivāsī kalaviṅkakā kokila barhiṇaśca /
T01bsu036_u:4766: pakṣīṇa ye jīvakajīvakā hi teṣāṃ ca valgū śṛṇute hi śabdān // Saddhp_18.11
T01bsu036_u:4767: narakeṣu ye vedana vedayanti sudāruṇāṃścāpi karonti śabdān /
T01bsu036_u:4768: āhāraduḥkhairavapīḍitānāṃ yān preta kurvanti tathaiva śabdān //
T01bsu036_u:4769: asurāśca ye sāgaramadhyavāsino muñcanti ghoṣāṃstatha cānyamanyān /
T01bsu036_u:4770: sarvānihastho sa hi dharmabhāṇakaḥ śṛṇoti śabdānna ca ostarīyati //
T01bsu036_u:4771: tiryāṇa yonīṣu rutāni yāni anyonyasaṃbhāṣaṇatāṃ karonti /
T01bsu036_u:4772: iha sthitastānapi so śṛṇoti vividhāni śabdāni bahūvidhāni // Saddhp_18.14
T01bsu036_u:4773: ye brahmaloke nivasanti devā akaniṣṭha ābhāsvara ye ca devāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4774: ye cānyamanyasya karonti ghoṣān śṛṇoti tatsarvamaśeṣato 'sau //
T01bsu036_u:4775: svādhyāya kurvantiha ye ca bhikṣavaḥ sugatāniha śāsani pravrajitvā /
T01bsu036_u:4776: parṣāsu ye deśayate ca dharmaṃ teṣāṃ pi śabdaṃ śṛṇute sa nityam //
T01bsu036_u:4777: ye bodhisattvāściha lokadhātau svādhyāya kurvanti paraspareṇa /
T01bsu036_u:4778: saṃgīti dharmeṣu ca ye karonti śṛṇoti śabdān vividhāṃśca teṣām //
T01bsu036_u:4779: bhagavān pi buddho naradamyasārathiḥ parṣāsu dharmaṃ bruvate yamagram /
T01bsu036_u:4780: taṃ cāpi so śṛṇvanti ekakāle yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet //
T01bsu036_u:4782: sarve trisāhasri imasmi kṣetre ye sattva kurvanti bahūṃ pi śabdān /
T01bsu036_u:4783: abhyantareṇāpi ca bāhireṇa avīciparyanta bhavāgramūrdhvam // Saddhp_18.19
T01bsu036_u:4784: sarveṣa sattvāna śṛṇoti śabdān naṃ cāpi kṣetraṃ uparudhyate 'sya /
T01bsu036_u:4785: paṭvindriyo jānati sthānasthānaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ prākṛtakaṃ hi tāvat //
T01bsu036_u:4786: na ca tāva divyasmi karoti yatnaṃ prakṛtya saṃtiṣṭhati śrotrametat /
T01bsu036_u:4787: sūtraṃ hi yo dhārayate viśārado guṇā sya etādṛśakā bhavanti //
T01bsu036_u:4788: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayataḥ prakāśayataḥ svādhyāyato likhato 'ṣṭābhirguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:4789: sa tena pariśuddhena ghrāṇendriyeṇa ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sāntarbahirvividhagandhāḥ saṃvidyante, tadyathā - pūtigandhā vā manojñagandhā vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ sumanasāṃ gandhāḥ, tadyathā -
T01bsu036_u:4791: jalajānāmapi puṣpāṇāṃ vividhān gandhān ghrāyati, tadyathā -
T01bsu036_u:4802: bhūtān gandhān vandati, na ca tairgandhaiḥ saṃhriyate, na saṃmuhyati |
T01bsu036_u:4803: sa ihasthita eva devānāmapi gandhān ghrāyati, tadyathā - pārijātakasya kovidārasya māndāravamahāmāndāravamañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakānāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati |
T01bsu036_u:4805: divyānāṃ ca nānāvidhānāṃ puṣpavikṛtiśatasahasrāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati, nāmāni caiṣāṃ saṃjānīte
T01bsu036_u:4806: devaputrātmabhāvagandhān ghrāyati, tadyathā - śakrasya devānāmindrasya ātmabhāvagandhaṃ ghrāyati
T01bsu036_u:4807: taṃ ca jānīte yadi vā vaijayante prāsāde krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantaṃ yadi vā sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ yadi vā udyānabhūmau niryāntaṃ krīḍanāya |
T01bsu036_u:4814: anena paryāyeṇa yāvad bhavāgropapannānāmapi sattvānāmātmabhāvagandhān ghrāyati |
T01bsu036_u:4819: yasmiṃśca sthāne te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā viharanti, tacca prajānāti |
T01bsu036_u:4820: na cāsya tad ghrāṇendiyaṃ taistairvividhairgandhaiḥ pratihanyate, nopahanyate, na saṃpīḍyate
T01bsu036_u:4823: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4824: ghrāṇendriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti vividhāṃśca gandhān bahu ghrāyate 'sau
T01bsu036_u:4825: ye lokadhātau hi imasmi sarve sugandha durgandha bhavanti kecit //
T01bsu036_u:4826: jātīya gandho atha mallikāyā tamālapatrasya ca candanasya /
T01bsu036_u:4827: tagarasya gandho agarusya cāpi vividhāna puṣpāṇa phalāna cāpi //
T01bsu036_u:4828: sattvāna gandhān pi tathaiva jānati narāṇa nārīṇa ca dūrataḥ sthitaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4829: kumārakāṇāṃ ca kumārikāṇāṃ gandhena so jānati teṣa sthānam // Saddhp_18.24
T01bsu036_u:4830: rājñāṃ pi so jānati cakravartināṃ balacakravartīnatha maṇḍalīnām /
T01bsu036_u:4831: kumārakāmātya tathaiva teṣāṃ gandhena cāntaḥpura sarva jānati //
T01bsu036_u:4832: paribhogaratnāni bahūvidhāni kupyāni bhūmau nihitāni yāni /
T01bsu036_u:4833: strīratnabhūtāni bhavanti yāpi gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4835: teṣāṃ ca yā ābharaṇā bhavanti kāyasmi āmukta vicitrarūpā /
T01bsu036_u:4836: vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4837: sthitāṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ śayitāṃ tathaiva krīḍāratiṃ ṛddhibalaṃ ca sarvam /
T01bsu036_u:4838: so jānatī ghrāṇabalena dhīro yo dhārayet sūtramidaṃ variṣṭham //
T01bsu036_u:4839: sugandhatailāna tathaiva gandhān nānāvidhān puṣpaphalāna gandhān /
T01bsu036_u:4840: sakṛtasthito jānati ghrāyate ca amukasmi deśasmi imasmi gandhān //
T01bsu036_u:4841: ye parvatānāṃ vivarāntareṣu bahu candanā puṣpita tatra santi /
T01bsu036_u:4842: ye cāpi tasminnivasanti sattvāḥ sarveṣa gandhena vidurvijānati //
T01bsu036_u:4843: ye cakravālasya bhavanti pārśve ye sāgarasyo nivasanti madhye /
T01bsu036_u:4844: pṛthivīya ye madhyi vasanti sattvāḥ sarvān sa gandhena vidurvijānati //
T01bsu036_u:4845: surāṃśca jānāti tathāsurāṃśca asurāṇa kanyāśca vijānate 'sau /
T01bsu036_u:4846: asurāṇa krīḍāśca ratiṃ ca jānati ghrāṇasya tasyedṛśakaṃ balaṃ hi //
T01bsu036_u:4847: aṭavīṣu ye keci catuṣpadāsti siṃhāśca vyāghrāstatha hastināgāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4848: mahiṣā gavā ye gavayaśca tatra ghrāṇena so jānati teṣa vāsam //
T01bsu036_u:4849: striyaśca yā gurviṇikā bhavanti kumārakāṃ vāpi kumārikāṃ vā /
T01bsu036_u:4850: dhārenti kukṣau hi kilāntakāyā gandhena so jānati yaṃ tahiṃ syāt //
T01bsu036_u:4852: āpannasattvāṃ pi vijānate 'sau vināśadharmāṃ pi vijānate 'sau /
T01bsu036_u:4853: iyaṃ pi nārī vyapanītaduḥkhā prasaviṣyate puṇyamayaṃ kumāram //
T01bsu036_u:4854: puruṣāṇa abhiprāyu bahuṃ vijānate abhiprāyagandhaṃ ca tathaiva ghrāyate /
T01bsu036_u:4855: raktāna duṣṭāna tathaiva mrakṣiṇāṃ upaśāntacittāna ca gandha ghrāyate //
T01bsu036_u:4856: pṛthivīya ye cāpi nidhāna santi ghanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyam /
T01bsu036_u:4857: mañjūṣa lohī ca tathā supūrṇā gandhena so ghrāyati bodhisattvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4858: hārārdhahārān maṇimuktikāśca anarghaprāptā vividhā ca ratnā /
T01bsu036_u:4859: gandhena so jānati tāni sarvā anarghanāmaṃ dyutisaṃsthitaṃ ca //
T01bsu036_u:4860: upariṃ ca deveṣu tathaiva puṣpā mandāravāṃścaiva mañjūṣakāṃśca /
T01bsu036_u:4861: yā pārijātasya ca santi puṣpā iha sthito ghrāyati tā sa dhīraḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4862: vimāna ye yādṛśakāśca yasya udāra hīnāstatha madhyamāśca /
T01bsu036_u:4863: vicitrarūpāśca bhavanti yatra iha sthito ghrāṇabalena ghrāyati //
T01bsu036_u:4864: udyānabhūmiṃ ca tathā prajānate sudharma devāsani vaijayante /
T01bsu036_u:4865: prāsādaśreṣṭhe ca tathā vijānate ye co ramante tahi devaputrāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4866: iha sthito ghrāyati gandhu teṣāṃ gandhena so jānati devaputrān /
T01bsu036_u:4868: yo yatra karmā kurute sthito vā śete vā gacchati yatra vāpi //
T01bsu036_u:4870: ramanti gacchanti ca yatra yatra gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4871: yāvadbhavāgrādupariṃ ca devā brahmā mahābrahma vimānacāriṇaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4872: tāṃścāpi gandhena tahiṃ prajānate sthitāṃśca dhyāne atha vyutthitān vā //
T01bsu036_u:4874: ghrāṇendriyaṃ īdṛśa tasya bhoti yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet //
T01bsu036_u:4875: ya keci bhikṣū sugatasya śāsane abhiyuktarūpā sthita cakrameṣu /
T01bsu036_u:4876: uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca bhikṣavo sarvān hi so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4877: ye śrāvakā bhonti jinasya putrā viharanti kecit sada vṛkṣamūle /
T01bsu036_u:4878: gandhena sarvān vidu jānate tān amutra bhikṣū amuko sthito ti //
T01bsu036_u:4879: ye bodhisattvāḥ smṛtimanta dhyāyino uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca ye sadā /
T01bsu036_u:4880: parṣāsu dharmaṃ ca prakāśayanti gandhena tān jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4881: yasyāṃ diśāyāṃ sugato mahāmunirdharmaṃ prakāśeti hitānukampakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4882: puraskṛtaḥ śrāvakasaṃghamadhye gandhena so jānati lokanātham //
T01bsu036_u:4884: ye cāpi sattvā sya śṛṇoti dharmaṃ śrutvā ca ye prītamanā bhavanti /
T01bsu036_u:4885: iha sthito jānati bodhisattvo jinasya parṣāmapui tatra sarvām //
T01bsu036_u:4886: etādṛśaṃ ghrāṇabalaṃ sya bhoti na ca tāva divyaṃ bhavate sya ghrāṇam /
T01bsu036_u:4887: pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya tu eta bhoti divyasya ghrāṇasya anāsravasya //
T01bsu036_u:4888: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayamāṇo deśayamānaḥ prakāśayamāno likhamānastairdvādaśabhirjihvāguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataṃ jihvendriyaṃ pratilapsyate |
T01bsu036_u:4889: sa tathārūpeṇa jihvendriyeṇa yān yān rasānāsvādayati, yān yān rasān jihvendriye upanikṣepsati, sarve te divyaṃ mahārasaṃ mokṣyante |
T01bsu036_u:4890: tathā ca āsvādayiṣyati yathā na kaṃcid rasamamanaāpamāsvādayiṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4892: 'pi amanaāpā rasāste 'pi tasya jihvendriye samupanikṣiptāḥ divyaṃ rasaṃ mokṣyante |
T01bsu036_u:4893: yaṃ ca dharmaṃ vyāhariṣyati parṣanmadhyagataḥ, tena tasya te
T01bsu036_u:4894: sattvāḥ prīṇitendriyā bhaviṣyanti tuṣṭāḥ paramatuṣṭāḥ prāmodyajātāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4895: madhuraścāsya valgumanojñasvaro gambhīro niścariṣyati hṛdayaṃgamaḥ premaṇīyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:4897: yeṣāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, te cāsya madhuranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā valgumanojñaṃ devā
T01bsu036_u:4898: apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravanāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4899: devaputrā api devakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4900: śakrā api brahmāṇo 'pi brahmakāyikā api devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4901: nāgā nāgakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4902: asurā asurakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4903: garūḍā garūḍakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4904: kinnarāḥ kinnarakanyā api, mahoragā mahoragakanyā api, yakṣā yakṣakanyā api, piśācāḥ piśācakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
T01bsu036_u:4905: te cāsya satkāraṃ kariṣyanti, gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kariṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:4908: rājaputrā api rājāmātyā api rājamahāmātrā api darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:4909: balacakravartino 'pi rājānaḥ, cakravartino 'pi saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ sakumārāḥ sāmātyāḥ sāntaḥpuraparivārā darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:4911: tāvanmadhuraṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyate yathābhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ tathāgatena |
T01bsu036_u:4912: anye 'pi brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo naigamajānapadāstasya dharmabhāṇakasya (Vaidya 219) satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti yāvadāyuṣparyavasānam |
T01bsu036_u:4916: yasyāṃ ca diśi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vihariṣyati, tasyāṃ diśi tathāgatābhimukhaṃ
T01bsu036_u:4917: dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca bhājanabhūto bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4919: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4920: jihvendriyaṃ tasya viśiṣṭu bhoti na jātu hīnaṃ rasa svādayeta /
T01bsu036_u:4921: nikṣiptamātrāśca bhavanti divyā rasena divyena samanvitāśca //
T01bsu036_u:4922: valgusvarāṃ madhura prabhāṣate girāṃ śravaṇīyamiṣṭāṃ ca manoramāṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:4923: parṣāya madhyasmi ha premaṇīyaṃ gambhīraghoṣaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate //
T01bsu036_u:4925: prāmodya tatrāpi janeti so 'graṃ pūjāṃ ca tasya kurute 'prameyām //
T01bsu036_u:4926: devā pi nāgāsuraguhyakāśca draṣṭuṃ tamicchanti ca nityakālam /
T01bsu036_u:4927: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ ca sagauravāśca ime guṇāstasya bhavanti sarve //
T01bsu036_u:4929: snigdhaḥ svaro 'sya madhuraśca bhoti gambhīra valguśca supremaṇīyaḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4931: saputradārā kariyāṇa añjaliṃ śṛṇvanti dharmasya ca nityakālam //
T01bsu036_u:4933: yakṣāṇa co bhoti sadā puraskṛto nāgāna gandharvagaṇāna caiva /
T01bsu036_u:4934: piśācakānāṃ ca piśācikānāṃ susatkṛto mānitu pūjitaśca // Saddhp_18.58 //
T01bsu036_u:4935: brahmāpi tasya vaśavarti bhoti maheśvaro īśvara devaputraḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4937: buddhāśca ye lokahitānukampakāḥ saśrāvakāstasya niśāmya ghoṣam /
T01bsu036_u:4938: karonti rakṣāṃ mukhadarśanāya tuṣṭāśca bhonti bruvato 'sya dharmam //
T01bsu036_u:4939: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayamāṇo vā vācayamāno vā prakāśayamāno vā deśayamāno vā likhamāno vā aṣṭau kāyaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyati tasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśuddho vaiḍūryapariśuddhacchavivarṇo bhaviṣyati, priyadarśanaḥ sattvānām
T01bsu036_u:4940: sa tasminnātmabhāve pariśuddhe sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ drakṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4941: ye ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāścyavanti upapadyante ca, hīnāḥ praṇītāśca, suvarṇā
T01bsu036_u:4942: durvarṇāḥ, sugatau durgatau, ye ca cakravālamahācakravāleṣu merusumeruṣu ca parvatarājeṣu sattvāḥ prativasanti, ye ca adhastādavīcyāmūrdhvaṃ ca yāvad bhavāgraṃ sattvāḥ prativasanti, tān sarvān sva ātmabhāve drakṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4943: ye cāpi kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātrau śrāvakā vā pratyekabuddhā vā bodhisattvā vā tathāgatā vā prativasanti, yaṃ ca te
T01bsu036_u:4944: tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayanti, ye ca sattvāstāṃstathāgatān paryupāsante,
T01bsu036_u:4945: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāmātmabhāvapratilambhān sva ātmabhāve drakṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4947: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4948: pariśuddha tasyo bhavatetmabhāvo yathāpi vaiḍūryamayo viśuddhaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4949: sattvāna nityaṃ priyadarśanaśca yaḥ sūtra dhāreti idaṃ udāram //
T01bsu036_u:4950: ādarśapṛṣṭhe yatha vimbu paśyet loko 'sya kāye ayu dṛśyate tathā /
T01bsu036_u:4952: svayaṃbhu so paśyati nānyi sattvāḥ pariśuddhi kāyasmi ima evarūpā //
T01bsu036_u:4953: ye lokadhātau hi ihāsti sattvā manuṣya devāsura guhyakā vā /
T01bsu036_u:4954: narakeṣu preteṣu tiraścayoniṣu pratibimbu saṃdṛśyati tatra kāye //
T01bsu036_u:4955: vimāna devāna bhavāgra yāvacchailaṃ pi co parvatacakravālam /
T01bsu036_u:4956: himavān sumeruśca mahāṃśca meruḥ kāyasmi dṛśyantimi sarvathaiva //
T01bsu036_u:4957: buddhān pi so paśyati ātmabhāve saśrāvakān buddhasutāṃstathānyān /
T01bsu036_u:4958: ye bodhisattvā viharanti caikakā gaṇe ca ye dharma prakāśayanti //
T01bsu036_u:4959: etādṛśī kāyaviśuddhi tasya yahi dṛśyate sarviya lokadhātuḥ /
T01bsu036_u:4960: na ca tāva so divya na prāpuṇoti prakṛtīya kāyasyiyamīdṛśī bhavet //
T01bsu036_u:4961: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgate parinirvṛte imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayato deśayataḥ saṃprakāśayato likhato vācayatastairdvādaśabhirmanaskāraguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataṃ manaindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4962: sa tena pariśuddhena manaindriyeṇa yadyekagāthāmapyantaśaḥ śroṣyati, tasya bahvarthamājñāsyati sa tāvamabudhya tannidānaṃ māsamapi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, caturmāsamapi saṃvatsaramapi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:4965: ye kecillaukikā lokavyavahārā bhāṣyāṇi vā mantrā vā, sarvāṃstān dharmanayena saṃsyandayiṣyati
T01bsu036_u:4966: yāvantaśca kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ sattvāḥ
T01bsu036_u:4967: saṃsaranti, sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni jñāsyati |
T01bsu036_u:4969: apratilabdhe ca tāvadāryajñāne evaṃrūpaṃ cāsya manaindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati || yāṃ yāṃ ca dharmaniruktimanuvicintya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, sarvaṃ tad bhūtaṃ
T01bsu036_u:4973: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:4974: manaindriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti prabhāsvaraṃ śuddhamanāvilaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:4975: so tena dharmān vividhān prajānati hīnānathotkṛṣṭa tathaiva madhyamān //
T01bsu036_u:4976: ekāmapi gātha śruṇitva dhīro artha bahuṃ jānati tasya tatra /
T01bsu036_u:4977: samitaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate māsān pi catvāri tathāpi varṣam //
T01bsu036_u:4978: ye cāpi sattvā iha lokadhātau abhyantare bāhiri ye vasanti /
T01bsu036_u:4979: devā manuṣyāsuraguhyakāśca nāgāśca ye cāpi tiraścayoniṣu // Saddhp_18.69
T01bsu036_u:4980: ṣaṭsu gatīṣu nivasanti sattvā vicintitaṃ teṣa bhaveta yaṃ ca /
T01bsu036_u:4981: ekakṣaṇe sarvi vidurvijānate dhāretva sūtraṃ ima ānuśaṃsāḥ // Saddhp_18.70
T01bsu036_u:4982: yaṃ cāpi buddhaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇo dharmaṃ prakāśedida sarvaloke /
T01bsu036_u:4983: tasyāpi śabdaṃ śṛṇute viśuddhaṃ yaṃ cāpi so bhāṣati gṛhyate tat //
T01bsu036_u:4984: bahūn vicinteti ca agradharmān bahūṃśca so bhāṣati nityakālam /
T01bsu036_u:4985: na cāsya saṃmoha kadāci bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
T01bsu036_u:4986: saṃdhiṃ visaṃdhiṃ ca vijānate 'sau sarveṣu dharmeṣu vilakṣaṇāni /
T01bsu036_u:4987: prajānate artha niruktayaśca yathā ca taṃ jānati bhāṣate tathā //
T01bsu036_u:4989: yaṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhotiha dīrgharātraṃ pūrvehi lokācariyehi sūtram /
T01bsu036_u:4990: taṃ dharma so bhāṣati nityakālaṃ asaṃtrasanto pariṣāya madhye //
T01bsu036_u:4991: manaindriyaṃ īdṛśamasya bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imu vācayitvā /
T01bsu036_u:4992: na ca tāva asaṅgaṃ labhate ha jñānaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya imaṃ tu bhoti //
T01bsu036_u:4993: ācāryabhūmau hi sthitaśca bhoti sarveṣa sattvāna katheya dharmam /
T01bsu036_u:4994: niruktikoṭīkuśalaśca bhoti imu dhārayanto sugatasya sutram // Saddhp_18.76
T01bsu036_u:4998: atha khalu bhagavān mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - anenāpi tāvanmahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - yathā ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti, evaṃrūpāṃśca sūtrāntadhārakāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā ākrośiṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:4999: paribhāṣiṣyanti, asatyayā paruṣayā vācā samudācariṣyanti, teṣāmevamaniṣṭo vipāko bhaviṣyati, yo na śakyaṃ vācā parikīrtayitum |
T01bsu036_u:5000: ye ca imamaevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
T01bsu036_u:5001: parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, teṣāmevamiṣṭo vipāko bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:5005: kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairaprameyairacintyaistebhyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena samayena bhīṣmagarjitasvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vinirbhoge kalpe mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau |
T01bsu036_u:5007: samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purato dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5008: yadidaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasamatikramāya nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttim |
T01bsu036_u:5009: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya tathāgatajñānadarśanaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5010: tasya khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catvāriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5013: tasyāṃ khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratirūpake ca antarhite aparo 'pi bhīṣmagarjitasvararāja eva tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:5014: samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T01bsu036_u:5015: anayā mahāsthāmaprāpta paraṃparayā tasyāṃ mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhīṣmagarjitasvararājanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan |
