T01bsu036_u:5018: samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān, tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmapratirūpake ca antardhīyamāne tasmin śāsane 'dhimānikabhikṣvadhyākrānte (Vaidya 225)
T01bsu036_u:5020: kena kāraṇena mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāparibhūta ityucyate? sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yameva paśyati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣūṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā, taṃ tamupasaṃkramya eva
T01bsu036_u:5024: hetoḥ? sarve hi bhavanto bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantu |
T01bsu036_u:5025: bhaviṣyatha yūyaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti |
T01bsu036_u:5026: anena mahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhikṣubhūto noddeśaṃ karoti, na svādhyāya karoti, anyatra yaṃ yameva paśyati dūragatamapi, sarvaṃ tamupaṃsakramya evaṃ saṃśrāvayati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā, taṃ tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati - nāhaṃ bhaginyo yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi |
T01bsu036_u:5028: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvā yūyaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradhvam
T01bsu036_u:5030: yaṃ yameva mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā evaṃ saṃśrāvayati, sarve 'sya
T01bsu036_u:5033: bhikṣuraparibhavacittamityasmākamupadarśayati? paribhūtamātmānaṃ karoti yadasmākaṃ vyākarotyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asantamanākāṅkṣitaṃ ca |
T01bsu036_u:5034: atha khalu mahāsthāmaprāpta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni varṣāṇi tathā ākruśyataḥ paribhāṣyamāṇasya gacchanti |
T01bsu036_u:5037: ye cāsya evaṃ saṃśrāvayato loṣṭaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā kṣipanti, sa teṣāṃ dūrata eva uccaiḥsvaraṃ kṛtvā saṃśrāvayati sma - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti |
T01bsu036_u:5038: tasya tābhirabhimānikabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃśrāvyamāṇābhiḥ sadāparibhūta iti nāma kṛtamabhūt ||
T01bsu036_u:5039: tena khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kālakriyāyāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5040: tena ca bhagavatā bhīṣmagarjitasvararājena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo
T01bsu036_u:5042: sa ca sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite antarīkṣanirghoṣādimaṃ dharmaparyāyamaśrauṣīt |
T01bsu036_u:5043: yena kenacid bhāṣitamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān,
T01bsu036_u:5044: imāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ cakṣurviśuddhiṃ śrotraviśuddhiṃ ghrāṇaviśuddhiṃ jihvāviśuddhiṃ kāyaviśuddhiṃ manoviśuddhiṃ ca pratilabdhavān |
T01bsu036_u:5045: sahapratilabdhābhirviśuddhibhiḥ punaranyāni viṃśativarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ātmano jīvitasaṃskāramadhiṣṭhāya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśitavān |
T01bsu036_u:5047: sattvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ, ye pūrvaṃ nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti saṃśrāvitāḥ, yairasyedaṃ sadāparibhūta iti nāma kṛtamabhūt,
T01bsu036_u:5050: sarve tena anyāni ca bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitānyabhūvan
T01bsu036_u:5051: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataścyavitvā candrasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5052: viṃśatikoṭīśatānyārāgitavān, sarveṣu ca imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:5057: so 'nenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyapūrveṇa meghasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5061: sarveṣu ca evaṃrūpayā cakṣuḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt, śrotrapariśuddhyā ghrāṇapariśuddhayā jihvāpariśuddhayā kāyapariśuddhayā manaḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt ||
T01bsu036_u:5062: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyatāṃ tathāgata koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā anyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā, sarveṣu ca teṣu imameva saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamārāgitavān, ārāgayitvā sa tenaiva
T01bsu036_u:5064: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā
T01bsu036_u:5065: - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo
T01bsu036_u:5067: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ sadāparibhūtaḥ saṃmato 'bhūt, yena te tāvantastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitā abhūvan? na khalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T01bsu036_u:5068: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahameva sa mahāsthāmaprāpta tena kālena tena
T01bsu036_u:5070: yadā mayā mahāsthāmaprāpta pūrvamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo nodgṛhīto 'bhaviṣyat, na
T01bsu036_u:5073: yataścāhaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta paurvikāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāritavān vācitavān deśitavān, tato 'hamevaṃ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ yānyapi tāni mahāsthāmaprāpta tena sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhikṣuśatāni bhikṣuṇīśatāni ca upāsakaśatāni upāsikāśatāni ca tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃśrāvitānyabhūvan - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti |
T01bsu036_u:5077: tairviśatikalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi na jātu tathāgato dṛṣṭo 'bhūt, nāpi dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdaḥ śruto 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5078: daśa ca kalpasahasrāṇyavīcau mahānarake dāruṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmāsuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5079: te ca sarve tasmāt karmāvaraṇāt parimuktāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5080: tenaiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripācitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:5081: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - katame tena kālena tena samayena te sattvā abhūvan ye te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ ptahāsattvamullāpitavanta uccagghitavantaḥ? asyāmeva mahāsthāmaprāpta parṣadi bhadrapālapramukhāṇi pañca bodhisattvaśatāni
T01bsu036_u:5082: siṃhacandrāpramukhāni pañcabhikṣuṇīśatāni sugatacetanāpramukhāni pañcopāsikāśatāni sarvāṇyavaivartikāni kṛtāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:5083: evamiyaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta mahārthasya dharmaparyāyasya dhāraṇā vācanā deśanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā saṃvartate |
T01bsu036_u:5084: tasmāttarhi mahāsthāmaprāpta ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvairmahāsattvaistathāgate parinirvṛte abhīkṣṇaṃ dhārayitavyo vācayitavyo deśayitavyaḥ saṃprakāśayitavya iti ||
T01bsu036_u:5085: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:5088: tasya jinasya parinirvṛtasya saddharma saṃkṣobha vrajanti paścime /
T01bsu036_u:5089: bhikṣū abhūṣī tada bodhisattvo nāmena so sadaparibhūta ucyate //
T01bsu036_u:5090: upasaṃkramitvā tada bhikṣu anyān upalambhadṛṣṭīna tathaiva bhikṣuṇī /
T01bsu036_u:5091: paribhāva mahyaṃ na kadācidasti yūyaṃ hi caryāṃ carathāgrabodhaye //
T01bsu036_u:5092: evaṃ ca saṃśrāvayi nityakālaṃ ākrośa paribhāṣa sahantu teṣām /
T01bsu036_u:5093: kālakriyāyāṃ samupasthitāyāṃ śrutaṃ idaṃ sūtramabhūṣi tena // Saddhp_19.4
T01bsu036_u:5094: akṛtva kālaṃ tada paṇḍitena adhiṣṭhihitvā ca sudīrghamāyuḥ /
T01bsu036_u:5095: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tadāsīt tahi śāsane tasya vināyakasya // Saddhp_19.5
T01bsu036_u:5097: te cāpi sarve bahu opalambhikā bodhīya tena paripācitāsīt /
T01bsu036_u:5098: tataścyavitvāna sa bodhisattvo ārāgayī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_19.6
T01bsu036_u:5099: anupūrva puṇyena kṛtena tena prakāśayitvā imu sūtra nityam /
T01bsu036_u:5100: bodhiṃ sa saṃprāpta jinasya putro ahameva so śākyamunistadāsīt //
T01bsu036_u:5101: ye cāpi bhikṣū tada opalambhikā yā bhikṣuṇī ye ca upāsakā vā /
T01bsu036_u:5102: upāsikāstatra ca yā tadāsīd ye bodhi saṃśrāvita paṇḍitena // Saddhp_19.8
T01bsu036_u:5103: te cāpi dṛṣṭvā bahubuddhakoṭya ime ca te pañcaśatā anūnakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:5104: tathaiva bhikṣūṇa ca bhikṣuṇī ca upāsikāścāpi mi mahya saṃmukham //
T01bsu036_u:5105: sarve mayā śrāvita agradharmā te caiva sarve paripācitā me /
T01bsu036_u:5106: mayi nirvṛte cāpimi sarvi dhīrā imu dhārayiṣyanti ha sūtramagram //
T01bsu036_u:5107: kalpāna koṭyo bahubhīracintyairna kadācidetādṛśa dharma śrūyate /
T01bsu036_u:5108: buddhāna koṭīśata caiva bhonti na ca te pimaṃ sūtra prakāśayanti //
T01bsu036_u:5109: tasmācchrūṇitvā idamevarūpaṃ parikīrtitaṃ dharmu svayaṃ svayaṃbhūvā /
T01bsu036_u:5110: ārāgayitvā ca punaḥ punaścimaṃ prakāśayet sūtra mayīha nirvṛte //
T01bsu036_u:5114: atha khalu yāni tāni sāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pṛthivīvivarebhyo niṣkrāntāni, tāni sarvāṇi bhagavato 'bhimukhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya
T01bsu036_u:5115: sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāni yāni bhagavato buddhakṣetrāṇi, yatra yatra bhagavān parinirvṛto bhaviṣyati, tatra tatra saṃprakāśayiṣyāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5116: arthino vayaṃ bhagavan anenaikavamudāreṇa dharmaparyāyeṇa dhāraṇāya vācanāya deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya vā likhanāya ||
T01bsu036_u:5117: atha khalu mañjuśrīpramukhāni bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāni asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau vāstavyāni, bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
T01bsu036_u:5118: devanāgayakṣāgandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ, bahavaśca gaṅgānadīvālikopamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya
T01bsu036_u:5119: addaṣṭenātmabhāvena, bhagavan antarīkṣe sthitā ghoṣaṃ saṃśrāvayiṣyāmaḥ,
T01bsu036_u:5121: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ teṣāṃ paurvikāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ gaṇināṃ mahāgaṇināṃ gaṇācāryāṇāmekaṃ pramukhaṃ viśiṣṭacāritraṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mahāgaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryamāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu viśiṣṭacāritra |
T01bsu036_u:5124: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ stūpamadhye |
T01bsu036_u:5125: siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau dvāvapi smitaṃ prāduṣkṛrutaḥ, mukhavivarāntarābhyāṃ ca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayataḥ
T01bsu036_u:5127: tābhyāṃ ca jihvendriyābhyāṃ bahūni raśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma |
T01bsu036_u:5128: tāsu ca raśmiṣvekaikasyā raśmerbahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5129: suvarṇavarṇāḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ
T01bsu036_u:5130: te ca bodhisattvā digvidikṣu lokadhātuśatasahasreṣu visṛtāḥ,
T01bsu036_u:5132: yathaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5133: karoti prabhūtaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tathaiva te sarve tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, ye te 'nyalokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo 'bhyāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭā jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ kurvanti ||
T01bsu036_u:5134: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ te ca sarve tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tamṛddhayabhisaṃskāraṃ paripūrṇaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5136: atha khalu varṣaśatasahasrasyātyayena te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstāni jihvendriyāṇi punarevopasaṃhṛtya ekasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte samakālaṃ sarvairmahāsiṃhotkāsanaśabdaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5138: tena ca mahotkāsanaśabdena mahācchaṭāsaṃghātaśabdena yāvanti daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi, tāni sarvāṇyākampitānyabhūvan,
T01bsu036_u:5139: prakampitāni saṃprakampitāni calitāni pracalitāni saṃpracalitāni vedhitāni pravedhitāni saṃpravedhitāni
T01bsu036_u:5140: teṣu ca sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāvantaḥ sarvasattvā
T01bsu036_u:5142: sarve buddhānubhāvena tatrasthā evamimāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:5143: tāni ca sarvatathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatena sārdhaṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ tāśca tisraḥ parṣadaḥ paśyanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:5144: dṛṣṭvā ca āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:5145: evaṃ ca antarīkṣād ghoṣamaśrauṣuḥ - eṣa mārṣā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5147: sa etarhi saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati |
T01bsu036_u:5148: taṃ yūyamadhyāśayena anumodadhvam, taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5149: śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ namaskurudhvam ||
T01bsu036_u:5150: atha khalu te sarvasattvā imamevaṃrūpamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tatrasthā eva namo bhagavate śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti vācaṃ bhāṣante sma añjaliṃ pragṛhya |
T01bsu036_u:5151: vividhāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyo yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātustena kṣipanti sma, nānavidhāni cābharaṇāni pindhāṇi
T01bsu036_u:5152: hārārdhahāramaṇiratnānyapi kṣipanti sma, bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe, asya ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya |
T01bsu036_u:5153: tāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyastāni ca hārārdhahāramaṇiratnāni kṣiptāni imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma |
T01bsu036_u:5154: taiśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantīrāśibhirhārārdhahārairmaṇiratnaiśca asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sārdhaṃ tairanyarlokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairekībhūtairye teṣu tathāgatāḥ
T01bsu036_u:5155: saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ, teṣu sarveṣu vaihāyase 'ntarīkṣe samantānmahāpuṣpavitānaṃ parisaṃsthitamabhūt
T01bsu036_u:5156: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānāmantrayāmāsa - acintyaprabhāvāḥ kulaputrāstathāgatā arhantaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5158: bahūnyapyahaṃ kulaputrāḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi asya dharmaparyāyasya parīndanārthaṃ nānādharmapramukhairbahūnānuśaṃsān bhāṣeyam |
T01bsu036_u:5159: na cāhaṃ guṇānāṃ pāraṃ gaccheyamasya dharmaparyāyasya bhāṣamāṇaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5160: saṃkṣepeṇa kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhavṛṣabhitā sarvabuddharahasyaṃ sarvabuddhagambhīrasthānaṃ mayā asmin dharmaparyāye deśitam |
T01bsu036_u:5161: tasmāttarhi kulaputrā yuṣmābhistathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyo deśayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ prakāśayitavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5163: yasmiṃśca kulaputrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśe ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo vācyeta vā prakāśyeta vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā cintyeta vā bhāṣyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā pustakagato vā tiṣṭhat ārāme vā vihāre vā gṛhe vā vane vā nagare vā vṛkṣamūle vā prāsāde vā layane vā guhāyāṃ vā, tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatamudiśya caityaṃ kartavyam |
T01bsu036_u:5164: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvatathāgatānāṃ hi sa pṛthivīpradeśo bodhimaṇḍo veditavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5165: tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe sarvatathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā iti veditavyam |
T01bsu036_u:5166: tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe sarvatathāgatairdharmacakraṃ pravartitam, tasmiṃścapṛthivīpradeśe sarvatathāgatāḥ parinirvṛtā iti veditavyam ||
T01bsu036_u:5167: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu036_u:5169: ye ṛddhi darśenti anantacakṣuṣaḥ prāmodyahetoriha sarvadehinām //
T01bsu036_u:5171: āścaryabhūtā iha ṛddhidarśitāḥ te sarvi ye prasthita agrabodhau //
T01bsu036_u:5172: utkāsitaṃ cāpi karonti buddhā ekācchaṭā ye ca karonti śabdam /
T01bsu036_u:5173: te vijñapentī imu sarvalokaṃ daśo diśāyāṃ ima lokadhātum // Saddhp_20.3 //
T01bsu036_u:5174: etāni cānyāni ca prātihāryā guṇānnidarśenti hitānukampakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:5175: kathaṃ nu te harṣita tasmi kāle dhāreyu sūtraṃ sugatasya nirvṛte //
T01bsu036_u:5176: bahū pi kalpāna sahasrakoṭyo vadeya varṇaṃ sugatātmajānām /
T01bsu036_u:5177: ye dhārayiṣyantima sūtramagraṃ parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin // Saddhp_20.5
T01bsu036_u:5178: na teṣa paryanta bhavedguṇānāṃ ākāśadhātau hi yathā diśāsu /
T01bsu036_u:5179: acintiyā teṣā guṇā bhavanti ye sūtra dhārenti idaṃ śubhaṃ sadā //
T01bsu036_u:5180: dṛṣṭo ahaṃ sarva ime ca nāyakā ayaṃ ca yo nirvṛtu lokanāyakaḥ /
T01bsu036_u:5182: ime ca sarve bahubodhisattvāḥ parṣāśca catvāri anena dṛṣṭāḥ // Saddhp_20.7
T01bsu036_u:5183: ahaṃ ca ārāgitu tenihādya ime ca ārāgita sarvi nāyakāḥ /
T01bsu036_u:5184: ayaṃ ca yo nirvṛtako jinendro ye cāpi anye daśasū diśāsu // Saddhp_20.8 //
T01bsu036_u:5185: anāgatātīta tathā ca buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti ye cāpi daśasu ddiśāsu /

T01bsu036_u:5197: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye tathāgataddharyabhisaṃskāraparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ

T01bsu036_u:5201: bhagavan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavet, ya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayet, kāyagataṃ vā pustakagataṃ vā
T01bsu036_u:5202: kṛtvā? evamukte bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aśītigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni tathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet, takiṃ manyase bhaiṣajyarāja kiyatkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata |
T01bsu036_u:5204: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā asmāt saddharmapuṇḍarīkāddharmaparyāyādantaśa ekāmapi catuṣpadīgāthāṃ dhārayet, vācayet, paryavāpnuyāt, pratipattyā ca saṃpādayet, ataḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat - dāsyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā yeṣāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ kāyagato vā syāt, pustakagato vā, rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye dhāraṇīmantrapadāni |
T01bsu036_u:5206: anye manye mane mamane citte carite same samitā viśānte mukte muktatame same aviṣame samasame jaye kṣaye akṣaye akṣiṇe śānte samite dhāraṇi ālokabhāṣe pratyavekṣaṇi nidhiru abhyantaraniviṣṭe abhyantarapāriśuddhimutkule araḍe paraḍe sukāṅkṣi asamasame buddhavilokite

T01bsu036_u:5227: sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati, svastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati ||

T01bsu036_u:5237: atha khalu lambā ca nāma rākṣasī vilambā ca nāma rākṣasī kūṭadantī ca nāma rākṣasī puṣpadantī ca nāma rākṣasī makuṭadantī ca nāma rākṣasī keśinī ca nāma rākṣasī acalā ca nāma rākṣasī mālādhārī ca nāma rākṣasī kuntī ca nāma rākṣasī sarvasattvojohārī ca nāma rākṣasī hḥrītī ca nḥma rḥkṣasī saputraparivḥrḥ etḥḥ sarvḥ rḥkṣasyo yena bhagavḥṃstenopasaṃkrḥntḥḥ |

T01bsu036_u:5239: atha khalu tāḥ sarvā rākṣasya ekasvareṇa samaṃ saṃgītyā bhagavata imāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni prayacchanti sma |

T01bsu036_u:5248: atha khalu tā rākṣasya evasvareṇa samaṃ saṃgītyā bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -

T01bsu036_u:5269: mahāsattvasya yat kiṃciccaryāpradeśamātram, yacchrutvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāstadanyalokadhātvāgatāśca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ime ca mahāśrāvakāḥ śrutvā sarve prītāstuṣṭā udagrā
T01bsu036_u:5271: atha khalu bhagavān nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya adhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat bhūtapurvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaiḥ kalpairyadāsīt |

T01bsu036_u:5281: sa ca bhagavānimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ teṣāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma, sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā |
T01bsu036_u:5282: tasya khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhagavataścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dvācatvāriṃśatkalpasahasrāṇyāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt, teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvanāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ tāvadevāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5283: sa ca sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ pravacane duṣkaracaryābhiyukto 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5285: sa dvādaśānāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvarūpasaṃdarśanaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma
T01bsu036_u:5286: sahapratilambhācca tasya samādheḥ sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cintayāmāsa - imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamāgamya ayaṃ mayā sarvarūpasaṃdarśanaḥ (Vaidya 237) samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cintayati sma -
T01bsu036_u:5289: sa tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yasya samādheḥ samanantarasamāpannasya sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya
T01bsu036_u:5293: tādṛśī ca nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sā gandhajātiḥ, yasyā ekaḥ karṣa imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ mūlyena kṣamati ||

T01bsu036_u:5295: vyutthāya caivaṃ ciantayāmāsa - na tadarddhiprātihāryasaṃdarśanena bhagavataḥ pūjā kṛtā bhavati, yathā ātmabhāvaparityāgeneti |
T01bsu036_u:5296: atha khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmagaruturuṣkakundurukarasaṃ bhakṣayati sma,
T01bsu036_u:5298: tena khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña paryāyeṇa tasya sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitaṃ gandhaṃ bhakṣayataścampakatailaṃ ca pibato dvādaśa varṣāṇyatikrāntānyabhūvan atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena taṃ svamātmabhāvaṃ divyairvastraiḥ pariveṣṭaya gandhatailaplutaṃ kṛtvā svakamadhiṣṭhānamakarot |
T01bsu036_u:5299: svakamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā svaṃ kāyaṃ prajvālayāmāsa tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe, asya ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya pūjārtham |
T01bsu036_u:5300: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña tasya sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tābhiḥ kāyapradīpaprabhājvālābhiraśītigaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhuvan |
T01bsu036_u:5301: tāsu ca lokadhātuṣu aśītigaṅgānadīvālikāsamā eva buddhā bhagavantaste sarve sādhukāraṃ dadanti sma - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kulaputra, ayaṃ sa bhūto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vīryārambhaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5307: iyaṃ punaḥ kulaputra viśiṣṭā agrā varā pravarā praṇītā dharmapūjā, yo

T01bsu036_u:5311: varṣaśatānyatikrāntānyabhūvan, na ca praśamaṃ gacchati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5313: sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpāṃ tathāgatapūjāṃ ca dharmapūjāṃ ca kṛtvā tataścyutastasyaiva bhagavataścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane rājño vimaladattasya gṛhe (Vaidya 238)
T01bsu036_u:5316: samanantaropapannaśca khalu punaḥ sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātāpitarau gāthayādhyabhāṣata -

T01bsu036_u:5321: samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ deśayati, yasya mayā bhagavataścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyastathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvarutakauśalyadhāraṇī pratilabdhā, ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko
T01bsu036_u:5322: dharmaparyāyo 'śītibhirgāthākoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ kaṅkaraiśca vivaraiśca akṣobhyaiśca tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchruto 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5323: sādhu amba tāta gamiṣyāmyahaṃ tasya bhagavato 'ntikam, tasmiṃśca gatvā bhūyastasya
T01bsu036_u:5325: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya saptaratnamaye kūṭāgāre paryaṅkamābhujya tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5326: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yena sa bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtvā anayā gāthāyābhiṣṭauti sma suvimalavadanā narendra dhīrā tava prabha rājatiyaṃ daśaddiśāsu /
T01bsu036_u:5327: tubhya sugata kṛtva agrapūjāṃ ahamiha āgatu nātha darśanāya // Saddhp_22.2
T01bsu036_u:5328: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ candrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyaṃ saṃkusumitābhijña sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśrīstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:5329: parinirvāṇakālasamayo me kulaputra anuprāptaḥ, kṣayāntakālo me kulaputra
T01bsu036_u:5331: tadgaccha tvaṃ kulaputra, mama mañcaṃ prajñapayasva,
T01bsu036_u:5333: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśrīstathāgatastaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - idaṃ ca te
T01bsu036_u:5334: kulaputra śāsanamanuparindāmi, (Vaidya 239) imāṃśca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān, imāṃśca mahāśrāvakān, imāṃ ca buddhabodhim, imāṃ ca lokadhātum, imāni ca ratnavyomakāni, imāni ca ratnavṛkṣāṇi, imāṃśca
T01bsu036_u:5336: parinirvṛtasya ca me kulaputra ye dhātavastānanuparindāmi |
T01bsu036_u:5337: ātmanā ca tvayā kulaputra mama dhātūnāṃ vipulā pūjā kartavyā |
T01bsu036_u:5340: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśrīstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevamanuśiṣya tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛto 'bhūt ||
T01bsu036_u:5341: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ bhagavanta candrasūryavimalaprabhāsaśriyaṃ tathāgataṃ parinirvṛtaṃ viditvā uragasāracandanacittāṃ kṛtvā taṃ tathāgatātmabhāvaṃ saṃprajvālayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:5342: dagdhaṃ niśāntaṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvaṃ viditvā tato dhātūn gṛhītvā rodati krandati paridevate sma |
T01bsu036_u:5343: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ruditvā kranditvā paridevitvā saptaratnamayāni caturaśītikumbhasahasrāṇi kārayitvā teṣu tāṃstathāgatadhātūn prakṣipya saptaratnamayāni caturaśītistūpasahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa, yāvad
T01bsu036_u:5345: sa tān stūpān pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ cintayāmāsa - kṛtā mayā tasya
T01bsu036_u:5347: ataśca bhūya uttari viśiṣṭatarāṃ tathāgatadhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmīti |
T01bsu036_u:5348: atha khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāṃśca mahāśrāvakāṃstāṃśca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyagaṇānāmantrayāmāsa - sarve yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ samanvāharadhvam |
T01bsu036_u:5349: tasya bhagavato dhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyāma iti |
T01bsu036_u:5350: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ teṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ tathāgatadhātustūpasahasrāṇāṃ purastācchatapuṇyavicitritaṃ svaṃ bāhumādīpayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:5351: ādīpya ca dvāsaptativarṣasahasrāṇi teṣāṃ tathāgatadhātustūpānāṃ pūjāmakarot |
T01bsu036_u:5352: pūjāṃ ca kurvatā tasyāḥ parṣado 'saṃkhyeyāni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vinītāni |
T01bsu036_u:5354: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ, te ca sarve mahāśrāvakāḥ, taṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5355: mahāsattvamaṅgahīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā aśrumukhā rudantaḥ krandantaḥ paridevamānāḥ parasparametadūcuḥ - ayaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T01bsu036_u:5359: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastān bodhisattvāṃstāṃśca mahāśrāvakāṃstāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa - mā yūyaṃ kulaputrā māmaṅgahīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā rudata,
T01bsu036_u:5361: eṣo 'haṃ kulaputrā ye keciddaśasu dikṣu anantāparyantāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
T01bsu036_u:5362: dhriyante yāpayanti, tān sarvān buddhān bhagavataḥ sākṣiṇaḥ kṛtvā teṣāṃ purataḥ sattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ karomi, yena satyena satyavacanena svaṃ mama bāhuṃ tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe parityajya suvarṇavarṇo me kāyo bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5363: tena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ mama bāhuryathāpaurāṇo bhavatu, iyaṃ ca mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampatu, antarīkṣagatāśca devaputrā mahāpuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣantu |
T01bsu036_u:5364: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña samanantarakṛte 'smin satyādhiṣṭhāne tena sarvasattvapriyadarśanena
T01bsu036_u:5367: tasya ca sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sa bāhuryathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt, yaduta tasyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya jñānabalādhānena puṇyabalādhānena ca
T01bsu036_u:5368: | syāt khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt? na khalu punaste
T01bsu036_u:5370: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt
T01bsu036_u:5371: | iyanti nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi karoti, ātmabhāvaparityāgāṃśca karoti |
T01bsu036_u:5372: bahutaraṃ khalvapi sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimākāṅkṣamāṇo yaḥ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ tathāgatacaityeṣvādīpayet ekāṃ hastāṅguliṃ pādāṅguliṃ vā ekāṅgaṃ vā bāhumādīpayet,
T01bsu036_u:5373: bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavati
T01bsu036_u:5374: na tveva rājyaparityāgānna priyaputraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgānna trisāhasramahāsāhasrīlokadhātoḥ savanasamudraparvatotsasarastaḍāgakūpārāmāyāḥ parityāgāt |
T01bsu036_u:5375: yaśca khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā sarvabuddhabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
T01bsu036_u:5376: tāvat puṇyaṃ prasavati, yāvat sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yaḥ itaḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkāddharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayet,
T01bsu036_u:5378: na tvevaṃ imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadatastasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:5379: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāmutsasarastaḍāgānāṃ mahāsamudro mūrdhaprāptaḥ, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5381: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ kālaparvatānāṃ cakravālānāṃ mahācakravālānāṃ ca sumeruḥ parvatarājo
T01bsu036_u:5382: mūrdhaprāptaḥ, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña (Vaidya 241) ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5384: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ candramāḥ prabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaścandrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātirekaprabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5385: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5387: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5389: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ sarveṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ rājā brahmaloke pitṛkāryaṃ karoti, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ca pitṛkāryaṃ karoti |
T01bsu036_u:5390: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvabālapṛthagjanānatikrāntaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaśca, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5391: saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān sūtrāntānatikramya abhyudgato mūrdhaprāpto veditavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5393: nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sattvā mūrdhaprāptā veditavyāḥ, ye khalvimaṃ sūtrarājaṃ dhārayiṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:5394: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvo 'gra ākhyāyate, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sutrāntānāmagra ākhyāyate |
T01bsu036_u:5395: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tathāgato dharmarājaḥ paṭṭabaddhaḥ, evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastathāgatabhūto
T01bsu036_u:5397: trātā khalvapi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvabhayebhyaḥ, vimocakaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5398: taḍāga iva tṛṣitānāmagniriva śītārtānāṃ cailamiva nagnānāṃ sārthavāha iva vaṇijānāṃ māteva putrāṇāṃ nauriva pāragāmināṃ vaidya iva āturāṇāṃ dīpa iva tamondhakārāvṛtānāṃ ratnamiva dhanārthināṃ cakravartīva sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ samudra iva saritāmulkeva sarvatamondhakāravidhamanāya |
T01bsu036_u:5399: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocakaḥ sarvavyādhicchedakaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayabandhanasaṃkaṭapramocakaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5400: yena cāyaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto
T01bsu036_u:5401: bhaviṣyati, yaśca likhati, yaśca lekhayati, eṣāṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña puṇyābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bauddhena jñānena na
T01bsu036_u:5402: śakyaṃ paryanto 'dhigantum, yāvantaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:5403: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā deśayitvā vā śrutvā vā likhitvā (Vaidya 242) vā pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākavaijayantībhirvādyavastrāñjalikarmabhirvā ghṛtapradīpairvā gandhatailapradīpairvācampakatailapradīpairvā sumanātailapradīpairvā pāṭalatailapradipairvā vārṣikatailapradīpairvā
T01bsu036_u:5404: navamālikātailapradīpairvā bahuvidhābhiśca pūjābhiḥ satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ kuryāt pūjanāṃ kuryāt, bahu sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūvayogaparivartaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati śroṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5405: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña mātṛgrāma imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā udgahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvo bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5406: yaḥ kaścinnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivartaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ śrutvā mātṛgrāmaḥ pratipatsyate sa khalvataścyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate yasyāṃ sa bhagavānamitāyustathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati |
T01bsu036_u:5407: sa tasyāṃ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa upapatsyate |
T01bsu036_u:5409: vyābādhiṣyate, na dveṣo na moho na māno na mātsaryaṃ na krodho na vyāpādaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5412: anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvāsaptatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃstathāgatān drakṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5413: tādṛśaṃ cāsya cakṣurindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati, yena cakṣurindriyeṇa pariśuddhena
T01bsu036_u:5415: te cāsya buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yattvayā saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ
T01bsu036_u:5416: śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane uddiṣṭaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ bhāvitaṃ cintitaṃ manasi kṛtaṃ parasattvānāṃ ca saṃprakāśitam, ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyamagninā dagdhuṃ nodakena hartum |
T01bsu036_u:5417: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyaṃ buddhasahesreṇāpi nirdeṣṭum |
T01bsu036_u:5420: | na tava kulaputra sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadṛśo vidyate tathāgatamekaṃ vinirmucya |
T01bsu036_u:5421: nānyaḥ kaścicchrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā yastvāṃ śaktaḥ puṇyena vā prajñayā vā samādhinā vā abhibhavitum |
T01bsu036_u:5422: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati ||
T01bsu036_u:5424: sādhukāramanupradāsyati, tasyotpalagandho mukhādvāsyati, gātrebhyaścāsya candanagandho bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:5426: tasyema evaṃrūpā dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti, (Vaidya 243) ye mayaitarhi nirdiṣṭāḥ
T01bsu036_u:5427: tasmāttarhi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña anuparindāmyahamimaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūrvayogaparivartam, yathā paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasmin jambudvīpe pracaret, nāntardhānaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5428: gacchet, na ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet, na mārakāyikā devatāḥ, na nāgā na yakṣā na gandharvā na kumbhāṇḍā avatāraṃ labheyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5431: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vyādhiḥ kāye na kramiṣyati, na jarā nākālamṛtyuḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5432: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paśyedevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣum, taṃ
T01bsu036_u:5433: candanacūrṇairnīlotpalairabhyakiret, abhyavakīrya caivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - gamiṣyatyayaṃ kulaputro bodhimaṇḍam |
T01bsu036_u:5440: evaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña tena bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - ityetādṛśāścāsya guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu036_u:5442: asmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyapūrvayogaparivarte nirdiśyamāne caturaśītīnāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarutakauśalyānugatāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho
T01bsu036_u:5444: sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña, yatra hi nāma
T01bsu036_u:5445: tvamevamacintyaguṇadharmastathāgatena nirdiṣṭaḥ, tvaṃ cācintyaguṇadharmasamanvāgataṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchasīti ||
T01bsu036_u:5446: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma dvāviṃśatimaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5449: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇād bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt prabhāṃ pramumoca,
T01bsu036_u:5450: yayā prabhayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ābhayā sphuṭānyabhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:5451: tāni ca aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitā nāma lokadhātuḥ, tatra kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:5453: vipulena bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5454: atha khalu yā bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenorṇākośāt prabhā pramuktāḥ, sā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5455: vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatyā ābhayā spharati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5456: tasyāṃ khalu punarvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati sma avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5457: dṛṣṭapūrvāśca tena bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpā raśmyavabhāsāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5459: tadyathā dhvajāgrakeyūrasamādhipratilabdhaḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkasamādhipratilabdho vimaladattasamādhipratilabdho nakṣatrarājavikrīḍitasamādhipratilabdhaḥ anilambhasamādhipratilabdho jñānamudrāsamādhipratilabdhaḥ candrapradīpasamādhipratilabdhaḥ sarvarutakauśalyasamādhipratilabdhaḥ sarvapuṇyasamuccayasamādhipratilabdhaḥ prasādavatīsamādhipratilabdhaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5463: tasya khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sā prabhā kāye nipatitābhūt
T01bsu036_u:5464: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ bhagavantaṃ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5465: samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya, taṃ ca mañjuśriyaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5466: kumārabhūtaṃ darśanāya, taṃ ca bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ darśanāya, taṃ ca pradānaśūraṃ bodhisattvaṃ darśanāya, taṃ ca nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ bodhisattvaṃ darśanāya, taṃ ca viśiṣṭacāritraṃ bodhisattvaṃ darśanāya, taṃ ca vyūharājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5467: darśanāya, taṃ ca bhaiṣajyarājasamudgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ darśanāya ||
T01bsu036_u:5469: samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvayā kulaputra tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau gatvā hīnasaṃjñotpādayitavyā |
T01bsu036_u:5470: sā khalu punaḥ kulaputra lokadhāturutkūlanikūlā (Vaidya 245) mṛnmayī kālaparvatākīrṇā gūthoḍillaparipūrṇā
T01bsu036_u:5472: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho hrasvakāyaḥ, te ca bodhisattvā hrasvakāyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5475: tvaṃ ca kulaputra prāsādiko darśanīyo 'bhirūpaḥ, paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā
T01bsu036_u:5477: tasmāttarhi kulaputra tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ gatvā mā hīnasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyasi tathāgate ca bodhisattveṣu ca tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre ||
T01bsu036_u:5478: evamukte gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - tathāhaṃ bhagavan kariṣye, yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati |
T01bsu036_u:5479: gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena tathāgatabalādhānena tathāgatavikrīḍitena tathāgatavyūhena tathāgatābhyudgatajñānena |
T01bsu036_u:5480: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmanuccalita eva tasmād buddhakṣetrādanutthitaścaiva tasmādāsanāt tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma, yasya samādheḥ samanantarasamāpannasya gadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya atha tāvadeveha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau gṛdhrakūṭe parvate tasya tathāgatadharmāsanasya purastāccaturaśītipadmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
T01bsu036_u:5481: prādurbhūtānyabhūvan suvarṇadaṇḍāni rupyapatrāṇi padmakiṃśukarvaṇāni saṃdṛśyante sma ||
T01bsu036_u:5482: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastaṃ padmavyūhaprādurbhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:5483: kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yenemāni caturaśītipadmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma suvarṇadaṇḍāni rūpyapatrāṇi padmakiṃśukavarṇāni? evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5485: kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetrād gadgadasvaro bodhisatvo mahāsattvaścaturaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya
T01bsu036_u:5486: paryupāsanāya, asya ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya |
T01bsu036_u:5487: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - kastena bhagavan kulaputreṇa kuśalasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ, yena sa kuśalasaṃbhāreṇa kṛtenopacitena ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ? katamasmiṃśca bhagavan samādhau sa
T01bsu036_u:5488: bodhisattvaścarati? taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan samādhiṃ śṛṇuyāma, tatra ya vayaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5490: taṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5491: paśyema, kīdṛśastasya bodhisattvasya varṇaḥ, kīdṛg rūpam, kīdṛg liṅgam,
T01bsu036_u:5493: tatsādhu bhagavan karotu tathāgatastathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ yena nimittena saṃcoditaḥ samānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet ||
T01bsu036_u:5494: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtametadavocat - karotu bhagavāṃstathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ yena (Vaidya
T01bsu036_u:5495: 246) gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet |
T01bsu036_u:5496: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ prāduścakāragadgadasvarasya
T01bsu036_u:5497: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃcodanārtham - āgaccha kulaputra imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātum |
T01bsu036_u:5499: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtastasyā vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyā lokadhātorantarhitaḥ imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchati sma, prakampadbhiḥ kṣetraiḥ, pravarṣadbhiḥ padmaiḥ,
T01bsu036_u:5502: śriyā jājvalyamānaḥ, tejasā dedīpyamānaḥ, lakṣaṇairvicitritagātro nārāyaṇasaṃhananakāyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5503: saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāramabhiruhya vaihāyase saptatālamātreṇa bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āgacchati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5504: sa yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātuḥ, yena ca gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrāmat |
T01bsu036_u:5505: upasaṃkramya tasmāt kūṭāgārādavatīrya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat
T01bsu036_u:5506: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe niryātayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:5509: samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati alpābādhatām ālpataṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasaṃsparśavihāratām |
T01bsu036_u:5510: evaṃ ca sa bhagavānavocat - kaccitte bhagavan kṣamaṇīyam, kaccid yāpanīyam,
T01bsu036_u:5511: kacciddhātavaḥ pratikurvanti, kaccitte sattvāḥ svākārāḥ suvaineyāḥ
T01bsu036_u:5512: sucikitsāḥ, kaccicchucikāyā mā atīva rāgacaritāḥ, mā atīva dveṣacaritā mā atīva mohacaritā mā atīva bhagavan sattvā īrṣyālukā mā matsariṇo mā amātṛjñā mā apitṛjñā mā aśrāmaṇya mā abrāhmaṇyā mā mithyādṛṣṭyo mā adāntacittā mā aguptendriyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5515: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgato dharmaśravaṇāya saptaratnamaye stūpe madhyagataḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5516: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ tathāgatarmahantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sa bhagavān paripṛcchati - kaccidbhagavaṃstasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kṣamaṇīyam, kaccid yāpanīyam, kaccid bhagavan prabhūtaratnastathāgato
T01bsu036_u:5518: vayamapi bhagavaṃstasya prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātuvigrahaṃ paśyema |
T01bsu036_u:5519: tatsādhu bhagavān darśayatu tathāgatastasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātuvigrahamiti ||
T01bsu036_u:5520: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ (Vaidya 247) tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvaro
T01bsu036_u:5521: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5522: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yatra hi nāma
T01bsu036_u:5523: tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ draṣṭukāmo
T01bsu036_u:5524: 'bhyāgataḥ, imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāya śrāvaṇāya mañjuśriyaṃ ca kumārabhūtaṃ darśanāyeti ||
T01bsu036_u:5525: atha khalu padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5526: kuśalamūlamavaropitam, kasya vā tathāgatasyāntike? atha khalu bhagavān
T01bsu036_u:5528: mahāsattvametadavocat - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule aprameye apramāṇe yadāsīt |
T01bsu036_u:5529: tena kālena tena samayena meghadundubhisvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān sarvarūpasaṃdarśanāyāṃ lokadhātau priyadarśane kalpe |
T01bsu036_u:5530: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tūryaśatasahasrapravāditena dvādaśavarṣaśatasahasrāṇi pūjā kṛtābhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5532: tatra kulaputra meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasya pravacane gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyamīdṛśī śrīḥ prāptā |
T01bsu036_u:5533: syāt khalu punaste kulaputra kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt, yena sā tasya
T01bsu036_u:5534: bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā, tāni caturaśītibhājanasahasrāṇi dattāni? na khalu punaste
T01bsu036_u:5537: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt, yena sā tasya bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
T01bsu036_u:5539: evaṃ bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ kulaputra gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kṛtabuddhaparikarmā |
T01bsu036_u:5540: dṛṣṭapūrvāścānena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5541: paśyasi tvaṃ padmaśrīretaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam? padmaśrīrāha - paśyāmi
T01bsu036_u:5543: bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu punaḥ padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahubhī rūpairimaṃ
T01bsu036_u:5555: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5556: iyadbhiḥ kulaputra rūpasaṃdarśanairgadgadasvaro bodhisatvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5557: yāvat keṣāṃcid yakṣarūpeṇa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5559: garūḍarūpeṇa, keṣāṃcit kinnararūpeṇa, keṣāṃcinmahoragarūpeṇa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5561: yāvannirayatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇopapannānāmapi sattvānāṃ gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayaṃstrātā bhavati |
T01bsu036_u:5562: yāvadantaḥpuramadhyagatānāmapi sattvānāṃ gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ strīrūpamabhinirmāya ima saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5563: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:5564: trātā khalvapi padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannānāṃ sattvānām |
T01bsu036_u:5565: tasyāṃ ca sahāyāṃ lokadhātāveva sa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyadbhī rūpanimittairimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati |
T01bsu036_u:5567: iyadbhiḥ kulaputra jñānāvabhāsairgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāyate |
T01bsu036_u:5568: anyeṣu ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati |

T01bsu036_u:5772: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya pravacane śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5773: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya vimaladattā nāma bhāryābhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5774: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya dvau putrāvabhūtām - eko vimalagarbho nāma, dvitīyo vimalanetro nāma |
T01bsu036_u:5775: tau ca dvau dārakāvṛddhimantau cābhūtām, prajñāvantau ca puṇyavantau ca jñānavantau ca bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ ca abhiyuktāvabhūtām
T01bsu036_u:5776: | tadyathā - dānapāramitāyāmabhiyuktāvabhūtām, śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalyapāramitāyāṃ maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāmupekṣāyāṃ yāvat saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu |
T01bsu036_u:5778: pāraṃgatāvabhūtām, vimalasya samādheḥ pāraṃgatau, nakṣatrarājādityasya samādheḥ pāraṃgatau, vimalanirbhāsasya samādheḥ pāraṃgatau, vimalabhāsasya samādheḥ pāraṃgatau, alaṃkāraśubhasya samādheḥ pāraṃgatau,
T01bsu036_u:5780: sa ca bhagavāṃstena kālena tena samayena imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayāmāsa teṣāṃ sattvānāmanukampāyai, tasya ca rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai |
T01bsu036_u:5781: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako yena svamātā
T01bsu036_u:5783: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya janayitrīmetadavocatām ehyamba gamiṣyāvastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
T01bsu036_u:5784: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa hyamba sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato
T01bsu036_u:5785: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ visteraṇa saṃprakāśayati, taṃ śravaṇāya gamiṣyāvaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5786: evamukte kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā vimalagarbhaṃ dārakaṃ vimalanetraṃ ca dārakametadavocat - eṣa khalu kulaputrau yuvayoḥ pitā rājā
T01bsu036_u:5789: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya tāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām - mithyādṛṣṭikule 'sminnāvāṃ jātau? āvāṃ punardharmarājaputrāviti atha khalu kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā tau dvau dārakāvetadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputrau (Vaidya 259)| yuvāṃ tasya svapitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai kiṃcideva prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayatam
T01bsu036_u:5791: prasannacittaśca asmākamanujānīyāt tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhigantum ||
T01bsu036_u:5792: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya tasya pitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai buddhānujñātāni yamakāni prātihāryāṇyakurutām tau tatraivāntarīkṣe gatau śayyāmakalpayatām |
T01bsu036_u:5797: tau tasminnevākāśe mahāntau bhūtvā khuḍḍakau bhavataḥ,
T01bsu036_u:5802: iyadbhiḥ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā ṛddhiprātihāryaistābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sa śubhavyūho rājā svapitā vinītaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5803: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastayordārakayostamṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya
T01bsu036_u:5804: tau dārakāvetadavocat - ko yuvayoḥ kulaputrau śāstā, kasya vā yuvāṃ
T01bsu036_u:5805: śiṣyāviti? atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau taṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat - eṣa sa mahārāja bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:5806: samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati ratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle dharmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5807: sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati
T01bsu036_u:5810: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastau dārakāvetadavocat - paśyāmo vayaṃ kulaputrau taṃ yuvayoḥ śāstāram |
T01bsu036_u:5812: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau tato 'ntarīkṣādavatīrya yena svamātā janayitrī tenopasaṃkrāmatām
T01bsu036_u:5813: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām - eṣa āvābhyāmamba vinītaḥ svapitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T01bsu036_u:5816: āvāṃ tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe pravrajiṣyāva iti
T01bsu036_u:5817: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣatām -
T01bsu036_u:5819: āvāṃ vai pravrajiṣyāvo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ // Saddhp_25.1 //
T01bsu036_u:5825: vayaṃ pi pravrajiṣyāmo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ // Saddhp_25.3 //
T01bsu036_u:5827: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakāvime gāthe bhāṣitvā tau mātāpitarāvetadavocatām - sādhu amba tāta eta |
T01bsu036_u:5828: vayaṃ sarve sahitā bhūtvā gamiṣyāmastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam |
T01bsu036_u:5829: upasaṃkramiṣyāmastaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya |
T01bsu036_u:5831: hetoḥ? durlabho hyamba tāta buddhotpādaḥ, udumbarapuṣpasadṛśo mahārṇavyugacchidrakūrmagrīvāpraveśavat
T01bsu036_u:5833: tasmāttarhi amba tāta paramapuṇyopastabdhā vayamīdṛśe pravacane upapannāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5836: tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajiṣyāvaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5837: durlabhaṃ hi amba tāta tathāgatānāṃ darśanam |
T01bsu036_u:5841: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ samayena tasya rājñaḥ śūbhavyūhasya antaḥpurāccaturaśītirantaḥpurikāsahasrāṇi asya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya bhājanabhutānyabhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:5844: vimalagarbhaśca dārako bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvasattvapāpajahane samādhau carito
T01bsu036_u:5846: sā ca tayordārakayormātā vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvabuddhasaṃgītiṃ sarvabuddhadharmaguhyasthānāni ca saṃjānīte sma |
T01bsu036_u:5847: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ tathāgataśāsane vinītaḥ, avatāritaśca, paripācitaśca sarvasvajanaparivāraḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5848: sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvasvajanaparivārā tau ca dvau dārakau rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrau dvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāntapurau sāmātyau sarve sahitāḥ samagrāḥ yena bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:5850: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:5852: samyaksaṃbuddho rājānaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ saparivāramupasaṃkrāntaṃ viditvā dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
T01bsu036_u:5853: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ (Vaidya 261)
T01bsu036_u:5854: saṃpraharṣitastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhāpya
T01bsu036_u:5856: sarvastrīgaṇaparivārā, tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ
T01bsu036_u:5857: prāṇisahasraiḥ, sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan |
T01bsu036_u:5858: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma |
T01bsu036_u:5861: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau bhavataḥ yadahamābhyāmṛddhiprātihāryeṇa tasmānmahato dṛṣṭigatādvinivartitaḥ, tathāgataśāsane ca pratiṣṭhapitaḥ, paripācitaśca
T01bsu036_u:5863: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau, yaduta pūrvakuśalamūlasmaraṇārtham
T01bsu036_u:5867: avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi, yāni śāstṛkṛtyena pratyupasthitāni
T01bsu036_u:5868: bhavanti, yānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau śāsakānyavatārakāṇi paripācakāni bhavanti |
T01bsu036_u:5870: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau? āha - paśyāmi bhagavan, paśyāmi sugata |
T01bsu036_u:5872: etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānḥṃ tathḥgatḥnḥmarhatḥṃ samyaksaṃbuddhḥnḥmantike pūjḥṃ kariṣyataḥ, imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ dhḥrayiṣyataḥ sattvḥnḥmanukampḥyai,
T01bsu036_u:5874: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - tatsādhu bhagavan |
T01bsu036_u:5876: samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti, vimalanetraśca bhagavān,
T01bsu036_u:5877: bhruvormadhye corṇā vibhāti śaśiśaṅkhapāṇḍarābhā, sā ca samasahitā
T01bsu036_u:5878: dantāvalī vadanāntare virājati, bimboṣṭhaśca bhagavāṃścārunetraśca sugataḥ
T01bsu036_u:5880: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhiṣṭutya anyaiśca guṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ bhagavantamabhiṣṭutya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitabhoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvanmahārthamidaṃ tathāgataśāsanam, acintyaguṇasamanvāgataśca tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayaḥ, yāvat suprajñaptā ca tathāgataśikṣā |
T01bsu036_u:5881: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ, na bhūyo mithyādṛṣṭervaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ, na bhūyaḥ krodhasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ, na bhūyaḥ pāpakānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5882: ebhirahaṃ bhagavan iyadbhirakuśalaidharmaiḥ samanvāgato necchāmi bhagavato
T01bsu036_u:5884: sa tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrajasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya antarīkṣagata evāsthāt ||
T01bsu036_u:5885: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe 'kṣaipsīt |
T01bsu036_u:5886: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5889: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma |
T01bsu036_u:5890: atha khalu rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyaitadabhavat - mahānubhāvamidaṃ buddhajñānam,
T01bsu036_u:5892: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:5893: atha khalu bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgataścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadantam? āhuḥ - paśyāmo bhagavan |
T01bsu036_u:5895: - eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā
T01bsu036_u:5896: śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
T01bsu036_u:5897: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau |
T01bsu036_u:5899: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati, aprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5900: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5902: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt? na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam tatkasya hetoḥ? ayameva sa padmaśrīrbodhisattvo
T01bsu036_u:5903: mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhut |
T01bsu036_u:5904: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyā sā tena
T01bsu036_u:5905: kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma (Vaidya 263) rājabhāryābhūt? na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T01bsu036_u:5906: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ sa vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitadhvajarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhut |
T01bsu036_u:5907: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato 'bhūt |
T01bsu036_u:5908: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau
T01bsu036_u:5909: dārakāvabhūtām? na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T01bsu036_u:5910: tatkasya hetoḥ? imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām |
T01bsu036_u:5911: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
T01bsu036_u:5914: dhārayiṣyanti, te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena ||
T01bsu036_u:5915: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham ||
T01bsu036_u:5916: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5919: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prakampadbhiḥ kṣetrai pravarṣadbhiḥ padmaiḥ
T01bsu036_u:5920: pravādyamānaistūryakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ, mahatā bodhisattvānubhāvena mahatyā bodhisattvavikurvayā mahatyā bodhisattvaddharyā mahata bodhisattvamāhātmyena mahatā bodhisattvasamāhitena mahatā bodhisattvatejasā jājvalyamānena, mahatā bodhisattvayānena, mahatā
T01bsu036_u:5922: mahadbhirdevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ evamacintyairṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa yenagṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājaḥ yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat |
T01bsu036_u:5923: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantametadavocat
T01bsu036_u:5924: ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bhagavato ratnatejobhyudgatarājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādihāgataḥ iha bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo deśyata iti |
T01bsu036_u:5926: amūni ca bhagavannetāvanti bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāyāgatāni |
T01bsu036_u:5928: samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍārīkaṃ dharmaparyāyameṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vistareṇa
T01bsu036_u:5929: evamukte bhagavān samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - uddhaṭitajñā hi kulaputra ete bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5930: api tvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo yaduta asaṃbhinnatathatā |
T01bsu036_u:5933: atha khalu yāstasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāśca saṃnipatitāḥ, tāsāṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ punarapi bhagavān samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ
T01bsu036_u:5934: samanvāgatasya mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5938: ebhiḥ kulaputra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati ||
T01bsu036_u:5939: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat -
T01bsu036_u:5940: ahaṃ bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi,
T01bsu036_u:5941: svastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi, daṇḍaparihāraṃ kariṣyāmi, viṣadūṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmi,
T01bsu036_u:5942: yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate |
T01bsu036_u:5943: na māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate,
T01bsu036_u:5944: na māraputrā na mārakāyikā devaputrā na mārakanyā na mārapārṣadyā yāvanna bhūyo māraparyutthito bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5945: na devaputrā na yakṣā na pretā na pūtanā na kṛtyā na vetālāstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāvatāraprekṣiṇo
T01bsu036_u:5947: ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasya satatasamitaṃ nityakālaṃ rakṣāṃ (Vaidya 265) kariṣyāmi
T01bsu036_u:5948: yadā ca sa dharmabhāṇako 'smin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktaścaṃkramābhirūḍho bhaviṣyati, tadāhaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike śvetaṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya tasya dharmabhāṇakasya caṃkramakuṭīmupasaṃkramiṣyāmi bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛto 'sya dharmaparyāyasyārakṣāyai |
T01bsu036_u:5949: yadā punastasya dharmabhāṇakasya asmin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktasya sataḥ ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaḥ padavyañjanaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati, tadāhaṃ tasmin śvetaṣaḍdante gajarāje 'bhiruhya tasya dharmabhāṇakasya saṃmukhamupadarśayitvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ pratyuccārayiṣyāmi sa ca dharmabhāṇako mamātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā imaṃ ca dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ mamāntikācchrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate, āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
T01bsu036_u:5950: mama ca sahadarśanena samādhiṃ pratilapsyate, dhāraṇyāvartāṃ ca nāma
T01bsu036_u:5951: dhāraṇīṃ pratilapsyate, koṭīśatasahasrāvartāṃ ca nāma dhāraṇīṃ
T01bsu036_u:5952: pratilapsyate, sarvarutakauśalyāvartāṃ ca nāma dhāraṇīṃ pratilapsyate ||
T01bsu036_u:5953: ye ca bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhikṣavo vā bhikṣūṇyo vā upāsakā vā upāsikā vā evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakā evaṃ sūtrāntalekhakā evaṃ sūtrāntamārgakā evaṃ sūtrāntavācakā ye paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāmasmin dharmaparyāye trisaptāhamekaviṃśatidivasāni caṃkramābhirūḍhā abhiyuktā bhaviṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:5955: tameva śvetaṃ ṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ ekaviṃśatime divase teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ caṃkramamāgamiṣyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:5956: āgatya ca tān dharmabhāṇakān parisaṃharṣayiṣyāmi samādāpayiṣyāmi samuttejayiṣyāmi saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmi
T01bsu036_u:5957: dhāraṇīṃ caiṣāṃ dāsyāmi, yathā te dharmabhāṇakā na kenaciddharṣaṇīyā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:5958: na caiṣāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ
T01bsu036_u:5961: svastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi, daṇḍaparihāraṃ kariṣyāmi, viṣadūṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:5962: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan dharmabhāṇakānāmimāni dhāraṇīpadāni dāsyāmi |
T01bsu036_u:5965: adaṇḍe daṇḍapati daṇḍāvartani daṇḍakuśale daṇḍasudhāri sudhārapati buddhapaśyane sarvadhāraṇi āvartani saṃvartani saṃghaparīkṣite saṃghanirghātani dharmaparīkṣite sarvasattvarutakauśalyānugate siṃhavikrīḍite anuvarte vartani vartāli svāhā ||
T01bsu036_u:5966: imāni tāni bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
T01bsu036_u:5968: ayaṃ ca bhagavan saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracaramāṇo yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hastagato bhaviṣyati,
T01bsu036_u:5969: tairbhagavan dharmabhāṇakairevaṃ veditavyam - samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānubhāvena yadasmākamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya (Vaidya 266) mahāsattvasya caryāyāste bhagavan sattvā lābhino bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:5972: ye idaṃ sūtraṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti, mama tairbhagavan priyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:5973: ya idaṃ sūtraṃ likhisyanti, ye ca asyārthamanubhotsyante, likhitvā ca te bhagavannidaṃ sūtramitaścyutvā trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāya upapatsyante, sahopapannānāṃ caiṣāṃ caturaśītirapsarasāṃ sahasrāṇyupasaṃkramiṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:5974: bherīmātreṇa mukuṭena te devaputrāstāsāmapsarasāṃ madhye sthāsyanti |
T01bsu036_u:5975: īdṛśaḥ kulaputrā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā puṇyaskandhaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5976: kaḥ punarvādo ye etamuddekṣyanti svādhyāyiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti manasi kariṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:5977: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ satkṛtya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo likhitavyaḥ, sarvadetaḥ samanvāhṛtya |
T01bsu036_u:5978: yaśca avikṣiptena manasikāreṇa likhiṣyati, tasya buddhasahasraṃ hastamupanāmayiṣyati, maraṇakāle cāsya buddhasahasraṃ
T01bsu036_u:5981: itaścyutaśca tuṣitānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyopapatsyate, yatra sa maitreyo
T01bsu036_u:5984: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ paṇḍitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ satkṛtya likhitavyaḥ
T01bsu036_u:5986: imaṃ kulaputrā dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā uddiśya svādhyāyitvā bhāvayitvā manasikṛtvā evamaprameyā guṇā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:5987: tasmāttarhi tena paṇḍitena bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:5989: tasmāttarhi bhagavan ahamapi tāvadimaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhiṣṭhāsyāmi, yathā bhagavan mamādhiṣṭhānena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracariṣyati ||
T01bsu036_u:5990: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu036_u:5991: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samantabhadrāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu samantabhadra, yatra hi nāma tvamevaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
T01bsu036_u:5994: mahākaruṇāsaṃgṛhītenādhyāśayena, acintyasaṃgṛhītena cittotpādena, yastvaṃ svayameva teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ karoṣi |
T01bsu036_u:5995: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:5997: ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikācchrutaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:6000: anumoditaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhaviṣyati śākyamuninā ca tathāgatena teṣāṃ mūrdhni pāṇiḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:6002: tathāgataśāsanaparigrāhakāśca te samantabhadra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
T01bsu036_u:6004: na ca teṣāṃ lokāyate rucirbhaviṣyati, na kāvyaprasṛtāḥ sattvāsteṣāmabhirucitā bhaviṣyanti, na nṛttakā na mallā na nartakā na śauṇḍikaurabhrikakaukkuṭikasaukarikastrīpoṣakāḥ
T01bsu036_u:6006: īdṛśāṃśca sūtrāntān śrutvā likhitvā dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā na teṣāmanyadabhirucitaṃ bhaviṣyati
T01bsu036_u:6011: evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakāśca ye bhikṣavo bhaviṣyanti, na teṣāṃ rāgo vyābādhiṣyati, na dveṣo na moho nerṣyā na mātsaryaṃ na mrakṣo na māno nādhimāno na mithyāmānaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:6013: yaḥ samantabhadra paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ paśyet, evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - gamiṣyatyayaṃ kulaputro bodhimaṇḍam,
T01bsu036_u:6017: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ dhārayiṣyanti, na te bhikṣavo lubdhā bhaviṣyanti, na cīvaragṛddhā na pātragṛddhā bhaviṣyanti |
T01bsu036_u:6021: ya evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ mohaṃ dāsyanti, jātyandhāste sattvā
T01bsu036_u:6023: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme kāyaścitro bhaviṣyati |
T01bsu036_u:6024: ya evaṃ sūtrāntalekhakānāmuccagghanaṃ kariṣyanti ullapiṣyanti, te khaṇḍadantāśca bhaviṣyanti, varaladantāśca bhaviṣyanti, bībhatsoṣṭhāśca bhaviṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:6028: ye īdṛśānāṃ sūtrāntalekhakānāṃ sūtrāntavācakānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ ca sūtrāntadeśakānāṃ ca apriyāṃ vācaṃ bhūtāmabhūtāṃ vā saṃśrāvayiṣyanti,
T01bsu036_u:6030: tasmāttarhi samantabhadra asya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dūrata eva pratyutthātavyam
T01bsu036_u:6031: yathā tathāgatasyāntike gauravaṃ kartavyam, tathā teṣāmeva sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāmevaṃ gauravaṃ kartavyam ||
T01bsu036_u:6032: asmin khalu punaḥ samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarte nirdiśyamāne gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt ||
T01bsu036_u:6033: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarto nāma ṣaḍviṃśatimaḥ ||
T01bsu036_u:6036: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utthāya tasmāddharmāsanāt sarvāṃstān bodhisattvāan piṇḍīkṛtya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā
T01bsu036_u:6037: ṛddhayabhisaṃskārapariniṣpannena dakṣiṇahasteṣvadhyālambya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadavocat - imāmahaṃ kulaputrā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipāmi |
T01bsu036_u:6038: yathā vipulā vaistārikī bhavet, tathā yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāḥ karaṇīyam |
T01bsu036_u:6039: dvaitīyakamapi traitīyakamapi bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināadhyālambyaitadavocat - imāmahaṃ kulaputrā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipami |
T01bsu036_u:6040: yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputra udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā deśayitavyā prakāśayitavyā
T01bsu036_u:6043: kulaputrā aparigṛhītacitto viśārado buddhajñānasya dātā, tathāgatajñānasya svayaṃbhūjñānasya dātā |
T01bsu036_u:6046: amatsaribhirbhūtvemaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanaṃ mahopāyakauśalyamāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃśrāvayitavyaḥ |
T01bsu036_u:6047: ye ca aśrāddhāḥ sattvāste 'smin dharmaparyāye samādāpayitavyāḥ |
T01bsu036_u:6048: evaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāstathāgatānāṃ pratikāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati ||
T01bsu036_u:6049: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan |
T01bsu036_u:6051: samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ - tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo
T01bsu036_u:6056: dvaitīyakamapi, traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu
T01bsu036_u:6058: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati |
T01bsu036_u:6060: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma |
T01bsu036_u:6061: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma - yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ
T01bsu036_u:6063: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa |
T01bsu036_u:6067: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu
T01bsu036_u:6068: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān
T01bsu036_u:6069: bodhisattvagaṇaḥ, te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo 'bhyudgatāḥ, te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ, sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
T01bsu036_u:6070: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye 'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ
T01bsu036_u:6071: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
T01bsu036_u:6072: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
